CHAATNE KE VAASTE..<br />\n<br />\nI APPEND BELOW <span style=\"color: blue;\">BHAGAVAD GITA CHAPTER 5 VERSE 18</span> --IF ANYBODY HAS TRANSLATED THIS VERSE THE CORRECT WAY IN ANY BOOK OR ON THE INTERNET OR VIDEO--I WILL STOP BLOGGING AND EAT MY OWN HEAD<br />\n<br />\n\u0935\u093f\u0926\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0935\u093f\u0928\u092f\u0938\u092e\u094d\u092a\u0928\u094d\u0928\u0947 \u092c\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0939\u094d\u092e\u0923\u0947 \u0917\u0935\u093f \u0939\u0938\u094d\u0924\u093f\u0928\u093f |<br />\n\u0936\u0941\u0928\u093f \u091a\u0948\u0935 \u0936\u094d\u0935\u092a\u093e\u0915\u0947 \u091a \u092a\u0923\u094d\u0921\u093f\u0924\u093e: \u0938\u092e\u0926\u0930\u094d\u0936\u093f\u0928: || 5.18||<br />\n<br />\nvidy\u0101-vinaya-sampanne br\u0101hma\u1e47e gavi hastini<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">\u015bhuni</span> chaiva <span style=\"color: red;\">\u015bhva-p\u0101ke</span> cha pa\u1e47\u1e0dit\u0101\u1e25 sama-dar\u015bhina\u1e25<br />\n<br />\nMEANING : A JIVAN MUKT WITH SOUL OF HIGHEST FREQUENCY AND ZERO EGO ( VIDYA VINAYA SAMPANNE BRAHMANE) HAS EQUAL VISION FOR A COW ( SACRED ANIMAL ) , ELEPHANT ( CONSCIOUS ANIMAL ), DOG ( NON-CONSCIOUS ANIMAL ) , AN ILLITERATE CONSCIOUS HUMAN AND A LITERATE CONSCIOUS HUMAN ..<br />\n<br />\n\"&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">SHVA PAKE</span>&nbsp;</b>\"- HAS BEEN INJECTED ALL OVER AS&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">DOG EATING SHUDRA</span></b>&nbsp;( THIS MAKES KANCHA ILAH MOAN AND HAVE WHITE SPITTLE AT THE CORNERS OF HIS BLACK LIPS ).. IN ANY CASE PAKE DOES NOT MEAN EATING IN SANSKRIT OR MALAYALAM..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">WHEN THE PREVIOUS WORD \"</span><span style=\"color: red;\">SHUNI</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">\" IS DOG , WHY SHOULD BE THE NEXT WORD FOR SAME DOG BE \"</span><span style=\"color: red;\">SHVA</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">\" ?<br /><br />THERE ARE NO SYNONYMS IN SANSKRIT..</span></b><br />\nIN SANSKRIT AND MALAYALAM KUKKURAH MEANS DOG ON EARTH ..<br />\n<br />\nSHUNI ELEVATES THE DOG TO YAMA STATUS ( GUARDIAN OF THE SOUTH , DOG IN HEAVEN - SARAMA / SVAN )<br />\n<br />\nIN VEDAS SARAMA RECOVERED THE COWS STOLEN BY PANIS .. THIS IS A ALLEGORY FIGHT BETWEEN LIGHT AND DARKNESS..<br />\n<br />\nTHE ENTIRE \"SAYANA \" TRANSLATION OF VEDAS HAS BEEN POISON INJECTED AND HIJACKED .. IT WAS JNU COMMIE ROMILA THAPAR WHO GOT HINDUS IN BALI TO SACRIFICE ANIMALS EVERY DAY..<br />\n<br />\nFIRST OF ALL SAYANA WAS NOT A TELUGU MAN WHO EXISTED 600 YEARS AGO -- HE WAS A KERALA NAMBOODIRI WHO EXISTED MORE THAN 3000 YEARS AGO..<br />\n<br />\nI WILL WRITE ABOUT IT..<br />\n<br />\nSEND THIS TO ROMILA THAPAR , DHARMAWIKI AND SWAMY -- TELL THEM THIS IS CAPTAINs \"OPINION\".. AND IT WONT DOVETAIL WITH KERALA CHRISTIAN VETTAM MANI SHIT..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/11/open-letter-to-romila-thapar-from-capt.html</span><br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nNOTE: IMPORTANT-- I HAVE DISCONTINUED MY USUAL PRACTICE OF SENDING MY COMMENTS TO PM, MINISTERS, JUDGES, POLICE ETC ( TILL FURTHER NOTICE ) DUE TO THE EMERGENCY WAR SITUATION..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; line-height: 115%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">MIND YOU, SHIVA AND HIS VAHANA NANDI THE BULL AND BHAIRAVA AND HIS VAHANA SARAMA THE WOLF ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES&nbsp; ( JUST IN CASE TEESTA SETALVAD GETS IDEAS )&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"251\" data-original-width=\"201\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-5xRow4TQzkg/XHfB-Jrpz5I/AAAAAAABf9c/aVlSaGDW82QmYFm4--sQVjSYPXgnVdhkgCLcBGAs/s640/doSwnload.jpg\" width=\"512\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Two decades ago, I was\ndriving my car at high speed through a forest at night . Suddenly a wolf crossed the\nroad eyes burning bright-- and I had to brake hard..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I cried out\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;FUCKIN\u2019 SARAMEYAH !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This means wolf in\nMalayalam and Sanskrit.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At that time both my\nsons were school going children.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even today when I\ndrive, if a dog crosses the road in front of my car my sons will holler DADDY\nSARAMEYAH ! &nbsp;and have a ball.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-eDmcwAQRuPk/XHfrA6mpeFI/AAAAAAABf-M/kgBbGfjtEC4dnw81rlRIa5sChSi8Gi5cwCLcBGAs/s1600/lgPPF32544.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just see, O Bh\u012bma, how\nthe she WOLF howls at the rising sun and vomits fire, and how the DOG&nbsp; barks at me fearlessly.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">k\u1e63ut-par\u012bta\u1e25\u2014overcome\nby hunger; yath\u0101\u2014as; d\u012bna\u1e25\u2014poor; <span style=\"color: red;\">s\u0101rameya\u1e25</span>\u2014a dog; g\u1e5bham\u2014from one house; g\u1e5bham\u2014to\nanother house; caran\u2014wandering; vindati\u2014receives; yat\u2014whose; di\u1e63\u1e6dam\u2014according\nto destiny; da\u1e47\u1e0dam\u2014punishment; odanam\u2014food; eva\u2014certainly; v\u0101\u2014or;\ntath\u0101\u2014similarly; k\u0101ma-\u0101\u015baya\u1e25\u2014pursuing different types of desires; j\u012bva\u1e25\u2014the\nliving entity; ucca\u2014high; avaca\u2014low; path\u0101\u2014on a path; bhraman\u2014wandering;\nupari\u2014high; adha\u1e25\u2014low; v\u0101\u2014or; madhye\u2014in the middle; v\u0101\u2014or; y\u0101ti\u2014goes toward; di\u1e63\u1e6dam\u2014according\nto destiny; priya\u2014pleasing; apriyam\u2014not pleasing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The living entity is\nexactly like a dog, who, overcome with hunger, goes from door to door for some\nfood. According to his destiny, he sometimes receives punishment and is driven\nout and at other times receives a little food to eat. Similarly, the living\nentity, being influenced by so many desires, wanders according to KARMA BASED destiny.\nSometimes he is on high, and sometimes he is low paths . &nbsp;Sometimes he goes to the pleasing HIGH ASTRAL\nLAYERS , sometimes to unpleasing LOWEST ASTRAL LAYER , sometimes to the\nMIDDLE ASTRAL LAYERS&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 28, 2019 at 8:10 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nMahodaya,<br />\n<br />\nCould you please tell us more about there being no synonyms in Samskrutha?<br />\n<br />\nIn the Bhagavatgeeta verse you mentioned, Hastini = Elephant ; Shuni = Dog<br />\n<br />\nBut in Samskrutha learnt at school, Elephant is also called Gaja (same in Kannada), Naga and Dog is called Shwana (same in Kannada)<br />\n<br />\nPlease help in understanding.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AKRURA WHO SHARED THE\nSAME GREAT GREAT GRANDFATHER AS KRISHNA , HAD ELEVEN YOUNGER BROTHERS \u2026 ONE WAS\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">SARAMEYAH ( WOLF )..</span></b> &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AKRURA KEPT KRISHNAs\nSYAMANTHAKAM DIAMOND ( KOHINOOR ) FOR SAFE KEEPING..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AKRURA FOUGHT AGAINST\nJARASANDHA ( POWERFUL KING OF MAGADHA ) ALONGSIDE KRISHNA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">SRIMAD BHAGAVAD VERSE 9.24. 16 - 18</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0101sa\u1e45ga\u1e25 <span style=\"color: red;\">s\u0101rameya\u015b</span> ca<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">m\u1e5bduro m\u1e5bduvid giri\u1e25<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">dharmav\u1e5bddha\u1e25 sukarm\u0101\nca<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">k\u1e63etropek\u1e63o \u2019rimardana\u1e25<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u015batrughno gandham\u0101da\u015b\nca<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">pratib\u0101hu\u015b ca dv\u0101da\u015ba<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">te\u1e63\u0101\u1e41 svas\u0101 suc\u0101r\u0101khy\u0101<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">dv\u0101v akr\u016bra-sut\u0101v api<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">devav\u0101n upadeva\u015b ca<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">tath\u0101 citrarath\u0101tmaj\u0101\u1e25<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">p\u1e5bthur vid\u016brath\u0101dy\u0101\u015b ca<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">bahavo v\u1e5b\u1e63\u1e47i-nandan\u0101\u1e25<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0101sa\u1e45ga\u1e25 \u2014 \u0100sa\u1e45ga;\ns\u0101rameya\u1e25 \u2014 <span style=\"color: red;\">SARAMEYA ( WOLF )</span> &nbsp;ca \u2014 also;\nm\u1e5bdura\u1e25 \u2014 M\u1e5bdura; m\u1e5bduvit \u2014 M\u1e5bduvit; giri\u1e25 \u2014 Giri; dharmav\u1e5bddha\u1e25 \u2014 Dharmav\u1e5bddha;\nsukarm\u0101 \u2014 Sukarm\u0101; ca \u2014 also; k\u1e63etropek\u1e63a\u1e25 \u2014 K\u1e63etropek\u1e63a; arimardana\u1e25 \u2014\nArimardana; \u015batrughna\u1e25 \u2014 \u015aatrughna; gandham\u0101da\u1e25 \u2014 Gandham\u0101da; ca \u2014 and;\npratib\u0101hu\u1e25 \u2014 Pratib\u0101hu; ca \u2014 and; dv\u0101da\u015ba \u2014 twelve; te\u1e63\u0101m \u2014 of them; svas\u0101 \u2014\nsister; suc\u0101r\u0101 \u2014 Suc\u0101r\u0101; \u0101khy\u0101 \u2014 well known; dvau \u2014 two; akr\u016bra \u2014 of Akr\u016bra;\nsutau \u2014 sons; api \u2014 also; devav\u0101n \u2014 Devav\u0101n; upadeva\u1e25 ca \u2014 and Upadeva; tath\u0101 \u2014\nthereafter; citraratha-\u0101tmaj\u0101\u1e25 \u2014 the sons of Citraratha; p\u1e5bthu\u1e25 vid\u016bratha \u2014 P\u1e5bthu\nand Vid\u016bratha; \u0101dy\u0101\u1e25 \u2014 beginning with; ca \u2014 also; bahava\u1e25 \u2014 many; v\u1e5b\u1e63\u1e47i-nandan\u0101\u1e25\n\u2014 the sons of V\u1e5b\u1e63\u1e47i.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TRANSLATION:&nbsp; The names of these twelve were \u0100sa\u1e45ga,\n<span style=\"color: red;\">SARAMEYA</span>, M\u1e5bdura, M\u1e5bduvit, Giri, Dharmav\u1e5bddha, Sukarm\u0101, K\u1e63etropek\u1e63a,\nArimardana, \u015aatrughna, Gandham\u0101da and Pratib\u0101hu. These brothers also had a\nsister named Suc\u0101r\u0101. From Akr\u016bra came two sons, named Devav\u0101n and Upadeva.\nCitraratha had many sons, headed by P\u1e5bthu and Vid\u016bratha, all of whom were known\nas belonging to the dynasty of V\u1e5b\u1e63\u1e47i.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">After the war was over Krishna was himself contemplating the end of the snooty Yadav race. They were very powerful under the protection of lord Krishna so no external force could defeat them. &nbsp;If the Yadavas were unharnessed , they will become a burden to the planet. Krishna realized the gravity of the situation and the importance of bringing the destruction of his own beloved race. &nbsp;Gandhari\u2019s curse came at the right time as if on divine cue.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Days flew by after the coronation of Yudhishtra as the king of Hasthinapur. Krishna went back to Dwaraka to rule over the prosperous kingdom. &nbsp;Slowly but steadily the the curse of Gandhari bore fruit.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The pompous Yadavas shed their conduct, morals, scruples and humility. &nbsp;One incident sealed their fate. Some great sages were on pilgrimage and they stopped by at Dwarka to meet Krishna and Balarama.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The Yadavas, which included Bhodakas, Vrishnis, Kekeyas and Andakas, wre now at the peak of wanton uncouth behavior. A bunch of Yadava boys decided to tease the sages. They dressed Samba, the handsome son of Krishna &nbsp;as a woman and tied pillows on his stomach to make the woman look pregnant.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">They approached the sages and asked them to predict whether the 'lady' would give birth to a boy or a girl. &nbsp;The dismayed sages saw through this charade and were shocked at this lack pf respect. &nbsp;In anger, on of the sages cursed them saying that the disguised boy will give birth to a lump of iron which will destroy the entire Yadava race.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; clear: both; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-wfZHNGSqaUY/VAVzOJytaBI/AAAAAAAAvds/2CC7xYXKNqw/s1600/KA1_16dd8.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-wfZHNGSqaUY/VAVzOJytaBI/AAAAAAAAvds/2CC7xYXKNqw/s1600/KA1_16dd8.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"480\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The Yadavas, again showed extreme disrespect and responded with sarcasm, instead of an apology.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 12pt;\">There was a pall of fear and impending doom the next day when Krishna\u2019s son Sambha developed labour pains and soon delivered an iron mace . They immediately rushed with the mace to </span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">Akroora</span><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 12pt;\"> and Ugrasena and in the presence of Krishna himself; they narrated the weird tide of events.&nbsp;</span></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;Krishna knew the events which would transpire in future , and kept quiet. Seeing Krishna silent , </span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">Akroora </span><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 12pt;\">cried \u201cGrind the mace to a fine powder and cast it into the ocean.\u201d The Yadavas nodded and ran to comply.<o:p></o:p></span></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">Akroora </span><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 12pt;\">looked with intent at Krishna, his eyes full of questions. &nbsp;Krishna simply smiled back. \u201cUncle, the Kala Chakra is now in motion . Sambha has played his part perfectly.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">He left without another word, leaving both of them bewildered.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u201cWhat did he mean by that?\u201d asked Ugrasena. \u201cI can tell you that, father.\u201d Ugrasena turned around to the source of voice - Rukmini. \u201cThirty six year ago, Krishna prayed to Shiva for a son like him\u2014a god of detruction -does that mean anything?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The time for gandari\u2019s curse to take effect had arrived.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 12pt;\">Outside the palace, the Yadavas had obeyed</span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"> Akroora\u2019s </span><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 12pt;\">command and they ground the iron mace into fine powder\u2014except for a stubborn triangular piece looking like an arrow head. It was too hard to grind . The Yadavas threw everything into the sea.<o:p></o:p></span></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The fear disappeared and they went back to their wanton and rowdy behavior . They started to drink heavily and were intoxicated throughout the day. &nbsp;Time rolled by. The triangular piece of the mace was swallowed by a fish. The fish was caught by a hunter, who upon finding the piece in the fish\u2019s entrails immediately used it to craft a fine poisonous arrow.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The fine powder, on the other hand, washed back ashore and deposited itself by the beautiful coast of Dwaraka. A certain sharp serrated grass grew in lush abundance in the area where the powder was deposited. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Everything was set and in place for the final showdown.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">After 36 years of Mahabharat war, evil omen started to appear in the Dwaraka city. The Sudarshana chakra, Panchajanya shankh, the chariot of lord Krishna and the plough weapon of Balarama just disappeared from earth. &nbsp;&nbsp;One day, the Yadavas gathered on the beach. The liquor that they drank made them lose their senses completely.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">They started teasing one another, bringing up the gory pasts and gruesome mistakes of each other. &nbsp;Satyaki and Krithavarma acted as the starting points of the doom of Dwaraka. &nbsp;Satyaki had fought on Pandava\u2019s side in the battle of Kurukshetra and Krithavarma, on the Kaurava side. They taunted one another, bringing back memories of the horrific war where the Pandavas cheated against the rules of war , aided and abetted by Krishna. &nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">In a fit of rage, Satyaki, jumped on Krithaverma and cut his head off. The friends of Krithavarma pounced on Satyaki and a great mass brawl followed. &nbsp;Pradyumna, the son of Krishna, innocent though he was, found himself in the thick of the fight and was killed. &nbsp;As they have come to the sea shore for a pleasure, they did not carry any weapons along with them.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; clear: both; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-hJxGiH7WH2U/VAVyQ2mYPXI/AAAAAAAAvdc/zDAv0PL7Nec/s1600/downloddad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-hJxGiH7WH2U/VAVyQ2mYPXI/AAAAAAAAvdc/zDAv0PL7Nec/s1600/downloddad.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">They saw the long grown sharp serrated grass in abundance along the sea shore. They picked up the grass stems and beat and killed each other. The whole area was soaked in red blood. Those grass stems are nothing but blades made of the powder of the same lump of Iron born to Samba. The curse of saints had borne fruit. Each blade of grass became a mace, smashing into the Yadavas, killing them instantly. Except Krishna, all Yadavas were killed. Krishna\u2019s charioteer Daruka and another one called Babhru only survived.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">They both approached Sri Krishna and said: \u201cO Krishna! All Yadavas were killed. Whereabouts of Balarama are not known. It is better to search for him.\u201d Balarama was in deep meditation under a tree. Seeing this, Krishna told Daruka, \u201c\u201cO Daruka! you immediately go to Hastinapura and inform Dharmaja about the mass massacre of Yadavas and bring Arjuna here. He will look after everything.\u201d said Krishna. Accordingly, Daruka rushed towards Hastinapura in a chariot. Krishna went to the place where Balarama was sitting and said \u201cO brother Balarama! I will sit in meditation along with you.\u201d&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; clear: both; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5WYVBpcUpzE/VAVyLC8ZhdI/AAAAAAAAvdU/RoShj64X_-A/s1600/ee.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5WYVBpcUpzE/VAVyLC8ZhdI/AAAAAAAAvdU/RoShj64X_-A/s1600/ee.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"293\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">But there was no reply from Balarama. A long spiral smoke type serpent came out of the face of Balarama. Balarama had just left this mortal body. &nbsp;His soul travelled into the sky through the sea. As Balarama was the incarnation of Adi Sesha, Naga community welcomed back Balarama. &nbsp;Balarama attained moksha and &nbsp;joined Vishnu at Vaikuntam .<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Krishna knew that the time for him to shed his earthly avatar had come. Krishna knew the only way for someone to kill him was by wounding his foot. &nbsp;He remembered the curse of Maharishi Durvasa, which left his foot vulnerable. &nbsp;Krishna laid down under a tree and went into Yoga Samadhi. &nbsp;At that time a hunter Jara entered that forest. That hunter misunderstood the moving foot of Krishna as a lurking deer and shot a lethal arrow that pierced into Krishna\u2019s feet.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; clear: both; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wkB5ORqeQVM/VAVx2M6kicI/AAAAAAAAvdM/R0-UksMLeWQ/s1600/downleeoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wkB5ORqeQVM/VAVx2M6kicI/AAAAAAAAvdM/R0-UksMLeWQ/s1600/downleeoad.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"268\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">As soon as the hunter reached Krishna, he realised his mistake and pleaded the lord for forgiveness. Lord Krishna consoles him and tells him how his death was inevitable and things are going as per divine plan . Krishna says that in his previous birth as Lord Rama in the Tretayuga, Rama killed Vaali (Sugreeva's brother) from behind. So, Krishna has now reaped the price for the same through Jara who was king Vaali in his previous birth.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; clear: both; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kDY7601VKBs/VAVxxPWaiQI/AAAAAAAAvdE/tKAR7AIF4m4/s1600/imddages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kDY7601VKBs/VAVxxPWaiQI/AAAAAAAAvdE/tKAR7AIF4m4/s1600/imddages.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"257\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Such was the Dharma thatt, even for the Ruler of the Universe, the laws of Karma remain the same. Hence, lord Krishna left the mortal world. &nbsp;The time from which lord Krishna died is considered to be the beginning of Kaliyuga. Daruka, sent by Sri Krishna, met Pandavas and informed them about the tragic deaths.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">On hearing this, Pandavas plunged into great grief. After taking suitable instructions from Dharmaja, Arjuna reached Dwarka. &nbsp;Dwarka was destined to be flooded &nbsp;within seven days of Krishna\u2019s death; hence, Arjuna decided to take the survivors and the Vishnu idol to Indraprastha.&nbsp; &nbsp;Krishna's father left for heavenly abode while being in deep meditation.&nbsp; Arjuna performed the last rites for Krishna and his kinsman.&nbsp; All the ladies and children started moving towards Indraprastha along with Arjuna.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; clear: both; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UIFFL_1KgLA/VAVy5rZLigI/AAAAAAAAvdk/wzCSlf0ORGY/s1600/Dwarka-Golden-Cittyty-Krishna-Balrama.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"292\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UIFFL_1KgLA/VAVy5rZLigI/AAAAAAAAvdk/wzCSlf0ORGY/s1600/Dwarka-Golden-Cittyty-Krishna-Balrama.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">As the people walked away from the Dwaraka city, and they looked back for the last time, the city sank into the sea.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; clear: both; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-s-ZXJaXtPEQ/VAVxbFHIlaI/AAAAAAAAvc8/-hDU7pOf9Mg/s1600/downddeload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"182\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-s-ZXJaXtPEQ/VAVxbFHIlaI/AAAAAAAAvc8/-hDU7pOf9Mg/s1600/downddeload.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">On the way, some thieves of saw that only one man with a bow accompanied the ladies. They tried to rob them. Arjuna who was once a very great archer, found it very difficult to even lift his bow. When he tried to invoke his Divya astras, he forgot all those mental passwords to arm his arrows.. The thieves killed many people and kidnapped some beautiful women. Some of the ladies including the wives of Krishna and Balarama self immolated. &nbsp;This was NOT Sati.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Arjuna unable to even protect the women arrived at Hastinapur in a most dejected condition, not wishing to live anymore. The Pandavas visited sage VedaVyasa and narrated the Yadavas destruction, Krishna's death and Arjuna\u2019s inability to save the Yadava women. The sage consoled the Pandavas and told them that their purpose on the earth is served.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The Pandavas coroneted Parikshit and embarked on their final journey towards the Himalayas with Draupdai . A dog followed them . Krishna participated in the Kurukshethra battle only after Arjuna and Duryodana themselves voluntarily came to seek his help in Dwaraka. Matters so transpired that he gave his mighty Narayani sena to Duryodana and became a charioteer to Arjuna.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; clear: both; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jVpZDdW44mU/VAVxMTJ1KuI/AAAAAAAAvc0/yj6oNYcDw2s/s1600/dowrehnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"309\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jVpZDdW44mU/VAVxMTJ1KuI/AAAAAAAAvc0/yj6oNYcDw2s/s1600/dowrehnload.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE DOG WHICH FOLLOWED\nPANDAVA BROTHERS AND DRAUPADI &nbsp;WAS YAMA ,\nWHO IS IN CHARGE OF ASTRAL LAYERS TWO TO SIX.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE ABODE OF YAMA IS\nGUARDED BY TWO BLACK FOUR EYED SARAMEYAS ( WOLVES ), THE SONS OF SARAMA \u2013( THE PRIMORDIAL\nMOTHER OF WOLVES) &nbsp;AND SISIRA &nbsp;( PRIMORDIAL FATHER OF WOLVES ) &nbsp;..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN THE TENTH MANDALA OF\nRIG VEDA ( WHICH CAME ON ORAL ROUTE FOR 330 CENTURIES BEFORE BEING PENNED DOWN\n70 CENTURIES AGK ) SHYAMA AND SABALA ARE SARAMAs DAUGHTERS. &nbsp;&nbsp;THEY ARE GUARDIANS OF THE ASTRAL LAYERS TWO TO\nSIX..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">RAVANAs YOUNGER BROTHER\nVIBHISHANAs WIFE WAS NAMED SARAMA..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JANAMEJAYA THE GREAT\nGRANDSON OF ARJUNA ( SON OF KING PARIKSHIT ) WAS CURSED BY WOLF SARAMA FOR\nINJURING HER SON..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">IN VEDIC SRUTIS SARAMA MEANS INTUITION ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THE WHITE MANs MIND IS TOO SHALLOW TO COMPREHEND THIS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">SARAMA IS THE PIONEER WHO CARRIES HIS OWN LAMP ON HIS OWN UNBEATEN PATH RELENTLESSLY TOWARDS HIS GOAL.. CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL IS A SARAMA.</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-aie4aQ19sMk/XHgOLVBz5YI/AAAAAAABf-4/DXSfK_YdH3EIuYAzRHCBlu4zUnVXpRAfQCLcBGAs/s1600/WGolf-Symbolism-Spirit-Animal-Dream.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">GERMAN JEW ROTHSCHILD WHO\nRULED INDIA, INJECTED POISON INTO CHAPTER 5 VERSE 18 OF BHAGAWAD GITA.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">HE CALLED SHUDRA AS DOG\nEATER.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; \u015bhuni\u2014a dog; cha\u2014and; eva\u2014certainly; <span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">\u015bhva-p\u0101ke\u2014a\ndog-eater</span></span>; cha\u2014and; pa\u1e47\u1e0dit\u0101\u1e25\u2014the learned; sama-dar\u015bhina\u1e25\u2014see with equal vision<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Translation --: The\ntruly learned, with the eyes of divine knowledge, see with equal vision a\nBrahmin, a cow, an elephant, a dog, and a <span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">dog-eater.</span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">NOW THIS IS NOT A BIG\nDEAL \u2013 JESUS WAS COOKED UP. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE GREATEST INVENTOR\nON THE PLANET NIKOLA TESLA ( AC ELECTRICITY&nbsp;\n) WAS DELETED FROM HISTORY.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">USING THE LIE OF\nBRAHMACHARI AS A \u201cSEMEN RETAINER \u201c &nbsp;ANAL\nSEX RECEIVING FAKE GURUS TOOK OVER SANATANA DHARMA.. &nbsp;OUR TEMPLE PRIESTS BECAME HOMOSEXUALS ENMASSE LIKE\nIN CATHOLIC CHURCHES .. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ALL THIS WHEN SANATANA\nDHARMA CLEARLY SAYS\u2014NO HINDU CAN DO A YAGNA UNLESS HE IS MARRIED TO A WOMAN ( HE\nCANNOT BE&nbsp; BACHELOR OR A WIDOWER )..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">OUR MAIN GOD SHIVA BECAME A SEX MANIAC , RAPIST\nAND A CORPSE EATER.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">OUR TEMPLES BECAME\nWHORE HOUSES <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHEN A DROP OF BLOOD\nCANNOT BE OUTSIDE THE BODY LEATHER BAG IN A TEMPLE &nbsp;( SABARIMALA &nbsp;CASE ) , ANIMAL SACRIFICES BECAME RAMPANT\nINSIDE TEMPLES..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/11/all-animal-sacrifices-in-hindu-temples.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/11/all-animal-sacrifices-in-hindu-temples.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">KAMA GOT EQUATED WITH\nPERVERSE SEX AND SEMEN .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/07/kamasutra-by-vatsayana-immoral-sexual.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/07/kamasutra-by-vatsayana-immoral-sexual.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">NOBLE MAHARISHI MANU ,\nTHIS PLANETs OLDEST LAW GIVER BECAME A BIGOT AND TYRANT , WHO HARASSED SHUDRAS\nBY POURING MOLTEN LEAD INO THEIR EARS .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">FOUR ORIGINAL MUTTS\nCREATED BY KERALA NAMBOODIRI ADI SHANKARACHARYA 4000 YEARS AGO WITH THE EXPRESS\nCONDITION THAT THESE 4 MUTTS MUST BE HEADED BY KERALA NAMBOODIRIS WHO WERE\nEXPERTS ON ORAL VEDA TRANSMISSION , GOT TAKEN OVER BY CRYPTO JEWS PONTIFFS WHO NEVER\nSTUDIED THE VEDAS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;WHEN THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA THERE WERE\nONLY 4 ORIGINAL MUTTS.&nbsp; &nbsp; WHEN HE LEFT INDIA IN 1947 THERE WERE MORE THAN 1000\nFAKE MUTTS MOST HEADED BY ANALS SEX RECEIVING HOMOSEXUAL PONTIFFS ( BRAHMACHARIS IF YOU\nPLEAJJE ) WHO TROUBLED NON-BRAHMINS&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;.. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">HAVE YOU SEEN HOW FAKE MEAT EATING PANDAS HAVE TAKEN OVER NORTH INDIAN TEMPLES?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THESE FAKE MUTTS\nSMASHED UP SANATANA DHARMA AND GLORIOUS HINDU CULTURE FROM WITHIN..&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;SACRED HINDU SYMBOLS AND TRADITIONS WERE\nMUTILATED.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;KALASHA KUMBHAM IS IMPALED\nAND HUNG UPSIDE DOWN SANS WATER.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">TODAY WHEN A HINDU BRIDEGROOM TRIES TO PUT A GARLAND ON HIS BRIDE , SHE DUCKS .. &nbsp; BOTH ARE SITTING ON HUMAN SHOULDERS .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">MARRIAGES ARE CONDUCTED AT NIGHT..&nbsp; TELUGU\nBRAHMIN BRIDEGROOM WANTS HIS BRIDEs AGED &nbsp;FATHER TO TOUCH HIS FEET AS A WEDDING RITUAL. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A TELUGU BRAHMIN WEDDING WHICH IS SUPPOSED TO BE OVER IN 20\nMINUTES IS DRAGGED TO A &nbsp;RIDICULOUS EIGHT HOURS\nWHERE BRIDE AND BRIDEGROOM KEEPS POURING RICE ON EACH OTHERS HEADS BY THE\nBUCKET LOADS LIKE RETARDED CHILDREN..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHEN A COUPLE ENTERS A\nNEW HOME ( GRIHA PRAVESH ), SHE WILL KICK THE SACRED POT OF AKSHAT RICE&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">CHITPAVAN JEWS BECAME BRAHMINS AND RULERS OF\nMAHARASHTRA.&nbsp;BRAHMINS CANNOT RULE, THESE ARE BASICS ..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; RULING CLASS THIYYAS\nWERE CONVERTED TO COCONUT TREE CLIMBING MONKEYS ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">MISSING LINK BETWEEN BRAHMINS AND KSHATRIYAS ,\nCALLED KAYASTHAS ( TRAITORS ) WITH FAKE GOD CHITRAGUPTA TOOK OVER INDIAN ADMINISTRATION BEFORE INDEPENDENCE ( AFTER INDEPENDENCE TRAITOR JNU COMMIES TOOK OVER ) ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; )&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style=\"color: blue;\">POISON INJECTION IN BHAGAWAD GITA, KAUN SAH\nKHET KA BEET ROOT HAI BHAIYYA &nbsp;?</span></span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc;
