text-decoration-line: none;\">March 1, 2019 at 1:04 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nPranaam Captain<br />\n<br />\n\"<br />\nTHE ABODE OF YAMA IS GUARDED BY TWO BLACK FOUR EYED SARAMEYAS ( WOLVES ), THE SONS OF SARAMA \u2013( THE PRIMORDIAL MOTHER OF WOLVES) AND SISIRA ( PRIMORDIAL FATHER OF WOLVES ) ..\"<br />\n<br />\nis the Sarameyah same as Egyptian god Anubis who ushers souls into afterlife ? Anubis carries a sphere in one hand and a key to Mount Meru in other hand same as Imhotep.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c2651850063358857732-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c2651850063358857732-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c6430351739311385675\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_28.html?showComment=1551408449671#c6430351739311385675\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 1, 2019 at 8:17 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nINDEED -<br />\n<br />\nANUBIS / WEPWAWET HAS THE HEAD OF A KERALA BLACK WOLF ( MUTHAPPAN TEMPLES ) , NOT JACKAL AS WRITTEN BY WESTERN HISTORIANS ...BOTH A VAASTU GODS.. BOTH ARE REPRESENTATIONS OF YAMA..<br />\n<br />\nAnubis the WOLF god was associated with mummification and the afterlife. Anubis is associated with the Higher Mind and is the knowledge on ASTRAL planes which leads one where one needs to go.<br />\n<br />\nTHE GOD WHICH ACCOMPANIED PANDAVAS AND DRAUPADI ON THE LAST JOURNEY WAS IN FACT A WOLF ( YAMA ) .. EGYPTIAN WEPWAWETs ROLE IS SAME AS YAMA-- TO PROTECT THE SOULS TILL THE ASTRAL LAYER PARKING SPACE .<br />\n<br />\nVERSES FROM RIG VEDA MANDALA 7-PENED WON 7000 YEARS AGO.<br />\n<br />\n7.54 (570) [Vastospati.] v\u00e2sto\u1e63 pate pr\u00e1ti j\u0101n\u012bhi asm\u00e2n<br />\n7.55 (571) [Vastospati.] am\u012bvah\u00e2 v\u0101sto\u1e63 pate<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">The guardian WOLF of the astral layers is\nVastospati</span></span><br />\nTHE FIERCE BLACK INDIAN WOLF ( CANIS INDICA ) ATTACHED TO MUTHAPPAN TEMPLES OF HOT AND HUMID KERALA DO NOT HAVE FUR -- LIKE IN SIBERIA ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE INDIAN WOLFs EYES GLOW LIKE BRILLIANT DIAMONDS WHEN LIGHT STRIKES IT IN THE DARK..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS WOLF IS NOW EXTINCT AND HENCE DOGS ARE USED AS A SUBSTITUTE.. THE ANCESTOR OF DOG IS A WOLF..<br />\n<br />\nMOWGLI OF JUNGLE BOOK IS A FERAL CHILD.. IN KERALA THERE ARE LORES OF WOLVES DOING CHILD LIFTING AND REARING THEM AS THEIR OWN..<br />\n<br />\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amala_and_Kamala<br />\n<br />\nFOUNDER OF ROME , ROMULUS WAS A FERAL CHILD , SUCKLED BY A WOLF..THIS WAS A FAKE ADDITION AS ROME IS NAMED AFTER RAM..<br />\n<br />\nThe she-wolf in the act of nurturing the twins can be seen in many buildings as a homage to Rome and is called Lupercale or Natale di Roma ..The she-wolf of the Capitol was the emblem of Rome..<br />\n<br />\nThe Roman Catholic Church equated the wolf with the devil. YAMA is not a devil..<br />\n<br />\nIn the Talmus , the city of Wepwawet was known as Lycopolis, \"Wolf City\". Genghis Khan was a feral child.. Wolves kill more than they can eat, unlike other animals.. Vikings would drink wolf blood before a major battle.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Five Characteristics of\na Student<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kaak cheshtaa, bako\ndhyaanam, shwaan nidraa, alpahaaree, griha Tyaagee,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">......vidyaarthee panch\nlakshanam\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Roughly translated -\nthe five indications of a good student are ---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(1) perseverance of a\ncrow,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(2) concentration of a\ncrane,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(3) light sleeper like\na wolf,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(4) light eater,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(5) staying away from\nhome (means noise, emotions).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The wolf totem ( VRKAH\n) is a reminder to keep your spirit alive and trust your instincts to find the\nway that will best suit you. A very social animal, the wolf values community\nand family offers healing through various wolf characteristic and qualities.\nThese can include healing through empowerment, restorative energies, and guide\nyou in spiritual development.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Call upon the wolf's spiritual energies and\nphysical energies to assist you. One of these abilities is resilience, and\nanother is stamina.&nbsp; The wolf can teach\nyou how to tap into your highest potential as you rise to meet and conquer the\nchallenge before you.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Wolf is &nbsp;the\nmost powerful spirit guides of all, and its presence is a message of guidance. The\nwolf animal totem urges us to ensure that you are playing your part in the\ncommunity and that loyalties are properly maintained.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rig Veda considers\nSarama as intuition which removes the darkness caused by Panis. &nbsp;Sarama is the power of Truth that seeks and\ndiscovers, that finds a divine faculty of insight the hidden Light and denied\nImmortality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. HINDUS .. THEY WERE EATEN FOR DINNER IN AN MASS ORGY OF CANNIBALISM FOR MANY DAYS..<br />\n<br />\nI WILL WRITE ABOUT THIS \"DELETED\" INCIDENT SOON ..<br />\n<br />\nTODAY ORTHODOX CHRISTIANS/ CATHOLIC CHRISTIANS/ JEWS/ MUSLIMS QUARREL OVER JERUSALEM..<br />\n<br />\nBEFORE JUDAISM WAS BORN IN 2950 YEARS AGO--&nbsp; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; Under normal circumstances, the heart and brain communicate with each other via nerve fiber optics running through the spinal column.&nbsp; During a heart transplant, these nerve connections are severed and remain separated for an extended period of time.&nbsp; However, the transplanted heart is still able to function in its new body using its intact, intrinsic nervous system .&nbsp; UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; Vaccines can be used to explain cellular memory.&nbsp; You are given a shot that contains a small controlled amount of a bacteria.&nbsp; Your immune system immediately sets up a counter-offensive to keep you from getting sick from it.&nbsp; Then your immune system 'remembers' that type of experience to keep you healthy. This means vaccines evoke cell memory by their actions. Cells can \u201cremember\u201d how to fight a virus so you won\u2019t get reinfected. HE IS NOT A CUNT..<br />\n<br />\nI NEED ANDHRA NEEDS FINANCIAL HELP TO MAKE A NEW CAPITAL AFTER THEY LOST HYDERABAD TO NEW STATE TELENGANA ..<br />\n<br />\nIF CHANDRABABU NAIDU BECOMES CM OF ANDHRA HE WILL BUILD HIS CAPITAL AT AMRAVATI BEFORE 2024..<br />\n<br />\nPM MODI HIMSELF LAID THE FOUNDATION STONE ON 22ND OCT 2015 AT EDDANDARAYUNIPALEM AREA ON BANKS OF KRISHNA RIVER .<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK AJIT DOVAL / CBI TO CHECK THE BENAMI LANDS CHANDRABABU NAIDU HAS ACQUIRED SURREPTITIOUSLY AT THE HEART OF HIS NEW EARMARKED CAPITAL AMRAVATI .. THIS WILL MAKE HIM THE RICHEST MAN IN INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/05/jagan-mohan-reddy-finally-in-jail-for.html<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">THE BUDDHIST STUPA AT AMARAVATI IS FAKE..<br /><br />THE REAL BUDDHA ( WHO BELIEVED IN VEDAS ) HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH MODERN BUDDHISM ( OF BUDDHA BORN IN 563 BC WHO ATE PIG AND DID NOT BELIEVE IN SOUL ) WE SEE TODAY.. WHEN THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA THERE WAS NOT ONE SINGLE BUDDHIST IN INDIA..<br /><br />THE REAL BUDDHA WAS ADI BUDDHA BORN TO ANJANA OF FATHER HEMAJIT IN KIKATA, BODHGAYA IN 1900 BC..<br /><br />THE FAKE BUDDHA ( BORN IN LUMBINI , KAPILAVASTU, NEPAL ) OF FAKE ASHOKA FAME WAS NOT LIBERATED... HE STRUGGLED FOR SALVATION.. HIS LAST MEAL WAS PIG GIBLET..HIS MOTHER WAS MAYADEVI AND FATHER WAS SHUDDHODANA..<br /><br />his is a passage from my social studies book while at school<br /><br />QUOTE : The great Buddhist Stupa of Amaravati, the Maha chaitya, is one of the greatest architectural achievement of ancient India. The monument was situated on the outskirts of the town of Amaravati near the ancient ruined city of Dharanikota. It was founded in the 3rd-2nd centuries BC during Ashoka Maurya' reign UNQUOTE<br /><br />BUT ALAS\u2014EMPEROR ASHOKA NEVER EXISTED. HE WAS COOKED UP BY JEW ROTHSCHILD .<br /><br />AFTER ALL ASHOKA CONVERTED FROM BAAAAAAD HINDUSIM TO GOOOOOOD BUDDHISM !<br /><br />THE STUPA NEVER EXISTED AT THE SPOT \u2013IT WAS JUST A FIGMENT OF ROTHSCHILDs SLIMY IMAGINATION.. ALL DIAGRAMS ARE FAKE..<br /><br />I HAVE SEEN THE AMARAVATI BUDDHIST RELICS IN THE BRITISH MUSEUM\u2014 THEY ARE ALL FAKE\u2014JUST LIKE THE ASHOKA ROCK EDICTS .<br /><br />I have seen the Colin Mackenzie album of maps, plans and drawings of sculpture from the stupa at Amaravati at the British Library\u2014all FAKE<br /><br />THE NAME OF THIS NEW CAPITAL IS DERIVED FROM AN OLDER VILLAGE IN GUNTUR NAMED AMARAWATHI ON THE BANKS OF THE KRISHNA RIVER<br /><br />Amaravathi Mahachaitya Stupa exists in this village. This is a FAKE relic made by Jew Rothschild to propagate the FAKE Emperor Ashoka who never existed.<br /><br />The Chinese traveller and Buddhist monk Hiuen Tsang (Xuanzang) visited Amaravati in 640 AD as per Rothschild historians \u2013 BALLS! This fellow Hiun Tsang was cooked up by Jew Rothschild.<br /><br />Colonel Colin Mackenzie working for Rothschild as the first Surveyor General of India was a FAKE archaeologist, FAKE collector of antiquities and an orientalist\u2014who did propaganda for this FAKE Buddhist STUPA ..<br /><br />Colonel Colin Mackenzie was involved in the MURDER of Tipu Sultan while he was eating breakfast in 1799 at his palace in Srirangapatnam..<br /><br />CHANDRABABU NAIDU WANTS TO MAKE AMARAVATHI A BUDDHIST MECCA..</span><br />\n87 % of the nearly 54,000 acres land (lying between Vijayawada and Guntur cities alongside the river Krishna) designated for Amravati has been acquired under the land pooling system from 28,200 farmers .. This is a fertile area growing 3 crops a year for 122 varieties of food crops.. Even marginal farmers who own half an acre or less earn more than Rs 32,000 each month<br />\n<br />\nThis area if a FOOD BOWL and will be prone to floods.. Why trade precious FOOD for a concrete Jungle?<br />\n<br />\nTHE TOPSOIL IS SOFT AND IF TALL BUILDING HAVE TO BE MADE, THE BOTTOM OF THE TOP SOIL WHERE FOUNDATIONS WILL BE DRIVEN IN MUST BE INVESTIGATED FOR SUITABILITY..<br />\n<br />\nIF CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WAS THE BOSS OF NGT OR ENVIRONMENT MINISTER OR PM \u2014 I WONT GIVE CLEARANCE FOR BEING ENVIRONMENTALLY UNSUSTAINABLE ..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c4630046836699855545-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c4630046836699855545-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c4375031982074918446\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. NAIDU BABY WANTS HIS STATUE EVERYWHERE ?<br />\n<br />\nEVEN TODAY KRISHNA FLOWING THROUGH ANDHRA TO SEA GETS DRY..<br />\n<br />\nPooling emerges from a separate state law called the Andhra Pradesh Capital Region Development Authority Act passed by the Assembly on December 22, 2014. This scheme doesn\u2019t offer monetary compensation for land taken. In exchange for village land taken today, it offers a developed piece of land in the future city.<br />\n<br />\nFor every fertile acre pooled, the state will return 25% of developed area in the future city: a 1,000 square-yard residential plot, and a 250 square-yard commercial plot..<br />\n<br />\nNaidu baby has already got a home in Amaravati.. Most pro-pooling farmers are Kammas, like Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu. They are traditional voters of the ruling TDP.<br />\n<br />\nMost anti-pooling farmers are Reddys or Kapus, supporting the YSR Congress.<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL DECLARES\u2014ALL THOSE WHO HAD VISION OF A BUSTLING AMARAVATI CITY WITH WHITE FOREIGNERS PLAYING GOLF LOOKING INTO A MIGHTY FLOWING KRISHNA RIVER \u2013THEY MUST BE COLLECTED TOGETHER AND SHOT WITH THEIR OWN SHIT<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c4375031982074918446-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c249699038761574302\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. FIT ONLY FOR DIMWIT FRENCH WOMEN..<br />\n<br />\nKALKI BABY, JUST BECAUSE YOU DOD A LESBIAN SCENE IN A BOLLYWOOD MOVIE , NOW YOU THINK YOU CAN ADVISE INDIA?...<br />\n<br />\nAND JUST IN CASE YOU THINK YOU LOOK BEAUTIFUL-- YOU ARE A UGLY WOMAN BY FRENCH STANDARDS.. HALF WITS LIKE YOU WILL NOT UNDERSTAND THE GLORY OF SANATANA DHARMA..<br />\n<br />\nYOU COULD NOT TOLERATE ONE HUSBAND ( WE KNOW IT WAS THE OTHER WAY AROUND -- REMEMBER THE PEBBLE IN THE JAR ? ) --THAT IS YOUR PROBLEM..<br />\n<br />\nKALKI BABY, GET INITIATED ABOUT THE ALLEGORY OF DRAUPADI..<br />\n<br />\nEVERY HINDUS GOD EXCEPT VISHNU AVATARS RAMA, KRISHNA AND AYYAPPA ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES.<br />\n<br />\nIF RAVANA IS MENTIONED IN RAMAYANA AS HAVING TEN HEADS , IT IS JUST AN ALLEGORY FOR HAVING TEN HEADS WORTH OF KNOWLEDGE IN ONE SINGLE HEAD.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">DRAUPADI OF MAHABHARATA IS AN ALLEGORY FOR KUNDALINI SHAKTI..<br /><br />DRAUPADI CAME OUT OF A YAGNA .<br /><br /><span style=\"font-size: medium;\">Draupadi was NOT born like you and me. She came directly out of the yagna fire at the ripe age to be married right away..</span></span><br />\n<br />\nKing Drupada performed a yagna called Putrakameshti yajna. From the sacrificial fire, Draupadi emerged as a beautiful dark-skinned longhaired young woman..<br />\n<br />\nWhen she emerged from the fire, a heavenly voice said that she would bring about the destruction of the Kuru line and all were stunned. The prophecy came true when she insulted King Duryodhana ( son of blind parents is also blind ) where he was tricked to fall into a pool..<br />\n<br />\nDraupadi ( Indrasena in her previous birth ) was a daughter of an ascetic Sage Moudgalya . She did a hard tapasya to please Lord Shiva as she could not get a husband worthy of her .<br />\n<br />\nAfter many years of penance, Lord Shiva ( cosmic allegory ) was pleased with her and appeared to grant a boon.<br />\n<br />\nDraupadi ( Indrasena ) asked for a husband with five qualities in her next life . The first that he should be a moral man. Second, he should be valiant. Third he should be good looking. Fourth, he should be knowledgeable and fifth that he should be kind and loving.<br />\n<br />\nLord Shiva thought for a while and then he said that all these five qualities could not exist in one person.<br />\n<br />\nTherefore he blessed Draupadi with the boon that in her next birth, she would have five husbands who would possess all the five qualities, individually.<br />\n<br />\nHence, when she was born as Draupadi to king Drupad, she was pre-destined to get married to the five brothers.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS AN ALLEGORY THAT THERE IS NO BUNGEE JUMP FOR THE KUNDALINI UP THE UPPER CHAKRAS ..<br />\n<br />\nAND THERE IS NO INSTANT BUNJEE JUMP FOR THE SOUL AFTER DEATH TO THE SEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER FOR MOKSHA.<br />\n<br />\nTHE SOUL CAN EVOLVE FROM THE FIRST ASTRAL LAYER TO THE SEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER ONLY IF IT INCREASES ITS FREQUENCY. SOUL FREQUENCY IS TIED TO THE WEIGHT OF NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE.<br />\n<br />\nTHE KUNDALINI RISES CHAKRA TO CHAKRA ONLY IF THE SOUL FREQUENCY INCREASES .<br />\n<br />\nWITH EVERY RISE OF THE KUNDALINI ON THE SEVEN CHAKRA STEPS , THE BODY AURA INCREASES BY ONE COLORED LAYER, OF THE SEVEN RAINBOW COLOURS.<br />\n<br />\nNOW WE JUMP TO THE FINAL SCENE OF MAHABHARATA --TO BEAR OUT WHAT I SAID BEFORE..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c8215767457225197098-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c8215767457225197098-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c2607955836878162187\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_6.html?showComment=1551951189622#c2607955836878162187\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 7, 2019 at 3:03 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nNOW\u2014<br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE 5 PANDAVA BROTHERS AND DRAUPADI DECIDE TO CLIMB ALLEGORICAL MOUNT MERU AT THE END OF THE EPIC MAHABHARATA --IT IS AN ALLEGORY FOR DEATH AND SOULS PARKING AT ONE OF THE SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS<br />\n<br />\nYAMA ( DHARMA ) IN THE FORM OF A WOLF JOINS THIS GROUP ..<br />\n<br />\nYAMA USHERS IN --<br />\nDRAUPADI INTO THE SECOND ASTRAL LAYER<br />\nNAKULA INTO THE THIRD ASTRAL LAYER<br />\nSAHADEVA INTO THE FOURTH ASTRAL LAYER<br />\nBHIMA INTO THE FIFTH ASTRAL LAYER<br />\nARJUNA INTO THE SIXTH ASTRAL LAYER<br />\n<br />\nAND THEN YUDHISTRA LOOKS BACK AND SEES THE WOLF .. HE KNOWS THAT NO ANIMAL CAN GET PAST THE FIRST ASTRAL LAYER --AND HE IS PUZZLED..<br />\n<br />\nTHE SECOND TO SIXTH ASTRAL LAYERS ARE MEANT FOR CONSCIOUS HUMAN SOULS.. THE SEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER IS THE FIELD OF BRAHMAN INTO WHICH THE MOKSHA SOUL MERGES \u2014VAIKUNTA.<br />\n<br />\nAT THE SEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER ( EQUIVALENT OF HEAVEN- FIELD OF BRAHMAN ) YUDDHISTRA SEES ALL HUNDRED KAURAVAS ALREADY THERE -- ALONG WITH THE STALWARTS LIKE BHISHMA/ DRONA /KARNA ETC<br />\n<br />\nHE IS SHOCKED AND ANGRY<br />\n<br />\nAT THAT TIME YAMA ( THE DOORKEEPER OF ASTRAL LAYERS 2 TO 6 ) DECLARES THAT HE IS YUDDHISTRAs FATHER WITH KUNTI .. AND THAT YUDDHISTRA STILL HAS SEEDS OF EGO WITHIN HIMS WHICH MAKES HIM UNFIT FOR MOKSHA ..<br />\n<br />\nYAMAs EXPLANATION: WHOEVER KRISHNA KILLED --ALL GOT MOKSHA .. KRISHNA HAD THE UNWRITTEN TASK OF KILLING ALL 100 TEST TUBE KAURAVA BABIES-- HE DID IT AND HOW..<br />\n<br />\nPANDAVAS WOULD HAVE HAD ALBINO BLOOD OF MOTHER KUNTI HAS SEX WITH PANDU ( AN ALBINO )--AND IN THAT CASE KRISHNA WOULD HAVE KILLED ALL 5 PANDAVAS TOO..<br />\n<br />\nTHE WOLF REPRESENTED DHARMA ( YAMA ) \u2014 YUDHISHTRA WAS \u201cSON OF DHARMA \u201c..<br />\n<br />\nYAMA IS IN CHARGE OF LAYERS TWO TO SIX..<br />\n<br />\nALL SOULS IN FIRST TO SIXTH ASTRAL LAYERS --AWAIT RE-BIRTH.<br />\n<br />\nSEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER IS THE FIELD OF BRAHMAN ( VAIKUNTA ).. HERE ONLY MOKSHA SOULS -- NIL EGO, NIL KARMIC BAGGAGE AND HIGHEST SOUL FREQUENCY ( SAME AS MOTHER FIELD BRAHMAN ) CAN ENTER --TO BE MERGED WITH BRAHMAN ( GOD )..<br />\n<br />\nONLY SOULS CAN ENTER ALL SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS --NOT THE PHYSICAL BODY ..<br />\n<br />\nKALKI BABY, NO WHITE MAN HAS THE CEREBRAL DEPTH TO UNDERSTAND WHAT I WROTE ABOVE.. I DON\u2019T EXPECT A HALFWIT FRENCH WOMAN TO UNDERSTAND IT !<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br />CARRY ON WITH SPREADING YOUR TOES ( TEE HEEE ) AND MORE POWER TO THE SOUNDS OF TRRRRR ( OR IS IT PRRRR ? )</span></b><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c2607955836878162187-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c2592765655726837322\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Griffith (1899) omits verses VSM 23.20\u201331 (the ritual obscenities), protesting that they are \"not reproducible even in the semi-obscurity of a learned European language\" UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nSO WE HINDU ARE SAVAGES, RIGHT?<br />\n<br />\nEXAMPLE NO 2 --<br />\n<br />\nCONSTRUCTION OF SHIVAs DAMARU..<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: Fashioned out of a human cranium, the drum is comprised of two skulls: a boy of sixteen and a girl of twelve . IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL OWNED THE SHIVA TEMPLE KAABALISHWARA AT MECCA OASIS WHICH ALSO DOUBLED UP AS A SPICE FREE TRADE CUSTOMS OUTPOST ..<br /><br />146 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KAABA AT MECCA , THE HOLIEST PLACE OF THE MUSLIMS AND THIS PLANETs FIRST MOSQUE IS THE NAME OF LORD SHIVA AS GOD WITH THE MATTED LOCKS WHICH IS THE SOURCE OF THE GANGES..<br /><br />147 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KAABALA ( KABBALAH ) OF JUDAISM IS JUST A CORRUPTION OF KAABA + ISHAWARA ( KAABALISHAWARA ) ROOTED IN EIN SOF, THE ENDLESS ONE..<br /><br />148 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL RUSHED TO MECCA ON BEING SUMMONED BY EMERGENCY PIGEON MESSAGE BY THE KERALA NAMBOODIRI ARYAN PRIEST OF THE SHIVA TEMPLE AT MECCA OASIS , BY SHIP TO SALALAH ( PORT AT DHOFAR, HIS OWN KINGDOM ) AND THEN BY CARAVAN ROUTE ..<br /><br />149 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 DURING A FLOOD AT MECCA , THE SHIVA TEMPLE SHIVA LINGAM WAS SUBMERGED UNDER FIVE FEET OF WATER AND THE HINDU SON ( MOHAMMAD ) OF THE YOUNGER SEMITE NAMBOODIRI BROTHER IN CHARGE OF CUSTOMS/ TRADE , UPROOTED THE SHIVA LINGAM (BLASPHEMY ) AND FIXED IT ON THE SE CORNER OF THE TEMPLE STRUCTURE FIVE FEET ABOVE THE GROUND..<br /><br />150 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 IS SANATANA DHARMA WE BUILD A TEMPLE OVER A SPOT WHERE A SHIVA LINGAM ( BLACK METEORITE DIVINE PHALLUS STONE WHICH PROVIDES THE DNA SEED ) IS FOUND, THE STONE CANNOT BE LIFTED OFF THE GROUND AND FIXED AT AN ALTERNATE SPOT..<br /><br />151 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL REPORTEDLY CONVERTED TO ISLAM AFTER MEETING MOHAMMAD , AND DECREED THAT HIS SHIVA TEMPLE AT KODUNGALLUR HIS CULTURAL CENTRE BE CONVERTED TO A MOSQUE BY PIGEON MESSAGE ..<br /><br />152 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL DIED ( REPORTEDLY WAS KILLED ) ON HIS WAY BACK TO CALICUT , INDIA AND HIS DEAD BODY IS BURIED AT A ISLAMIC DARGAH AT SALALAH OMAN MARKED AS THIYYAJUDDIN , KING OF HINDU THIYYA CLAN.<br /><br />153 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 THIS PLANETs FIRST PRISTINE KORAN WAS COMPILED AT KODUNGALLUR CHERAMAN PERUMAL MOSQUE A YEAR AFTER THE DEATH OF MOHAMMAD BY SEMITE YOUNGER BROTHERS OF NAMBOODIRIS UNDER THE CHARGE OF MOHAMMADs FRIEND AND DISCIPLE HINDU CONVERT MALIK BIN DINAR \u2026</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2009/07/vedic-practises-in-mecca-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c6043198391169861581-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c7822148748057008874\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 THE FIRST KORAN EDITED AT CHERAMAN PERUMAL MOSQUE IS THIS&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: red;\">PLANETs MOST EXPENSIVE BOOK</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;AS IT WAS BOUGHT BY THE WORLDs RICHEST MAN KING MANSA MUSA OF MALI IN GOLD&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/01/mansa-musa-king-of-mali-and-sri.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">155 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KERALA SAGES FROM KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY PROVIDED THE COSMIC ALLEGORY PART OF THE KORAN USING THE NUMBER 786 ( HINDU KING MANTRA OM ) ON THE COVER PAGE AND COSMIC CODE 19 IN THE VERSES..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/god-code-by-timothy-paul-smith-damning.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">156 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 CODE 19 INCORPORATED IN THE KORAN IF PART OF MOUNT MERU MYSTICISM, IT REPRESENTS THE 19 YEAR METONIC CYCLE , WHERE THE SUN , MOON AND EARTH LINE UP IN THE SAME RELATIVE POSITIONS ONCE EVERY 19 YEARS , AS A RESULT OF THE HINDU KING MANTRA OM ( DIGITAL REPRESENTATION 108 , GEOMETRICAL REPRESENTATION OF SRI YANTRA CONSTRUCTED WITH DIVINE GOLDEN MEAN 1.618 )..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">157 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 SIMPLEX CODE PRIME NUMBER 19 WAS ENMESHED INTO KORAN VERSES BY HINDU SAGES FROM KOUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY TO PREVENT FUDGING LATER BY JEWISH / CHRISTIAN ENEMIES OF ISLAM.. THESE UNGRATEFUL MUSLIMS NOW CALL HINDUS SAVAGES..<br /><br /><br />158 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 THE VEDA SRUTI VERSES IN SANSKRIT HAD ITS OWN DIVINE MATH MULTIPLEX VERIFIERS .. VEDIC SRUTIS HAVE GOLDEN MEAN (1.618 ) , FIBONACCI SERIES , PASCALS TRIANGLE, LUCAS NUMBERS , SRI YANTRA ( GEOMETRY OF OM ), ULAM SPIRAL, PRIME NUMBER VERIFIER , ISOTOPE MAGIC EMBEDDED IN IT ..</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">159- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 THE ORIGINAL KORAN STILL HAND MADE IN CHERAMAN PERUMAL MOSQUE LIES HIDDEN IN A FOXHOLE UNDER TIMBUCTOO DESERT SANDS SAFE FROM FRENCH JEW ROTHSCHILDs MERCENERIES WHO TRIED TO DESTROY THE BOOK SEVERAL TIMES BY BURNING DOWN THE LIBRARY AT MALI..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nLIES WONT WORK.. A BROWN HINDU BLOGGER IS IN TOWN..<br />\n<br />\nI WILL NOT REVEAL THE FURTHER DETAILS OF&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">CODE 19&nbsp;</span></b>ENMESHED IN KORAN\u2014I WILL DO IT ONLY WHEN MY REVELATIONS REACH 98 %..<br />\n<br />\nIT SO HAPPENS THAT YOU TEACH SOME UNGRATEFUL BASTARD \u2013 AND LATER HE STARTS TEACHING YOU , WHAT HE LEARNT FROM YOU..<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c7822148748057008874-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c7822148748057008874-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c806970617106005461\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. WE HAVE MIGHTY STRATEGIC NUKES ..</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">IF CHINA WANTS TO SUPPORT TERRORIST AZHAR MASOOD , INDIA CAN KILL CHINA WITH ONE SINGLE ECONOMIC BLOW -- STOP ALL IMPORTS FROM CHINA --100%..</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The overall Chinese debt is currently at around 385 percent of its GDP..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Growth is a pissfart 4.9 % --while India grows today at 10.1 %..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MADMEN have screwed up Chinas economy.. A big chunk of the debt lies in the country\u2019s shadow banking sector, which only increases the risk of China\u2019s financial collapse.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Shadow banking is the unregulated segment of the Chinese financial environment. This sector sells anything from investments trusts to wealth management products, creating a false sense of economic expansion beyond official avenues.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Unlike in the U.S., traditional commercial banks drive shadow banking, or unregulated lending, in China. That\u2019s because the banks have been able to keep shadow-banking assets off their balance sheets, thereby sidestepping regulatory constraints on lending.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Asset Managed Products (AMPs) are the biggest funding source for shadow loans in the country. These are deposit accounts that offer high-interest rates. All major institutions, right from banks to brokerages, issue AMPs.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Chinese people were fooled into believing that the Commie Chinese government supports the country\u2019s financial institutions, AMPs generated huge trust among investors ( sic ) . Its issuance is more than 17 Trillion USD ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The problem is that a big portion of funds raised through the AMPs has been utilized by the institutions to lend money to weaker borrowers and investing in speculative markets, like stocks and real estate. Since profits made from such investments often fail to match yields promised to the investors of deposit accounts, the institutions are at risk of failing to honor the promised returns.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Other shadow banking instruments like entrusted loans, interbank funding, and Internet financing all have this vulnerability. And this threatens to rip apart the entire Chinese financial ecosystem.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The use of leverage and liquidity transformation in risky investment products remains widespread in China , with risks residing in opaque corners of the financial system</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">COME ON CHINKS \u2013TAKE US ON !</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c1833193299470394530\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; They agreed that the one who first succeeded in making the traveler take his cloak off should be considered stronger than the other. Then the North Wind blew as hard as he could, but the more he blew the more closely did the traveler fold his cloak around him; and at last the North Wind gave up the attempt. Then the Sun shined out warmly, and immediately the traveler took off his cloak. And so the North Wind was obliged to confess that the Sun was the stronger of the two.:UNQUOTE&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Sunshine Policy is the policy of South Korea towards North Korea during Kim Dae-jung\u2019s presidency. ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The formal name of the policy was the \"Comprehensive Engagement Policy towards North Korea\" and first announced by the 15th South Korean President, Kim Dae-jung, in 1998 with white JEW help. He would be given Nobel Prize for this in 2000 AD\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">By the way KIMs have Indian DNA and are ruler class of Korea.</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/korean-brahmins-kim-hae-clan-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">NORTH KOREA IS RICHER THAN SAUDI ARABIA..</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/regime-change-in-north-korea-rare.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The term \"Sunshine Policy\" was originated from one of Aesop's fables, \"The North Wind and the Sun,\" as the policy aimed for loosening containment on North Korea, embracing North Korea, and eventually making the North Korean government to denuclearize by itself.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Sunshine Policy refers to the theoretical basis for South Korea's foreign policy towards North Korea\u2026. the idea built on the traditional Korean ways of dealing with enemies by giving them gifts to prevent them from causing harm.. Facing bankruptcy and spending excessive portion of its funds on warfare along with the nuclear program, North Korea faced widespread starvation among its people during the time..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">These principles were meant to convey the message that the South does not wish to absorb the North or to undermine its government; its goal was peaceful co-existence rather than regime change</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Sunshine policy was based on three following principles: ----</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">## No armed provocation by the North will be tolerated.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">## The South will not attempt to absorb the North in any way. ( THE WHITE JEW WANTS THE RARE EARTHS OF NORTH KOREA )</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">## The South actively seeks cooperation.</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2---</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_96BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_96b+seedDnIFD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_95T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_96b+seedDnIFD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_95TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_95TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_95TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_96b+seedDnIFD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_96b+seedDnIFD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_95TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_95TN\"></span></span><br /></span>\n<br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_95TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_96b+seedDnIFD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_95B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/discretion-subjective-objective-value.html?showComment=1526827599089#c6504454391802426967\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 20, 2018 at 8:16 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_95MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1---<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE JEW DID NOT WANT THE RE-UNIFICATION OF KOREA IN A HAPPY AND AMICABE MANNER. THEY WANTED NORTH TO COME DOWN ON ITS KNEES AND THEN BE ABSORBED BY SOUTH KOREA. ..<br />\n<br />\nBy addressing the second principle, the South Korea halted forming tension with North Korea and appeased North Korea to reduce its spending in defense..<br />\n<br />\nBesides its direct influence on inter-Korean relations, the Sunshine Policy tremendously helped South Korean economy. It had been historically shown that more than billions of dollar evaporate in just one day whenever North Korea announced some antagonistic policy toward the South or caused military provocation on the South, because foreign investors then regarded the South Korean market as unstable<br />\n<br />\nThe third bullet point explicitly implied that the South would put unprecedented amount of effort and investment into the North if North Korea becomes cooperative. As a result, Kaesong Industrial Region (or KIR), a special administrative industrial region of North Korea, where 53,000 North Koreans and 800 South Koreans are employed and work together, was constructed. .<br />\n<br />\nThere was a substantial economic benefit to South Korea too. At the beginning of Kim Dea-jung's administration, South Korea was just bailed out from the IMF, so the South had to avoid confrontationist policy toward the North. In this sense, this coexistence, reconciliation policy helped South Korea from recovering its economic from the nadir.<br />\n<br />\nThe US DEEP STATE used the Sunshine Policy as a political gain in domestic politics in the South.<br />\n<br />\nBecause of the post-1998 'Sunshine policy', many South Korean nongovernmental organizations and the public weren't concerned about North Korea's threats, believing that Pyongyang would never use nuclear weapons against them..<br />\n<br />\nWITH KIM OF NORTH KOAREA HAVING ICBM MISSILES WHICH CAN DESTROY US CITIES \u201cSUNSHINE POLICCY\u201d IS FLUSED DOWN THE DRAIN..<br />\n<br />\nNORTH KOREANS HAVE SUFFERED ENOUGH.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/japanese-in-hiroshima-and-nagasaki.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</span></li>\n</span></ol>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_26.html?showComment=1551321204020#c2626438219377919373\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 28, 2019 at 8:03 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME<br />\n<br />\nCAPTAIN, WHY DO YOU SAY THAT BHAGAWAD GITA HAS NOT BEEN TRANSLATED PROPERLY TILL TODAY?<br />\n<br />\nCAN YOU GIVE AN EXAMPLE?<br />\n<br />\nWOKAY.. CHAATNE KE VAASTE..<br />\n<br />\nI APPEND BELOW BHAGAWAD GITA CHAPTER 5 VERSE 18 --IF ANYBODY HAS TRANSLATED THIS VERSE THE CORRECT WAY IN ANY BOOK OR ON THE INTERNET OR VIDEO--I WILL STOP BLOGGING AND EAT MY OWN HEAD<br />\n<br />\n\u0935\u093f\u0926\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0935\u093f\u0928\u092f\u0938\u092e\u094d\u092a\u0928\u094d\u0928\u0947 \u092c\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0939\u094d\u092e\u0923\u0947 \u0917\u0935\u093f \u0939\u0938\u094d\u0924\u093f\u0928\u093f |<br />\n\u0936\u0941\u0928\u093f \u091a\u0948\u0935 \u0936\u094d\u0935\u092a\u093e\u0915\u0947 \u091a \u092a\u0923\u094d\u0921\u093f\u0924\u093e: \u0938\u092e\u0926\u0930\u094d\u0936\u093f\u0928: || 5.18||<br />\n<br />\nvidy\u0101-vinaya-sampanne br\u0101hma\u1e47e gavi hastini<br />\n\u015bhuni chaiva \u015bhva-p\u0101ke cha pa\u1e47\u1e0dit\u0101\u1e25 sama-dar\u015bhina\u1e25<br />\n<br />\nMEANING : A JIVAN MUKT WITH SOUL OF HIGHEST FREQUENCY AND ZERO EGO ( VIDYA VINAYA SAMPANNE BRAHMANE) HAS EQUAL VISION FOR A COW ( SACRED ANIMAL ) , ELEPHANT ( CONSCIOUS ANIMAL ), DOG ( NON-CONSCIOUS ANIMAL ) , AN ILLITERATE CONSCIOUS HUMAN AND A LITERATE CONSCIOUS HUMAN ..<br />\n<br />\n\" <b><span style=\"color: red;\">SHVA PAKE</span> </b>\"- HAS BEEN INJECTED ALL OVER AS <b><span style=\"color: red;\">DOG EATING SHUDRA</span></b> ( THIS MAKES KANCHA ILAH MOAN AND HAVE WHITE SPITTLE AT THE CORNERS OF HIS BLACK LIPS ).. IN ANY CASE PAKE DOES NOT MEAN EATING IN SANSKRIT OR MALAYALAM..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">WHEN THE PREVIOUS WORD \"</span><span style=\"color: red;\">SHUNI</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">\" IS DOG , WHY SHOULD BE THE NEXT WORD FOR SAME DOG BE \"</span><span style=\"color: red;\">SHVA</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">\" ?<br /><br />THERE ARE NO SYNONYMS IN SANSKRIT..</span></b><br />\nIN SANSKRIT AND MALAYALAM KUKKURAH MEANS DOG ON EARTH ..<br />\n<br />\nSHUNI ELEVATES THE DOG TO YAMA STATUS ( GUARDIAN OF THE SOUTH , DOG IN HEAVEN - SARAMA / SVAN )<br />\n<br />\nIN VEDAS SARAMA RECOVERED THE COWS STOLEN BY PANIS .. THIS IS A ALLEGORY FIGHT BETWEEN LIGHT AND DARKNESS..<br />\n<br />\nTHE ENTIRE \"SAYANA \" TRANSLATION OF VEDAS HAS BEEN POISON INJECTED AND HIJACKED .. IT WAS JNU COMMIE ROMILA THAPAR WHO GOT HINDUS IN BALI TO SACRIFICE ANIMALS EVERY DAY..<br />\n<br />\nFIRST OF ALL SAYANA WAS NOT A TELUGU MAN WHO EXISTED 600 YEARS AGO -- HE WAS A KERALA NAMBOODIRI WHO EXISTED MORE THAN 3000 YEARS AGO..<br />\n<br />\nI WILL WRITE ABOUT IT..<br />\n<br />\nSEND THIS TO ROMILA THAPAR , DHARMAWIKI AND SWAMY -- TELL THEM THIS IS CAPTAINs \"OPINION\".. AND IT WONT DOVETAIL WITH KERALA CHRISTIAN VETTAM MANI SHIT..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/11/open-letter-to-romila-thapar-from-capt.html</span><br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nNOTE: IMPORTANT-- I HAVE DISCONTINUED MY USUAL PRACTICE OF SENDING MY COMMENTS TO PM, MINISTERS, JUDGES, POLICE ETC ( TILL FURTHER NOTICE ) DUE TO THE EMERGENCY WAR SITUATION..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; BY CHEATING ON THE TIME AXIS..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/06/travesty-of-justice-sreesanth-and.html<br />\n<br />\nANOTHER EXAMPLE OF A TIME SHOT USING A CAMERA FILM ROLL ..<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE : I raced down to my cabin , got the camera , and started taking shots, in succession. The last 30 metres of the approach, how the ships bows crumpled at our hull near No 2 hold, severely damaging 3 timber staunchions and the entire bulwark, all was captured in the camera, with TIME SHOTS of the GPS in between-- a no contest situation : UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/el-nino-and-la-nina-mariners-overview.html<br />\n<br />\nYOU MUST NEVER ALLOW A REACTION TO BE CONVERTED TO ACTION ..<br />\n<br />\nBUT OUR COLLEGIUM JUDGE MELORDS ARE SO STUPID WHEN IT COMES TO GLEANING CIRCUMSTANTIAL EVIDENCE , THAT THEY ALLOW A SLIMY LAWYER LIKE KAPIL SIBAL TO ESTABLISH THAT THE AGGRESSIVE BLOODY NOSE INJURED THE INNOCENT SPIKED FIST..<br />\n<br />\nKULBHUSHAN JADAVs CONFESSIONAL STATEMENT WAS COOKED UP..<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nTHE ABOVE IS A CRITICAL COMMENT FOR THE FORTUNES OF WING COMMANDER ABHINANDAN ..<br />\n<br />\nI GIVE SPECIAL PERMISSION TO PUT THE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nWING COMMANDER ABHINANDAN<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nRAW<br />\nIB<br />\nCBI<br />\nED<br />\nNIA<br />\nCHIEFS OF ALL THREE ARMED FORCES<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nRAJNATH SINGH<br />\nHOME MINISTRY<br />\nDGPs OF ALL STATES<br />\nLAW MINISTER<br />\nLAW MINISTRY<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nCJI GOGOI<br />\nALL SUPRME COURT JUDGES<br />\nALL HIGH COURT CHIEF JUSTICES<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nCRPF CHIEF<br />\nBSF CHIEF<br />\nNIRMALA SITARAMAN<br />\nDEFENCE MINISTRY<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nVP OF INDIA<br />\n<br />\nDO IT NOW !</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; If ignited, the chemical reacts by extinguishing the flames.<br />\n<br />\nIt is important you choose a suitable type of fire-retardant chemical that is compatible with waterproofed and canvas fabric. Otherwise, the fireproofing will be ineffective.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nCM YOGI ADITYANATH<br />\nCJI GOGOI<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nALL SUPREME COURT JUDGES<br />\nLAW MINISTER<br />\nLAW MINISTRY<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nNIA<br />\nCBI<br />\nIB<br />\nED<br />\nRAJNATH SINGH<br />\nHOME MINISTRY<br />\nCMs OF ALL INDIAN STATES<br />\nDGPs OF ALL STATES<br />\nGOVERNORS OF ALL STATES<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nVP OF INDIA<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nAMITABH KANT</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c4630046836699855545\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. HE IS NOT A CUNT..<br />\n<br />\nI NEED ANDHRA NEEDS FINANCIAL HELP TO MAKE A NEW CAPITAL AFTER THEY LOST HYDERABAD TO NEW STATE TELENGANA ..<br />\n<br />\nIF CHANDRABABU NAIDU BECOMES CM OF ANDHRA HE WILL BUILD HIS CAPITAL AT AMRAVATI BEFORE 20214..<br />\n<br />\nPM MODI HIMSELF LAID THE FOUNDATION STONE ON 22ND OCT 2015 AT EDDANDARAYUNIPALEM AREA ON BANKD OF KRISHNA RIVER .<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK AJIT DOVAL / CBI TO CHECK THE BENAMI LANDS CHANDRABABU NAIDU HAS ACQUIRED SURREPTITIOUSLY AT THE HEART OF HIS NEW EARMARKED CAPITAL AMRAVATI .. THIS WILL MAKE HIM THE RICHEST MAN IN INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/05/jagan-mohan-reddy-finally-in-jail-for.html<br />\n<br />\nTHE BUDDHIST STUPA AT AMARAVATI IS FAKE..<br />\n<br />\nTHE REAL BUDDHA ( WHO BELIEVED IN VEDAS ) HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH MODERN BUDDHISM ( OF BUDDHA BORN IN 563 BC WHO ATE PIG AND DID NOT BELIEVE IN SOUL ) WE SEE TODAY.. WHEN THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA THERE WAS NOT ONE SINGLE BUDDHIST IN INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nTHE REAL BUDDHA WAS ADI BUDDHA BORN TO ANJANA OF FATHER HEMAJIT IN KIKATA, BODHGAYA IN 1900 BC..<br />\n<br />\nTHE FAKE BUDDHA ( BORN IN LUMBINI , KAPILAVASTU, NEPAL ) OF FAKE ASHOKA FAME WAS NOT LIBERATED... HE STRUGGLED FOR SALVATION.. HIS LAST MEAL WAS PIG GIBLET..HIS MOTHER WAS MAYADEVI AND FATHER WAS SHUDDHODANA..<br />\n<br />\nhis is a passage from my social studies book while at school<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE : The great Buddhist Stupa of Amaravati, the Maha chaitya, is one of the greatest architectural achievement of ancient India. The monument was situated on the outskirts of the town of Amaravati near the ancient ruined city of Dharanikota. It was founded in the 3rd-2nd centuries BC during Ashoka Maurya' reign UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nBUT ALAS\u2014EMPEROR ASHOKA NEVER EXISTED. HE WAS COOKED UP BY JEW ROTHSCHILD .<br />\n<br />\nAFTER ALL ASHOKA CONVERTED FROM BAAAAAAD HINDUSIM TO GOOOOOOD BUDDHISM !<br />\n<br />\nTHE STUPA NEVER EXISTED AT THE SPOT \u2013IT WAS JUST A FIGMENT OF ROTHSCHILDs SLIMY IMAGINATION.. ALL DIAGRAMS ARE FAKE..<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE SEEN THE AMARAVATI BUDDHIST RELICS IN THE BRITISH MUSEUM\u2014 THEY ARE ALL FAKE\u2014JUST LIKE THE ASHOKA ROCK EDICTS .<br />\n<br />\nI have seen the Colin Mackenzie album of maps, plans and drawings of sculpture from the stupa at Amaravati at the British Library\u2014all FAKE<br />\n<br />\nTHE NAME OF THIS NEW CAPITAL IS DERIVED FROM AN OLDER VILLAGE IN GUNTUR NAMED AMARAWATHI ON THE BANKS OF THE KRISHNA RIVER<br />\n<br />\nAmaravathi Mahachaitya Stupa exists in this village. This is a FAKE relic made by Jew Rothschild to propagate the FAKE Emperor Ashoka who never existed.<br />\n<br />\nThe Chinese traveller and Buddhist monk Hiuen Tsang (Xuanzang) visited Amaravati in 640 AD as per Rothschild historians \u2013 BALLS! This fellow Hiun Tsang was cooked up by Jew Rothschild.<br />\n<br />\nColonel Colin Mackenzie working for Rothschild as the first Surveyor General of India was a FAKE archaeologist, FAKE collector of antiquities and an orientalist\u2014who did propaganda for this FAKE Buddhist STUPA ..<br />\n<br />\nColonel Colin Mackenzie was involved in the MURDER of Tipu Sultan while he was eating breakfast in 1799 at his palace in Srirangapatnam..<br />\n<br />\nCHANDRABABU NAIDU WANTS TO MAKE AMARAVATHI A BUDDHIST MECCA..<br />\n<br />\n87 % of the nearly 54,000 acres land (lying between Vijayawada and Guntur cities alongside the river Krishna) designated for Amravati has been acquired under the land pooling system from 28,200 farmers .. This is a fertile area growing 3 crops a year for 122 varieties of food crops.. Even marginal farmers who own half an acre or less earn more than Rs 32,000 each month<br />\n<br />\nThis area if a FOOD BOWL and will be prone to floods.. Why trade precious FOOD for a concrete Jungle?<br />\n<br />\nTHE TOPSOIL IS SOFT AND IF TALL BUILDING HAVE TO BE MADE, THE BOTTOM OF THE TOP SOIL WHERE FOUNDATIONS WILL BE DRIVEN IN MUST BE INVESTIGATED FOR SUITABILITY..<br />\n<br />\nIF CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WAS THE BOSS OF NGT OR ENVIRONMENT MINISTER OR PM \u2014 I WONT GIVE CLEARANCE FOR BEING ENVIRONMENTALLY UNSUSTAINABLE ..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\"><a class=\"comment-reply\" data-comment-id=\"4630046836699855545\" href=\"https://www.blogger.com/null\" style=\"color: #888888; This scheme doesn\u2019t offer monetary compensation for land taken. In exchange for village land taken today, it offers a developed piece of land in the future city.<br />\n<br />\nFor every fertile acre pooled, the state will return 25% of developed area in the future city: a 1,000 square-yard residential plot, and a 250 square-yard commercial plot..<br />\n<br />\nNaidu baby has already got a home in Amaravati.. Most pro-pooling farmers are Kammas, like Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu. They are traditional voters of the ruling TDP.<br />\n<br />\nMost anti-pooling farmers are Reddys or Kapus, supporting the YSR Congress.<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL DECLARES\u2014ALL THOSE WHO HAD VISION OF A BUSTLING AMARAVATI CITY WITH WHITE FORIEGNERS PLAYING GOLF LOOKING INTO A MIGHTY FLOWING KRISHNA RIVER \u2013THEY MUST BE COLLECTED TOGETHE AND SHOT WITH THEIR OWN SHIT<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/delete-comment.g?blogID=3564735312144269387&amp;postID=4375031982074918446\" style=\"color: #888888; padding-right: 5px; padding-top: 5px; text-decoration-line: none;\" target=\"_self\">Delete</a></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c4375031982074918446-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c249699038761574302\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. WE NOW GIVE AS GOOD AS WE GOT..<br />\n<br />\nJEWESS ARIANA HUFFINGTON OF HUFFINGTON POST SPONSORS YOU.. DO YOU KNOW HER HUSBAND FOUND HER SO REPULSIVE THAT HE RAN WAY WITH A GAY ?..<br />\n<br />\nARUNDHATI BABY, I READ YOUR BOOK THE \"GOD OF SMALL THINGS \"-- THE HYPED UP BOOK WHICH SHOT YOU TO FAME AND CAUSED YOU TO BECOME A WORLD EXPERT ON HUMAN AFFAIRS..<br />\n<br />\nAS SOON AS THE BOOK WAS RELEASED BY WIFE BOUGHT A COPY.. THE MOMENT SHE STARTED READING SHE CRIED OUT THAT THIS BOOK IS PLAGIARIZED FROM HARPER LEEs MAGNUM OPUS \" TO KILL A MOCKINGBIRD \" WHICH WON THE PULITZER PRIZE...<br />\n<br />\nTHE HARPER LEE BOOK WAS ENGRAVED ON HER SPLEEN , AS SHE WAS THE SCHOOL LEADER OF AUXILIUM CONVENT MUMBAI, AND SHE WAS CHOSEN READ OUT A PASSAGE DAILY DURING THE MORNING SCHOOL ASSEMBLY..<br />\n<br />\nREMOVE THE FORBIDDEN SEX FROM YOUR BOOK \"GOD OF SMALL THINGS \" AND THEN WHAT IS REMAINING ?--GARBAGE !<br />\n<br />\nI WILL GRANT THAT THE BOOK WAS BRILLIANTLY EDITED..<br />\n<br />\nYOUR NARRATIVE WAS STREWN AROUND FOR THE READER TO PICK IT UP AND WEAVE HIS OWN PRIVATE STORY WELL IN ADVANCE ..<br />\n<br />\nWHAT A CHO0T WRITER YOU ARE ARUNDHATI BABY..<br />\n<br />\nLET ME INTRODUCE MYSELF-- 886 MILLION IS MY PROFILE VIEW.. CAN NEVER BE BEATEN TILL THE SUN GOES SUPERNOVA..<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654<br />\n<br />\nANOTHER WOMAN IN INDIA HAS \"DONE A ARUNDHATI\"..<br />\n<br />\nHER NAME IS SWARA TRRRRR BHASKAR ( OR IS IT PRRRRR ? )..<br />\n<br />\nIN A BOLLYWOOD MOVIE SHE USED A VIBRATOR DILDO ..<br />\n<br />\nTRRRRR AND PRRRRR IS THE SOUND FROM TWO AREAS OF HUMAN GEOGRAPHY SITUATED JUST ONE INCH APART.. ONE SOUND DRIVES AWAY MOSQUITOES-- THE OTHER FLIES !<br />\n<br />\nSWARA BABY NOW ADVISES INDIA !!<br />\n<br />\nARUNDHATI BABY, DO YOU WANNA KNOW THE ART OF WRITING ?..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/written-in-cold-blood-by-truman-capote.html<br />\n<br />\nTEE HEEEEEEE..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c3166642795685446037-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c3166642795685446037-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c4523063997363461737\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Her friends cried and shouted but were unable to rescue her. Muhammed Ali heard the shouting and came to find out what was wrong. He recognized the girl drowning in the pond as the princess, but was hesitant about saving her because of untouchability and if a lower-caste person touched an upper-caste person it was considered a sin, possibly punishable by death. However, he rescued her and gave her his dhoti to cover the princess. When the news reached the Chirakkal Raja, he called his daughter and the Muhammed Ali. At that time, if a man gave a pudava (a long cloth used for covering the body) to an unmarried woman, they were considered married.UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nAS LONG AS THIS BLOGSITE EXISTS-- WORLD HISTORY CANNOT BE FUDGED...<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">IN SANATANA DHARMA YOUR SOUL ( CONSCIENCE ) GUIDES YOU --&nbsp; NOT SOME STUPID DOGMA RIDDEN SINGLE HOLY BOOK OR SINGLE MESSIAH..</b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 23, 2019 at 8:33 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nE SREEDHARAN WAS GIVEN \"LIFE TIME ACHIEVEMENT \" BY ARNAB GOSWAMI..<br />\n<br />\nIF SOMEONE DESERVES THIS-- IT IS HIM ALONE..<br />\n<br />\nBEFORE E SREEDHARAN STARTS ON ANY PROJECT, HE CALLS HIS TEAM AND GIVES THEM A LECTURE ON BHAGAWAD GITA..<br />\n<br />\nAFTER RECEIVING HIS AWARD, A HUMBLE E SREEDHARAN SAYS \" SUCCESS IS POWERED BY DIVINE GRACE\"<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SOMEONE ASKED ME<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHY IS THAT ONLY HUMANS\nHAVE A SEVEN TIER SYSTEM OF ASTRAL LAEYRS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHY NO LOWER SPECIES?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">LAWS OF KARMA KICKS IN\nONY WHEN YOU HAVE MORE CHAKRAS THAN THE LOWEST MOOLADHARA CHAKRA ( SURVIVAL SEAT\n)..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ANIMALS AND LOWER\nSPECIES HAVE ONLY MULADHARA CHAKRA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CRIMINALS AND\nHOMOSEXUAL SOULS &nbsp;WHO ACCOMPANY LOWER\nSPECIES IN THE FIRST ASTRAL LAYER , HAVE A STRONG MOOLADHARA CHAKRA\u2014THEIR OTHER\nUPPER CHAKRAS DESPITE BEING BORN A HHUMAN ARE ALMOST NON-EXISTANT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ONLY SOULS WITH\nFREEWILL ARE SUBJECTED TO LAWS OF KARMA.. THIS IS WHY ASTRAL LAYERS TWO TO SIX ARE\nRESERVED ONLY FOR HUMANS WITH CONSCIOUS CHOICE..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only conscious humans\nhave bad karma baggage . Animals do NOT have karma as they have never risen\nbeyond their mooladhara chakra.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike animals a\nconscious human has the power to choose. He has the power to change. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You have the power to\nbecome whatever you want. You create your destiny using your FREE WILL.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanatana Dharma ,\nyou future is based on your past. There is no favoritism in the determination\nof the law of karma as everyone is treated equally, and equal opportunity for\ngrowth is given to everyone as well. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The soul has attached\nsamskaras based on your past karmas.&nbsp;\nSoul samskaras are impressions carried over from our past lives in our\nsubconscious minds which motivate desires, and in turn produce our thoughts and\nactions. &nbsp;&nbsp;These samskaras show up as phobias\n, deviant behavior , deep rooted vices etc .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your womb of birth, country\nof birth are affected by soul samskaras.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nature has endowed\nhuman beings with sufficient freedom to make or mar their own self.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since the spark of\ndivinity ( soul ) &nbsp;is present in all of\nus, sincere efforts to perform actions in the right way will be rewarded.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Law of Karma is\ninfallible and everyone&nbsp; is subjected to\nit.. As per the law of karma, every positive deed which we do, generates&nbsp; positive marks, while every sin ( laws of universe\nignored ) results in negative marks , which subsequently we need to repay by\nenduring happiness or unhappiness in this life of the next<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During our day-to-day\ninteractions, we are either increasing or reducing the karmic baggage\nweight.&nbsp; If the karmic baggage weights\nyou will have another re-birth and another chance to lighten it.&nbsp;&nbsp; We are not consciously aware of the\ngive-and-take karmic accounts generated in our previous births.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Spirituality teaches\nyou to harness&nbsp; your thoughts, words and\nactions which can even be triggered by your past samskaras .&nbsp;&nbsp; You just follow the laws of the universe ,\nand things will fall in place&nbsp;&nbsp; because\nthey are the effect.&nbsp;&nbsp; This may not\nhappen immediately, but it is inevitable.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanatan Dharma the\ntrue purpose of life is to overcome karma (destiny) and attain moksha where you\nbecome god. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ball of energy\nwithin you ( soul ) merges with brahmAn ( mother energy field ).&nbsp; The soul was once part of it. It is REAL home\ncoming .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is NOT like the\nbullshit homecoming of a lost Manipuri Jew ( sic ) in Israel. Israel is trying\ntheir best to repair their warped DNA ( Y chromosome ) by a kosher GOTRA system\nof DECEIT .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AT SEA , WHEN I TELL\nPEOPLE TO APPLY CONSCIENCE FIRST , THEY GET A BIT RUFFLED.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEN I TELL THEM, AS\nLONG AS I KNOW YOU HAVE APPLIED YOUR OWN CONSCIENCE AND LAWS OF NATURAL JUSTICE\n, YOU ARE UNDER MY PROTECTION. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Translation-- The\npleasures that arise from contact with the sense objects, though appearing as\nenjoyable to worldly-minded people, are verily a source of misery. O son of\nKunti, such pleasures have a beginning and an end, and so the wise do not\ndelight in them.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;
