, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">na hanyate hanyam\u0101ne\n\u015bhar\u012bre<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Translation-- The soul\nis neither born, nor does it ever die; nor having once existed, does it ever\ncease to be. The soul is without birth, eternal, immortal, and ageless. It is\nnot destroyed when the body is destroyed.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ak\u1e63hara\u1e41 brahma parama\u1e41\nsvabh\u0101vo \u2019dhy\u0101tmam uchyate<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">bh\u016bta-bh\u0101vodbhava-karo\nvisarga\u1e25 karma-sanj\u00f1ita\u1e25<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u015bhr\u012b-bhagav\u0101n\nuv\u0101cha\u2014the Blessed Lord said; ak\u1e63haram\u2014indestructible; brahma\u2014Brahman;\nparamam\u2014the Supreme; svabh\u0101va\u1e25\u2014nature; adhy\u0101tmam\u2014one\u2019s own self; uchyate\u2014is\ncalled; bh\u016bta-bh\u0101va-udbhava-kara\u1e25\u2014Actions pertaining to the material\npersonality of living beings, and its development; visarga\u1e25\u2014creation;\nkarma\u2014fruitive activities; sanj\u00f1ita\u1e25\u2014are called<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Translation--&nbsp; The Blessed Lord said: The Supreme\nIndestructible Entity is called Brahman ( THE MORPHOGENETIC FIELD OF CONSCIOUSNESS\n) ; one\u2019s own self is called adhy\u0101tma ( SOUL , A TINY PART OF THE FIELD ) .\nActions pertaining to the material personality of living beings, and its\ndevelopment are called karma, or fruitive activities.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Translation-- From me (\n&nbsp;BRAHMAN , FIELD OF CONSCIOUSNESS &nbsp;OF WHICH SOUL IS A TINY PART OF REDUCED\nFREQUENCY ) alone arise the varieties in the qualities amongst humans, such as\nintellect, knowledge, clarity of thought, forgiveness, truthfulness, control\nover the senses and mind, joy and sorrow, birth and death, fear and courage,\nnon-violence, equanimity, contentment, austerity, charity, fame, and infamy.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0917\u091a\u094d\u091b\u0928\u094d\u0924\u094d\u092f\u0928\u093e\u092e\u092f\u092e\u094d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n|| 51||&nbsp; <b>Bhagawad Gita 2.51-&nbsp; 4000 BC</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">karma-ja\u1e41 buddhi-yukt\u0101\nhi phala\u1e41 tyaktv\u0101 man\u012b\u1e63hi\u1e47a\u1e25<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">janma-bandha-vinirmukt\u0101\u1e25\npada\u1e41 gachchhanty-an\u0101mayam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Translation--&nbsp; The wise endowed with equanimity of\nintellect, abandon attachment to the fruits of actions, which bind one to the\ncycle of life and death. By working in such consciousness, they attain the\nstate beyond all suffering ( MOKSHA WHERE YOU , YOUR SOUL, AT HIGHEST FREQUENCY\nMERGES INTO THE FIELD OF BRAHMAN AND BECOMES GOD ) .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Moksha is not an\nachievement, therefore there is no competition.&nbsp;\nIt is liberation from , the cycle of death and rebirth.&nbsp; Your soul achieves its pure self.&nbsp; After moksha there is no rebirth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Upanishads\nestablished that moksha as the ultimate goal of all Hindu religious and spiritual\nactivity..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are no marks and\ngrading. You get Moksha or you don\u2019t, depending on what you are worth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Moksha is spiritual realization.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The attainment of\nmoksha is EXTREMELY rare and countless reincarnations are required for a person\nto reach this state of spiritual perfection. Moksha is self-emancipation..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Moksha is the\nfulfillment of life's purpose. Life ends on this earth plane when you attain\nMoksha or liberation from birth and death.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You are liberated from\nlittleness into vastness, from bondage to boundless bliss. . The conquest of\nignorance, ego, attachment, and impulse brings about liberation (moksha) for\nthe individual. The one who is a slave to impulses and tendencies (vasanas) is\ndevoid of wisdom.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\"><b>I WANT TO TELL THIS </b></span><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\"><b>PIECE</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;OF SHIT,&nbsp; JACK DORSEY </span><span style=\"color: red;\">( CEO OF TWITTER ) THAT BRAHMINICAL PATRIARCHY DOES NOT EXIST IN SANATANA DHARMA..&nbsp; &nbsp; BRAHMINS COULD NOT HOLD LAND OR WEALTH AND LIVED BY BEGGING FOR FOOD.</span></b></span></span><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\"><b>&nbsp;OF VATICAN WHERE THERE IS A FELLOW WEARING RIDICULOUS ROBES , HOLDING A CURVED STAFF , CALLED POPE , CLAIMING TO BE A MIDDLEMAN BETWEEN MAN AND HIS GOD.</b></span></span><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">AND HEY, WE ARE MISSING COMMIE ROMILA THAPAR AMONG THESE RABIDLY ANTI-HINDU BIMBETTES LIKE BARKHA DUTT , ANNA VETTICAD ETC.</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_26.html?showComment=1551321204020#c2626438219377919373\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 28, 2019 at 8:03 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME<br />\n<br />\nCAPTAIN, WHY DO YOU SAY THAT BHAGAWAD GITA HAS NOT BEEN TRANSLATED PROPERLY TILL TODAY?<br />\n<br />\nCAN YOU GIVE AN EXAMPLE?<br />\n<br />\nWOKAY.. CHAATNE KE VAASTE..<br />\n<br />\nI APPEND BELOW BHAGAWAD GITA CHAPTER 5 VERSE 18 --IF ANYBODY HAS TRANSLATED THIS VERSE THE CORRECT WAY IN ANY BOOK OR ON THE INTERNET OR VIDEO--I WILL STOP BLOGGING AND EAT MY OWN HEAD<br />\n<br />\n\u0935\u093f\u0926\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0935\u093f\u0928\u092f\u0938\u092e\u094d\u092a\u0928\u094d\u0928\u0947 \u092c\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0939\u094d\u092e\u0923\u0947 \u0917\u0935\u093f \u0939\u0938\u094d\u0924\u093f\u0928\u093f |<br />\n\u0936\u0941\u0928\u093f \u091a\u0948\u0935 \u0936\u094d\u0935\u092a\u093e\u0915\u0947 \u091a \u092a\u0923\u094d\u0921\u093f\u0924\u093e: \u0938\u092e\u0926\u0930\u094d\u0936\u093f\u0928: || 18||<br />\n<br />\nvidy\u0101-vinaya-sampanne br\u0101hma\u1e47e gavi hastini<br />\n\u015bhuni chaiva \u015bhva-p\u0101ke cha pa\u1e47\u1e0dit\u0101\u1e25 sama-dar\u015bhina\u1e25<br />\n<br />\nMEANING : A JIVAN MUKT WITH SOUL OF HIGHEST FREQUENCY AND ZERO EGO ( VIDYA VINAYA SAMPANNE BRAHMANE) HAS EQUAL VISION FOR A COW ( SACRED ANIMAL ) , ELEPHANT ( CONSCIOUS ANIMAL ), DOG ( NON-CONSCIOUS ANIMAL ) , AN ILLITERATE CONSCIOUS HUMAN AND A LITERATE CONSCIOUS HUMAN ..<br />\n<br />\n\"&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">SHVA PAKE</span>&nbsp;</b>\"- HAS BEEN INJECTED ALL OVER AS&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">DOG EATING SHUDRA</span></b>&nbsp;( THIS MAKES KANCHA ILAH MOAN AND HAVE WHITE SPITTLE AT THE CORNERS OF HIS BLACK LIPS ).. IN ANY CASE PAKE DOES NOT MEAN EATING IN SANSKRIT OR MALAYALAM..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">WHEN THE PREVIOUS WORD \"</span><span style=\"color: red;\">SHUNI</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">\" IS DOG , WHY SHOULD BE THE NEXT WORD FOR SAME DOG BE \"</span><span style=\"color: red;\">SHVA</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">\" ?<br /><br />THERE ARE NO SYNONYMS IN SANSKRIT..</span></b><br />\nIN SANSKRIT AND MALAYALAM KUKKURAH MEANS DOG ON EARTH ..<br />\n<br />\nSHUNI ELEVATES THE DOG TO YAMA STATUS ( GUARDIAN OF THE SOUTH , DOG IN HEAVEN - SARAMA / SVAN )<br />\n<br />\nIN VEDAS SARAMA RECOVERED THE COWS STOLEN BY PANIS .. THIS IS A ALLEGORY FIGHT BETWEEN LIGHT AND DARKNESS..<br />\n<br />\nTHE ENTIRE \"SAYANA \" TRANSLATION OF VEDAS HAS BEEN POISON INJECTED AND HIJACKED .. IT WAS JNU COMMIE ROMILA THAPAR WHO GOT HINDUS IN BALI TO SACRIFICE ANIMALS EVERY DAY..<br />\n<br />\nFIRST OF ALL SAYANA WAS NOT A TELUGU MAN WHO EXISTED 600 YEARS AGO -- HE WAS A KERALA NAMBOODIRI WHO EXISTED MORE THAN 3000 YEARS AGO..<br />\n<br />\nI WILL WRITE ABOUT IT..<br />\n<br />\nSEND THIS TO ROMILA THAPAR , DHARMAWIKI AND SWAMY -- TELL THEM THIS IS CAPTAINs \"OPINION\".. AND IT WONT DOVETAIL WITH KERALA CHRISTIAN VETTAM MANI SHIT..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/11/open-letter-to-romila-thapar-from-capt.html</span><br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nNOTE: IMPORTANT-- I HAVE DISCONTINUED MY USUAL PRACTICE OF SENDING MY COMMENTS TO PM, MINISTERS, JUDGES, POLICE ETC ( TILL FURTHER NOTICE ) DUE TO THE EMERGENCY WAR SITUATION..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; FAKE BUDDHAs PARENTS WERE MAYADEVI AND SHUDDODHANA , HE BORN IN LUMBINI , KAPILAVASTU, NEPAL... BR AMBEDKAR WAS THE FOLLOWER OF THIS FAKE BUDDHA</span> #### ..</div>\n<br />\nWANNA KNOW THE HIJACKED TRUTH ?....<br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n#### <span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">THE REAL BUDDHA WAS BORN IN 1900 BC , 100 YEARS AFTER ADI SHANKARACHARYA.. ADI-BUDDHA SPOKE SANSKRIT , DID NOT KNOW PALI , WAS A VEGAN, BELIEVED IN VEDAS AND THE SOUL .. HIS PARENTS WERE ANJANA AND HEMAJIT . HE WAS BORN IN KIKATA, BODHGAYA</span> ####....</div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">THE BUDDHA YOU FIND IN ELEPHANT CAVES ( MUMBAI ) AND FAR EAST ROCK TEMPLES IS ADI-BUDDHA , THE REAL BUDDHA...</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE NINTH AVATAR OF VISHNU WAS AYYAPPA BORN IN 5900 BC..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/11/5900-year-old-sabarimala-this-planets.html</span><br />\n<br />\nNDIANS REJECTED THE FAKE BUDDHA AS HE DID NOT BELIEVE IN THE SOUL..<br />\n<br />\nTO KNOW MORE ABOUT THE SOUL, READ THE POST BELOW..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_19.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nI ASK MY READERS TO LET ME KNOW IF TWITTER , FACEBOOK , QUORA REJECTS THIS MESSAGE..PUT THE COMMENT ABOVE IN AL QUERIES IN QUORA ABOUT CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL --I GUESS THERE ARE MORE THAN 12 OF THEM..</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c1937573589686684914-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c1937573589686684914-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c7444687972475059392\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. NOBODY HAS WRITTEN ABOUT IT TILL TODAY..<br />\n<br />\nPM MODI HAS BEEN UNABLE TO PREVENT FALSE PROPAGANDA FROM DESH DROHI JOURNALISTS LIKE SIDDHARTH VARADARAJAN, BARKHA DUTT, PRANNOY JAMES ROY, AROON PURIE, N RAM , RAJDEEP SARDESIA , RANA AYYUB ETC ..<br />\n<br />\nALL THESE DESH DROHI JOURNALISTS LOBE COL RATHORE ( I&amp;B MINISTER )--WHY ?<br />\n<br />\nWE WATCH..<br />\n<br />\nread all 8 parts of the post below--<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/justice-be-damned-enforce-law-not-any.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nCAPT AMARINDER SINGH<br />\nDGPs OF ALL STATES<br />\nLAW MINISTER PRASAD<br />\nLAW MINISTRY<br />\nCJI GOGOI<br />\nALL SUPREME COURT JUDGES<br />\nALL SUPREME COURT LAWYERS<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nALL HIGH COURT CHIEF JUSTICES<br />\nCMs OF ALL STATES<br />\nGOVERNORS OF ALL STATES<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nCBI<br />\nIB<br />\nNIA<br />\nED<br />\nRAW<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nRAJNATH SINGH<br />\nHOME MINISTRY<br />\nALL MPs OF INDIA<br />\nALL MLAs OF INDIA<br />\nALL LOK / RAJYA SABHA MPs<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nVP OF INDIA<br />\nKATJU<br />\nSOLI BABY<br />\nFALI BABY<br />\nSALVE BABY<br />\nSRI SRI RAVISHANKAR<br />\nSADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nI&amp;B DEPT<br />\nCOL RATHORE<br />\nDGPs OF ALL STATES<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\nALL BJP SPOKESMEN<br />\nAMITABH KANT<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nRSS<br />\nVHP<br />\nAVBP<br />\nNHRC<br />\nNCM<br />\nNCW<br />\nAMIT SHAH<br />\nWEBSITES OF DESH BHAKT LEADERS<br />\nSPREAD ON SOCIAL MEDIA</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; THIS IS HOW THEY GOT CAUGHT..<br />\n<br />\nTHE SEPARATISTS TRIED THE SAME STUNT WITH MAJOR GOGOI ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">WE WANT NEW MILITARY COURTS TO BE FORMED ..&nbsp; TRAITOR JUDGES ( SERVING AND RETIRED ) MUST BE TRIED AND PUNISHED FOR SEDITION..</span><br />\n<br />\nINDIA COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY MUST BE KEPT AWAY FROM THE WATANs EXTERNAL AND INTERNAL SECURITY CASES.. BENAMI MEDIA WERE IN CAHOOTS WITH THE JUDGES IN BLEEDING BHARATMATA\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">JUDGES HAVE BEEN IN CONTEMPT OF \u201cWE THE PEOPLE\u201d.</span></b>. AN EXAMPLE IS 5 JUDGES LEGALISING ADULTERY FOR 1300 MILLION PEOPLE..IF THERE IS A REFERENDUM 99.99 % INDIANS WILL VOTE AGAINST THE RULING\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE ILLEGAL COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY CREATED THE NAXAL RED CORRIDOR..</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">NOW A PAKISTANI ISI SPONSORED GREEN CORRIDOR HAS STARTED IN FULL SWING..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">THE ILLEGAL COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY ALLOWED ETHNIC CLEANSING OF KASHMIRI PANDITS..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHE COLLEGIUM MELORDS ARE MORE WORRIED ABOUT RIGHTS OF ISLAMIC SEPARATISTS / NAXALS HOLDING PAKISTANI GUNS AND IEDs.. THE CONSTITUTION DOES NOT PROTECT THEM-- BUT HEY, OUR JUDGES WILL PROTECT THEM..<br />\n<br />\nJUDICIARY HAS BEEN PLAYING GOD , WHEN ALL THEY ARE ALLOWED BY THE CONSTITUTION IS TO INTERPRET LAWS..<br />\n<br />\nJUDGES CANNOT MAKE AND BREAK LAWS FOR THE WHOLE NATION VIA PIL ROUTE , FILED BY FOREIGN PAYROLL DESH DROHIS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWHY HAS ILLEGAL COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY BEEN ALLOWED TO INTERFERENE IN INDIAs EXTERNAL AND INTERNAL SECURITY MATTERS ?..<br />\n<br />\nIn Nov 2018, the Supreme Court dismissed a plea made by over 300 armed forces personnel challenging filing of FIRs in police stations during military operations while the Armed Forces (Special Powers) Acts was in force in the state. ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b>JUDGES ARE IN CONTEMPT OF THE CONSTITUTION ITSELF</b></span>.. COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY IS NOT ALLOWED BY THE CONSTITUTION.. INDIA IS THE ONLY NATION ON THE PLANET WHERE JUDGES ELECT JUDGES\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHE CONSTITUTION IS ONLY TO PROTECT LAWFUL ABIDING DESH BHAKT CITIZENS, NOT FOREIGN PAYROLL DESH DROHIS ...<br />\n<br />\nIN KASHMIR WE THE PEOPLE HAVE CROSSED THE RUBICON LINE... WE HAVE BEEN TOO TOLERANT THAT TRAITORS AND DESH DROHI FOREIGNERS ARE SH#TTING ON BHARATMATAs FACE..<br />\n<br />\nWHAT DO YOU MEAN BY \"TALKING TO ALL STAKE HOLDERS\u201d AFTER MUSLIMS HAVE ETHNICALLY CLEANSED HINDUS WITH DEEP STATE TOOL UN AND COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY SUPPORT?..<br />\n<br />\nIN INDIA WE DEMAND PATRIOTISM TO THE WATAN -- NOT THE CONSTITUTION.. THE WAY THE KOSHER DEEP STATE WANTS ..<br />\n<br />\nCONSTITUTIONAL PATRIOTISM IS AKIN TO PATRIOTISM TO \"MAOs RED BOOK\" OR THE \"KORAN\"..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS WHY INDIAN COMMIES SUPPORTED CHINA DURING THE 1962 WAR\u2026<br />\n<br />\nANYBODY BODY RUNNING DOWN THE WATAN MUST BE SLAPPED WITH SEDITION CHARGES..<br />\n<br />\nSTARE DECISIS IS NOT ALLOWED --WHERE PAST RULINGS OF STUPID JUDGES UNDER THE MINDLESS SYSTEM OF \"JUSTICE IS BLIND SANS CONTEXT \" IS ATTACHED AS AN ADDENDUM-- NAY-- LANGOT TO THE CONSTITUTION..<br />\n<br />\nTHE EGO LADEN CJI OF INDIA GOGOI HAS \u201c<b><span style=\"color: red;\">BROKEN THE SYSTEM</span></b>\u201d BY HUMILIATING THE CBI BOSS LIKE A KINDERGARTEN SCHOOL BOY WHO HAS TO KNEEL IN A CORNER OF THE CLASS WEARING A DUNCE CAP..<br />\n<br />\nPM MODI HAS ALLOWED IT \u2026<br />\n<br />\nread all 8 parts of the post below--<br />\n<br />\nhttps://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/justice-be-damned-enforce-law-not-any.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; ( SOUL )&nbsp;</b></span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zBA6MMFEQnU/XGs6pjAnc2I/AAAAAAABf34/7Bcx-QqBsAoLHe__UqkqgmkkyJ3fLD2BgCLcBGAs/s1600/1D-703508.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHAT IS THE \u201cHUMAN SOUL\u201d?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Here is a true\nincident.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">One white woman was\nborn blind. Her world was total darkness<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">One day she had a major\naccident.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">During the course of\nsurgery, he breathing and pulse stopped.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE DOCTOR TOLD THE\nNURSES LOUDLY IN THE OPERATION THEATRE &nbsp;\u201c\nI CANT SAVE HER \u201c.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Now\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">This woman suddenly saw\nher own body as a OUT OF BODY EXPERIENCE on top of the surgery theatre bed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">He felt light and good\n..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">She saw light and\ncolours.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">She saw how her face\nlooked and the ring she was wearing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">She saw everybody in\nthe surgery theatre and the various strange instruments around her.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Suddenly she felt extreme\npain and was pushed back into her lifeless body on the bed and then total\ndarkness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">She heard doctors and\nnurses shouting SHE IS BACK.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">She told what she saw\nto the doctors , nurses and her relatives.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">She told them their\nconversations after they declared her clinically dead with the monitors showing\npulse and breathing as zero.. &nbsp;She\nrecalled new doctors rushing in, how they looked , what they wore , what they held&nbsp;&nbsp;. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">avin\u0101\u015bhi\u2014indestructible;\ntu\u2014indeed; tat\u2014that; viddhi\u2014know; yena\u2014by whom; sarvam\u2014entire; idam\u2014this;\ntatam\u2014pervaded; vin\u0101\u015bham\u2014destruction; avyayasya\u2014of the imperishable; asya\u2014of\nit; na ka\u015bhchit\u2014no one; kartum\u2014to cause; arhati\u2014is able</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Translation:&nbsp; &nbsp;That\nwhich pervades the entire body, know it to be indestructible. No one can cause\nthe destruction of the imperishable soul.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">e\u1e63o '\u1e47ur \u0101tm\u0101 cetas\u0101\nveditavyo<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">yasmin pr\u0101\u1e47a\u1e25 pa\u00f1cadh\u0101\nsa\u1e41vive\u015ba<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">pr\u0101\u1e47ai\u015b citta\u1e41 sarvam\nota\u1e41 praj\u0101n\u0101\u1e41<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">yasmin vi\u015buddhe\nvibhavaty e\u1e63a \u0101tm\u0101&nbsp; --&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<b>Mundaka Upanishad 3.1.9 , 5000 BC</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The soul is\natomic in size and can be perceived by perfect intelligence. This atomic soul\nis floating in the five kinds of air (pr\u0101\u1e47a, ap\u0101na, vy\u0101na, sam\u0101na and ud\u0101na),\nis situated within the heart, and spreads its influence all over the body of\nthe embodied living entities. When the soul is purified from the contamination\nof the five kinds of material air, its spiritual influence is exhibited.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">avirodha\u015bhchandanavat\n(<b>Brahma S\u016btra 2.3.23) [v20] \u2013 5000 BC</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cJust as applying\nsandalwood to your forehead cools the entire body, similarly, the soul,\nalthough residing locally in the heart, infuses its consciousness throughout\nthe body.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">h\u1e5bidi hye\u1e63ha \u0101tm\u0101\n<b>(Pra\u015bhnopani\u1e63had 3.6) [v18] 5000 BC</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">sa v\u0101 e\u1e63ha \u0101tm\u0101 h\u1e5bidi\n<b>(Chh\u0101ndogya Upani\u1e63had 8.3.3) [v19] 5000 BC<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The word h\u1e5bidi\nindicates that the soul is seated in the region of the heart. Yet,\nconsciousness, which is the symptom of the soul, spreads throughout the body.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>WHEN A HUMANs NEGATIVE\nKARMIC BAGGAGE IS ZERO , HIS SOUL ATTAINS THE HIGHEST FREQUENCY, SAME AS THE\nMOTHER FIELD OF BRAHMAN..&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>HE NOW GETS MOKSHA AND IS FREE OF THE CYCLE OF\nENDLESS REBIRTHS.&nbsp; HE IS NOW GOD.&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THIS IS SOUL EVOLUTION , VERY DIFFERENT FROM\nMADMAN DARWINs EVOLUTION..</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; SAINTS, SMALL CHILDREN SANS EGO&nbsp; ETC .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS MEANS ALL 20 WILL HAVE\nDIFFERENT HUMAN AURAS AND SOUL VIBRATIONS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">TELL THEM TO FILL UP\nTHE SYRINGES WITH GANGES LIVING WATER.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL 20 MEN MUST PUT TEN\nDROPS EACH ON EACH GLASS SLIDE . &nbsp;THIS\nMEANS THERE WILL BE TEN DROPS OF WATER ON EACH GLASS SLIDE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHAT HAPPENED WAS\nSHOCKING<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVERY SINGLE SLIDE\nSHOWED EXACTLY THE SAME PATTERN OF 20 WATER DROPS <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL TWENTY GLASS SLIDES\nSHOWED DIFFERENT UNIQUE PATTERNS UNDER A MICROSCOPE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS MEANS THE HUMAN\nAURA AFFECTS THE WATER<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WATER HOLDS MEMORY.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/water-valley-and-walking-on-water-capt.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/water-valley-and-walking-on-water-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/living-water-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/living-water-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUANTUM COMPUTERS OF\nTHE FUTURE WILL HAVE WATER FOR MEMORY ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A DIP IN A HOLY RIVER\nWITH GHATS SITUATED AT A MOBIUS WATER FLOW PATTERN GENERATES A MASSIVE SCALAR\nFIELD..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">THIS FIELD REMOVES DARK\nSPOTS ON THE HUMAN AURA..</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/06/kottiyoor-temple-oldest-temple-and.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/06/kottiyoor-temple-oldest-temple-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT IS WRITTEN IN OUR\nVEDAS 7000 YEARS AGO THAT EVERYTHING IS ENERGY.. &nbsp;ENERGY CANNOT BE CREATED OR DESTROYED.. &nbsp;&nbsp;IT CAN JUST BE TRANSFORMED.. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MODERN SCIENCE HAS\nLIFTED ENERGY THEORIES WHOLESALE FROM PART 2 &nbsp;( &nbsp;BRAHMANAS\n) AND PART 3 &nbsp;( ARANYAKAS ) OF VEDAS WHICH\nTHE WHITE INVADER STOLE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE HUMAN AURA IS\nPOWERED BY THE 7 CHAKRAS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FOR ANIMALS AND HUMAN\nCRIMINALS / HOMOSEXUALS ONLY THE ROOT CHAKRA ( MULADHARA ) EXISTS .. REST OF &nbsp;THE OUTER AURA LAYERS ARE WEAK OR DON\u2019T EXIST.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS WHY AFTER DEATH,\n&nbsp;&nbsp;SOULS OF HUMAN CRIMINALS/ HOMOSEXUALS (THOUGH\nCONSCIOUS MAMMALS ) KEEP COMPANY WITH LOWER FORMS ON LIFE NON-CONSCIOUS FORMS\nON THE FIRST ASTRAL LAYER &nbsp;..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT HAS BEEN A\nCONSPIRACY OF JEW ROTHSCHILD TO ENSURE THAT INDIAN TEMPLES ARE PACKED WITH\nHOMOSEXUAL PRIESTS ..LIKE CATHOLIC CHURCHES.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AS PER SANATANA DHARMA\nPRIESTS MUST BE MEN .. NO WOMAN IS ALLOWED TO BE A PRIEST..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">IN THE MAMAKAM FESTIVAL\nWHICH DIED AFTER KERALA TIRUNAVAYA TEMPLE LIBRARY WAS BURNT, ENEMIES OF SANATANA\nDHARMA HAD 108 VEDIC HOMAMs CONDUCTED BY WOMEN. <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1550315317962#c5556847866371618080\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 16, 2019 at 4:38 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWHEN IN SCHOOL ( AGE 13 ) WE WENT ON A PICNIC TO TIRUNAVAYA TEMPLE IN KERALA..<br />\n<br />\nWE WENT BY LARGE BOATS --BHARATA PUZHA RIVER.. WE ROCKED THE BOATS AND MADE THE FEMALE TEACHERS CRY ( GIRLS ALSO JOINED IN THE PRANK WHICH WAS VERY DANGEROUS ) .. THE PRINCIPAL OP GUPTA ( KENDRIYA VIDYALAYA ) GOT WILD...<br />\n<br />\nWE PLAYED KABADDI AND OTHER GAMES -- HAD HAJAAAR FUN.. EVEN TODAY WHEN I WANT TO FEEL GOOD I THINK ABOUT THIS PICNIC..<br />\n<br />\nNOBODY KNOWS THAT TIRUNAVAYA IS ONE OF THE OLDEST TEMPLES OF INDIA, PART OF THE DANAVA CIVILIZATION WHICH PRECEEDED THE VEDIC CIVILIZATION BY MILLINIUMS...IT IS OLDER THAN THE 6000 YEAR OLD GURUVAYUR TEMPLE..<br />\n<br />\nPARASHURAMA HAS CONSECRATED AN AYYAPPA IDOL IN THIS TEMPLE ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE RIVER SPOT WAS HOLY AND INDIANS FROM ALL OVER CAME THERE TO DO SHRADDH .. THIS SPOT IS KNOWN AS SOUTHERN KASHI..<br />\n<br />\nIT HAD THE LARGEST LIBRARY IN IN INDIA (SANSKRIT AND MALAYALAM ) WHICH ROTHSCHILD STOLE AND CARTED AWAY TO GERMANY..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS INCLUDED ORIGINAL COPIES TECHNICAL PARTS OF VEDAS (PART 2 BRAHMANAS AND PART 3 ARANYAKAS ) AND THE UPANISHADS..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS WHY GERMANY TEACHES SANSKRIT AND MALAYALAM IN THEIR UNIVERSITIES.. THIS WAS REVEALED BY ANGELA MERKEL..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/Malayalam-gets-global-push-new-status-in-Germany/articleshow/48522400.cms<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/12/hermann-gundert-hermann-hesse-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE TEMPLE LIBRARY WAS SET ON FIRE IN 1743 TO MAKE LOCAL BELIEVE THAT BOOKS WERE LOST IN THE FIRE..<br />\n<br />\nJEW HYDER ALI AGAIN SET THE TIRUNAVAYA TEMPLE ON FIRE IN 1761 AD AND RAZED IT TO THE GROUND-- HE WAS LOOKING FOR GOLD IN THE UNDERGROUND VAULTS..<br />\n<br />\nTHE TIRUNAVAYA LIBRARY HAD BEEN REBUILT AND WE LOST ORIGINAL DOCUMENTS SCROUNGED FROM OTHER KERALA TEMPLES AND SRINGERI MUTT , THE SECOND TIME..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/10/tipu-sultan-unmasked-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE ANCIENT MAMANKAM FESTIVAL ON TIRUNAVAYA TEMPLE RIVER BANKS WAS A INTERNATIONAL CULTURAL FEST WHERE ANCIENT GREEKS WHO STUDIED IN KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY PARTICIPATED--<br />\n<br />\nALL ANCIENT GREEKS SCHOLARS EXCEPT ARISTOTLE..THEY HAVE WRITTEN ABOUT KATHAKALI DANCES THE WHOLE NIGHT ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE WIKIPEDIA POST BELOW IS A FOUL LIE..<br />\n<br />\nTHE TAMIL PRIDE BASTARD WITH THE BIG BLACK STINKING ASS HAS INJECTED TAMIL SHIT ALL OVER..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OR5KC71zQN0</span><br />\n<br />\nCOMMIES ARE TRYING TO KILL HINDUIM IN KERALA.. ATHEIST COMMIE PINARAYI VIJAYAN MUST KNOW THAT CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WILL NOT ALLOW IT..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gCBC1-KYL8s</span><br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c5556847866371618080\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanjaya was blind king\nDhritarashtra\u2019s advisor and also his charioteer.&nbsp; Sanjaya was given a boon of divya drishti by\nMaharishi Vyasa.&nbsp; Sanjaya narrates to\nDhritarashtra the action in the climactic battle of Kurukshetra, which includes\nthe Bhagavad Gita.&nbsp; His soul took flights\nand rejoined the body- he gave a blow by blow unadulterated account of the\nwar..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanjaya also gives\nvarious descriptions of: Earth, the other planets, and focuses on the Indian\nsubcontinent and gives an elaborate list of hundreds of kingdoms, tribes,\nprovinces, cities, towns, villages, rivers, mountains, and forests of the\n(ancient) Indian Subcontinent (Bharata Varsha). Astral soul flights are faster\nthan light.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c5556847866371618080\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><br /></li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c5556847866371618080\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THE QUALITY OF THIS NEW HOUSE AND ITS LOCATION WILL BE DECIDED&nbsp; BY BRAHMAN ( MOTHER FIELD OF SOUL ) BASED ON YOUR KARMA WHILE YOU LIVED IN THE LAST COLLAPSED HOUSE..</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You soul just merges\nwith the mother field , negative karmic baggage&nbsp;\nbeing shed , and seeds of ego being burnt. This is real homecoming..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only cremated bodies\nget moksha.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Moksha can happen only\nin the holy land of India..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Burial at death cause\nthe soul to be trapped on earth \u2014 lonely, unhappy and miserable forever.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here is a post I penned\n7 years ago..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/11/rip-impossible-with-burial-world-is.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/11/rip-impossible-with-burial-world-is.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Moksha means liberation\nfrom the endless cycle of rebirths on planet earth.&nbsp;&nbsp; A Jivanmukti is a living liberated soul\u2014an\nexample of which is Adi Shankaracharya .&nbsp;&nbsp;\nLiberation, while living, is called Jivanmukti and those who have\nattained it are called Jivanmuktas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jivanmukta&nbsp; is one who is devoid of likes/dislikes,\nsorrow/elation and whose intellect is divine.\u201d-<b>Mahopanishad (2/57) -5000 BC<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A jivanmukta is one who\ndoes not see anything separate from the Self.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nThe Realized Man has transcended all destiny and is bound neither by the\nbody nor by its destiny. His actions are cosmic movements and not the instincts\nof the sense of egoism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cThe Jivanmukta is he\nwho does not frighten the world nor is he afraid of the world; he is free from\njoy, anger and fear as well\u201d - <b>Laghu Yoga Vasishtam. 5.95</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like I said before ,\ndeath occurs to the physical body only and not to the Atman ( soul ).&nbsp; The scriptures tell us&nbsp; that the energy body of Atman is \u2018na jAyate\u2019\n(never born), \u2018na mriyate\u2019 (never dies).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A jivan mukta does not\nget delighted by pleasures. He has got nothing to obtain or avoid.&nbsp; He does NOT feel&nbsp; helpless or dejected.&nbsp; He does NOT expect any publicity , reward or\nreturn . . Whatever he does is righteous, moral and ideal.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He has no tussle\nbetween the body and the spirit.&nbsp; His\nexternal actions are just like those of the ignorant worldly man.&nbsp; But the greatest difference lies between\ntheir minds, the desires and Vasanas.&nbsp;\nThis one does not know what is desire and the other is immersed in\ndesires.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For the liberated sage\nthere is no delusion for he sees oneness everywhere. He is not affected by\neither what he has done or what he has not done. But he knows his\nprarabdas.&nbsp; Prarabdha is that portion of\nthe past karma which is responsible for the soul residing in the present body.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The liberated sage is\nfree from all the modifications of the mind. His heart is pure like the\nHimalayan snow crystal. .</span></div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per our Hindu\nscriptures a human being is essentially an atman clothed in a physical body. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the physical body of\nan individual were compared to a computer, the atman would represent the\nelectricity that powers&nbsp; the\ncomputer.&nbsp; Without atman, the human body\nis insentient.&nbsp; In a human body atman is\nthe source of the mind, intellect and ego sense. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Atman or soul is\nimmortal and divine.&nbsp; Therefore, an\nindividual is potentially divine and eternally perfect. There are two states of\nexistence associated with atman: the bound state and the liberated state.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In\nthe bound state, atman is associated with a physical body. As a result of this\nassociation, atman is subject to m\u00e3ya, which causes it to forget its true\ndivine nature and commit evil deeds in the world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After death when you\nare cremated and your skull pops, your soul is shot up by a soliton carrier\nwave to one of these 7 astral energy layers \u2013 depending on your aura energy /\nkundalini raise .&nbsp;&nbsp; A moksha soul of\nhighest frequency go to the highest&nbsp;\nenergy plane, the 7th astral layer of BrahmAn ( Vaikunta)&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An ordinary mortal (\nlike you and me)&nbsp; cannot love and serve\nthose who hate him,&nbsp; who beat him and who\nabuse him always. The liberated sage ( Jivanmukt ) , of highest soul frequency\nand zero ego, the prince of ascetics&nbsp; has\ntranscendental love.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember you are\nimmortal\u2014&nbsp; you were born with the stars ,\nat the beginning of cosmic creation.&nbsp; You\ngreat grandfather , you,&nbsp; your future\ngreat grandchild were all born at the same split second..&nbsp; Your cadaver/ body is like a rented\nhouse&nbsp; , you discard on death .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The child created out\nof mutual love has good DNA. The child born out of two people hating each other\n( rape ) is unfortunate. Again this is part of Karma. Orgasm from LOVE ( and\nnot LUST ) electrically charges healthy sperm , and hence the off spring will\nNOT be a depraved homosexual..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You will find that the parents of homosexuals (\nmostly tainted foreign invader blood ) have no family values..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"YOU\" ARE A\nBALL OF ENERGY WITHIN YOUR CADAVER CALLED \"SOUL\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
