font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV\nWHO TOLD THAT IT IS OK FOR HOMOSEXUALS TO HAVE ANAL SEX BEHIND CLOSED DOORS\nDOES NOT KNOW THE BASICS OF SANATANA DHARMA ( FOR NICE KOSHER DEEP STATE FUNDS AND\nINVITES TO SPEAK AT UN AND INTERNATIONAL FREEMASON SEMINARS )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">KARMA CATCHED UP BEHIND\nCLOSED DOORS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MODI GAVE THIS FAKE\nGURU A PADMA VIBHUSHAN..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE OTHER FAKE GURU AND\nRASCAL SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR TOLD ON NDTV THAT SANATANA DHARMA ALOWS\nHOMOSEXUALITY . &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HAVE YOU HEARD THE GIRLY\nVOICE OF THIS PATHETIC FELLOW-- HAVE YOU SEEN HIS FINGERS ? &nbsp;MODI GAVE HIM TOO A PADMA VIBHUSHAN..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HOMOSEXUALS ARE THE\nSALT NAY BOUNTRY OF THIS PLANET, RIGHT?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WRONG !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A HINDU WOMAN DOES NOT\nNEED TO CONFESS IN CHURCH TO A STRANGER MALE SEXUAL PREDATOR.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MOKSHA IS PURELY KARMA\nBASED. THERE IS NO SHORT CUT OR JUGAAD POSSIBLE-- LIKE ROTHSCHILDs CREATION\nBABAJI ( OR SOME RASCAL LIKE SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR ) GIVING YOU DEEKSHA .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A JIVAN MUKT WHOSE SOUL\nHAS THE HIGHEST FREQUENCY WHILE LIVING ON PLANET EARTH HAS ALL 7 COLOUR AURAS (\nLIKE RANBOW ) THE WHOLE AURA ENCLOSED IN A GOLDEN SHEATH.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">VISHNU AVATARS WERE NOT\nBORN WITH THE STARS LIKE YOU AND ME . THEIR SOULS WERE CREATED AND SENT DOWN\nFOR A PURPOSE ON EARTH.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AFTER THEIR MISSION ON\nEARTH WAS OVER , THEIR SOULS MERGED BACK TO BRAHMAN ON SEVENTH ASTRA LAYER (\nVAIKUNTA ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT IS IMPOSSIBLE FOR\nCON-MEN TO CLAIM THAT THEY ARE DESCENDANTS OF RAMA OR KRISHNA..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVERY LIVING AND\nGROWING ENTITY ON PLANET EARTH HAS A SOUL.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nWE WERE ALL PART OF THE MOTHER FIELD NAMED BRAHMAN ON THE SEVENTH ASTRAL\nLAYER<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS WHY HINDUS DO\nNAMASTE\u2014WE HONOUR THE PIECE OF BRAHMAN WITHIN THE OTHER PERSON.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE GOD OF SANATANA\nDHARMA IS A \"MORHOGENETEIC CONSCIOUSNESS FIELD- BRAHMAN \" WHICH\nCANNOT HE PICKED UP BY THE 5 SENSES--ON MICRO AND MACRO SCALE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ON MICRO SCALE THIS\nEMPTY SPACE ( INTELLIGENT FIELD ) PROVIDES PERPETUAL MOTION WITHIN AN ATOM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN HINDUISM WE CREMATE\nDEAD BODIES FOR TWO REASONS .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NO 1 REASON IS THAT THE\nSOUL HAS TO TRAVEL ON A SOLITION CARRIER WAVE CREATED BY SKULL POPPING , TO AN\nASTRAL PLANE .</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE SECOND REASON IS\nEARTH IS NOT POLLUTED BY A CREMATED BODY .. THE ASHES ENRICH THE SOIL.. ONLY A\nSMALL POT OF SELECTED PURE CARBON ASH IS THROWN INTO THE FLOWING WATER BODY OR\nSEA .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE IMMERSED IN WATER ASHES\nPROVIDE DNA MEMORY TO THE SEA OR RIVER .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE BURIED DEAD CADAVER\nPOLLUTES THE GROUND WATER AND UNDERWATER AQUIFERS , CAUSING PRION DISEASES &nbsp;.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE BASIS OF ALL\nRELIGIONS EXCEPT HINDUISM IS TO FILL YOU WITH GUILT -- THIS HEAVEN AND HELL\nCONCEPT .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HINDUISM DOES NOT\nSUBSCRIBE TO HELL . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HINDUISM DOES NOT\nSUBSCRIBE TO YOU BEING A SINNER WHO HAS TO BE SAVED .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IF YOUR ACCUMULATED\nKARMA IS BAD, WHEN YOU GET RE-INDUCTED BACK ON EARTH YOU WILL SUFFER.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THESE LYING CHRISTIAN\nPSYCHOLOGISTS TALK ABOUT PAST LIFE REGRESSION ( WHICH CANNOT TAKE OFF UNLESS\nYOU BELIEVE IN HINDUS CONCEPT OF RE-INCARNATION AND RE-BIRTHS ) --<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEY HAVE LIFTED\nEVERYTHING FROM OUR ANCIENT SCRIPTURES-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT TAKES A CAPT AJIT\nVADAKAYIL TO TAKE DOWN THEIR LYING PANTS .'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During\nRothschild\u2019s&nbsp; rule a FAKE cooked up Chitragupta\npopped up --&nbsp; as a one among 33 crore\nHindu gods assigned with the unique task of keeping complete records of actions\nof human beings on the earth.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fake\nmutts of Jew Rothschild did propaganda that Chitra Gupta will decide if you\nwill go to HEAVEN or HELL (which is nonsense ) -- depending on their actions on\nthe earth .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SORRY, IN SANATANA\nDHARMA IT IS NOT YOUR CURRENT BIRTH WHICH DECIDES YOUR FATE-- ALL THE EXTRA\nBAGGAGE OF YOUR PAST LIVES ADD UP.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All Sanskrit&nbsp; Vedas/&nbsp;\nPuranas where Chitragupta is mentioned \u2013 is all poison injected by\nRothschild.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Rig Veda\nRothschild has injected an invocation to be made to Chitragupta before making a\nANIMAL SACRIFICE. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sorry , there wasNO\nanimal sacrifice in Hinduism before the white invader came to India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/11/all-animal-sacrifices-in-hindu-temples.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/11/all-animal-sacrifices-in-hindu-temples.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild got a temple\nat Alwar dedicated to Chitragupta.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The FAKE Kanchi mutt\ngot a temple for Chitragupta in&nbsp;\nKanchipuram.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CHITRA GUPTA FOLLOWERS\nARE HAPPILY EATING BEEF -- A LOOP HOLE PROVIDED BY ROTHSCHILD .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me break a\nbombshell--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">KAYASTHA was almost\nlike a SIR knighthood , if Hindus toed the Rothschild line.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember, once you are\nborn as a HUMAN you do NOT revert back as an animal.&nbsp; &nbsp;I am the first to write\nthis.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONSCIOUS creatures like dolphins,\nelephants, chimps ( who pass the mirror colour test ) are in line for promotion\nto HUMANS.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a sort of spiritual\nevolution.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IDIOT DARWIN DID NOT UNDERSTAND THIS .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; HE WAS A VEGAN<br /><br />THE FAKE BUDDHA BORN IN 563 BC , WHO SPOKE PALI, DID NOT BELIEVE IN THE SOUL.. HE ATE PIG. HIS LAST MEAL WAS PIG GIBLETS.. INDIANS REJECTED HIM.. ROTHSCHILDs AGENT BR AMBEDKAR PROPAGATED THIS FELLOW.</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/07/difference-between-buddha-and-mahavira.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN SANATANA DHARMA GOD\nIS A FIELD , CANNOT BE PICKED UP BY 5 SENSES -- ADVAITA ( MUSLIMS HAVE LIFTED\nTO CALL ALLAH )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IF YOU ONLY KNOW HOW\nWONDERFUL YOUR OWN BODY IS \u2013 YOU WILL NOT CARE FOR MAD MAN DARWIN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DARWIN WAS CREATED BY\nFREEMASON JEWS , TO MAKE COMMUNISM A SUCCESS\u2014 WHERE YOU ARE NOT AFRAID OF\nKILLING AND SINNING.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JIVAN MUKTs SAGE SOUL\nIS ALREADY ENMESHED WITH THE BRAHMAN FIELD-- IT DOES NOT REQUIRE A SOLITON WAVE\nBOOST OF SKULL POPPING IN FIRE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS WHY WHEN\nINDENTURED COOLIES WERE TAKEN ABROAD, THEY GAVE WRITTEN GUARANTEE THAT THE DEAD\nBODY WILL BE CREMATED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/04/indentured-coolie-slavery-reinvented.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/04/indentured-coolie-slavery-reinvented.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CREMATION FIRE ( AGNI )\nIS YAMAs PRIEST AS PER VEDAS .&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YAMA\nPROPELs THE SOUL WHEN THE SKULL POPS DURING CREMATION TO A SUITABLE ASTRAL\nLAYER .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YAMA IS ALSO THE SON OF VIVASAT , THE KEEPER OF DHARMA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>IN SANATANA DHARMA\nTHERE IS NO HELL OR HEAVEN..&nbsp; &nbsp;EVEN VIVEKANANDA DID NOT KNOW THIS..</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YAMA IS NOT THE LORD OF\nHELL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">GARUDA PURANA WAS\nINJECTED WITH POISON TO SHOW VARIOUS TORTURES &nbsp;IN HELL.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/09/garuda-vimana-of-vishnu-and-garuda.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/09/garuda-vimana-of-vishnu-and-garuda.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: medium; line-height: 27px;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">THE POISON INJECTED GARUDA PURANA AND THE MANU SMRITI IS THE REASON WHY HINDUS BECAME SELF LOATHING AND CONVERTED TO CHRISTIANITY AND BUDDHISM .<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">SO WHAT DOES THE POISON INJECTED GARUDA PURANA SAY ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">BLAH BLAH BLAH<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-vS2V8r7rPcE/VEHP4fEOxfI/AAAAAAAAxKs/D2ajt1cv_YM/s1600/220px-VVVFHindu_hell.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-vS2V8r7rPcE/VEHP4fEOxfI/AAAAAAAAxKs/D2ajt1cv_YM/s1600/220px-VVVFHindu_hell.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"472\" /></a></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Sinners are sent to the various Narakas (Hells) by Yamadharma according to their nature and seriousness of their Sins. There is a total of 28 Narakas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">They are:\u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(1) Tamisram(Heavy flogging)- for those who steal (<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;if you have ever stolen , better convert boy&nbsp;</span></i>)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(2) Andhatamtrsam(Flogging)- for those who forsake their wives and husbands for no apparent reasons&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-dp9rIhJ8GMs/VEHP_55v0KI/AAAAAAAAxK0/Yf92y6XUSH4/s1600/DDEa.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-dp9rIhJ8GMs/VEHP_55v0KI/AAAAAAAAxK0/Yf92y6XUSH4/s1600/DDEa.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"390\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(3) Rauravam(torment of snakes)- for thosewho enjoy another man\u2019s property or resources.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(4) Mahararuravam(death by snakes)-for those who deny the legitimate heirs, their inheritance and possess and enjoy others property.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OakIyg9gMyU/VEHQHuN__6I/AAAAAAAAxK8/V5jT1XcyvoE/s1600/doddwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"226\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OakIyg9gMyU/VEHQHuN__6I/AAAAAAAAxK8/V5jT1XcyvoE/s1600/doddwnload.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(5) Kumbhipakam(cooked by oil)- for those who kill animals for pleasure. (&nbsp;<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">have you ever killed an animal and NOT eaten it\u2014say a rat \u2013better convert boy !</span></i>)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(6) Kalasutram( Hot as hell)- for those who do not respect their elders ( boy\u2014if you have disrespected any elder , bettEr convert maan )<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-lDwHh6eeGgg/VEHQOrWtjYI/AAAAAAAAxLE/wkgpOVYv8Vs/s1600/dovvvwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"243\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-lDwHh6eeGgg/VEHQOrWtjYI/AAAAAAAAxLE/wkgpOVYv8Vs/s1600/dovvvwnload.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(7) Asitapatram(sharp flogging)- for people who abandon one\u2019s own duty. (&nbsp;<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">if you wanna while at work , shirk better convert&nbsp;</span></i>)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(8)Sukaramukham(Crushed and tormented)- for rulers who neglect their duties&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-WecGurcRDhQ/VEHQU8eNiKI/AAAAAAAAxLM/uUaOYkmHd-0/s1600/iee3mages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"234\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-WecGurcRDhQ/VEHQU8eNiKI/AAAAAAAAxLM/uUaOYkmHd-0/s1600/iee3mages.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(9) Andhakupam( Attack of the animals)- This is hell for those who do not help despite having the resources. (&nbsp;<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">if you don\u2019t want to part with your penny better convert&nbsp;</span></i>)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(10) Taptamurti( Burnt Alive)- Those who plunder (&nbsp;<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">better to convert if you wanna steal</span></i>&nbsp;)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(11) Krimibhojanam(Food for worms)- for those who use men or women only for their own gain (&nbsp;<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">better to convert if you do NOT want to pay bonus and hike up the salary</span></i>&nbsp;).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jrLJU2JOEUs/VEHQgQtkTAI/AAAAAAAAxLU/tNcLV0DE_-c/s1600/imassges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"364\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jrLJU2JOEUs/VEHQgQtkTAI/AAAAAAAAxLU/tNcLV0DE_-c/s640/imassges.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(12) Salmali(Embracing red hot images)- for men and women who have committed adultery. (<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;if you wanna have sex outside marriage , better convert&nbsp;</span></i>)</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(13) Vajrakantakasali-(Embracing sharp images)- for those who want to fu#k animals (<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;better to convert and enjoy bestial sex -but first tie the camel&nbsp;</span></i>).</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"218\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-YlqbW2vBs2E/VEHQn6SJ7bI/AAAAAAAAxLc/Y-NzNKxacJw/s1600/imagvfrfes.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(14) Vaitarani(River of Filth)- Rulers who abuse their power -- it is a river which is filled with human excreta, blood, hair, bones, nails, flesh and all kinds of dirty substances. (&nbsp;<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">better to convert if you want to treat your employees badly</span></i>&nbsp;)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(15) Puyodakam (Well of hell)- This is a well filled with excreta, urine, blood, phlegm. For men who have intercourse and cheat women with no intention of marrying (<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;better to convert and screw around merrily</span></i>&nbsp;)<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-A9YXYV9fuLc/VEHQwwEhVHI/AAAAAAAAxLk/CvSOo54c3sA/s1600/imccgages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-A9YXYV9fuLc/VEHQwwEhVHI/AAAAAAAAxLk/CvSOo54c3sA/s1600/imccgages.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"262\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(16) Pranarodham (cut piece by piece)- for those who keep dogs and eat (&nbsp;<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">better to convert and eat beef and be merry&nbsp;</span></i>).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(17) Visasanam(Bashing from Clubs) for rich people who spend excessively just to display their wealth and splendour. (&nbsp;<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">if you wanna enjoy your money better convert</span></i>&nbsp;)<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-cu9INuVRNKM/VEHQ5UTj9oI/AAAAAAAAxLs/ycwYMzMktsY/s1600/FFRe.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-cu9INuVRNKM/VEHQ5UTj9oI/AAAAAAAAxLs/ycwYMzMktsY/s640/FFRe.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"404\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(18) Lalabhaksam-(River of semen)- for the Hindu who FORCES HIS WIFE TO GIVE HIM A BLOW JOB . His only food will be semen . (<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;better to convert and take blowjobs from 4 wives</span></i>&nbsp;).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(19) Sarameyasanam(Torment from dogs)- for those guilty of anti-social acts&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-sjjfmtIb5cU/VEHRol7oCII/AAAAAAAAxMc/P-56uFDf6h8/s1600/imagddees.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"279\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-sjjfmtIb5cU/VEHRol7oCII/AAAAAAAAxMc/P-56uFDf6h8/s1600/imagddees.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(20) Avici( turned into dust)- for bearing false witness and false swearing. There are hurled from a great height and they are utterly smashed into dust when they reached the ground. They are again restored to life and the punishment is repeated (&nbsp;<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Oh boy !</span></i>)<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-3VuRFzOI7FI/VEHRAhN5y8I/AAAAAAAAxL0/-8v4ToWv0dw/s1600/FFRC.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-3VuRFzOI7FI/VEHRAhN5y8I/AAAAAAAAxL0/-8v4ToWv0dw/s1600/FFRC.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"404\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(21) Ayahpanam(Drinking of burning substances)- Those who consume alcohol-- women are forced to drink melted iron in liquid form, whereas the men will be forced to drink hot liquid molten lava for every drink consumed in their earthly lives.(&nbsp;<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">so better to convert to Christianity and drink and be merry</span></i>&nbsp;)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(22) Raksobjaksam(Revenge attacks)- Those who do animal and human sacrifices (&nbsp;<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Hindusim never allowed animal sacrifice\u2014leave alone human sacrifice</span></i>&nbsp;)<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-xQMS9meQnOY/VEHRJ9UsDzI/AAAAAAAAxL8/2kZ4oL6ODYs/s1600/downfffload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(23) Sulaprotam(Trident Torture)- People who deceives others by treachery<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(24) Ksharakardamam(hanged upside down) \u2013 for braggarts<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(25) Dandasukam(eaten alive)- sinners who persecute&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(26) Vatarodham(weapon torture)- for those who persecute animals<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(27) Paryavartanakam( torture from birds)- One who denies food to a hungry person<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">(28) Sucimukham(Tortured by needles)- for miserly people.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After death your soul\nis parked in one of the bottom six astral layers in hibernation , without Kriya\nShakti.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only when you are\nre-inducted back on earth in another body form ( as human ) do you regain your\npower over Karma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN YOU DO NOT HAVE\nEGO, YOU ARE BURIED AFTER DEATH -- LIKE JIVAN MUKT SAGES WHOSE SOULS ARE AT\nHIGHEST FREQUENCY&nbsp; , AND SMALL CHILDREN\nOF LESS THAN 27 MONTHS OF AGE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A JIVAN MUKT DOES NOT\nNEED CREMATION -- AS HIS SOUL IS ALREADY PART OF BRAHMAN-- HE IS BURIED IN\nHINDUISM , NOT UNDER THE GROUND BUT ABOVE THE GROUND ( MUNIYARA/ DOLMENS ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SANATANA DHARMA URGES\nYOU TO SHED YOUR EGO AND LEAD A SIMPLE LIFE WHILE ON EARTH.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVOLUTION IS YOUR (\nSOULs ) EVOLUTION UP THE LADDER -- TO THE 7 LAYERS. NOT MAD MAN DARWINs STUPID\nTHEORY..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YAMA DOES NOT HOLD THE\n\"FINAL JUDGEMENT\" LIKE IN CHRISTIANITY. THIS GOES AGAINST THE LAWS OF\nKARMA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE OPIUM DRUG RUNNING\nPARTNERS OF JEW ROTHSCHILD/ SASSOON ( CALCUTTA ) GAMBLED ON DHANTERAS , FIRST\nDAY OF DIWALI TO PLEASE YAMA.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">KUBERA IS THE OPPOSITE\nDIRECTION -GUARDIAN OF NORTH.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ONLY CONSCIOUS\n\"HUMAN SOULS\"&nbsp; ARE BOUND BY THE\nLAWS OF KARMA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MOKSHA HAPPENS ONLY IN\nTHE HOLY LAND OF INDIA.. MOKSHA IS PURELY KARMA BASED. THERE IS NO SHORT CUT OR\nJUGAAD POSSIBLE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IF A WHITE CHRISTIAN\nMAN IS CREMATED IN THE WEST HIS SOUL WILL SHOOT UP TO ONE OF THE BOTTOM SIX\nASTRAL LAYERS--BUT NOT TO THE SEVENTH --THAT CAN HAPPEN ONLY IN THE HOLY LAND\nOF INDIA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A WHITE MAN IN THE WEST\nWHOSE SOUL IS EVOLVED AND WORTHY OF THE SEVENTH LAYER IS BORN AS AN INDIGO\nCHILD. INDIGO IS SAME COLOR OF THE SIXTH ASTRAL LAYER.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/03/indigo-children-ajit-vadakayil.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/03/indigo-children-ajit-vadakayil.html</a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">VISHNU MORTAL AVATARS\nWERE SENT SPECIALLY --BRAHMAN ( GOD ) SENT THEM FOR A SPECIFIC PURPOSE ON\nEARTH. AFTER THEIR MISSION WAS ACCOMPLISHED THEIR SOULS WERE MERGED BACK TO\nBRAHMAN</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YOU ARE GIVEN CHANCES\nTO LESSEN YOUR KARMIC BAGGAGE ONCE YOU BECOME HUMAN. THIS IS WHY GOD HAS GIVEN\nYOU FREE WILL.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GOD DOES NOT PUNISH\nANIMALS WITH BAD KARMA-- AS ANIMALS BEHAVE ON PURE SURVIVAL INSTINCTS.&nbsp; ANIMALS HAVE ONLY MOOLADARA CHAKRA.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ONCE YOU BECOME HUMAN\nYOU DO NOT GO BACK TO BEING AN ANIMAL BY BAAD KARMA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT IS OBVIOUS ALL ARE\nNOT BORN EQUAL\u2014 SOME ARE BRAINY AND HANDSOME, SOME ARE UGLY AND RETARDED . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NEXT IN LINE TO BECOME\nHUMAN ARE A HANDFUL OF CONSCIOUS MAMMALS WHO CAN SEE IN COLOUR AND WHO CAN PASS\nTHE MIRROR TEST.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">hi a,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the POISON INJECTED\nKatha Upanishad, Yama is portrayed as a teacher to Nachiketa, a little boy, and\ntheir conversation evolves to a discussion of the nature of humans, knowledge,\nAtman (soul, self) and moksha (liberation)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">FIND OUT WHO WERE THE\nAGENTS OF JEW ROTHSCHILD<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">FIND OUT WHOM THEY\nPROPAGATED<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">VIVEKANANDA USED TO\nKEEP REPEATING NACHIKETA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE POISON INJECTED IS\nTHAT YAMA GAVE MOKSHA TO NACHIKETA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">YAMA CANNOT GIVE MOKSHA\n.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">NEITHER THERE IS HELL\nIN HINDUISM .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://isha.sadhguru.org/blog/sadhguru/masters-words/intensity-spiritual-path-story-nachiketa/\">http://isha.sadhguru.org/blog/sadhguru/masters-words/intensity-spiritual-path-story-nachiketa/</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN SANATANA DHARMA YAMA\nIS LOKPALA ( GUARDIAN ) OF SOUTH DIRECTION. THIS HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH HELL. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">YAMA DOES NOT HOLD THE\n\"FINAL JUDGEMENT\" LIKE IN CHRISTIANITY. THIS GOES AGAINST THE LAWS OF\nKARMA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE OPIUM DRUG RUNNING\nPARTNERS OF JEW ROTHSCHILD/ SASSOON ( CALCUTTA ) GAMBLED ON DHANTERAS , FIRST\nDAY OF DIWALI TO PLEASE YAMA. KUBERA IS THE OPPOSITE DIRECTION -GUARDIAN OF\nNORTH.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">HERE IS BULLSHIT IN\nWIKIPEDIA-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE: An ancient\nlegend ascribes the occasion to on interesting story about the 16-year-old son\nof King Hima. His horoscope predicted his death by snake-bite on the fourth day\nof his marriage. On that particular day, his newly-wed wife did not allow him to\nsleep. She laid out all her ornaments and lots of gold and silver coins in a\nheap at the entrance of the sleeping chamber and lit lamps all over the place.\nThen she narrated stories and sang songs to keep her husband from falling\nasleep. The next day, when Yama, the god of Death, arrived at the prince\u2019s\ndoorstep in the guise of a Serpent, his eyes were dazzled and blinded by the\nbrilliance of the lamps and the jewellery. Yama could not enter the Prince's\nchamber, so he climbed on top of the heap of gold coins and sat there the\nentire night listening to the stories and songs. In the morning, he silently\nwent away. Thus, the young prince was saved from the clutches of death by the\ncleverness of his new bride, and the day came to be celebrated as Dhanteras. The\nfollowing day came to be called Naraka Chaturdashi ('Naraka' means hell and\nChaturdashi means 14th). It is also known as \u2018Yamadeepdaan\u2019 as the ladies of\nthe house light earthen lamps or \u2018deep\u2019 and these are kept burning throughout\nthe night glorifying Yama, the God of Death. Since this is the night before\nDiwali, it is also called 'Chhoti Diwali' or Minor Diwali.[2]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to another\npopular legend, when the Gods and demons churned the ocean for Amrita or\nnectar, Dhanvantari (the physician of the Gods and an incarnation of Vishnu)\nemerged carrying a jar of the elixir on the day of Dhanteras.[2] UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">YAMA HAS BEEN INJECTED\nALL OVER VEDAS / UPANISHADS BY JEW ROTHSCHILD TO SUSTAIN THE FALSE THEORY OF\nHELL IN HINDUISM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">######################################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">TRUTH :&nbsp; CREMATION FIRE ( AGNI ) IS YAMAs PRIEST AS\nPER VEDAS .&nbsp; YAMA PROPELs THE SOUL WHEN\nTHE SKULL POPS DURING CREMATION TO A SUITABLE ASTRAL LAYER .&nbsp; YAMA IS ALSO THE SON OF VIVASAT , THE KEEPER\nOF DHARMA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">###############################################################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">MY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP\nTO 20.45%<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YAMA IS NOT THE DEVIL,\nAS WHAT IS DISCUSSED IN LITERARY FESTS BY DESH DROHI WHITE MEN .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YAMA LIKE RUDRA IS A\nGOD IN VEDAS. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">VEDAS DESRIBE YAMA AS\nTHE REGENT OF THE DEPARTED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YAMA IS LORD OF PITRIS \u2013\nTHE GUARDIAN OF THE ANCESTORS SOULS IN ASTRAL LAYERS TWO TO SIX.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YAMA IS LOKAPALA , THE\nREGENT OF THE SOUTH AS PER VAASTU.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Brihadaranyaka\nUpanishad mentions Surya the Sun as the Regent of the East; Varuna of the West;\nYama of the South; Soma of the North; and Agni in the zenith.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">indro vahni\u1e25 pit\u1e5bpatirnair\u1e5bto\nvaru\u1e47o marut / kubera {\u012b}\u015ba\u1e25 pataya\u1e25 p\u016brv\u0101d\u012bn\u0101\u1e43 di\u015b\u0101\u1e43 kram\u0101t (1.3.178-9) \u2013\nAmarakosha<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CHITRAGUPTA , COOKED UP\nBY JEW ROTHSCHILD HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH YAMA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">NOWHERE\nIN THE VEDAS HAS YAMA ANYTHING TO DO WITH PUNISHMENT OF THE WICKED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">Yama\nis god of the dead but not a god of death. He is the god of righteousness\n(Dharmaraja) and a restrainer (niyamaytir)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">Yama\nis the son of the resplendent Vivasvat; hence his last-name is Vaivasvata (Rig\nVeda 10.14.5) \u2013 vivasvanta\u1e43 huve ya\u1e25 pit\u0101 te.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u201cWorship\nthe son of Vivasvat, the gatherer of men with oblations, he who was the first\nof the mortals to die (prathamo marty\u0101n\u0101\u1e43), he who first entered&nbsp;&nbsp; this world \u2013 prey\u0101ya prathamo lokam etam\u201d).&nbsp; <b>-&nbsp; &nbsp;Atharva Veda 18.3.13 \u2013 5000 BC<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">Yama\nis the first ancestor and the king of ancestors (pitr raja; Preta-adipati ) as\nalso the god of ceremonies, Sraddha deva.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
