, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A soul attracts karmic\nmatter even with the thoughts, and not just the actions.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;Forget\nabout fake GURU Sadguru Jaggi Vasudev telling you that it is OK for a\nhomosexual to have ANAL SEX behind closed doors..&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Toeven think evil of\nsomeone would endure a karma-bandha or an increment in bad karma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma operates as a\nself-sustaining mechanism as natural universal law, without any need of an\nexternal entity to manage them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanatana Dharma only\nACCUMULATED KARMIC BAGGAGE decides moksha<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before Moksha, the soul\nmust go through all the experiences of life in the physical world. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The belief in karma and\nreincarnation brings to each Hindu inner peace and self-assurance. The Hindu\nknows that the maturing of the soul takes many lives, and that if the soul is\nimmature in the present birth, then there is hope, for there will be many\nopportunities for learning and growing in future lives.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You cannot create\nexperience-&nbsp; you have to undergo it.&nbsp;&nbsp; Pain of mistake is part of experience . Good\njudgement flows from experience . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The field of brahmAn (\ngod ) , does not treat all the same.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why some are\nbeautiful having brains who are respected , while some are ugly lepers with NIL\nbrains who are despised&nbsp; or some are fat\nand ugly like a certain KUMARI.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your present life is\nnothing, when compared with the whole soul-life. It is momentary - a mere\nfragment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A JIVAN MUKT IS IN A\nTURIYA STATE\u2014HE IS NOT A SAINT\u2014HE BECOME A SAGE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A saint is a very\nordinary guy.. A sage is the extraordinary being. A sage does not dream,\nbecause he has no polarity. He\u2019s just a witness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A SAGE HAS NO EGO.&nbsp; &nbsp;WE\nBURY HIM . THERE ARE NO SEEDS INSIDE HIM TO BE BURNT BEFORE HIS SOULS MERGES\nWITH BRAHMAN<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A WOMAN CAN NEVER BE A\nJIVAN MUKT DUE TO THE EGO FACTOR<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TURIYA means\n\u201cconsciousness minus thinking\u201d . It represents consciousness free from material\ninfluence or supreme consciousness . In Turiya there is the absolute awareness\n. It is the experience of ultimate reality and truth. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">A JIVAN MUKT HAS ZERO\nEGO.. HIS SOUL FREQUENCY IS THE HIGHEST..&nbsp;\nHIS NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE IS ZERO.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Actions do not create\nkarma (good or bad) when performed by an individual in the state of Moksha or\nliberation.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Such a Jivan mukt person is called\n\"Stithaprajna\".&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first mark of a sthitaprajna, one of\nsteady wisdom, is casting off all desires and delighting and being content in\none\u2019s own true nature, Brahman\u2026&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Attaining sthitaprajna state is the goal of human\nevolution.&nbsp; He &nbsp;lives in the body but is free from all bonds,\nsense-cravings, and has a clear understanding of the truth.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such a person has\nrisen above the plane of gains or losses. A jivanmukta is not miserable, is not\nanxious over the past and the future, and remains calm&nbsp; regardless of what is happening in the\npresent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such a person always\nremains unattached to the&nbsp; material world\ndue to the awareness that this&nbsp; gross\nbody is perishable, and such a person does&nbsp;\nnot attach any significance to this body and is&nbsp; least interested in names and forms.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Being\nindifferent to the actions and reactions of the senses&nbsp; and the body, a jivanmukta is totally bereft\nof&nbsp; the feelings of \u2018I\u2019 and \u2018mine\u2019.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A\njivanmukta does&nbsp; not offend anybody by\nthought, word, and deed,&nbsp; and is not hurt\neven a bit by taunts, censures,&nbsp; insults,\nand persecutions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such a person maintains balance or equanimity of mind amidst\nthe&nbsp; duality of world: censure and\npraise, honour and&nbsp; dishonour, pleasure\nand pain.&nbsp; He is above good and evil,\nvirtue and vice, and finds no&nbsp; fault with\nothers. Such a person is a powerhouse&nbsp; of\nspiritual energy, who sees all these through the eye of knowledge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">n\u0101bhinandati na dve\u1e63h\u1e6di\ntasya praj\u00f1\u0101 prati\u1e63h\u1e6dhit\u0101<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Translation-- One who\nremains unattached under all conditions, and is neither delighted by good\nfortune nor dejected by tribulation, he is a sage with perfect knowledge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0935\u093f\u092e\u0941\u0939\u094d\u092f\u0924\u093f</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n|<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0938\u094d\u0925\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0935\u093e\u0938\u094d\u092f\u093e\u092e\u0928\u094d\u0924\u0915\u093e\u0932\u0947\u093d\u092a\u093f</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092c\u094d\u0930\u0939\u094d\u092e\u0928\u093f\u0930\u094d\u0935\u093e\u0923\u092e\u0943\u091a\u094d\u091b\u0924\u093f</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n|| 72|| <b>Bhagawad Gita 2.72 \u2013 4000 BC</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">e\u1e63h\u0101 br\u0101hm\u012b sthiti\u1e25\np\u0101rtha nain\u0101\u1e41 pr\u0101pya vimuhyati<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">sthitv\u0101sy\u0101m anta-k\u0101le\n\u2019pi brahma-nirv\u0101\u1e47am \u1e5bichchhati<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Translattion--O Parth,\nsuch is the state of an enlightened soul that having attained it, one is never\nagain deluded. Being established in this consciousness even at the hour of\ndeath, one is liberated from the cycle of life and death and reaches the\nSupreme Abode of God.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the Karma comes to\nan entirely neutral state, with neither good karma nor bad karma outstanding,\nthen the person ( Jivan Mukt )&nbsp; is said\nto have obtained Moksha.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindus believe that\neverything in the Universe is in a state of creation, maintenance or\ndestruction. Similarly, the mind creates a thought, maintains (follows) it for\nsome time and the thought ultimately dies down (perhaps to be replaced by\nanother thought).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In addition to the three states of\nconsciousness, Hinduism puts forward a fourth state of being called Turiya or\npure consciousness, where the mind is not engaged in thinking but just observes\nthe thoughts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Actions in the Turiya\nstate do not create karma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An individual who is\nconstantly in the turiya state is said to have attained moksha where their\nactions happen as a response to events (and not because of thought process);\nsuch actions do not result in accumulation of karma as they have no karmic\neffect. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Turiya, the self\ndoes not think, feel, or do, but rather observes thought, emotion, and action\ncapable of truly understanding the totality of the universe. Turiya has no\nlimits and no endpoint. It is infinitely transcendent, which means its\npotential is forever expanding. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You are now a unique\nindividual and you are a vital part of a larger universal life force that transcends\neverything on earth..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reality and truth\nbecome more clearly defined, allowing you to perceive that which lies above,\nbelow, and beyond the human experience.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This utterly quiet,\npeaceful and blissful state is the ultimate aim of all spiritual activity this\nhighest state is not affected by Maya The Waker, The Dreamer, The Deep Sleeper\nand The Observer<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You experience\ndetachment and joy .&nbsp; Turiya\nConsciousness&nbsp; is the ultimate goal of\nspirituality for here you know what freedom is all about.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The dot, point, or\nbindu of OM symbol represents the fourth state, the absolute consciousness,\nwhich encompasses, permeates, and is the other three\u2014this is Turiya. (Silence\nafter A, U, and M of OM Mantra)&nbsp; .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Piercing the bindu\nfinally allows one to attain the highest experience, and this comes after\nfollowing the process of Kundalini Awakening.&nbsp;\nTuriya is regarded as synonymous with videhamukti, liberation without a\nbody. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you become a\nwitness in your life, life becomes absolutely simple. . You cannot call it\nwaking, because this witness never sleeps; you cannot call it dreaming, because\nfor this witness no dream ever appears; you cannot call it sleep, because this\nwitness never sleeps. It is eternal awareness, this is Nirvana or enlightenment<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OM is the four states\nof consciousness, as per Patanjali Yoga.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OM is the waking state\nor jagrat. Beta brain wave<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OM is the dreaming\nstate or svapna.&nbsp; REM sleep state<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OM is the deep sleep\nstate or sushupti. (dream-less deep sleep state , the delta brain wave)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Om is the\ntranscendental state or turiya. (beyond all the states) , the fourth has been\ncalled nirvana.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVERY SINGLE MESSIAH\nSINGLE HOLY BOOK HAS STOLEN OM AND MODIFIED IT \u2013PATHETIC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CHRISTIANS MADE IT OM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MUSLIMS PUT 786 ON\nEVERY KORAN COVER.. DRAW THE SYMBOL OF OM \u2013SHOW TO A MIRROR AND READ FROM RIGHT\nTO LEFT\u2014YOU CAN READ 786<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JEWS MADE IT SHALOM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SIKHS MADE IT OMKAR<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Four stages:\nconsciousness plus thinking is waking, consciousness minus thinking is turiya,\nunconsciousness plus thinking is dreaming, unconsciousness minus thinking is\nsleep.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-gSx057PpLSs/XG_oSX7nodI/AAAAAAABf40/a2MKS-z9P18WwRaGWzp_PF7aYpgrzVLVgCLcBGAs/s1600/imFagesCAWL6LND.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"255\" data-original-width=\"197\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-gSx057PpLSs/XG_oSX7nodI/AAAAAAABf40/a2MKS-z9P18WwRaGWzp_PF7aYpgrzVLVgCLcBGAs/s640/imFagesCAWL6LND.jpg\" width=\"494\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Finally, the\nsemi-circle symbolizes Maya and separates the dot from the other three curves.\nIt is the illusion of Maya that prevents us from the realization of this\nhighest state of bliss. The semi-circle is open at the top and does not touch\nthe dot. This means that this highest state is not affected by Maya. Maya only\naffects the manifested phenomenon. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Turiya thoughts\nsubside and one becomes increasingly more awake; the mind settles down and\nconsciousness itself becomes primary. Mediators describe this as pure\nconsciousness or unbounded awareness. One sees the entire world and all things\nwithin it as part of oneself, and oneself part of all.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE SOUL HAS\nALREADY MERGED WITH BRAHMAN WHILE ON PLANET EARTH AS A QUANTUM&nbsp; ENTANGLEMENT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Turiya&nbsp; is a state of transcendence.. The Upanishads\nequates this experience with enlightenment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We ordinary people lack\ncontact with our fourth state of consciousness, and so we fail to live up to\nour potential as human beings\u2014like ancient Maharishis .. Turiya is the totality\nof everything, and the headwaters from which all consciousness flow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is said in the\nMandukya Upanishad. It is \u201cunseen, transcendent, the sole essence of the\nconsciousness of self, the completion of the world.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The ancient Vedic\nMaharishis with NIL karmic baggage and highest frequency soul, went beyond\nnature and realized the transcendental nature of man. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">They dared to take up\nthis challenge and the Upanishads are the unique record of the methods they\nadopted, the struggles they undertook and the victory they achieved in this\nastonishing adventure of human spirit .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">With their mental\ngifts, they had turned their mental energies to the conquest of the inner world\nrather than of the world of matter and life at the sensate level.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">&nbsp;In the 7000 year old Upanishads we get a\nglimpse into the workings of the minds of the great ancient Indian thinkers who\nwere unhampered by the tyranny of religious dogma of men who became brokers of\nGods or Gods themselves , burnings at the stake, political authority, pressure\nof public opinion, seeking truth with single-minded devotion, rare in the history\nof thought.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">These Indian sages were\nnot satisfied with their intellectual speculations. They discovered that the\nuniverse remained a mystery and the mystery only deepened with the advance of\nsuch knowledge, and one of the important components of that deepening mystery\nis the mystery of man and consciousness.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The Upanishads became aware of this\ntruth, which modern science now emphasizes.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">LISTEN-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 18.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">IF ALL WORLD RELIGIONS COMBINED IS A DROP OF STINKING DIRTY WATER \u2014&nbsp; SANATANA DHARMA IS THE DEEP PRISTINE BLUE OCEAN.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL ANCIENT MAHARISHIS\nWERE JIVANMUKTS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ONLY JIVANMUKHTs CAN\nDOWNLOAD VEDIC SRUTIS FROM AKASHA.. IT IS NOT POSSIBLE FOR ANY OTHER HUMAN TO\nDO THAT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WOMEN CANNOT BE\nJIVANMUKTS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE WHITE NVADER LIED\nTHAT SOME WOMEN WROTE THE VEDAS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">LISTEN-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN MEN HAVE NOT\nWRITTEN VEDAS\u2014HOW CAN WOMEN WRITE IT ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">February 1, 2019 at\n5:45 PM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hi captain,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">---&gt; Women in Vedic\nage who pursued vedic studies, could undergo the sacred thread ceremony or\n'Upanayana' (a sacrament to pursue Vedic studies), which is only meant for\nmales even to this day.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">---&gt;\u2018Sadyovadhus\u2019\nwere those who became vadhus or brides straight-away, (sadyas = at once) on the\nattainment of puberty, without undergoing the training in the Vedic studies. In\ntheir case, the upanayana ceremony was performed just before marriage, as a\nformality. The practice of performing upanayana for women and teaching them the\nVedas also, seems to have disappeared even by the time of the Manusmrti\n(composed much earlier than A. D. 200). The word brahmav\u0101din\u012b is sometimes\napplied to the famous Gayatr\u012bmantra also.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">https://dharmawiki.org/index.php/Education_of_Vedic_Women_-Brahmavadinis<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">https://dharmawiki.org/index.php/%E0%A4%B8%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A4%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%80_%E0%A4%B5%E0%A5%87%E0%A4%A6_%E0%A4%85%E0%A4%A7%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%95%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%B0-Study_of_Vedas_by_Women_in_Ancient_India<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They refered - Brhad\u0101ranyaka\nUpani\u1e63ad 4.5.1 The Concise Encyclopedia of Hinduism, Swami Harshananda, Ram\nKrishna Math, Bangalore<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt. In that he sacrifices on the day before\u2026In that he\nsacrifices at the new moon with clotted curds for Mitra and Varuna, the cow\nwhich is slaughtered for the gods becomes his also. POISON<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brihadaranyaka\nUpanishad 6.4.18 And if a man wishes that a learned son should be born to him,\nfamous, a public man, a popular speaker, that he should know all the Vedas, and\nthat he should live to his full age, then, after having prepared boiled rice\nwith meat and butter, they should both eat, being fit to have offspring. The\nmeat should be of a young or of an old bull.POISON<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brahma Purana 137\n\u201dAfter performing these tasks Rama thee most excellent among the virtuous\nperformed ten horse-sacrifices where flesh was offered to the deities.\u201d POISON<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SORRY-- ASHWAMEDHA IS A\nBLOODLESS YAGNA\u2014IT IS A \u201cVOTE OF CONFIDENCE\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manu Smriti 5.18 The\nporcupine, the hedgehog, the iguana, the rhinoceros, the tortoise, and the hare\nthey declare to be eatable; likewise those (domestic animals) that have teeth\nin one jaw only, excepting camels. POISON<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manu Smriti 5.35 But a\nman who, being duly engaged (to officiate or to dine at a sacred rite), refuses\nto eat meat, becomes after death an animal during twenty-one existences.POISON<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kurma Purana 2.17.40\n\u201dIf a person invited for the Sraddha or the worship of a deity eschews meat he\nmay have to be in the hell as many years as there are hairs on the body of the\nanimal.\u201dPOISON<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manu Smriti 5.32 He who\neats meat, when he honours the gods and manes, commits no sin, whether he has\nbought it, or himself has killed (the animal), or has received it as a present\nfrom others. POISON<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manu Smriti 5.44 Know\nthat the injury to moving creatures and to those destitute of motion, which the\nVeda has prescribed for certain occasions, is no injury at all; for the sacred\nlaw shone forth from the Veda.POISON<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED TO 4<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">February 1, 2019 at\n10:46 PM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED FROM 3-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manu Smriti 5.39-40\nSwayambhu (the Self-existent) himself created animals for the sake of\nsacrifices; sacrifices(have been instituted) for the good of this whole\n(world); hence the slaughtering (of beasts) for sacrifices is not slaughtering\n(in the ordinary sense of the word).Herbs, trees, cattle, birds, and (other)\nanimals that have been destroyed for sacrifices, receive (being reborn) higher\nexistence POISON<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manu Smriti 5.22-23\nBeasts and birds recommended (for consumption) may be slain by Brahmanas for\nsacrifices, and in order to feed those whom they are bound to maintain; for\nAgastya did this of old. For in ancient (times) the sacrificial cakes were\n(made of the flesh) of eatable beasts and birds at the sacrifices offered by\nBrahmanas and Kshatriyas.POISON<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT IS FUTILE TO QUOTE\nTHESE POISON INJECTED WORKS\u2014 THERE ARE THOUSANDS OF THEM..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE IMMORAL WHITE\nINVADER USED HIS FAKE MUTTS TO DO PRAPAGANDA THAT ANY HINDU WHO REFUSED TO EAT\nPRASADAM BEEF THAT WAS OFFERED TO GODS WILL GO TO HELL FOR ETERNAL PUNISHMENT.,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meat can never be\nobtained without injury to living creatures, and injury to sentient beings is\ndetrimental to (the attainment of) heavenly bliss; let him therefore shun (the\nuse of) meat.-- Manu Smriti 5.48. TRUTH<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The hymn of Devi sukta\n(10.125) attributed to woman sage Vaak Ambhrni\u2014 Sage Ambruna..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sorry, we never heard\nof Vaak Ambhrni before the white invader came to India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brihaspati did not have\na daughter named Romasa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white invader LIED\n. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n|| 20||&nbsp; <b>Bhagawad Gita 8.20 \u20144000 BC<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; That realm does not cease even when all others do.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n|| 42|| <b>Bhagawad Gita 10.42-&nbsp; 4000 BC</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">atha v\u0101 bahunaitena ki\u1e41\nj\u00f1\u0101tena tav\u0101rjuna<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">vi\u1e63h\u1e6dabhy\u0101ham ida\u1e41 k\u1e5bitsnam\nek\u0101n\u015bhena sthito jagat<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Translation-- What need\nis there for all this detailed knowledge, O Arjun? Simply know that by one\nfraction of my being, I pervade and support this entire creation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">February 4, 2019 at\n11:21 AM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/mistakes-deliberate-or-inadvertant-in.html</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN CREATOR BRAHMA\nBREATHE IN THERE IS PRALAYA \u2013 COSMIC DISSOLUTION..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BREATHING IN HAS TO BE\nASSISTED BY DESTROYER SHIVA ( DARK ENERGY ) ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MEDIATOR VISHNU DECIDES\nWHAT TIME PRALAYA MUST TAKE PLACE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The universe is full of\nmatter and the attractive force of gravity pulls all matter together.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">About 70 % of the\nuniverse is dark energy ( SHIVA ) \u2014 26% is dark matter . Normal matter is\naround 4 % of the universe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Purusha sukta is hymn\n10.90 of the Rigveda, dedicated to the Purusha, the \"Cosmic Being\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It gives a description\nof the spiritual unity of the universe. It presents the nature of Purusha, or\nthe cosmic being, as both immanent in the manifested world and yet transcendent\nto it..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From this being, the\noriginal creative will ( Hiranyagarbha) proceeds which causes the projection of\nthe universe in space and time. All manifestations, in past, present and\nfuture, is held to be the Purusha alone..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Purusha transcends his\ncreation. Creation is described to have started with the origination of Virat,\nor the cosmic body from the Purusha. In Virat, omnipresent intelligence\nmanifests itself which causes the appearance of diversity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rigveda 10.90.3 - All\nthat is born is just his one fourth, the other 3/4th cannot born or die.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rigveda 10.90.4 - 3/4th\nof him ( Purusha ) is beyond and only 1/4th of him is born again and again.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">RIGVEDA 10.90.11 IS\nPOISON INJECTED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD. ( AND THIS MADE KANCHA ILAIH CRY AND HAVE\nWHITE SPITTLE AT HIS BLACK LIP CORNERS .. )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">11 When they divided\nPuru\u1e63a how many portions did they make?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What do they call his\nmouth, his arms? What do they call his thighs and feet?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">RIGVEDA 10.90.12 IS\nPOISON INJECTED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">12 The Brahman was his\nmouth, of both his arms was the R\u0101janya made.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His thighs became the\nVai\u015bya, from his feet the \u015a\u016bdra was produced.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IDIOTS OF DHARMA WIKI\nCALLS THIS \u201cFACT\u201d .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Purusha Sukta holds\nthat the world is created by and out of a Yajna or sacrifice of the Purusha.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Purusha Sukta states\nthat the moon takes birth from the Purusha's mind and the sun from his eyes.\nIndra and Agni descend from his mouth and from his vital breath, air is born.\nThe firmament comes from his navel, the heavens from his head, the earth from\nhis feet and quarters of space from his ears.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Through this creation,\nunderlying unity of human, cosmic and divine realities is espoused, for all are\nseen arising out of same original reality, the Purusha.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All forms of existence\nare held to be grounded in this primordial yajna.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the seventeenth\nverse, the concept of Yajna itself is held to have arisen out of this original\nsacrifice. In the final verses, yajna is extolled as the primordial energy\nground for all existence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gods, sacrificing,\nsacrificed the victim these were the earliest holy ordinances.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Mighty Ones\nattained the height of heaven, there where the S\u0101dhyas, Gods of old, are\ndwelling.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sarvam shivam mayam\njagatham i.e. the whole Universe is held by Shiva. Shiva is Param Sunya means\nnothingness. Everything emerges from him and returns into him.. Shiva Is dark\nmatter and dark energy.. ( Shakti is recreative energy)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; MELORDS WANT TO SEE KACHRAWAALs SIGNATURE ON A PAPER , IF THEY MUST CHECK OUT IF SEDITION CAN BE APPLIED ON UMAR KHALID...<br />\n<br />\nMELORDS DONT EVEN KNOW THAT \"STATE\" IN JUDICIAL PARLANCE FOR SEDITION CASES MEANS CENTRE -- NOT DELHI STATE CM WHO HAS NO CONTROL EVEN OVER POLICE..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/09/uniform-civil-code-in-india-capt-ajit.html<br />\n<br />\nTHE ELECTIONS TO THE JAMMU AND KASHMIR ASSEMBLY IN 1951 WERE RIGGED...<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/01/the-kashmir-conflict-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html<br />\n<br />\nSHYAM PRASAD MOOKERJEE WAS MURDERED.. ON ORDERS FROM WE ALL KNOW WHO ( TO HIS HALF BROTHER WHO CONTROLLED KASHMIR )..<br />\n<br />\nArticle 370 gave the solitary State of Jammu &amp; Kashmir the right to have a separate Constitution and separate flag, but nowhere does it say which category of Indians will enjoy all citizenship rights in Jammu &amp; Kashmir and which sections will not.<br />\n<br />\nWE ALL KNOW WHICH MAN ( WHO LATER BECAME PM ) BENEFITED MOST FROM MURDER OF DEEN DAYAL UPADHYAYA.. THIS MAN SAID TAAATA BAAYE BAAAYE TO SHYAM PRASAD MOOKHERJEE . ..<br />\n<br />\nPARAMOUNT CLAUSE: \" ETHNIC CLEANSING \" - OF SIX LAKHS KASHMIRI PANDITS BY KASHMIRI MUSLIMS SUPPORTED BY PAKISTAN, MAKES ARTICLE 370 NULL AND VOID....<br />\n<br />\nNehru amended Article 368 without taking the Indian Parliament into confidence, THOUGH Parliament alone had the power to amend or not amend the Constitution, to amend Article 35 and add to it the atrocious Article 35A which was enforced in Jammu &amp; Kashmir through the Constitution (Application to Jammu &amp; Kashmir) Order, May 1954...<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A enabled the Jammu &amp; Kashmir Constituent Assembly to deny citizenship rights to the HINDU refugees from West Pakistan and all other Indians, barring Permanent Residents of the State...<br />\n<br />\nArmed with absolute power, the Jammu &amp; Kashmir Constituent Assembly adopted Section 6 which said no persons who had crossed over to the state after May 1944 will be considered eligible for citizenship rights...<br />\n<br />\nNehru enforced Article 35A in Jammu &amp; Kashmir UNCONSTITUTIONALLY - More important he criminally CONCEALED it...<br />\n<br />\nHe hid the amendments from the public, by not mentioning the same in the main body of the Constitution...<br />\n<br />\nThe unconstitutional amendments to Article 368 and Article 35 were mentioned only in Appendix-I and Appendix-II, respectively, so that they could escape public attention<br />\n- In a CRIMINAL MANNER..<br />\n<br />\nAN APPENDIX , CAN NEVER HIJACK THE MAIN BODY OF ANY ARTICLE...ANY IDIOT KNOWS THIS UNLESS HE IS STUPID COLLEGIUM JUDGE OR HE IS SENILE...<br />\n<br />\nIn October 2015, the High Court of Jammu and Kashmir has ruled that the Article 370 cannot be \"abrogated, repealed or even amended.\"..<br />\n<br />\nIt explained that the clause (3) of the Article conferred power to the State's Constituent Assembly to recommend to the President on the matter of the repeal of the Article...<br />\n<br />\nSince the Constituent Assembly did not make such a recommendation before its dissolution in 1957, the Article 370 has taken on the features of a \"permanent provision\" despite being titled a temporary provision in the Constitution..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1550369139948#c4046014408645006337\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 17, 2019 at 7:35 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nBALLS !<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS DONE BY DECEIT - IS \" NULL AND VOID \"..<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A came into existence by a Presidential Order passed by Dr. Rajandra Prasad ( Rothschild sponsored FAKE Kayastha ) on the advice of Nehru\u2019s cabinet in 1954...<br />\n<br />\nPresident of India has sole legislative power under article 123 power to make ordinance when either house of the Parliament is not in session. - This legislative powers of the President has an EXPIRY SHELL PERIOD OF MERE SIX MONTHS....<br />\n<br />\nThe Constitution can be amended only by the Parliament as per procedure clearly laid out in Article 368. But Article 35A was never presented before the Parliament of India...<br />\n<br />\nThis effectively means, in this case, the President bypassed the amending procedure as laid out in the Constitution of India in order to add the new Article 35A...<br />\n<br />\nThis also means that Article 368 of the Constitution, in its application to Jammu and Kashmir, also got amended!.<br />\n<br />\nThe President of India does not have legislative power, but here in this case he performed the function of Parliament!..<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A appears in the Constitution as an appendix..<br />\n<br />\nHow can an Article, which has been implemented on the ground as if it\u2019s a part of the Constitution, be missing from the text of the Constitution ?..<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A was an amendment in our Constitution via the back door (Presidential order), without the involvement of India\u2019s Parliament..<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A is an example of the abuse of Article 370..<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A is a violation of the basic structure of our Constitution..<br />\n<br />\nIt curbs certain basic rights enshrined in the very Preamble of the Constitution...<br />\n<br />\nAs a result of the implementation of Article 35A,<br />\n- Lakhs of Indian HINDU citizens have been deprived of \u201c JUSTICE, social, economic and political \u201d and \u201c EQUALITY of status and of opportunity \u201d...<br />\n<br />\nIn the laws under Article 370 read with Article 35A even the President of India may be denied a place or land for official purpose. - This is a breach of trust...<br />\n<br />\nDemocratic India cannot allow any section of its population to be treated as second-rate citizens in any part of the country...<br />\n<br />\nArticle 368 is the only way to amend the Constitution- Not the President...<br />\n<br />\nThe marginal note of Article 368 states; MAKE AADHAR COMPULSORY..&nbsp; &nbsp;APPLY AFSPA STRICTLY...<br />\n<br />\nMONITOR ( RECORD ) ALL MOBILE CALLS AND SOCIAL MEDIA ACTIVITY.<br />\n<br />\nIN THE REMAINING 17 PEACEFUL DISTRICTS LET PROSPERITY FLOW..<br />\n<br />\nTIME TO TIGHTEN THE SCREWS -- ISOLATE THE BAD APPLES..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nALL 3 ARMED FORCE CHIEFS<br />\nDEFENCE MINISTRY<br />\nDEFENCE MINISTER<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nRAW<br />\nIB<br />\nNIA<br />\nED<br />\nCBI<br />\nHOME MINISTRY<br />\nRAJNATH SINGH<br />\nCRPF CHIEF<br />\nGOVERNOR OF KASHMIR<br />\nCJI GOGOI<br />\nALL SUPREME COURT JUDGES<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nVP OF INDIA<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c2247030157387049788\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. THESE CASES MUST INVOLVE PENALTY FOR WASTING THE COURTs TIME..<br />\n<br />\nIN FUTURE IF ANYBODY SUES SOMEONE FOR 100 CRORES.... THE GOVT MUST MAKE SURE THAT 10% ( 10 crores ) OF THIS AMOUNT IS PUT AS SURETY IN COURT.... AS SOON AS THE CASE IS KICKED OUT BY THE JUDICIARY THIS 10% MUST IMMEDIATELY GO TO THE MAN WHO WAS FALSELY ACCUSED...<br />\n<br />\nENOUGH OF \"EGO MASSAGE \" CASES BY HIGH AND MIGHTY WHO WANT TO SUPPRESS TRUTHS..... THE PERSON WHO FILED THE DEFAMATION SUIT FOR 100 CRORES MUST REMAIN IN JAIL TILL HE PAYS UP THE REMAINING 90% ( 90 CRORES ) TO THE GOVT COFFERS....<br />\n<br />\nWE HAD A CRYING BOLLYWOOD SUPERSTAR FILING DEFAMATION CASE AGAINST CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL FOR EXPOSING ULTERIOR MOTIVED \u201cSATYAMEVA JAYATE\u201d SHOW..<br />\n<br />\nWHISTLE BLOWERS MUST NOT BE THREATENED... THE ONLY EXCEPTION TO THE RULE IS A LAWYER APPOINTED LEGALLY TO ARGUE THE CASE FOR A TRAITOR IN COURT ALONE ( NOT ON TV )..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nWE ASK AJIT DOVAL TO PROFILE ALL THESE FOREIGN PAYROLL DEEP STATE AGENTS AND THIS INCLUDED MEDIA ANCHORS WHO PUT ON SPIN ON THE DEFINITION OF THE TERM SEDITION..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nDEEP STATE CONTROLLED NGO FILE PILs SO THAT ILLEGAL COLLEGIUM JUDGES CAN MAKE LAWS\u2026<br />\nWE KNOW THE TRAITORS WHO ARE IN FOREIGN PAYROLL... THIS WAS A LIE ..</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">The Entebbe narrative reiterated the Israelis' ( SPECIAL PEOPLE OF PROMISED LAND ) insistence that </span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">they had the \"right\" to reach beyond their own borders </span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">in their \"war on terrorism\".. No other nation is afforded this UNIQUE privilege..</span><br />\n<br />\nThe hijackers, once in Benghazi, separated out the Israeli and Jewish passengers from the rest, letting the Gentiles go and taking the remainder to Entebbe.<br />\n<br />\n\"By way of deception, thou shalt make war\" \u2013 that's the motto of the Mossad, Israeli's main intelligence agency.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; THEY JUST WANT THE NEXT DRUG FIX..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nEVEN SOMALIA PIRATES ( 100% ) WERE UNDER THE EFFECT OF KHAT LEAVES..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/06/somalia-pirates-and-khat-leaves-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nCAPT AMARINDER SINGH<br />\nDGPs OF ALL STATES<br />\nLAW MINISTER PRASAD<br />\nLAW MINISTRY<br />\nCJI GOGOI<br />\nALL SUPREME COURT JUDGES<br />\nALL SUPREME COURT LAWYERS<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nALL HIGH COURT CHIEF JUSTICES<br />\nCMs OF ALL STATES<br />\nGOVERNORS OF ALL STATES<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nCBI<br />\nIB<br />\nNIA<br />\nED<br />\nRAW<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nRAJNATH SINGH<br />\nHOME MINISTRY<br />\nALL MPs OF INDIA<br />\nALL MLAs OF INDIA<br />\nALL LOK / RAJYA SABHA MPs<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nVP OF INDIA<br />\nKATJU<br />\nSOLI BABY<br />\nFALI BABY<br />\nSALVE BABY<br />\nSRI SRI RAVISHANKAR<br />\nSADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nI&amp;B DEPT<br />\nCOL RATHORE<br />\nDGPs OF ALL STATES<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\nALL BJP SPOKESMEN<br />\nAMITABH KANT<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nRSS<br />\nVHP<br />\nAVBP<br />\nNHRC<br />\nNCM<br />\nNCW<br />\nAMIT SHAH<br />\nWEBSITES OF DESH BHAKT LEADERS<br />\nSPREAD ON SOCIAL MEDIA</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c4148258640904450037\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; NOBODY HAS WRITTEN ABOUT IT TILL TODAY..<br />\n<br />\nPM MODI HAS BEEN UNABLE TO PREVENT FALSE PROPAGANDA FROM DESH DROHI JOURNALISTS LIKE SIDDHARTH VARADARAJAN, BARKHA DUTT, PRANNOY JAMES ROY, AROON PURIE, N RAM , RAJDEEP SARDESIA , RANA AYYUB ETC ..<br />\n<br />\nALL THESE DESH DROHI JOURNALISTS LOBE COL RATHORE ( I&amp;B MINISTER )--WHY ?<br />\n<br />\nWE WATCH..<br />\n<br />\nread all 8 parts of the post below--<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/justice-be-damned-enforce-law-not-any.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nCAPT AMARINDER SINGH<br />\nDGPs OF ALL STATES<br />\nLAW MINISTER PRASAD<br />\nLAW MINISTRY<br />\nCJI GOGOI<br />\nALL SUPREME COURT JUDGES<br />\nALL SUPREME COURT LAWYERS<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nALL HIGH COURT CHIEF JUSTICES<br />\nCMs OF ALL STATES<br />\nGOVERNORS OF ALL STATES<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nCBI<br />\nIB<br />\nNIA<br />\nED<br />\nRAW<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nRAJNATH SINGH<br />\nHOME MINISTRY<br />\nALL MPs OF INDIA<br />\nALL MLAs OF INDIA<br />\nALL LOK / RAJYA SABHA MPs<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nVP OF INDIA<br />\nKATJU<br />\nSOLI BABY<br />\nFALI BABY<br />\nSALVE BABY<br />\nSRI SRI RAVISHANKAR<br />\nSADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nI&amp;B DEPT<br />\nCOL RATHORE<br />\nDGPs OF ALL STATES<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\nALL BJP SPOKESMEN<br />\nAMITABH KANT<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nRSS<br />\nVHP<br />\nAVBP<br />\nNHRC<br />\nNCM<br />\nNCW<br />\nAMIT SHAH<br />\nWEBSITES OF DESH BHAKT LEADERS<br />\nSPREAD ON SOCIAL MEDIA</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc;
