max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_23.html?showComment=1550991677384#c841066437110554632\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 24, 2019 at 12:31 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE ASK THE MODI GOVT TO UNDERSTAND TRU HISTORY OF KASHMIR\u2014NOT FAKE HISTORY WRITTEN BY ROTHSCHILD HISTORIANS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The state of Jammu and Kashmir originally had five parts to it: Jammu, Kashmir, Ladakh, Aksai Chin and Northern Areas (Gilgit-Baltistan).</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Over time, India has lost Aksai Chin to China and, of course, the part captured by the tribal raiders in October 1947, which Pakistan chooses to refer to as \u201cAzad\u201d Kashmir, which incidentally includes the Gilgit-Baltistan area garnered courtesy a quietly executed Rotshchild coup.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In July 1948 , 24 year old Major William Alexander Brown was awarded the MBE (Military) by JEW Rothschild and it surprised everybody. The real reason is that he ensured the Gilgit went to Pakistan, not India as per Rothschild\u2019s orders..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Rothschild needed an Islamic buffer in that area . Islam and Communism are like oil and water \u2013 can commingle\u2014but never mix..</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JEW William Alexander Brown fluent in Pashtun language , was the son of Rothschild\u2019s agent William Neilson Brown, who was awarded the Military Cross during WW1. His grandfather, Alexander Laing Brown, was a Liberal MP .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Brown family were part of the Opium network of Rothschild under the front of wood traders.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">On 29 July 1947 24 year old Major William Alexander Brown , witnessed the formal handover of Gilgit on 1 August, when the British flag was lowered and that of Jammu &amp; Kashmir raised in its place.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Brigadier Ghansara Singh was the representative of the Maharaja of Jammu &amp; Kashmir.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">On August 1, 1947 the Gilgit lease was receded by Delhi to the maharaja of J&amp;K and Lt. Col. Roger Bacon, the British political agent, handed over the area to Brig. Ghansara Singh, the state\u2019s new governor.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The British officers of Gilgit Scouts: Major William Alexander Brown and Capt. A.S. Mathieson, still served Hari Singh as contract officers, though they continued to receive instructions from the political agent for Khyber based in Peshawar which was now Pakistan.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Brown and Mathieson had to swear an oath of allegiance to the maharaja on the \u201choly book\u201d Bible. These two wrapped an Oxford dictionary in red cloth and made an ass out of the Maharaja.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">As soon as Maharaja Hari Singh acceded to India, Brown got the Gilgit Scouts to surround the residency and, after a short gun battle, he imprisoned governor Ghansara Singh. Brown then informed Peshawar about the accession of Gilgit to Pakistan.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">On November 2, the major raised the Pakistani flag at his headquarters and informed the force that they now served the government in Karachi. Brown and Mathieson had surreptitiously opted for service in Pakistan when the maharaja signed the Instrument of Accession in favour of India. Since Gilgit by this act had become a part of India, properly, they should have made an immediate request for release from their appointments. But they didn\u2019t.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The geopolitically sensitive Gilgit had been swallowed whole by two Brits acting in concert with Pakistan. India was aghast.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Maj Brown was instructed by Jew Rothschild that the Muslim majority areas of Gilgit, Baltistan, Hunza, Nagar and Chitral, should join Pakistan.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Throughout the Kashmir War (October 22, 1947 to January 1, 1949), Rothschild successfully ensured that Pakistan\u2019s occupation of this region was not disturbed.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JEW Maj Brown and his associate, Subedar-Major JEW Babar Khan, realised that Gilgit would be surrounded and attacked by other rulers of Northern Areas and the Gilgit Scouts would defy orders if asked to take up arms..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">On November 1, 1947, Maj Brown arbitrarily declared that the Hindu rule had come to an end and added that Gilgit and the adjoining areas would join Pakistan</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">After Mountbatten\u2019s mediatory role and the collapse of the direct talks between Jawaharlal Nehru and Liaquat Ali Khan, the Indian Cabinet planned a full-scale war.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2--</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 36px; Miraculously he was found by a doctor and he recovered.<br />\n<br />\nIn 1957 JEW William Brown met JEWESS Margaret Rosemary Cooksley, who was serving with the UK High Commission in Karachi.<br />\n<br />\nOn 5 December 1984 , William Brown died in Britain .<br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">On Independence Day 1993, of the medal Sitara-i-Pakistan was issued as a posthumous recognition by Pakistan President Farooq Leghari of his great contribution. His widow Margaret received the medal in Islamabad from the hands of President Leghari on Pakistan Day, 23 March 1994.</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/01/the-kashmir-conflict-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD WANTED JEW NIZAM OF HYDERABAD TO ACCEDE TO PAKISTAN \u2013 THIS WAS STOPPED BY PATEL.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; THESE RICH SELFISH JEWS HAD CORNERED ALL THE WEALTH<br />\n<br />\nTHE NICARAGUAN PEOPLE WERE DESPERATELY POOR.<br />\n<br />\nMY CREW MEMBERS AND OFFICERS WERE ALL WHITES.<br />\n<br />\nI WENT ASHORE WITH MY MOLDOVAN CHIEF ENGINEER AT 2300 HRS , AS HE WANTED TO MAKE AN URGENT LONG TELEPHONE CALL TO HIS WIFE , FROM THE POST OFFICE. THE SATELLITE SHIPs PHONE WAS VERY EXPENSIVE<br />\n<br />\nI HIRED A SMALL BOY ( 8 YEARS OLD ) AT THE PORT GATE AS A GUIDE FOR SAFETY AND I TOOK MY WALKIE TALKIE TOO.<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE SEEN THE UTTER POVERTY<br />\n<br />\nMY ROMANIAN CHIEF OFFICER TOLD ME LATER-- ALL CREW WENT TO HOMES TO FUCK-- WIVES , SISTERS , DAUGHTERS . THESE WERE NOT WHORES. THEY WERE MADE VERY WELCOME. THEY PAID A PITTANCE FOR THE FUCK IN DOLLARS<br />\n<br />\nAT THE POST OFFICE I SAW A 11 YEAR OLD GORGEOUS LOOKING GIRL ( THEY LOOK LIKE INDIANS ) WITH VERY LONG HAIR .. HER EMAIL WAS STUCK. SO I HELPED HER BY SAYING YOU HAVE TO PUT A \"DOT\" ON THE YAHOO EMAIL ID.<br />\n<br />\nTHAT 11 YEAR OLD GIRL WAS ASKING MY 8 YEAR OLD BOY GUIDE WHETHER SHE COULD FUCK ME.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS BOY WAS PLAYING FACILITATOR AS HE COULD GET A BONUS FOR PLAYING PIMP. BUT SHE SAID SHE WANTED TO TAKE HER CLASSMATE FRIEND ALONG --FOR SAFETY-- AND SHE WOULD TAKE 30 MINUTES TO ARRIVE<br />\n<br />\nOUT OF CURIOSITY I ASKED THE GUIDE --IS SHE A VIRGIN?<br />\n<br />\nHE ASKED HER AND SAID \"YES\"<br />\n<br />\nI TOLD MY CHIEF ENGINEER \"STOP YOUR CALL-- LET US GET OUT OF HERE \"<br />\n<br />\nI WAS REMINDED OF A WHITE CAPTAIN WHO IS STILL IN HOT SCRATCHY BRAZILIAN JAIL AFTER A DECADE FOR SCREWING A GIRL ( AT AN AMAZON RIVER PORT--SHE CAME ON BOARD IN A BOAT WITH OTHER GIRLS ) WHO HE THOUGHT WAS MORE THAN 18<br />\n<br />\nAT THE GATE , THE WATCHMAN WITH A GUN WOULD NOT ALLOW US INSIDE AS IT WAS PAST MIDNIGHT<br />\n<br />\nTHE WALKIE TALKIE CAME IN HANDY-- I CALLED MY CHIEF OFFICER AND TOLD HIM TO CONTACT THE CORINTO HARBOUR MASTER BY VHF.<br />\n<br />\nLet e quote wikipedia--<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: While supporting the Contra war against the Sandinista government in the 1980s, U.S. Forces mined the Port of Corinto. On October 10, 1983, an attack destroyed 3.2 million US gallons (12,000 m3) of fuel. AND THAT TOO CROWDED IN RAWALPINDI, LAHORE , KARACHI , FAISALABAD , GUJRANWALA, HYDERABAD, AND MULTAN ..<br />\n<br />\nhttps://economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/science/nasa-releases-satellite-images-of-india-at-night-and-they-are-stunning/this-one-is-real/slideshow/58165307.cms<br />\n<br />\nWE KNOW HOW TO GRID BOMB PAKISTAN TO THE STONE AGE -- AND ACCEPT BACK THIS WASTELAND INTO INDIA AFTER THE RADIATION HAS COOLED OFF..<br />\n<br />\nTHE WEE TOY TACTICAL NUKE PHATTAKAS OF PAKISTAN DOES NOT SCARE INDIA.. WE HAVE MIGHTY STRATEGIC NUKES ..<br />\n<br />\nIF CHINA WANTS TO SUPPORT TERRORIST AZHAR MASOOD , INDIA CAN KILL CHINA WITH ONE SINGLE ECONOMIC BLOW -- STOP ALL IMPORTS FROM CHINA --100%..<br />\n<br />\nThe overall Chinese debt is currently at around 385 percent of its GDP..<br />\n<br />\nGrowth is a pissfart 4.9 % --while India grows today at 10.1 %..<br />\n<br />\nMADMEN have screwed up Chinas economy.. A big chunk of the debt lies in the country\u2019s shadow banking sector, which only increases the risk of China\u2019s financial collapse.<br />\n<br />\nShadow banking is the unregulated segment of the Chinese financial environment. This sector sells anything from investments trusts to wealth management products, creating a false sense of economic expansion beyond official avenues.<br />\n<br />\nUnlike in the U.S., traditional commercial banks drive shadow banking, or unregulated lending, in China. That\u2019s because the banks have been able to keep shadow-banking assets off their balance sheets, thereby sidestepping regulatory constraints on lending.<br />\n<br />\nAsset Managed Products (AMPs) are the biggest funding source for shadow loans in the country. These are deposit accounts that offer high-interest rates. All major institutions, right from banks to brokerages, issue AMPs.<br />\n<br />\nChinese people were fooled into believing that the Commie Chinese government supports the country\u2019s financial institutions, AMPs generated huge trust among investors ( sic ) . Its issuance is more than 17 Trillion USD ..<br />\n<br />\nThe problem is that a big portion of funds raised through the AMPs has been utilized by the institutions to lend money to weaker borrowers and investing in speculative markets, like stocks and real estate. Since profits made from such investments often fail to match yields promised to the investors of deposit accounts, the institutions are at risk of failing to honor the promised returns.<br />\n<br />\nOther shadow banking instruments like entrusted loans, interbank funding, and Internet financing all have this vulnerability. And this threatens to rip apart the entire Chinese financial ecosystem.<br />\n<br />\nThe use of leverage and liquidity transformation in risky investment products remains widespread in China , with risks residing in opaque corners of the financial system<br />\n<br />\nCOME ON CHINKS \u2013TAKE US ON !<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c3024233688378041833\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. THE TIDES HOLD THE RAINWATER WATER AND THE WHOLE AREA LOOKS LIKE A HUGE LAKE..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/amavasya-poornima-ekadashi-fasting.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c3686331311549833835\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_23.html?showComment=1551111310968#c3686331311549833835\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 25, 2019 at 9:45 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/01/point-break-movie-review-capt-ajit.html<br />\n<br />\nEXTRACT FROM POST ABOVE--<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: One of my readers asked me to give one more example of an incident where I showed HUMAN SPIRIT at sea by breaking \u201clong established rules\u201d<br />\n<br />\nWell!-- OK, a WEE one !!!<br />\n<br />\nThere was this time , my ship was coming out of a narrow tributary of mighty river Amazon. We were timed to cross a shallow bar at high water.<br />\n<br />\nWhile we were crossing the bar , I got a frantic call from Chief Engineer\u2014all temperatures of sea water cooled machinery ( main engines/ generators etc ) were rising rapidly \u2013with the added information that we are on HIGH sea suction which is nearly 4 metres above the ship\u2019s bottom LOW sea suction.<br />\n<br />\nThis meant that river mud had ingressed the seawater inlet pipes.<br />\n<br />\nChief Engineer arbitrarily informed that he wants to shut down the main engines and generators--lest the pistons get seized in the cylinders .<br />\n<br />\nI firmly commanded him\u2014\u201c You cannot stop any machinery till I order you to do it . Go to manual override . This is an emergency and I now control the ship\u2019s response \u201c<br />\n<br />\nImmediately I told the Brazilian river pilot\u2014I now have taken over your pilotage under Master\u2019s authority.<br />\n<br />\nI quickly consulted the chart and literally power waded the ship to a deep sliver of water. Meanwhile I had the anchors ready.<br />\n<br />\nAs soon as I dropped anchor, I raced to the engine room. The ENTIRE engineers were there white faced with all sorts of alarms beeping.<br />\n<br />\nI quickly got the ship\u2019s fresh water tank hooked on to the generators using the \u201cinternational shore coupling\u201d and fire hose after knocking off a flange . The best part was that only I knew the pipelines\u2014I traced it then and there .<br />\n<br />\nThe cooling water starved generators gasped back to life.<br />\n<br />\nI got the LOW sea suction opened up and got clean river water into the cooling systems.<br />\n<br />\nTo cut a long story short we now had the mud cleared out and main engines and generators all running smooth.<br />\n<br />\nWhen I went back to the bridge the pilot said that we cant do night navigation in the tributary as per rules.<br />\n<br />\nI told him, we cant remain there for daylight as at the next turn of tide , the ships rudder would hit the river bank and then my brand new ship is history.<br />\n<br />\nI told him\u2014\u201cI WILL TAKE THE SHIP OUT IN DARKNESS . I KNOW THE RIVER BENDS , THE DEEPS AND SILTED AREAS . I WILL COMMIT IN WRITING\u201d<br />\n<br />\nAnyways , I got search lights out at the forecastle and we started our trip in absolute darkness with river bank trees almost brushing the ship at certain areas.<br />\n<br />\nThe entire river tribals had taken out fire torches are were whistling and clapping as we whooshed past at terrific speed beating the fall of tide depth.<br />\n<br />\nFinally , as we exited the tributary and entered the mighty Amazon, the young pilot remarked that he was confident that I would do it. But if we had run aground , polluted and blocked the tributary, we both would have been in a Brazilian jail.<br />\n<br />\nThe rest of my stunned crew could only say \u201c CAPTAIN DELIVERED AGAINST ALL ODDS-- AS USUAL \u201c.<br />\n<br />\nThe grapevine had spread the engine crew has spread the world of how captain TOOK OVER TECHNICAL OPERATIONAL COMMAND OF THE ENGINE ROOM and how every order was followed without demur ..<br />\n<br />\nWhat I have said above is a tour de force.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\"><a class=\"comment-reply\" data-comment-id=\"3686331311549833835\" href=\"https://www.blogger.com/null\" style=\"color: #888888; The loaded ship cannot be stopped like a motor bike , ice skate or surfing board.<br />\n<br />\nSince this happened on a El Nino year 1997 , I have got up thrice at night reliving this incident in a deep sweat.<br />\n<br />\nNo, it was NOT a nightmare, but \u201creliving \u201c the incident in a vivid dream where my body succumbed to faster heartbeats, hyperventilation and sweat.. while in REAL life I was cool .<br />\n<br />\nOr was it a dream ?<br />\n<br />\n-- the waving torches held by half naked tribals, the whistling , the clapping , the WHOOSH sound of river bank trees showing up at the last moment to bright searchlights on the bow on a moonless night<br />\n<br />\nTotal silence on the navigating bridge except my con orders and the repeating of orders by my helmsman and Chief Mate.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2009/07/amazon-navigation-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html<br />\n<br />\nUNQUOTE --<br />\n<br />\nWHEN CUNTS BOAST ABOUT THEIR GREAT EXPLOITS-- I JUST LAUGH WITHIN..<br />\n<br />\nWHAT DO THEY KNOW !<br />\n<br />\nTHE HUAMN SPIRIT SHOWS UP ONLY DURING TIMES OF GREAT CONFLICT..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/super-typhoon-bart-perfect-storm-capt.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I HAVE EXPLAINED IT\nBELOW..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I WILL EXPLAIN IT\nAGAIN..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ARYAVARTA IS SANSKRIT\nAND MALAYALAM MEANS \"ABODE OF THE ARYANS\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NOW<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHO IS AN ARYAN ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IS HE A WHITE SKINNED ,\nBLONDE, BLUE EYED MAN --AS ROTHSCHILD AND HIS AGENT CHITPAVAN JEW LOKMANYA BAL\nGANGHADAHARA TILAK TOLD ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NOT AT ALL.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ARYAN MEANS -- A HIGHLY\nEVOLVED AND NOBLE MAN..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ARYABHATTA ( 2700 BC )\nWAS AN ARYAN .. HIS REAL NAME IS ARYAN BHATTATHIRIPAD FROM MY HOMETOWN OF\nCALICUT -- A VISITING PROFESSOR FROM KODUUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY ( MUZIRIS ) OWNED\nBY THE CALICUT KING ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BHATTATHIRIPADS ARE HE\nCREAMY LAYER OF NAMBOODIRIS WELL VERSED IN MATH AND ASTRONOMY..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NAMBOODIRIS ARE HE\nCREAMY LAYER OF THIYYAS OF KERALA WELL VERSED IN SANSKRIT AND VEDA SMRITI ORAL\nROUTE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ARYAN NAMBOODIRIS WERE\nVISITING PROFESSORS AT TAXILA/ NALANDA/ SARASWATI DHAR / UNIVERSITY OF\nALEXANDRIA ETC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CHANAKYA WAS AN ARYAN\nNAMBOODIRI PROFESSOR AT TAXILA..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AN ARYAN WAS RECOGNIZED\nBY HIS SPECIAL HAIRDO ( KUDUMI TO THE SIDE OF THE HEAD ) ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/09/sikha-kudumi-choti-open-flag-of.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/09/sikha-kudumi-choti-open-flag-of.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ARYAVARTA , BRAHMAVARTA\nAND BRAHMARISHIDESHA ARE ALL THE SAME...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BRAHMAVARTA WAS THE\nVAST HOLY FOREST UNIVERSITY LAND WHERE THE BRAHMANAS ( PART 2 ) AND ARNYAKAS (\nPART 3 ) OF VEDAS --TECHNICAL SECTIONS-- WERE PENNED.. THIS IS MODERN MALABAR\nOR NORTH KERALA..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These two parts written\nin Sanskrit and Grantha lipi ( techinical volumes ) have been stolen by the\nwhite invader..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN KERALA ARYA\nVAIDYASALA IS A AYURVEDA HOSPITAL RUN BY ARYANS.. EVEN TODAY A NAMBOODIRI LODGE\nIN A TEMPLE TOWN IS CALLED ARYA BHAVAN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MANU SAID BHARAT IS THE\nLAND BETWEEN THE HOLY RIVER OF SARASWATI ( NORTH ) AND THE HOLY LAND OF\nBRAHMARISHIDESA ( SOUTH ) GIRDLED BY THE SEAS ON EITHER SIDE....<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">LET ME QUOTE BHAGAWAD\nGITA CHAPTER 2 VERSE 2 , PENNED 6000 YEARS AGO..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0936\u094d\u0930\u0940\u092d\u0917\u0935\u093e\u0928\u0941\u0935\u093e\u091a</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0915\u0941\u0924\u0938\u094d\u0924\u094d\u0935\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u0905\u0928\u093e\u0930\u094d\u092f</span>\u091c\u0941\u0937\u094d\u091f\u092e\u0938\u094d\u0935\u0930\u094d\u0917\u094d\u092f\u092e\u0915\u0940\u0930\u094d\u0924\u093f\u0915\u0930\u092e\u0930\u094d\u091c\u0941\u0928</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n|| 2||<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u015bhr\u012b bhagav\u0101n uv\u0101cha<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">kutastv\u0101 ka\u015bhmalamida\u1e41\nvi\u1e63hame samupasthitam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">an\u0101rya</span>-ju\u1e63h\u1e6damaswargyam\nak\u012brti-karam arjuna<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u015bhr\u012b-bhagav\u0101n\nuv\u0101cha\u2014the Supreme Lord said; kuta\u1e25\u2014wherefrom; tv\u0101\u2014to you; ka\u015bhmalam\u2014delusion;\nidam\u2014this; vi\u1e63hame\u2014in this hour of peril; samupasthitam\u2014overcome; an\u0101rya\u2014<b style=\"background-color: white;\">CUNT\nOF THE FIRST ORDER</b> ; ju\u1e63h\u1e6dam\u2014practiced; aswargyam\u2014which does not lead to the\nhigher abodes; ak\u012brti-karam\u2014leading to disgrace; arjuna\u2014Arjun<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Translation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BG 2.2: The Supreme\nLord said: My dear Arjun, how has this delusion overcome you in this hour of\nperil? It is not befitting an <b style=\"background-color: white;\">NOBLE HIGHLY EVOLVED MAN</b>. It leads not to the\nhigher abodes, but to disgrace.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS 100% PROOF !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manu wrote 10,300 years\nago --\u201c All the people on earth should learn their respective practices from a\nARYAN born in that land of Brahmarisihidesa \u201d..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ARYAVARTA ( PUNT/ SHEBA\n/ OPHIR/ MALABAR/ ARYAVARTA / LAND OF GODS / BRAHMARISHIDESA ) WAS PART OF THE\nDANAVA CIVILIZATION-WHICH PRECEDED THE VEDIC CIVILISATION BY SEVERAL\nMILLINIUMS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVEN TODAY KERALA IS\nKNOWN AS GODs OWN COUNTRY..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ARYAVARTA IS THE CRADLE\nOF THIS PLANETs KNOWLEDGE ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">February 13, 2019 at\n2:24 PM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED FROM 1--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/eight-sided-pyramid-of-giza-egypt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/eight-sided-pyramid-of-giza-egypt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I AM FROM THE LAND OF\nARAVARTA - MY GENOME SPEAKS TO ME..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brahmarshi-Desha or\nAryavarta, is a model region of discipline and order, and that \"from a\nARYAN born in that region, all men on earth should receive their lessons in\ntheir respective duties and responsibilities.\" (MBh. XIV, 110.47).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Law Code of Manu\nmentions the Rig Veda many times, but the Rig Veda did not mention the Law Code\nof Manu even once.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MANU WAS A SAGE FROM\nARYAVARTA..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is because Rig\nVeda went of oral route for 330 centuries before being penned down 70 centuries\nago.. Manu made his laws 10,300 years ago.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Law Code of Manu\ndoes not just mention the Rig Veda only in passing, but as the cornerstone of\nits civilization's philosophical and spiritual thought.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HAMMURABI LIFTED HIS\nLAWS WHOLE SALE FROM THE LAWS OF MANU ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE DID NOT HAVE A CASTE\nSYSTEM OF SHUDRAS TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA AND USED MORE THAN A\n1000 FAKE HINDU MUTTS TO INJECT POISON INTO THE SCRIPTURES.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/07/untouchables-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/07/untouchables-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WE HAD 4 VARNAS--<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">1) INTELLECTUALS (\nTHESE ARE NOT MERE PRIESTS )<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">2) WARRIORS<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">3) SKILLED LABOUR<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">4) UNSKILLED LABOUR </b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE KINGS OF ANCIENT\nINDIA WERE DRAWN FROM THE \"WARRIOR CLASS\"..&nbsp; BRAHMINS COULD NOT BE KINGS ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS RULE WAS BROKEN BY\nJEW ROTHSCHILD WHEN HE CONVERTED PALE EYED CHITPAVAN JEWS INTO BRAHMINS AND\nALLOWED THESE PESHWAS TO RULE MAHARASHTRA AFTER EMPEROR SHAHU... SHIVAJI WAS A\nMAHAR..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MAHARS WERE DEMOTED TO\nSHIT CLEANING SCAVENGERS ( UNTOUCHABLE CASTE SHUDRAS ) FROM RULING CLAN BY JEW\nROTHSCHILD..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SAME HAPPENED IN\nKERALA.. THE RULING CLASS THIYYAS WERE DEMOTED TO COCONUT TREE TODDY TAPPING\nMONKEYS AND A NEW CRYPTO JEW CLAN --VARMAS WITH PALE EYES CRAWLED OUT OF THE\nWOODWORK AS RULING CLAN OF KERALA..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BEFORE THE WHITE\nINVADER CAME TO INDIA WE NEVER HEARD OF CHITPAVAN BRAHMINS OR KERALA VARMAS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BRAHMINS WERE NOT\nTYRANTS IN ANCIENT INDIA.. EVERY OLD SCRIPTURE STORY , OR A PANCHATANTRA STORY\nSTARTED WITH \"THERE WAS A POOR BRAHMIN\"..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE ANCIENT VARNA\nSYSTEM ENSURED THAT BRAHMINS CANNOT OWN LAND OR WEALTH..&nbsp; THEY HAD TO LIVE BY BEGGING FOR FOOD..&nbsp; IF SOMEBODY ELSE DID NOT GIVE THEM FOOD THEY\nWRLD STARVE..&nbsp; IT WAS CONSIDERED\n\"GOOD KARMA\" IF YOU FEED A BRAHMIN..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVEN TODAY AFTER YOU DO\nSHRADDH FOR YOUR DEAD PARENTS -- WE FEED SOME POOR BRAHMINS.. THIS IS A\nRITUAL..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ONLY THE ORAL VEDA\nKNOWING KERALA BRAHMINS ( NAMBOODIRIS ) WERE EXEMPTED .. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">VEDA SRUTIS WENT ON\nORAL ROUTE FOR 330 CENTURIES BEFORE BEING PENNED DOWN 70 CENTURIES AGO IN\nGRANTHA LIPI SCRIPT IN SANSKRIT ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">VEDAS DONT HAVE MORTAL\nAUTHORS..THEY WERE DOWNLOADED FROM AAKASHA BY SUPERMEN MAHARISHIS WITH 12\nSTRAND DNA. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">VEDIC SRUTIS ARE DIVINE\nAND INFALLIBLE..THE MAGIC IS IN THE SOUND NOT THE MEANING . YET SOME SRUTIS\nREVEAL COSMIC CREATION SO ACCURATELY EVEN MODERN SCIENTISTS ARE STUNNED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE HINDU GOD IS\n\"BRAHMAN \" --IT IS A \"MORPHOGENETIC CONSCIOUSNESS FIELD\"\nWHICH CANNOT BE PICKED UP BY THE 5 HUMAN SENSES.. YOU CAN READ ABOUT BRAHMAN (\nADVAITA VEDANTA ) IN THE POST BELOW..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OUR HUMAN SOUL IF A\nSMALL CHUNK OF THIS MIGHTY FIELD ALBEIT AT LOWER FREQUENCY.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE DAY YOU CAN RAISE\nYOUR SOUL FREQUENCY ( BY LOWERING YOUR KARMIC BAGGAGE ) TO THE SAME LEVEL OF\n\"BRAHMAN\", YOU SOUL MERGES WITH THE FIELD AND YOU BECOME \"JIVAN\nMUKT \" A LIVING MAN WHO WHEN DIES WILL GET MOKSHA..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL ANCIENT MAHARISHIS\nWERE JIVAN MUKTS..&nbsp; THEIR NEGATIVE KARMIC\nBAGGAGE WAS ZERO..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HINDUS ARE NOT SAVAGE\nIDOLATORS .. IF AT ALL WE PRAY TO AN IDOL , IT IS ONLY USED AS A POINT OF\nFOCUS..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">HINDUS ARE NOT ALLOWED BHAKTI&nbsp;\nLIKE ALL OTHER RELIGIONS --WE HINDUS ARE ALLOWED ONLY \"SHRADDHA\n\"..</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BLIND DEVOTION TO DOGMA\nOF SINGLE HOLY BOOKS IS NOT ALLOWED IN SANATANA DHARMA..A HINDU IS ALLOWED ONLY\n\"ENLIGHTENED FAITH\" BASED ON SELF VERIFICATION, WHERE HIS CONSCIENCE\n( VOICE OF THE SOUL ) RULES..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS WHY YOU CANT\nMAKE HINDUS RUN OUT OF TEMPLES AFTER FRIDAY PRAYERS TO KILL BAAAAD PEOPLE OF\nOTHER RELIGIONS, ENMASSE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD WHO\nRULED INDIA DELETED SHRADHA AND INSERTED BHAKTI USING HIS FAKE MUTTS.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN THE POST BELOW, I\nHAVE SHOWN HOW THEY HAVE INJECTED BHAKTI IN BHAGAWAD GITA PENNED 6000 YEARS\nAGO..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ONLY KERALA BRAHMINS (\nNAMBOODIRIS ) WERE ALLOWED TO HOLD LAND AND MARRY ( 4 WIVES ) BY PARASHURAMA\nAND THAT TOO ONLY THE ELDEST BROTHER .. YOUNGER NAMBOODIRI BROTHERS COULD NOT\nHOLD LAND OR MARRY..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ELDER BROTHER\nNAMBOODIRIS WERE \"<b style=\"background-color: white;\">ARYANS</b>\" WITH SWASTIKA AS SYMBOL..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YOUNGER BROTHER\nNAMBOODIRIS ARE \"<b style=\"background-color: white;\">SEMITES</b>\" WITH 6 POINT STAR AS SYMBOL.. THESE SEMITES\nCREATED JUDAISM AND HEBREW LANGUAGE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVEN THE KING COULD NOT\nCOME WITHIN 6 FEET OF A ARYAN KERALA NAMBOODIRI..&nbsp; VISHNU AVATAR PARASHURAMA CREATED THIS SYSTEM\n6000 YEARS AGO.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BASICALLY PARASHURAMA\nGAVE VEDA ORAL ROUTE EXPERT NAMBOODIRIS UNLIMITED POWER.. HE PREVENTED SUB\nDIVISION AND FRAGMENTATION OF FERTILE LANDS.. ONLY A MARRIED BRAHMIN CAN DO A\nYAGNA ( NOT A BACHELOR / WIDOWER ).. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN KERALA NAMBOORIRIS\nAND THEIR YOUNGER BROTHERS AND FAMILIES ARE ONLY 0.19% OF THE POPULATION EVEN\nTODAY--UNLIKE THE REST OF INDIA WHERE FAKE BRAHMINS ARE CHURNED OUT BY\nINDUCTION..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT WAS TOUGH TO BE A\nVEDA ORAL ROUTE KNOWING BRAHMIN IN ANCIENT INDIA..&nbsp; HE HAD TO TAKE BATH IN A WATER BODY ( LAKE /\nRIVER ) THREE TIMES A DAY .. HE HARDLY GOT EIGHT HOURS TO SLEEP.. THE REST OF\nTHE TIME WAS SPENT IN STUDYING VEDAS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">CONVEYING THE VEDAS ON\nORAL ROUTE FOR 330 CENTURIES BEFORE THEY WERE PENNED DOWN 70 CENTURIES AGO ,\nWITHOUT LOSING A TONE OR SYLLABLE, IS THE GREATEST FEAT OF MAN..</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">VEDIC SRUTIS HAVE\nGOLDEN MEAN (1.618 ) , FIBONACCI SERIES , PASCALS TRIANGLE, LUCAS NUMBERS , SRI\nYANTRA ( GEOMETRY OF OM ), ULAM SPIRAL, PRIME NUMBER MAGIC , ISOTOPE MAGIC\nEMBEDDED IN IT ..</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE ANCIENT SRI YANTRA\nDIVINE GEOMETRY WHICH CONTAINS THE THEORY OF EVERYTHING, IS MADE USING 1.618\nVEDIC GOLDEN MEAN..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/9nHcGHmUrK4/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/9nHcGHmUrK4?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
