, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE DANAVA CIVILIZATION\nOF KERALA ( WHICH INCLUDES ARYAN KERALA NAMBOODIRIS ) PRECEDED THE VEDIC\nCIVILIZATION BY SEVERAL MILLENNIUMS.. KERALA SAGES MADE THE EGYPTIAN PYRAMIDS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/eight-sided-pyramid-of-giza-egypt.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/eight-sided-pyramid-of-giza-egypt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL THE INITIAL QUANTUM\nPHYSICS SCIENTISTS DECLARED THAT WHEN SCIENCE CATCHES UP WITH VEDANTA , THE\nCOSMOS WILL HAVE DISSOLUTION ( PRALAYA ).. SUCH IS THE WISDOM CONTAINED IN THE\nVEDAS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL OF THEM PICKED UP\nBHAGAWAD GITA AND WROTE DOWN IN THEIR WILLS THAT THEY WANT TO BE CREMATED --NOT\nBURIED..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NOW GETTING BACK TO THE\nCORE-- WHO IS A \"BRAHMIN\" WHOM ASSHOLE JACK DORSEY HATES ? ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"BRAHMINS\"\nWERE PEOPLE WHO DEDICATED THEIR LIVES TO CONVEYING THE VEDAS ON ORAL ROUTE.. IT\nWAS PAINFUL -- IT REQUIRED ABILITY AND DETERMINATION -- ALMOST LIKE STUDYING\nFOR EXAMS EVERY SINGLE DAY OF YOUR LIFE, WITHOUT VACATION..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THESE BRAHMINS WERE\nEQUIVALENT TO THE MODERN DATABASE OF \"GOOGLE SEARCH \" OR\n\"CLOUD\"..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BRAHMINS ALSO STUDIED\nTHE \"LAWS OF MANU \" ( SMRITIS WRITTEN BY A HUMAN AUTHOR ) OF 8200\nBC.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MANU WAS THE FIRST LAW\nGIVER ON THIS PLANET ..HAMMURABI JUST LIFTED FROM MANU IN 1740 BC..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/manu-first-law-maker-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/manu-first-law-maker-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IMAGINE A BRAHMIN WHO\nHAS MEMORIZED THE INDIAN CONSTITUTION AS SANSKRIT VERSES..&nbsp; HE WILL NOT BE A STUPID FELLOW LIKE THE\nMODERN JUDGE WHO CANNOT EVEN DO BODMAS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">IN THE KINGS COURT THE\nBRAHMIN SAT-- HE GAVE THE KING RELEVANT DATA AS PER THE LAWS OF MANU BY RECITING\nTHE RELEVANT SANSKRIT VERSE IN CONTEXT AND GIVING SUBJECTIVE ( NOT OBJECTIVE )\nINTERPRETATION..<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">EVEN MODERN SUPER\nCOMPUTERS CANNOT DO THIS--AS COMPUTERS ARE NOT SUBJECTIVE-- A COMPUTER CAN\nNEVER FIGURE OUT THE MORAL OF A STORY OR THE CONTEXT ..</span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\">Below: A Kerala Namboodiri wore his kudumi ( shikha ) by the side of his head..&nbsp; They were the only people who were allowed to do this..</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8jMB7NUSJzQ/XGYpi3HY4KI/AAAAAAABf2s/N7X8L0iSexIZKnqapMmGhNYZrnUAo8v0ACLcBGAs/s1600/DBBFF.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"275\" data-original-width=\"212\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8jMB7NUSJzQ/XGYpi3HY4KI/AAAAAAABf2s/N7X8L0iSexIZKnqapMmGhNYZrnUAo8v0ACLcBGAs/s640/DBBFF.jpg\" width=\"493\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A BRAHMIN INVITED TO A\nKINGs COURT WAS A CONSCIOUS COMPUTER WHICH COULD DIP INTO A VAST DATABASE&nbsp; IN THE PRESENCE OF HUNDREDS OF ONLOOKERS .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/super-panchatantra-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/super-panchatantra-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE WHITE INVADER\nCONVERTED MANU INTO A CRUEL BIGOT USING AGENTS LIKE BR AMBEDKAR .. MANU WAS A\nNOBLE MAHARISHI..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MANU SPECIFICALLY WROTE\nTHAT TO BE AN EXPERT OF HIS LAWS A STUDY PERIOD OF 36 YEARS ( SENIOR) OR 18\nYEARS ( JUNIOR ) IS REQUIRED..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BRAHMIN IS THE SANSKRIT\nWORD FOR BRAHMANA.. BRAHMANAS SPOKE SANSKRIT..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEY ARE ACHARYAS AND\nPROTECTORS OF EARNING ACROSS GENERATIONS FOR MILLENNIUMS. THEY WERE VEGETARIANS\nAND PEACE LOVING PEOPLE WHO CONDUCTED RITES OF PASSAGE ( SHODASA SAMSKARAS )\nFOR A HINDU.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BRAHMINS COULD&nbsp; BE EX-COMMUNICATED BY THEIR OWN CLAN IF THEY\nWERE NOT NOBLE OR FAIR OR&nbsp; VIRTUOUS OR\nHONEST OR GENTLE OR LACKING SELF CONTROL OR MODEST OR LEVEL HEADED OR COMPASSIONATE\nOR COVETING WEALTH/ PLEASURES .. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MANANAVA DHARMASHASTA (\nMANU SMRITI ) DEDICATED 1036 VERSES FOR ARYAN CODE OF CONDUCT OF BRAHMINS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EXAMPLE OF TWO\nVERSES?..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Except during a time of\nadversity, a Brahmin ought to sustain himself by following a livelihood that\ncauses little or no harm to creatures. He should gather wealth just sufficient\nfor his subsistence through irreproachable activities that are specific to him,\nwithout fatiguing his body. \u2013 4.2\u20134.3<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He must never follow a\nworldly occupation for the sake of livelihood, but subsist by means of a pure,\nupright and honest livelihood proper to a Brahmin. One who seeks happiness\nshould become supremely content and self controlled, for happiness is rooted in\ncontentment and its opposite is the root of unhappiness. \u2013 4.11\u20134.12<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2014\u2009Manusmriti<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AN ARYAN BRAHMIN IS NOT\nSOMEONE WHO WILL POUR MOLTEN LEAD INTO THE EARS OF A SUDRA AS PER FOUL\nPROPAGANDA OF THE WHITE INVADER..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ajyesthaaso\nAkanisthaasa Yete<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sam Bhraataro Vaavrudhuh\nSoubhagaya<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <b>RigVeda, Mandala-5, Sukta-60, Mantra-5-\n(5000 BC)</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2018No one is superior or\ninferior; all are brothers; all should strive for the interest of all and\nprogress collectively\u2019.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A BRAHMIN WILL TEACH\nHIS ART ONLY TO A MAN WHO IS AN ARYAN. THIS INCLUDES MENTAL ACUITY..&nbsp; THIS DOES NOT MEAN HE IS DISCRIMINATING.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ON MY SHIP I WILL NOT\nALLOW THE COOK TO NAVIGATE .. IF THIS IS CALLED DISCRIMINATION BY STUPID\nFOREIGN FUNDED KANCHA ILAAH TYPES --SO BE IT..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A BRAHMIN MUST BE A\nHONOURABLE ARYAN -- WHO STUDIES VEDAS WITH DELIGHT.. HE WILL LITERALLY DROOL\nOVER IT DESPITE THE HARDSHIPS ... <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A BRAHMIN CAN NEVER\nHURT ANY CREATURE--LEAVE ALONE KILL ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS WHY\n\"BRAHMIN\"&nbsp; IS NOT A RIGID\nCLASS. &nbsp;BRAHMIN HAD NOTHING TO DO WITH\nTHE CONCEPT OF THE MODERN \"PRIEST\"..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/03/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_21.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/03/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_21.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE PURUSHA SUKTA OF\nRIG VEDA WHERE BRAHMINS CAME FROM MOUTH AND SHUDRAS CAME FROM FEET OF THE COSMIC\nMAN IS POISON INJECTED ( PROPAGANDA BY JEW ROTHSCHILDs AGENTS BR AMBEDKAR AND\nEVR PERIYAR ) FOR DIVIDE AND RULE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BRAHMINS ALSO\nPROPAGATED THE PURANAS BEFORE THEY WERE PENNED DOWN BY VYASA 6000 YEARS AGO.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PURANAS WERE SOUL\nSTIRRING STORIES OF GODS --MEANT FOR THE HINDUS WHO WERE NOT ENTITLED TO STUDY\nTHE VEDAS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL HINDU GODS ARE\nCOSMIC ALLEGORIES EXCEPT MORTAL VISHNU AVATARS .. ONLY VISHNU CAN HAVE\nAVATARS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CHECK OUT THE POISON\nINJECTION OF OUR PURANAS BY THE WHITE INVADER USING HIS AGENTS --PURANAS ARE\nNOW <span style=\"color: red;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">SOAKED IN SEMEN</b> </span>( BELOW) ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SEE IT TO BELIEVE\nIT..&nbsp;&nbsp; HOW OUR GODS WERE RAPING WIVES OF\nOTHER GODS , MASTURBATING ALL OVER -- SOME INVOLUNTARY SEMEN EMISSIONS. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE WHOLE IDEA WAS TO\nMAKE THE HINDU SELF LOATHING SO THAT HE WILL CONVERT TO CHRISTIANITY..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/mistakes-deliberate-or-inadvertant-in_7.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/mistakes-deliberate-or-inadvertant-in_7.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The term SHUDRA appears\nonly once in the Rigveda penned down 7000 years ago .. This mention is found in\na verse in the Purusha Sukta which is one of its 1,028 hymns .. &nbsp;&nbsp;The verse is jarring as lost has lost its\nmathematical congruence and hence is clearly POISON INJECTED &nbsp;..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Purusha sukta is hymn\n10.90 of the Rigveda, dedicated to the Purusha, the \"Cosmic Being\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">RIGVEDA 10.90.11 IS\nPOISON INJECTED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD. ( AND THIS MADE KANCHA ILAIH CRY AND HAVE\nWHITE SPITTLE AT HIS BLACK LIP CORNERS .. )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">11 When they divided\nPuru\u1e63a how many portions did they make?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What do they call his\nmouth, his arms? What do they call his thighs and feet?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">RIGVEDA 10.90.12 IS\nPOISON INJECTED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">12 The Brahman was his\nmouth, of both his arms was the R\u0101janya made.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His thighs became the\nVai\u015bya, from his feet the \u015a\u016bdra was produced.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">LISTEN TO PURUSHA SUKTA\nCHANTS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ci_FIv8nsbQ/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/ci_FIv8nsbQ?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ci_FIv8nsbQ<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVEN MAX MULLER WROTE\nTHAT THIS IS A MODERN POISON INJECTION.. LET ME QUOTE WIKIPEDIA..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE: Then follows a\nverse which states that from his mouth, arms, thighs, feet the four varnas\n(classes) are born. This four varna-related verse is controversial and is\nbelieved by many scholars, such as Max M\u00fcller, to be a corruption and a\nmedieval or modern era insertion into the text.[1][2]UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Purusha_Sukta\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Purusha_Sukta</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MANU SMRITI WAS PENNED\nDOWN IN 8200 BC \u2013 AT THAT TIME THE WORD SHUDRA DID NOT EXIST..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HERE IS A &nbsp;POISON INJECTED VERSE IN BHAGAWAD GITA PENNED ..\n6000 YEARS AGO ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092c\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0939\u094d\u092e\u0923\u0915\u094d\u0937\u0924\u094d\u0930\u093f\u092f\u0935\u093f\u0936\u093e\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092a\u094d\u0930\u0935\u093f\u092d\u0915\u094d\u0924\u093e\u0928\u093f</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0938\u094d\u0935\u092d\u093e\u0935\u092a\u094d\u0930\u092d\u0935\u0948\u0930\u094d\u0917\u0941\u0923\u0948</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">:\n|| 41|| Bhagawad Gita Chapter 18, Verse 41 \u2013 4000 BC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">br\u0101hma\u1e47a-k\u1e63hatriya-vi\u015bh\u0101\u1e41\n\u015bh\u016bdr\u0101\u1e47\u0101\u1e41 cha parantapa<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">karm\u0101\u1e47i pravibhakt\u0101ni\nsvabh\u0101va-prabhavair gu\u1e47ai\u1e25<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">br\u0101hma\u1e47a\u2014of the\npriestly class; k\u1e63hatriya\u2014the warrior and administrative class; vi\u015bh\u0101m\u2014 <span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>SKILLED\nWORKER CLASS</b></span>; \u015bh\u016bdr\u0101\u1e47\u0101m\u2014 <b style=\"background-color: white;\">UNSKILLED WORKER CLASS</b>; cha\u2014and; parantapa\u2014Arjun,\nsubduer of the enemies; karm\u0101\u1e47i\u2014duties; pravibhakt\u0101ni\u2014distributed;\nsvabh\u0101va-prabhavai\u1e25-gu\u1e47ai\u1e25\u2014work based on one\u2019s nature and gu\u1e47as<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BG 18.41: The duties of\nthe Brahmins, Kshatriyas, Vaishyas, and SHUDRAS\u2014are distributed according to\ntheir qualities, in accordance with their gu\u1e47as (and not by birth).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A BRAHMIN WAS ALLOWED\nTO RECEIVE DAKSHINA FROM A STUDENT AFTER HE FINISHED HIS STUDIES.. FROM A POOR\nSTUDENT THIS COULD BE JUST A BETEL LEAF.. FROM A PRINCE IT COULD BE SOME BASIC\nAMENITIES FOR HIS HOME..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BRAHMINS COULD GET\nMEAGRE DAKSHINA FOR OFFICIATING AT A YAGNA OR CONDUCTING A SAMSKARA RITE OF\nPASSAGE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AFTER THE WHITE INVADER\nCREATED MORE THAN 1000 FAKE MUTTS BRAHMINS FLEECED THE POOR HINDUS AND CREATED\nLENGTHY PONDEROUS RIDICULOUS RITUALS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">KANCHI MUTT IS A FAKE\nMUTT.. BEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA THERE WAS NO SUCH KANCHI MUTT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/06/kanchi-mutt-creation-of-white-invader.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/06/kanchi-mutt-creation-of-white-invader.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE SRINGERI MUTT IS AN\nORIGINAL MUTT CREATED BY ADI SHANKARACHARYA 4000 YEARS AGO..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SOMEBODY ASKED ME--HOW\nDO YOU KNOW THAT ADI SHANKARACHARYA WAS BORN 2000 YEARS AGO..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WELL-- HE WAS BORN\nBEFORE ADI-BUDDHA OF 1900 BC.. AND I RELY ON STELLAR CONFIGURATIONS.. MIND YOU,\nI AM A MASTER MARINER WHO NAVIGATED USING STARS .. THIS IS MY PROFESSION.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I WONT RELY ON FAKE\nPLANTED ARTICLES LIKE THAT ANTI-HINDU , ANTI-WATAN COMMIE DESH DROHI JNU\nPROFESSOR ROMILA THAPAR.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I WILL WRITE THIS UNMARRIED WOMANs LEGACY\n.. IT WILL STINK !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">VEDAS PRECEEDED MANU.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">VEDAS NEVER TALKED\nABOUT LAWS OF MANU.. WHILE LAW OF MANU REFERRED TO VEDAS ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just as a modern\ncomputer memory gets \"backed-up\" every day, the Brahmins\n(\"brAhmaNa\") had to recite every day all that they had emorized, so\nas not to forget words, pronunciation and the rhythm --since everything they\nmemorized had been reduced to a kind of \"hymn\" and was required to be\nchanted with a specially assigned metered rhythm..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/zl7E00fIHbM/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/zl7E00fIHbM?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/2wkEU1GYD6U/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/2wkEU1GYD6U?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each line of Vedas\nseems to have been so carefully thought out so as to contain not only what\nappears on first blush to be religious and spiritual prayers and stories, but\nupon further examination reveal information about history, geography,\nastronomy, astrology , philosophy and mathematics.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/bd8d_tmQoW0/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/bd8d_tmQoW0?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mind you part 2 Brahmanas\nand part 3 Aranyakas were technical sections of Vedas and they have been stolen\nby the white invader..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0935\u0947\u0926\u094b\u093d\u0916\u093f\u0932\u094b</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0927\u0930\u094d\u092e\u092e\u0942\u0932\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0938\u094d\u092e\u0943\u0924\u093f\u0936\u0940\u0932\u0947</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u091a</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0924\u0926\u094d\u0935\u093f\u0926\u093e\u092e\u094d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0964</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0906\u091a\u093e\u0930\u0936\u094d\u091a\u0948\u0935</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0938\u093e\u0927\u0942\u0928\u093e\u092e\u093e\u0924\u094d\u092e\u0928\u0938\u094d\u0924\u0941\u0937\u094d\u091f\u093f\u0930\u0947\u0935</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u091a</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0965</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Translation : The whole\nVeda is the (first) source of the sacred law, next the tradition and the\nvirtuous conduct of those who know the (Veda further), also the customs of holy\nmen, and (finally) self-satisfaction (Atmana santushti).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The word DHARMA &nbsp;&nbsp;means:\n\" ...that which is established or firm, steadfast decree, statute,\nordinance, law, usage, practice, customary observance or prescribed conduct,\nduty; right, justice (often as a synonym ofpunishment; virtue, morality,\nreligion, religious merit, good; holding to the law, doing one's duty.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The word SHASTRA &nbsp;means\" ... an order, command, precept,\nrule; teaching, instruction, direction, advice, good counsel; any instrument of\nteaching, any manual or compendium ofrules, any book or treatise, any sacred\nbook ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MANAVA DHARMA SHASTRA\nIS MANU SMRITI.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092c\u0932\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092c\u0932\u0935\u0924\u093e\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u091a\u093e\u0939\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u0915\u093e\u092e</span>\u0930\u093e\u0917\u0935\u093f\u0935\u0930\u094d\u091c\u093f\u0924\u092e\u094d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n|<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0927\u0930\u094d\u092e\u093e\u0935\u093f\u0930\u0941\u0926\u094d\u0927\u094b</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092d\u0942\u0924\u0947\u0937\u0941</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0915\u093e\u092e\u094b\u093d\u0938\u094d\u092e\u093f</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092d\u0930\u0924\u0930\u094d\u0937\u092d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n|| 11|| Bhagawad Gita Chapter 7 Verse 11 \u20134000 BC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">bala\u1e41 balavat\u0101\u1e41 ch\u0101ha\u1e41\n<span style=\"color: red;\">k\u0101ma</span>-r\u0101ga-vivarjitam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">dharm\u0101viruddho bh\u016bte\u1e63hu\nKAMO smi bharatar\u1e63habha<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BG 7.11: O Arjuna, in\nstrong persons, I am their dispassionate strength. I am <b style=\"background-color: white;\">DESIRABLE ACTIVITY</b> not\nconflicting with dharma .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">REMEMBER \u2013 KAMA HAS\nNOTHING TO WITH SEX.. KAMA PURUSHARTHA IS \u201cDESIRABLE ACTION\u201d..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'Dharma' is a special\nattribute of the conscious man . Bereft of 'Dharma', man is equal to animal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whether the rules of\nDharma that :<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Everyone should tell\nthe truth;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. No one should\nindulge in violence against other living beings;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. No one should\nacquire illegitimate wealth;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. Every one should\nestablish control over his senses;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5. There should be\npurity in thought, speech and deed;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6. Everyone should\nrender service to other individuals;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">7. Every one should\neschew selfishness and greed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">8. The world should be\nregarded as one family.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dharma has attributes\nlike&nbsp; rationality, sense of duty,\njustice, peace, truthfulness, hospitality, kindness , respect, compassion,\nnon-violence, rectitude, humanity, spirituality, fairness , patience, self\nrestraint , tolerance, ethics, service to others, right to life , natural\njustice, virtue, morality, bonafide work and philanthropy.&nbsp; Dharma thus truly symbolises universal values\nof humanism and forms the basis of global ethics.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manusmriti written by\nthe ancient sage Manu, prescribes 10 essential rules for the observance of\ndharma:&nbsp; Patience (dhriti), forgiveness\n(kshama), piety or self control (dama), honesty (asteya), sanctity (shauch),\ncontrol of senses (indraiya-nigrah), reason (dhi), knowledge or learning\n(vidya), truthfulness (satya) and absence of anger (krodha).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manu further writes,\n\"Non-violence, truth, non-coveting, purity of body and mind, control of\nsenses are the essence of dharma\". Therefore dharmic laws govern not only\nthe individual but all in society.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manu further writes,\n\"Nonviolence, truth, non-coveting, purity of body and mind, control of\nsenses are the essence of Dharma\".&nbsp;\nDharma thus is a code of conduct that is intended to secure both worldly\njoys and supreme happiness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To act dharmically is,\nin essence, to act appropriately; what is appropriate is determined by the\ncontext in which the action is to be performed and who is performing it. &nbsp;&nbsp;A UNSKILLED varna &nbsp;is NOT expected to sacrifice his life when the\ncountry is in danger. He is NOT expected to do skilled labour or brainwork he\nis incapable of.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: x-large;\">Nobody is a Shudra by\nbirth. </span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If on my ship, my\nsteward who could NOT pass his school exams want the same salary as I the\nCaptain, he wants family carrying facility, he wants same comforts and space in\nhis cabin \u2013it is just wishful thinking. Mayawati cannot hope to snatch away the\nbeauty contest crown from Aishwarya Rai, no matter how hard she tries. Sanatana\nDharma is a pragmatic way of life..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manu cautions everyone\nto have self -control, so that his mind does not act as the instigator for\ncommitting any sinful mental action which would inevitably lead to one or the\nother type of evil verbal actions or wicked bodily actions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A verse from\nManusmriti:-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cSatyam\nBruyatPriyamBruyat\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ma Bruyat Satyam\nApriyam;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PriyamCaNanrutam,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BruyatEshaDharmahSanatanah;\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Translation: Speak\ntruth in such a way that it should be pleasing to others. Never speak truth\nwhich is unpleasant to others. Never speak truth which might be pleasant. This\nis the path of eternal morality, Sanatana Dharma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meaning:&nbsp; The main point is speaking truth which in\none\u2019s dharma. Speaking such truth tactfully which benefits others and is\npleasant to listen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>MANU XII 10-11</b> :- That\nman is called 'Tridandin' who has established three controls, on his mind viz.,\n(i) Manodanda -control over his thoughts, (ii) Vakdanda -control over his\nspeech and (iii) Kayadanda- control over his body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He who exercises these\nthree controls with respect to all created beings and wholly subdues desire and\nwrath, assuredly gains complete success in his life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manu calls upon man to use\nhis conscience . His verseneeds every individual to establish an internal\ncheck, which alone is the guarantee for good conduct or to eschew bad conduct\nand not the fear of state police,&nbsp; which\nonly makes a man to be more careful and secretive in committing offence. This\ninternal check is what is meant by \"God Fearing\" as Atma (Soul) is\nGod within the man.&nbsp; If man listens to\nhis conscience he will not commit the sin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manu has gone into\nterrific detail.&nbsp; Few examples only&nbsp; \u2013 or it will run into hundreds of pages.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>MANU X-163</b> :-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Asteya&nbsp; is the unterior motive or desire to secure\nwealth by illegitimate methods which makes a man corrupt, a cheat, a smuggler,\na black marketeer, an exploiter, and makes even men in noble professions\nexploit the miseries of others to make more and more money in utter disregard\nto professional ethics.&nbsp; Therefore, it is\nvery essential to ingrain in the heart and mind of every individual the desire\nnot to indulge in 'asteya' i.e., acquiring wealth by illegitimate and immoral\nmethods.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shoucham : Manu\ncommands every individual to maintain purity of thought, word and deed\n(Trikarana shuddi i.e., Kaya, Vacha, Manasa), which is also called Antaranga\nShuddi (internal/mental purity) and Bahiranga Shuddi (external purity or purity\nin action). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This rule means\nabsolute honesty in that there should be harmony in thought, word and deed of\nan individual.&nbsp; One should not think\nsomething in the mind, speak something else, and do entirely another thing.&nbsp; Hypocrisy is addressed here , which is so\nabundant in the west.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indriyanigraha:&nbsp; Manu wants every individual to have of\ncontrol over his senses. Failing which the man&nbsp;\nwill indulge in all types&nbsp; of\nillegal and immoral actions, being instigated by the one or more of the six\ninherent enemies (Arishadvargas).&nbsp; This\nlands himself as well as others in misery and loss of happiness. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mere knowledge of\nthe rules of Dharma, however does not make a man 'Dharmishta' i.e., a man\nacting always in conformity with Dharma. Therefore, Dharma has to be ingrained\nin the mind of every individual from child hood.&nbsp; It is a slow but a sure process. This process\nwas called 'Samskara'.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>MANUVI11-15</b>:- Dharma\nprotects those who protect it. Those who destroy Dharma get destroyed.\nTherefore, Dharma should not be destroyed so that we may not be destroyed as a\nconsequence thereof.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>MANU-IX-3</b> :-The father\nprotects the girl in her childhood, the husband protects her after marriage and\nher sons protect her in old age.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>MANU II-145 </b>:- The\nacharya is more venerable than a Upadhyaya (teacher).&nbsp; Father is more venerable than an acharya. But\nthe mother is more venerable than the father.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>MANU III-51-52</b> :-No\nfather who knows (the law) must take even the smallest gratuity for his\ndaughter; for a man who, through avarice, takes a gratuity, is a seller of his\noffspring.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>MANU Ch.IV-176:</b> Discard\nwealth (artha) or desire (kama) if it is contrary to Dharma as also any custom\nor rules regarded as source of Dharma if at any time they were to lead to\nunhappiness or arouse people's indignation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manu\u2019s concept of\ngratitude (Kritajnata)&nbsp; included custom\nof worshipping animals, and plants as also Ayudha Pooja, i.e., worshipping one\nday in year all the implements or instruments through which we earn our lively\nhood.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>MANU SMRITHI -IX -101\nand III-60</b> : -<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mutual friendship and\nfidelity is the highest Dharma to be observed by husband and wife, throughout\ntheir life. The family in which husband and wife have mutual affection and\nrespect always secures happiness and prosperity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(The West has 63%\ndivorce rate.&nbsp; The balance 37% have had\nmultiple sexual partners.&nbsp; Only the gays\n/dykes and the repulsively fat and ugly do NOT include in this 37% )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>MANU 4-239 -242</b> :-When\none departs from this world to the other World, neither father nor mother,\nneither son nor wife will accompany him. Only the \"Dharma\" practiced\nby an individual follows him even after death. A person takes birth alone and\ndies alone, he alone enjoys or suffers the consequences of his evil deeds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot;
