, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u200c\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0905\u0936\u094d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u200d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0928\u0941\u0924\u0947</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0964\u0964</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\u2013 </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092e\u0928\u0941\u0938\u094d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u200d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092e\u0943\u0924\u093f</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u096b</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u096a\u096c</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meaning: One who does\nnot have a desire to shackle and slaughter animals, becomes the well-wisher of\nanimals and acquires infinite happiness.&nbsp;\n<b>Manusmriti<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manusmriti says that\nahimsa is the foremost among the dharmas that are common to all. It is included\nin the yoga of mind control. Ahimsa means much more than non-injury or\nnn-violence ; it implies not doing harm to others even by thought or word.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manu Smriti says -\nYatra Naryastu Pujyante Ramante Tatra Devatah \u2013 \u201cWhere women are worshipped\nthere the angels tread\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This great law-giver of\nHinduism and first lawgiver on this planet defined the status of a wife and her\nequal rights thus:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If a wife dies, her husband may marry\nanother wife. (<b>Manu, Chapter V, Verse 168</b>). If a husband dies, a wife may marry\nanother husband. (Manu)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If a wife becomes fallen by drunkenness or\nimmorality her husband may marry another. (<b>Manu, Chapter IX, Verse 80</b>). If a\nhusband becomes fallen, a wife may re-marry another husband. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If a husband deserts his wife, she may\nmarry another. (<b>Manu, Chapter IX, Verse 76</b> )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"Women must be honoured\nand adorned by their fathers, brothers, husbands, and brothers-in-law, who\ndesire (their own) welfare\u201d &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<b>Manu Smriti &nbsp;Chapter III, Verse 55 -8200 BC<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u201cWhere women are\nhonoured, there the gods are pleased; but where they are not honoured, no\nsacred rite yields rewards \u201c&nbsp;&nbsp; <b>Manu Smriti&nbsp;\nChaptaer III, Verse 56 \u2013 8200 BC<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Untouchability and\ncaste-based discrimination were unknown during the Varnashrama days. No one was\nborn high and no one low. You became what you are with your karma. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A dimwit who cannot\npass a single exam in school has no reason to write the IIT entrance exam and\nhope to get Computer Science stream.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is easy to secure a\njob on quota but very difficult to hold on to it, unless you work for the\nuseless and corrupt Indian government offices or town municipality office.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">In the times of SEVERE\nADVERSITY , ( war / famine )&nbsp; Manusmriti\nrecommends that a Brahmin may live by engaging in the occupations of the\nwarrior class, or skilled labour class .. There has been times when brahmins\npicked up the sword as borne out by 6000 year old Mahabharata.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A BRAHMIN IS NOT TO BE\nSLOTTED AND POTTED AS A NAPUNSAK \"TATTU\"..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE ASK GUJJU NO 2 PM\nMODI-- DO NOT KEEP EXTOLLING THE VIRTUES OF ROTHSCHILDs AGENT GUJJU NO 1\nGANDHI-- AND DRY OUT THE KSHATRIYA BLOOD WHICH COURSES THROUGH THE VEINS OF\nHINDUS..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">WE ARE FROM THE LAND OF MIGHTY WARRIORS BHISHMA , KARNA , DRONA ETC </span></b>..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Megasthenes, the great\nGreek historian has recorded two milleniums ago&nbsp;\nthat there were four classes in Hindus and a Hindu of any class may\nbecome a Sophist (Brahmin).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Caste hierarchy and\nprivileges based on caste had no sanction in Sanatana Dharma -they are the\ndirect result of the immoral white invader and their vested historians.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The very expression\nDharma in Manusmriti is opposed to and inconsistent with any social inequality\nby birth . The relevant provisions of the Shruti (Vedas) leave no room for\ndoubt that discrimination on the ground of birth or otherwise had no Vedic\nsanction; on the other hand such discrimination was plainly opposed to vedic\ninjunction. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Discrimination of any\nkind is, therefore, contrary to Dharma. It is really Adharma.&nbsp; All discrimination in Hindu society was\nintroduced by the white invader to divide and rule.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma\nrespects the planet along with its flora and fauna. It is the only religion\nwhich advocates vegetarianism. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manu wrote that\npolluting the environment was a punishable offence. In Manu\u2019s laws a person\ncould be ex-communicated from society for mindless felling of tree or killing\nof animals, the way the English speaking white man shot the buffalo and\nexterminated the Indian American , or how the Australian Aborigine race was\nexterminated..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The whole idea of\nVaastu was to construct something without disturbing the flow of nature and\ninterrupting natural flow of energy. It is about peaceful co-existence and\ncomfort. Vaastu is about&nbsp; living&nbsp; in harmony with nature ,&nbsp; grateful for her natural bounties.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;It tells us not dominate and harass other\nliving beings, have inherent grace and know your \u201cduties\u201d.. That human beings\nare just but a link in this symbiotic chain of life and consciousness<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SANATANA means \"\nthat which holds eternal Vedic knowledge\"-- encompassing everything from\nmicrocosm to macrocosm.&nbsp; Dharma leads to\neternal bliss, both in this world and the next. It is your sole and soul\ncompanion after death.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dharma leads you on the\npath of self realisation.&nbsp; Dharma\nincludes adhara or regulation of daily life as per your conscience and written\nVedic laws.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism is a spiritual\ncode. Know thyself is the quintessence.&nbsp;\nIt has no founder or a Supreme head. There is NO supreme middleman like\nthe Pope who can canonise a human into a saint, by hoodwinking the unsuspecting\nmasses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanatana Dharma Rita\nis the principle of cosmic truth and order.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the 7000 year old\nRig Veda there is a remarkable insight on the notion of Rita, the inflexible\nlaw of universal order and harmony whereby all disorders and chaos is restored\nto equilibrium. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rita is, in essence,\nthe ordering principle of nature which gives to everything from the vast\ngalaxies, down to the nucleus of an atom, their nature and course.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Vedic vision,\nthis law of cosmic order is conceived to be manifesting at three levels: on the\ncosmic plane Rita governs the course of nature; on the socio-ethical level,\nRita imparts justice; and on the religio-spiritual level.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Though originally\nunderstood as a subordinate component of the essentially metaphysical concept\nof \u1e5aita, Dharma eventually grew to overshadow. \u1e5aita remained largely confined\nto the Vedas, and most Hindus don\u2019t even know the meaning of Rita. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A central concept of\nthe \u1e5aigveda is that created beings fulfil their true natures when they follow\nthe path set for them by the ordinances of \u1e5aita, and failing to follow those\ndivine ordinances was thought to be responsible for the appearance of various\nforms of calamity and suffering .&nbsp; A man\nwho follows the ordinances of nature ( universal laws ) can be described as one\nwho acts according to the \"Dharma of \u1e5aita\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dharma, was&nbsp; originally conceived of as a manifestation of\n\u1e5aita inasmuch as it represents that aspect of the universal Order which\nspecifically concerns the mundane natural, religious, social and moral spheres\nas expressed in ritualistic regulations, public laws, moral principles and laws\nof nature. . Rita, gives order to the universe and shows the righteous path for\nthe mind to follow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u1e5aita can be abstract\nconcepts such as \"law\", \"order\",, \"truth\", and\n\"regularity\". It can also be concrete objects such as the\nwaters,&nbsp; aakasha ( ether ) or the sun as\nmanifestations of the operation of \u1e5aita in the cosmos.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">India is widely\nrecognized at the last place on earth where spirituality still exists. Even the\nwestern thinkers agree that&nbsp; a chapter\nwhich had a Western beginning will have to have an Indian ending if it is not\nto end in self-destruction of the human race.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At this supremely\ndangerous moment in human history the only way of salvation for the mankind is\nan Indian way \u2013 Arnold Toynbee<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In times of confusion\nand crisis regarding what is right and what is wrong, one's own conscience is\nthe sole guide.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE CASTE SYSTEM IN\nINDIA WAS POISON INJECTED BY THE IMMOTAL WHITE CHRISTIAN INVADER TO DIVIDE AND\nRULE , AND TO CONVERT FRUSTRATED LOW CASTES INTO CHRISTIANITY.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;JEW ROTHSCHILD USED HS AGENTS BR AMBEDKAR\nAND EVR PERIYAR..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">UNKNOWN TO ALL BR AMBEDKAR\nWAS A ROTHSCHILD SPONSORED STAR KID<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/10/the-only-dalit-freemason-of-india-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/10/the-only-dalit-freemason-of-india-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JUST READ AND ENJOY\nKHALISTANIS RUNNING DOWN HINDUISM&nbsp; --&nbsp;\nBRANDING MANU AS A BAAAAAAD EVIL TYRANT..</span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://www.sikhiwiki.org/index.php/Manu_Smriti_on_Shudras\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.sikhiwiki.org/index.php/Manu_Smriti_on_Shudras</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ten Vishnu Avatars\nare:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-indent: .5in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Matsya (the fish) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Koorma (the\ntortoise)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. WORDS HAVE BEEN WRITTEN ON THE WORD \u201cBRAHMIN\u201d..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">BUT\nYOU ARE THE FIRST ON THE PLANET TO TELL WHO IS \u201cBRAHMIN\u201d&nbsp; ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">INDEED..\nTHIS BLOGSITE WAS CREATED TO SHOOT THE LYING WHITE HISTORIAN WITH HIS OWN\nKOSHER SHIT..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">RECENTLY\nI WAS WATCHING ROTHSCHILDs LYING KOSHER MOUTHPIECE \u201cHISTORY CHANNEL\u201d ON TV..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">THEY\nCLAIMED \u201c THE WHITE MAN HAS BEEN TO AMERICA FAR FAR BEFORE COLUMBUS\u201d..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">AND\nWHAT WAS THE PROOF THE MUFFS EXHIBITED ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">IN\nA BULLSHIT TV SERIAL WHERE THEY ARE SEARCHING FOR THE LOST \u201cARK OF THE\nCOVENANT \u201c THEY WENT ALL THE WAY TO ROSS ISLAND \u2013 A WEE ISLAND OFF NOVA SCOTIA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">THEY\nLIED THAT THE TEMPLAR KINGHTS BURIED IT THERE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">AND\nIN THEIR MINDLESS WILD GOOSE CHASE , THEY VISITED THE CHAPEL BUILT BY THE\nTEMPLAR KNIGHTS CALLED ROSSYLN CHAPEL IN THE VILLAGE OF ROSLIN , MIDLOTHIAN ,\nSCOTLAND.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">TEMPLAR KNIGHTS ALL CONVERTED TO HINDUISM&nbsp;AND WAS WORSHIPING&nbsp;NARASIMHA..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">ON\nTHE WALLS OF THE CHAPEL WERE THE FACE OF NARASIMHA \u2013VISHNUs FOUTH AVATAR . IT\nIS NOT A LION\u2014BUT A FIERCER ONE NAMED YAZHI. WHO LEATS IONS FOR BREAKFAST<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">AND\nON THE WALLS WERE MAIZE,- INDIAN CORN , ALL OVER..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">THOSE\nDAYS IN 1456 AD , WHEN THE CHAPEL WAS BUILT, MAIZE WAS UNKNOWN TO THE WHITE MAN\u2014\nAS IT WAS CULTIVATED AND EATEN ONLY IN INDIA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">AND\nTHEY WENT INTO GREAT LENGTHS AND PAINS EXPLAINING THAT THE NATIVE RED INDIANS\nOF NORTH AMERICA ATE MAIZE.. TEE HEEEEEEEE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">THESE\nCUNTS DO NOT REALIZE&nbsp;THAT COLUMBUS HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH NORTH AMERICA.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">ITALIAN\nNAVIGATOR AMERIGO VESPUCCI WAS THE FIRST TO REACH NORTH AMERICA AND THE\nCONTINENT IS NAMED AFTER HIM..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">Jew\nColumbus set off from Huelva , Spain and made three voyages \u2013 first to Lesser\nAntilles in 1493, Trinidad , next to the northern coast of South America in\n1498, and next to the eastern coast of Central America in 1502.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">COLUMBUS\nIS A MASS MURDERER\u2014WHO EXTERMINATED AN ENTIRE RACE WITH SMALL POX BLANKETS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">HIRANYAKASHIPU\nIS THE GRANDFATHER OF VIROCHANA WHO RULED THE WHOLE PLANET. had his own brother Kamran Mirza&nbsp;<b>blinded&nbsp;</b>which would end any claim to the throne.&nbsp; &nbsp;He<b>&nbsp;killed&nbsp;</b>his other brother&nbsp; Hindal Mirza. border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Jehangir (1605-1627)&nbsp;<b>killed</b>&nbsp;his uncle Mahdi Khwaja who was eyeing the throne.&nbsp; He also<b>&nbsp;blinded&nbsp;</b>his own eldest son Khusrau who was eyeing his throne. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i>Can you believe this -- Guru Arjan Singh was blamed by Jehangir of giving moral support to Khusrau , tortured severely and then drowned in the river Ravi.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; clear: both; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-79qVW3kpa0s/Uc9Wdh3BsjI/AAAAAAAAjns/-Hs5fp1Sluo/s160/download.jpgjehangir.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-79qVW3kpa0s/Uc9Wdh3BsjI/AAAAAAAAjns/-Hs5fp1Sluo/s160/download.jpgjehangir.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Shah Jahan.(1628-1658 )&nbsp;<b>killed</b>&nbsp;his younger&nbsp; brother Sheharyar so that he will not lay claim to the throne.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; clear: both; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-B0EsEE3uz-Q/Uc9WnalpBOI/AAAAAAAAjn0/7taC3ZsBZsI/s160/shah+jehan.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-B0EsEE3uz-Q/Uc9WnalpBOI/AAAAAAAAjn0/7taC3ZsBZsI/s160/shah+jehan.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 19.5px;\">Aurangezeb ( 1658-1707 ) the third son of Shah Jehan</span><b style=\"line-height: 24px;\">&nbsp;killed</b><span style=\"line-height: 19.5px;\">&nbsp;his &nbsp;3 brothers. He also put his&nbsp;</span><b style=\"line-height: 24px;\">father in jail&nbsp;</b><span style=\"line-height: 19.5px;\">for 8 years till he died. For choosing his capable eldest son Dara Shikoh as heir Aurangzeb punished him by presenting Dara\u2019s&nbsp;</span><b style=\"line-height: 24px;\">head in a platter</b><span style=\"line-height: 19.5px;\">to his father .&nbsp;</span><i><span style=\"line-height: 19.5px;\">&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><i><span style=\"line-height: 19.5px;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><i><span style=\"line-height: 19.5px;\">Can you&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">believe</span><span style=\"line-height: 19.5px;\">&nbsp;this-- Guru Har Rai got into the good books of Emperor Shah Jehan by saving his favourite son Dara Shikoh from tiger's whiskers&nbsp;</span></i><i><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">poisoning</span><span style=\"line-height: 19.5px;\">&nbsp;using laxative herbs ( poisoned by his brother Aurangazeb) --and in the&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">bargain</span><span style=\"line-height: 19.5px;\">&nbsp;he pissed of Aurangazeb.</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; clear: both; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-DjIiNZLFpLI/Uc9WrQmrjII/AAAAAAAAjn8/yyR0KI1IAoY/s240/aurangazeb.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-DjIiNZLFpLI/Uc9WrQmrjII/AAAAAAAAjn8/yyR0KI1IAoY/s240/aurangazeb.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Nobody names his son after Aurangazeb or Babur even today, though there are plenty of Akbars.. Pakistanis name their missiles Babur. &nbsp;They don\u2019t realize that when Babur came to India their forefathers were all Hindus and their women ancestors were raped.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Aurangzeb's son Bahadur Shah I (Muazzam )<b>&nbsp;killed</b>&nbsp;his brothers Muhammad Azam and Muhammad Kam Bhaksh to capture the throne. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><o:p></o:p></span><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Can you believe this? &nbsp;Guru Gobind Singh sent his army under the command of Bhai Dharam Singh, to help Muazzam.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Muazzam's forces defeated&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">his brother Azam\u2019s forces in the Battle of Jajau on 12 June 1707. &nbsp;Both sides numbered some 100,000 combatants, but Bah\u0101dur Shah had more artillery. &nbsp;Both Muhammad A\u1e93am and his son Bidar Bakht were killed in the battle.</span></i><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Bahadur Shah I died in 1712, and his successor Jahandar Shah was&nbsp;<b>killed&nbsp;</b>on the orders of the Sayyid Brothers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Bahadur Shah's death followed a war of succession among his four sons, Jahandar Shah, Azim-us-Shah, Jahan Shah and Rafi-is-Shah.&nbsp; Jalandar shah&nbsp;<b>killed his 3 brothers&nbsp;</b>to ascend the throne .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Azim-us-Shah's son Farrukhsiyar&nbsp;<b>killed&nbsp;</b>his uncle and ascended the throne.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">In 1719, the Brothers&nbsp;<b>blinded</b>, deposed and murdered Farrukhsiyar<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Sayyid brothers were soon&nbsp;<b>killed&nbsp;</b>by Muhammad Shah.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Ahmad Shah, son of Muhammad Shah, was<b>&nbsp;blinded</b>&nbsp;in 1754 by the Wazir Ghazi-ud-din Imad-ul-mulk<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Alamgir II (1754 - 1759) was<b>&nbsp;killed&nbsp;</b>by Ghazi-ud-din Imad-ul-mulk's orders.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Shah Alam II (1759 - 1806)&nbsp;<b>blinded</b>&nbsp;by the Afghan chief Gulam Qadir,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Bahadur Shah-II was falsely accused by the British of treason and rebellion and exiled to Burma.&nbsp; His descendants were&nbsp;<b>beheaded&nbsp;</b>and heads presented to him on a platter \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">-- and the glorious Mughal empire was swept away once and for all.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 24px;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/fatawa-e-alamgiri-kosher-document-of.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/fatawa-e-alamgiri-kosher-document-of.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 24px;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/fatawa-e-alamgiri-kosher-document-of_17.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/fatawa-e-alamgiri-kosher-document-of_17.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 24px;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 24px;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 24px;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">WHAT IS DHARMA ?</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Now let me narrate a short story from Ramayana 4300 BC.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">This was the Dharma in Hindu India before the Muslims and the Christians invaded .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">King Dasaratha , the father of Lord Rama was in the thick of battle with the Asuras. His favourite queen Kaikeyi was on the horse chariot with him. Dasaratha was injured , and the wheel of his chariot was about to be dislodged due to a missing cotter pin .&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Queen Kaikeyi put her finger into the orifice suffering great pain. In addition to this , as soon a Dasaratha became unconscious she drove the chariot away from the battle field and saved the king.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Later when Dasharatha came to know what transpired , he gave his wife two boons . She said that she would redeem the boon at a later date and time.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Years passed . Lord Rama being the eldest son was crown prince and Dasarath wanted to hand over his kingdom to Rama and then retire for sanyas. Queen Kaikeyi\u2019s son Bharata was away in another city. The city of Ayodha was being decorated for the huge event as the people loved prince Rama.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">The shrewd hump backed maid Mandara of Kaikeyi poisoned her mind. &nbsp;She reminded Kaikeyi of the two boons which the King had given her, and told her that she must redeem it now. She must ask that her son Bharat must be crowned king and his elder half brother Rama , son of eldest queen Kausalya must be banished to a far away forest on exile for 14 years.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; clear: both; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-NaFbjtVh1M4/Uc9Vo9apZeI/AAAAAAAAjm0/3N0q_IeCc3Q/s254/manthra-kaikeyi-the-ramayana-boons-indian-mythology-story.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-NaFbjtVh1M4/Uc9Vo9apZeI/AAAAAAAAjm0/3N0q_IeCc3Q/s400/manthra-kaikeyi-the-ramayana-boons-indian-mythology-story.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"311\" /></span></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Queen Kaikeyi approached King Dasaratha and reminded him of his promise . Then she told him what she wanted. The king was in a bind . He had to follow his dharma of not breaking a promise. Out of sheer grief he fell dead. &nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; clear: both; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-MZu3IRu8WYo/Uc9VvFKcUyI/AAAAAAAAjm8/Rc6smXeQvh8/s349/KaikeyiandDasaratha_22632.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"180\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-MZu3IRu8WYo/Uc9VvFKcUyI/AAAAAAAAjm8/Rc6smXeQvh8/s320/KaikeyiandDasaratha_22632.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"320\" /></span></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Rama did the last rites for his father and went away of exile with his wife Sita and his brother Lakshman . It was the dharma of both his wife and brother to be with him . &nbsp;The whole city of Ayodha was in gloom.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Meanwhile Bharata had a bad dream and a premonition . He came rushing back to Ayodhya. He knew something was wrong as the whole city of Ayodhya was in mourning and darkness. When he heard that his father is dead and his brother Rama was in exile, he fainted out of grief. &nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">When he came to, he gave a piece of his mind to his mother Kaikeyi and went to Rama\u2019s mother Kausalya's room and slept at her feet.<o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-sOmy_d2MSY4/Uc9Zm3oJFFI/AAAAAAAAjok/jsDaoIBDMVg/s556/RamaSita-500x556.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-sOmy_d2MSY4/Uc9Zm3oJFFI/AAAAAAAAjok/jsDaoIBDMVg/s400/RamaSita-500x556.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"358\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Next morning with the queen mothers, his brother Shatrughna , priests, ministers and &nbsp;a small army , he set off to the forest to bring his brother back to Ayodhya and crown him king. Maharishi Bharadwaja directed him to the cottage &nbsp;where Rama would be with his wife Sita and brother Lakshman.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Both Rama and Bharat hugged each other . Bharat fell at his elder brother Rama\u2019s feet and implored him to come back to Ayodhya and become king. Kaikeyi apologized and took back her boon. &nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Rama did NOT want to break his dharma of obeying his dead father\u2019s command. &nbsp;Bharat then asked Rama to give him his sandals and said till Rama comes back after 14 years his sandals would be on the throne and that he would rule on Rama\u2019s behalf from outside the palace , from Nandigram.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; clear: both; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-iCjPLC2Cvzk/Uc9V2BfpKlI/AAAAAAAAjnE/ZCJbLjgdOmA/s255/images.jpgjuyb9.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"310\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-iCjPLC2Cvzk/Uc9V2BfpKlI/AAAAAAAAjnE/ZCJbLjgdOmA/s400/images.jpgjuyb9.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"400\" /></span></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">After 14 long years when Hanuman broke the news of Rama\u2019s impending return to Ayodhya , Bharat again fainted with joy\u2014this time around. &nbsp;He showered Hanuman with gifts for the good tidings and commanded his brother Shatrughna to have the people decorate Ayodhya city .</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; clear: both; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-h1Gr_BY9Og0/Uc9V9W0ODXI/AAAAAAAAjnM/sLWozt5_Vdo/s600/RamBharat.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"296\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-h1Gr_BY9Og0/Uc9V9W0ODXI/AAAAAAAAjnM/sLWozt5_Vdo/s400/RamBharat.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"400\" /></span></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">The two brothers met and hugged each other, after which, Bharat led him to the throne on which was placed Rama\u2019s sandals. &nbsp;Rama was crowned king and there was great joy. Rama made&nbsp;Bharat his crown prince.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">At Rama's command, Bharat and his sons went to the Gandhar kingdom and defeated the Gandharvas living there. Bharat founded the two capital cities of Takshashila and Pushkalavat in the conquered kingdom and established his sons, Taksh and Pushkal as its rulers.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; clear: both; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-xZQAkM3wbVU/Uc9XgVi4iKI/AAAAAAAAjoU/isIvXxv-Zjk/s320/Rama-returns-to-Ayodhya.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"472\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-xZQAkM3wbVU/Uc9XgVi4iKI/AAAAAAAAjoU/isIvXxv-Zjk/s640/Rama-returns-to-Ayodhya.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">This was the Hindu dharma. &nbsp;Dharma broadly means righteousness.&nbsp; Our scriptures and history is full of such sacrifices to sustain dharma.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c2896679846603851739\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-R0jiV1T6_lE/XDGs4ekV3_I/AAAAAAAAAzY/DVkyNukXnTYcbwD-Cxq8qR_KAt9K6DcowCK4BGAYYCw/s35/Screenshot_2019-01-05-21-33-24-662_com.android.chrome.png\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/02025658490769199188\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Aiswarya r</a></cite><span class=\"icon user \" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1550302854692#c2896679846603851739\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 16, 2019 at 1:10 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSir,<br />\n<br />\nhttps://reclaimtemples.com/restarting-centuries-old-hindu-festival-of-kerala/<br />\n<br />\nMaghamakam ritual at tirunavaya restarted.<br />\n<br />\nhttps://medium.com/@subhashkak1/is-indias-strategic-plan-for-ai-credible-4edf09bfb3f1<br />\n<br />\nNeed of the hour is indigenous STEM research. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1550315317962#c5556847866371618080\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 16, 2019 at 4:38 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWHEN IN SCHOOL ( AGE 13 ) WE WENT ON A PICNIC TO TIRUNAVAYA TEMPLE IN KERALA..<br />\n<br />\nWE WENT BY LARGE BOATS --BHARATA PUZHA RIVER.. WE ROCKED THE BOATS AND MADE THE FEMALE TEACHERS CRY ( GIRLS ALSO JOINED IN THE PRANK WHICH WAS VERY DANGEROUS ) .. THE PRINCIPAL OP GUPTA ( KENDRIYA VIDYALAYA ) GOT WILD...<br />\n<br />\nWE PLAYED KABADDI AND OTHER GAMES -- HAD HAJAAAR FUN.. EVEN TODAY WHEN I WANT TO FEEL GOOD I THINK ABOUT THIS PICNIC..<br />\n<br />\nNOBODY KNOWS THAT TIRUNAVAYA IS ONE OF THE OLDEST TEMPLES OF INDIA, PART OF THE DANAVA CIVILIZATION WHICH PRECEEDED THE VEDIC CIVILIZATION BY MILLINIUMS...IT IS OLDER THAN THE 6000 YEAR OLD GURUVAYUR TEMPLE..<br />\n<br />\nPARASHURAMA HAS CONSECRATED AN AYYAPPA IDOL IN THIS TEMPLE ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE RIVER SPOT WAS HOLY AND INDIANS FROM ALL OVER CAME THERE TO DO SHRADDH .. THIS SPOT IS KNOWN AS SOUTHERN KASHI..<br />\n<br />\nIT HAD THE LARGEST LIBRARY IN IN INDIA (SANSKRIT AND MALAYALAM ) WHICH ROTHSCHILD STOLE AND CARTED AWAY TO GERMANY..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS INCLUDED ORIGINAL COPIES TECHNICAL PARTS OF VEDAS (PART 2 BRAHMANAS AND PART 3 ARANYAKAS ) AND THE UPANISHADS..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS WHY GERMANY TEACHES SANSKRIT AND MALAYALAM IN THEIR UNIVERSITIES.. THIS WAS REVEALED BY ANGELA MERKEL..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/Malayalam-gets-global-push-new-status-in-Germany/articleshow/48522400.cms<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/12/hermann-gundert-hermann-hesse-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE TEMPLE LIBRARY WAS SET ON FIRE IN 1743 TO MAKE LOCAL BELIEVE THAT BOOKS WERE LOST IN THE FIRE..<br />\n<br />\nJEW HYDER ALI AGAIN SET THE TIRUNAVAYA TEMPLE ON FIRE IN 1761 AD AND RAZED IT TO THE GROUND-- HE WAS LOOKING FOR GOLD IN THE UNDERGROUND VAULTS..<br />\n<br />\nTHE TIRUNAVAYA LIBRARY HAD BEEN REBUILT AND WE LOST ORIGINAL DOCUMENTS SCROUNGED FROM OTHER KERALA TEMPLES AND SRINGERI MUTT , THE SECOND TIME..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/10/tipu-sultan-unmasked-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE ANCIENT MAMANKAM FESTIVAL ON TIRUNAVAYA TEMPLE RIVER BANKS WAS A INTERNATIONAL CULTURAL FEST WHERE ANCIENT GREEKS WHO STUDIED IN KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY PARTICIPATED--<br />\n<br />\nALL ANCIENT GREEKS SCHOLARS EXCEPT ARISTOTLE..THEY HAVE WRITTEN ABOUT KATHAKALI DANCES THE WHOLE NIGHT ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE WIKIPEDIA POST BELOW IS A FOUL LIE..<br />\n<br />\nTHE TAMIL PRIDE BASTARD WITH THE BIG BLACK STINKING ASS HAS INJECTED TAMIL SHIT ALL OVER..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OR5KC71zQN0</span><br />\n<br />\nCOMMIES ARE TRYING TO KILL HINDUIM IN KERALA..
