/>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c2892037168147724555\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1550318164546#c2892037168147724555\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 16, 2019 at 5:26 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nMAMANKAM AT THIRUNAVAYA WAS THIS PLANETs FIRST MAHA KUMBH MELA ( 12 YEARLY ) ..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/02/kumbh-mela-mother-of-all-pilgrimages.html<br />\n<br />\nAFTER HYDER ALI CONQUERED CALICUT USING FRENCH ROTHSCHILDs LONG RANGE ROCKETS ..- THIS ANCIENT FESTIVAL CELEBRATING DHANVANTHARI , RAHU AND KETU DIED --AND IT WAS NEVER REVIVED .<br />\n<br />\nTHE CALICUT KING COMMITTED SUICIDE ( BLEW HIMSELF UP ) AND CALICUT KING HAS NEVER BEEN DEFEATED BEFORE IN HISTORY..<br />\n<br />\nKetu deals with the past Karma and Rahu with the future.<br />\n<br />\nNorth node Rahu is like gravity- pulling us toward something whether we really want to or not, whether we have agency over this desire or not. The South Node Ketu is like anti-matter in a natal chart.<br />\n<br />\nMY WIFE AND ALMOST ALL ANCIENT FAMILIES IN KERALA CONSULT THE RAHU KALAM CHART BEFORE WE DO SOMETHING CRITICAL.<br />\n<br />\nhe Moon (Chandra) completes its orbit round the earth in about a month crossing the orbit of earth twice in the same period, once when it goes from south to north and at another time while travelling from north to south.<br />\n<br />\nThe ascending point is called \"Rahu\" and descending point - \"Ketu\". These have retrograde motion in the zodiac at the rate of 19\u00b020' per year.<br />\n<br />\nIt has been established beyond doubt that Rahu and Ketu influence an individual\u2019s life, at times more than other planets.<br />\n<br />\nSince Rahu and Ketu are in exact opposition to each other, their effect should be considered simultaneously.<br />\n<br />\nRahu has the properties of Shani (Saturn) whereas Ketu has the influence of Mangala (Mars)<br />\n<br />\nThey indicate the precise point of the harmony with the three most important influences in our life- the Sun, the Earth and the Moon. This relationship plays an important part in the enfolding of individual consciousness.<br />\n<br />\nTheir role as Karmic indicators of our life is connected with their power to cause eclipses.<br />\n<br />\nThe eclipses occur in the vicinity of Rahu Ketu during the Full Moon and the New Moon. (During New Moon when it is +/- 18 degrees from Rahu Ketu, the Solar eclipse takes place. At the full Moon +/- 11 degrees 15' from the nodal position, the Lunar eclipse takes place.)<br />\n<br />\nAs they symbolically eclipse the Sun (consciousness) and the Moon (the Mind), they have a great part to play in darkening our perspective in order to bring in new light. They deal with the concept of death and re-birth, transformation and regeneration.<br />\n<br />\nThey have been given the status of planets to emphasise their significance and the importance placed on eclipses.<br />\n<br />\nThey have no substance and are physically non-existent. Yet their influence is full of potency and spiritual significance.<br />\n<br />\nThey work in unison 180 degrees apart, two opposite points in the zodiac with a mission to churn our lives in order to externalise hidden potential and wisdom. In keeping with their shadowy nature, they work on a psychological level.<br />\n<br />\nIt is always difficult to gauge their effect because their main concern is with our emotional makeup. They effect us internally. We are unaware of what exactly is happening to us at the time..<br />\n<br />\nThe five instincts that keep us attached to the materialistic purpose of life are Kaam (Desire, passions) Krodh (Anger) Madh (intoxicants- drugs, alcohol etc) Moh (Attachment) Lobh(Greed) and Matsaya(Jealousy).<br />\n<br />\nWe need to control our instincts rather than allowing ourselves to be controlled by them. Both Rahu and Ketu have the ability to keep our mind focused on these instincts- Rahu by exaggerating and Ketu by obscuring or blocking.<br />\n<br />\nWe are tied down to the cycle of unhappiness and dissatisfaction as we cannot break away from our lower selves. We are born again and again to experience the pleasures and pains of the earthly life until we recognise them to be the illusions that they are.<br />\n<br />\nRahu Ketu deals with the inner fight within us, the moral and the social choices we have to constantly make and the inner dilemmas.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c2412942809108600918\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1550318249353#c2412942809108600918\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 16, 2019 at 5:27 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nRahu takes people off their Dharmic past path to tempt them on the road of self destruction. Ketu is considered the keeper of the book of our life- past and present Karmas.<br />\n<br />\nWhen all the planets are hemmed between Rahu and Ketu (i.e., the moon's north node and the moon's south node), Kaalsarpa YOGAM ( not dosham ) is formed.<br />\n<br />\nKalasarpa yogam is a karmic dosha that may run across the generations\u2014bad luck galore .<br />\n<br />\nPeople go for Kalsarpa Shanti Pooja to Trimbakeshwar Temple at Nasik .<br />\n<br />\nRAHU AND KETU IS MAJOR PART OF KERALA ASTROLOGY. WE DON\u2019T USE URANUS , NEPTUNE AND PLUTO AS THESE PLANETS STAY IN ONE SINGLE RASHI FOR TOO LOG AND ARE TOO FAR AWAY. WE USE RAHU/ KETU/ MOON INSTEAD ..<br />\n<br />\nA lunar eclipse happens when the Earth, sun and moon align in space, with Earth in between the sun and moon. At such times, Earth\u2019s shadow falls on the full moon, causing a lunar eclipse.<br />\n<br />\nA solar eclipse happens at the opposite phase of the moon \u2013 new moon \u2013 when the moon passes between the sun and Earth. Why aren\u2019t there eclipses at every full and new moon?<br />\n<br />\nThe moon takes about a month to orbit around the Earth. If the moon orbited in the same plane as the ecliptic \u2013 Earth\u2019s orbital plane \u2013 we would have two eclipses every month. There\u2019d be an eclipse of the moon at every full moon. And, two weeks later, there\u2019d be an eclipse of the sun at new moon for a total of at least 24 eclipses every year.<br />\n<br />\nBut the moon\u2019s orbit is inclined to Earth\u2019s orbit by about 5 degrees. Twice a month the moon intersects the ecliptic \u2013 Earth\u2019s orbital plane \u2013 at points called nodes. If the moon is going from south to north in its orbit, it\u2019s called an ascending node.<br />\n<br />\nIf the moon is going from north to south, it\u2019s a descending node. If the full moon or new moon is appreciably close to one of these nodes, then an eclipse is not only possible \u2013 but inevitable.<br />\n<br />\nSolar and lunar eclipses always come in pairs, with one following the other in a period of one fortnight (approximately two weeks). For example, in 2017, the descending node partial lunar eclipse on August 7-8 was followed by an ascending node total solar eclipse on August 21.<br />\n<br />\nAgain, the lunar nodes are the orbital nodes of the Moon, that is, the points where the orbit of the Moon crosses the ecliptic. The ascending or north node is where the moon crosses from south of the ecliptic to north of the ecliptic. The descending or south node is where it crosses from north of the ecliptic to south of the ecliptic.<br />\n<br />\nEclipses occur only near the lunar nodes: Solar eclipses occur when the passage of the Moon through a node coincides with the new moon; lunar eclipses occur when passage coincides with the full moon. A lunar eclipse may occur if there is a full moon within 11\u00b0 38' (Celestial Longitude), of a node, and a solar eclipse may occur if there is a new moon within 17\u00b0 25' of a node.<br />\n<br />\nThe plane of the lunar orbit precesses in space and hence the lunar nodes precess around the ecliptic, completing a revolution (called a draconic or nodal period) in 6798.3835 days or 18.612958 years (note that this is not the same length as a saros). The same cycle, measured against an inertial frame of reference such as ICRS (relative to the stars) is 18.599525 years.<br />\n<br />\nThe two solar eclipses in July 2000 (Solar eclipse of July 1, 2000 and Solar eclipse of July 31, 2000) were around the time that the moon was at its ascending node. Ascending-node eclipses recur after one draconic year on average, which is about 0.94901 Gregorian years, and the same goes for descending-node eclipses.<br />\n<br />\nThe ascending node is referred to as RAHU its symbol is U+260A.svg. The descending node is called KETU and its symbol is the inversion of that of the ascending node: U+260B.svg.<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=1&amp;v=xwGs8_otT64<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c2412942809108600918-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c223923129159030966\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1550318348577#c223923129159030966\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 16, 2019 at 5:29 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nThe lunar orbit is inclined by about 5.1 degrees to the ecliptic: hence the Moon can be up to about 5 degrees north or south of the ecliptic. The ecliptic is inclined by about 23.4\u00b0 to the celestial equator, the plane that is perpendicular to the rotational axis of the Earth.<br />\n<br />\nAs a consequence, once during the 18.6-year nodal period, when the ascending node of the Moon's orbit coincides with the vernal equinox, then the Moon reaches extreme northern and southern declinations. Then it also has its extreme northern and southern azimuth points of rising and setting on the horizon; its extreme lowest and highest altitude when crossing the meridian; and potentially extreme late first sightings of the new moon.<br />\n<br />\nFurthermore, occultations by the Moon of the star group the Pleiades ( Karthika ) , which are over 4\u00b0 North of the ecliptic, occur during a comparatively brief period once every nodal period.<br />\n<br />\nThe constellation of Karthika are the Pleiades, the Seven Sisters in the Western. In the Indian they are the seven wives of the Sapta Rishis !<br />\n<br />\nTHE JNU COMMIES AND LITERARY FEST DROHIS RIDICULED THAT LORD SHIVA WAS CREWING THE WIVES OF THE SAPT RISHIS WHILE THEY WERE MEDITATING IN DEODHAR FOREST \u2013SHIVA USED TO WALK WITH HIS ERECT PRICK OUT AND THE HRNY WOVES WOULD RUN AFTER HIM SHEDDING THEIR CLOTHES. SORRY , SHIVA AND SAPT RISHIS ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES. SWASTIKA SYMBOL ADOPTED BY JEW HITLER IS SAPT RISHIS .<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/polaris-and-great-bear-capt-ajit.html<br />\n<br />\n############# Husband - star/ Wife #############<br />\n<br />\nKrathu- Dubhe / Santhati<br />\nAtri- Megrez / Anasuya<br />\nVasishta - Mizar / Arundhathi<br />\nAngiras - Alioth / Shraddha<br />\nPulaha- Merak / Havubhuh<br />\nPulastya -Phecd /Gathih<br />\nBhrigu -Alkaid / Puloma<br />\n<br />\nIn Western Astronomy, their names of the wives are Maia, Electra ,Taygete, Alcyone, Caleano, Sterope and Merope. Every vestige of western astronomy is lifted from Kodungallur University owned by the Calicut king.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/aghoris-corpse-eaters-of-india-capt.html<br />\n<br />\nWhen the Sun transits the constellation of Karthika ( from May 11th onwards ), Kerala gets relief from extreme heat ( as it lies 10.30 North of the Equator ) from the months of Sidereal Aquarius and Pisces, Kumbham and Meenam and the parched earth begins to get rainfall.<br />\n<br />\nRain accelerates during the Sun's transit of Rohini ( Aldebaran, from May 25th onwards ) and then from Mriga Sira Njattuvela ( solar transit of Meissa ) onwards ( from June 8 ), Kerala gets tremendous rains !<br />\n<br />\nIN 1498 AD VASCO DA GAMA s MEN STARTED STEALING PEPPER VINES AND STARTED STASHING AWAY IN POTS FILLED WITH KERALAs FERTILE SOIL..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE KING OF CALICUT AMRIN WAS TOLD HE STARTED LAUGHING LOUDLY\u2014HE CRIED \u201c CAN THAT PORUGUESE FELLOW STEAL OUR THIRUVATHIRA NJATHUVELA ( SEASON OF ALTERNATE HEAVY RAIN AND BLAZING SUN )?\u201d<br />\n<br />\nIn our ancient Vedic texts it is written that it was nectar that rained during Thiruvathira Njattuvela .<br />\n<br />\nRains will be incessant during Thiruvathira Njattuvela ( Thiri muriyathe peythu nirayunna Thiruvathira )<br />\n<br />\nThe sun position in the 27 star signs is called \u2018Njattuvela\u2019 each being thirteen and a half days.<br />\n<br />\nEven today we collect this Thiruvathira rain water ( straight to a wide mouthed glass bowl ) for making herbal LEHYAM for lactating mothers<br />\n<br />\nThe Njattuvela before Karthika, is good for digging wells. The wells dug during the Karthika Njattuvela ( when the Sun transits the Pleiades ), will be everlasting as their water will not dry up. ( Karthika kalil kakkakalu nananjal mukkathil mukkum ).<br />\n<br />\nThe seeds planted after Rohini Njattuvela ( Alpha Tauri ) need only little care. ( Rohinikappuram vitha kuruchu mathi ). Meaning you can get the fruits effortlessly.<br />\n<br />\nHeavy rains will lash during the Earth's transit of Lamda Orionis ( Makirythil Mazha Madhichu ).<br />\n<br />\nFierce rains to be expected during the Earth's tranist of Beta Geminorum ( Punarthathil pulappikkunna mazha ) ( Punartha thadiyan poozhi therippikkum ). ( Punarthathil poozhan keruka ).<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 4--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c223923129159030966-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c5562070875339706948\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1550318391992#c5562070875339706948\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 16, 2019 at 5:29 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 3--<br />\n<br />\nGood rains also during the Earth's transit olf Delta Cancri ( Pooyathil pothumpurahtum nellu ). ( Pooyathil mazha peythal pullum nellu ).<br />\n<br />\nIf the Monsoon fails, if the Njattuvelas fail, there wil be famine and drought ! It has NOT happened in Kerala in living memory<br />\n<br />\nThe major Four Seasons of the Western System ( spring, summer, autumn and winter ) and the six seasons of the Indian system ( vasanta, greeshma, varsha, sharat, hemanta, sisira ) are caused by the apparent solar transits or the real Earth's transits of the Constellational Zodiac.<br />\n<br />\nThe six seasons of Kerala based on the Sun position Varsham (Cancer-Leo), Sarath (Virgo-Libra), Hemandam(Scorpio-Saggitarius), Sisiram(Capricon-Aquarius), Vasantham (Pisces \u2013 Aries), Greeshmam (Taurus-Gemini) .<br />\n<br />\nThe Indian astronomical system is more detailed in that it deals with 27 stars signs coming from 18 Rasis but within the influence of the Zodiac for charting the movement of the Sun and the Moon.<br />\n<br />\nThe Panchangam day commences at sunrise with 60 units called Nazhikas (24 minutes) subdivided into 60 units of Vinazhikas (24 seconds) for each nazhika.. The 60 Nazhikas are divided into 4 quarters called padam. A star could be partly in one Constellation and the rest in the next. As an example Karthika (Pleiades) has the first quarter in Medam (Aries) and the balance in Taurus<br />\n<br />\nVishu 8 or the Sun's entry into the eighth degree of sidereal Aries, is the time for the farmers to sow. Vishu is an agricultural festival, based on the Wisdom of the Heavens and not a religious festiva<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/04/vishu-new-year-festival-of-kerala-capt.html<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Py0iGumX5Hg<br />\n<br />\nWE HAVE A CULTURE<br />\n<br />\nBE PROUD OF IT<br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS NOT AN IOTA OF SUPERSTITION IN SANATANA DHARMA..OTHER THAN WHAT THE MORE THAN 1000 FAKE MUTTS ( AND NOW SWAMYs DHARMAWIKI ) HAS INJECTED..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"date-posts\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: small;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">THERE IS NIL SUPERSTITION IN SANATANA DHARMA&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: small;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: small;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">AFTER READING MY BLOGPOSTS --&nbsp; &nbsp;HOW MANY OF YOU THINK I AM A FOOL TO MATCH MORE THAN 500 HOROSCOPES FOR MY ELDER SONs BRIDE ?</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wq7nKdTM3gA/WiNUfullAXI/AAAAAAABW7A/la5xU5juzLkScy6HloIep2D5opENy_ZswCLcBGAs/s1600/ChTTart%2BPisces.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"351\" data-original-width=\"704\" height=\"318\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wq7nKdTM3gA/WiNUfullAXI/AAAAAAABW7A/la5xU5juzLkScy6HloIep2D5opENy_ZswCLcBGAs/s640/ChTTart%2BPisces.png\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">Rahu and Ketu</span>&nbsp;are considered as the only two \u201cshadow planets\u201d that is not worshipped as a god in Indian mythology. They do not own any signs, but they do own nakshatras.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small; line-height: 27px;\">In Indian astrology the lunar nodes, known as&nbsp;</span><span style=\"background-color: white; color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small; line-height: 27px;\">Rahu and Ketu</span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small; line-height: 27px;\">, have special powers in a rashi chart. Often referred to as our karmic destiny, they indicate our greatest gifts and our darkest issues.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/BOjuzVRuq28/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/BOjuzVRuq28?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small; line-height: 27px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small; line-height: 27px;\">In prediction they are where the annual eclipses fall, and indicate the areas of our life that involve the most transformation for that year.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Eop0RcrXq0I/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Eop0RcrXq0I?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small; line-height: 27px;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small; line-height: 27px;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.4px;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: small;\">When the lunar nodes are combined with another planet they take on the quality of that planet. Each combination will produce very different results.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The Moon\u2019s orbit around the Earth intersects the ecliptic ( sun\u2019s path ) at two points. These two points are the nodes of the Moon. The north node of the Moon (<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Rahu)</span>&nbsp;is where the Moon crosses from south to north, called the ascending node. This symbolizes the birth into the material manifestation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small; line-height: 27px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 27px;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The south node (</span><span style=\"background-color: white;\">Ketu)</span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">&nbsp;is where the Moon crosses from north to south, called the descending node. This symbolizes our leaving the material plane for the spiritual realm.&nbsp;</span></span></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 27px;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/b5KrKojJlcM/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/b5KrKojJlcM?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 27px;\"><br /></span></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 27px;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">So</span><span style=\"background-color: white;\">&nbsp;Rahu&nbsp;</span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">takes us into the physical world and&nbsp;</span><span style=\"background-color: white;\">Ketu</span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">&nbsp;takes us out of it.</span></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 44px;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-38w2ey1vuo8/WiZ-BmNbsOI/AAAAAAABXBU/Jq51EgDGzy8qFFziyBaUw8WZalAVGc3KgCLcBGAs/s1600/ScreejnShot698.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 44px;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b>We ( souls ) are all the inhabitants of the shadow planet where&nbsp;&nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue;\">Rahu and Ketu&nbsp;</span>are NORTH and SOUTH poles .&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 44px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 44px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 44px;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">It represents the earth on the rashi chart .</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 16pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-UJhHvTovDWs/WiZ-kFD-goI/AAAAAAABXBc/AxeAYTna7jQ6uSr4FerXsaf794RbrgQ2wCLcBGAs/s1600/imagoies.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small; line-height: 27px;\">Rahu and Ketu&nbsp;</span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small; line-height: 27px;\">These shadow planets control us by our desires. Our desires are our karmas. Our destiny is to release the chains this world has cast upon us. It is like the serpent\u2019s bite. The poisonous venom intoxicates us into this world.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/oF1kCmFAjFc/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/oF1kCmFAjFc?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small; line-height: 27px;\">Rahu</span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small; line-height: 27px;\">&nbsp;takes us under its spell with the illusions of this world, the promise of happiness, leaving us with a sense of wanting: \u201cIf I could only have more of the things that give me pleasure\u201d. But of course, this only leads to insatiable desires. We can never have enough. This is the venomous bite of Rahu.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small; line-height: 27px;\"><br /></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small; line-height: 27px;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>Below: 54 devas and 54 Danavas ( I am a Danava ) or asuras churned the cosmic ocean to obtain amrit or ambrosia.&nbsp; This represents OM --whose digital value is 108 and geometry&nbsp;shape is the Sri Yantra , which contains the theory of everything&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small; line-height: 27px;\"><b style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></b></span><span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small; line-height: 27px;\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html\" style=\"background-color: lime; color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-gbP_lEt2gvA/WiaBhnvUfcI/AAAAAAABXBw/vtn5NN7KGxQ0eWLM3C9mmzCvim_36DZZgCLcBGAs/s1600/angkor-temple-WWguide-private.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"368\" data-original-width=\"550\" height=\"428\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-gbP_lEt2gvA/WiaBhnvUfcI/AAAAAAABXBw/vtn5NN7KGxQ0eWLM3C9mmzCvim_36DZZgCLcBGAs/s640/angkor-temple-WWguide-private.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small; line-height: 27px;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Conversely&nbsp;<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Ketu</span>&nbsp;strips us of the objects of our desires, revealing that nothing in this world gives us security and permanence. It is essentially the process of enlightenment, when we come to realize that ultimately, it is all an illusion. Nothing of this material world lasts, therefore; it is all an illusion or Maya.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">Ketu&nbsp;</span>is the bringer of enlightenment through the realization of this truth. Ketu is the release of this world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The strength of&nbsp;<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Rahu and Ketu&nbsp;</span>when compared to other planets is very high by thousands of times or more.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">If&nbsp;<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Rahu&nbsp;</span>is well-placed in a horoscope, it will bring power and material success. If it is not well-disposed, it can cause alot of problems. One may expect professional setbacks, loss of work and friends, and the possible break-up of a marriage during its major and sub-periods.&nbsp;<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Rahu&nbsp;</span>is said to give similar effects as Saturn.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">If&nbsp;<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Ketu&nbsp;</span>well-placed, it will works towards providing knowledge and moksha, the final liberation from cycle of birth and death. A poorly disposed&nbsp;<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Ketu&nbsp;</span>can also create total chaos. There may be monetary setbacks,personal unhappiness&nbsp; or a feeling of alienation, which can even result in withdrawal from materialistic life. It is said to produce the same effects as Mars.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The nodal points of the Moon, what we call&nbsp;<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Rahu and Ketu</span>, are infact, clubs of magnetic and gravitational forces of two celestial bodies, the Moon and Earth and hence are very influential upon the life of mankind.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">These points Affect our central nervous system as well as sympathetic and para &nbsp;sympathetic nervous system, which work on the principles of electromagnetic systems.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Nodal points (<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Rahu and Ketu</span>) are psychosomatic, which govern not only stress level of our mind, but also the activities of hormones, blood circulation and function of the heart.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">Rahu&nbsp;</span>is the immature child with in us, he want everything which he like. He is our deepest subconscious material desire.&nbsp;<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Rahu&nbsp;</span>is obsession over the things that we need to learn a soul lesson in this life, so that eventually we are free of them, but usually through many painful mistakes and subconscious imagined fears, hypnotic attachments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">Ketu&nbsp;</span>is the inner parent who knows everything.&nbsp;<span style=\"background-color: white;\">&nbsp;Ketu</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;is our past life experience which we already know. This is why&nbsp;<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Ketu</span>&nbsp;brings doubt and sharp criticism to the areas of life where he sitting in the birth chart. He is eternally unsatisfied, he only observe what missing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Both Nodes are the illusion of what we don't know and what we know. It is the push and &nbsp;pull of&nbsp;<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Rahu</span>obsession and&nbsp;<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Ketu</span>&nbsp;doubt teaches us the lesson of life so that we can liberate from this world and be one/merge with universes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Pariharasthalam ( to alleviate ) - &nbsp;Sacred Shrines of&nbsp;<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Rahu and Ketu</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Worship at any of the temples mentioned below can reduce the intensity of the problems arise from Sarpa dosha<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">- Sri Nageshwara temple, Thirunagesswaram<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">- Mannarsala in Kerala<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">- Kukke Subramanya temple, Karnataka<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The best day on which the remedies for Sarpa dosha be performed are Nagapanchami day, the day before the Maha Shivaratri.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; AND THAT MANU STOLE FROM HAMMURABI..<br />\n<br />\nTEE HEEEEEEEE<br />\n<br />\nTHE LAWS OF HAMMURABI WERE PENNED IN 1740 BC..<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE HISTORIANS WRITE THAT LAW OF MANU WERE PENNED DOWN IN 1000 BC..<br />\n<br />\nTEE HEEEEEEE<br />\n<br />\nTHE LAWS OF MANU STATES THAT RIVER SARASWATI IS A MIGHTY PERENNIAL FLOWING RIVER..<br />\n<br />\nRIVER SARASWATI DRIED UP JUST BEFORE THE MAHABHARATA WAR STARTED ..<br />\n<br />\nBALARAMA DIVERTED THE BLOCKED SARASWATI GLACIAL MOUTH TO GANGES ..<br />\n<br />\nBALARAMA ARRIVED BACK IN TIME TO WITNESS THE LAST FIGHT BETWEEN DURYODHANA AND BHIMA IN A STAGNANT POOL OF SARASWATI..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN BHIHMA HIT DURYODHANA ON HIS THIGH WITH HIS MACE AGAINST THE RULES OF WAR- HE ATTACKED BHIMA WITH HIS GIANT PLOUGH ( USED AS A LEVER FOR DIVERTING THE SARASWATI RIVER ) , BUT HIS BROTHER KRISHNA STOPPED HIM..<br />\n<br />\nYUDDHISTRA MOCKED DURYODHANA OF HIDING IN THE POOL OF WATER ( STAGNANT POOL OF SARASWATI RIVER )<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE:After doing, in vain, all he could to rally his defeated army, Duryodhana, left almost alone, took up his mace and walked towards a pool of water. His whole frame was burning like fire, and water attracted him. \"The wise Vidura knew what would happen and he told us,\" he said to himself, as he entered the water.<br />\n<br />\nOf what avail is wisdom that comes too late? What has been done must produce its result that has to be suffered. That is the law. Yudhishthira and his brothers arrived there in relentless, pursuit of their great enemy.<br />\n<br />\n\"Duryodhana!\" exclaimed Yudhishthira, \"after destroying family and tribe, would you yourself escape death by concealing yourself in this pond? Where is your pride now? Have you no shame? Come up and fight. A kshatriya by birth, do you shrink battle and death?\"<br />\n<br />\nStung to the quick by these words, Duryodhana replied with dignity: \"I have not come here, Dharmaputra, a fugitive for my life. It was not fear that brought me here. I stepped into the water to cool the fire that is raging within me. I neither fear death nor wish to live, but why should I fight? The earth has now nothing left that I came to fight for! All those who stood by me have been slain. My desire for kingdom is gone. I leave the world to you without a rival. Enjoy it in undisputed sovereignty.\"<br />\n<br />\nUNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nTHIS ANCIENT TEXT PENNED BY MAHARISHI VYASA 6000 YEARS AGO DOES NOT LIE..<br />\n<br />\nMANUSMRITI ( 8200 BC ) TALKS ABOUT THE VEDAS - VEDAS DONT TALK ABOUT MANU..<br />\n<br />\nRIG VEDA ( ORAL ROUTE FOR 330 CENTURIES BEFORE IT WAS PENNED DOWN 70 CENTURIES AGO ) TALK ABOUT SARASWATI RIVER --AS A MIGHTY FLOWING RIVER .. IT DOES NOT TALK ABOUT GANGES..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/mother-of-all-civilisations-saraswati.html<br />\n<br />\nWIKIPEDIA SAYS RIG VEDA WAS PENNED DOWN IN 1000 BC..<br />\n<br />\nIF SO WHY DOES RIG VEDA TALK ABOUT A MIGHTY FLOWING RIVER SARASWATI ?<br />\n<br />\nBATAO NAAH .<br />\n<br />\nPLEAJJE ..<br />\n<br />\nTEE HEEEEEE<br />\n<br />\nKOSHER LIES WONT WORK..<br />\n<br />\nAND BY THE WAY--<br />\n<br />\nOLDER THAN HAMMURABI LAWS URUKAGINA LAWS AND URNAMMU LAWS WERE ALL COOKED UP BY THE WHITE HISTORIANS.. THEY NEVER EXISTED ..<br />\n<br />\nFUCKIN' CUNTS !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Microtubules are quantum devices that are orchestrating our conscious awareness.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMicrotubules are bio-electrochemical transistors that form nonlinear electrical transmission lines.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nQuantum entanglement and coherence are two fundamental features of nature, arising from the superposition principle of quantum mechanics..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nStructures inside brain neurons called microtubules act as sources of laser-like coherence for the brain\u2019s vibrational hierarchy. Microtubules and axional membranes are also hollow cylinders.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe brain processes and stores information holographically as a massively parallel processing and associative computer system.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nConsciousness is a universal attribute of creation. BrahmAn ( the Hindu god ) is the field of morphogenetic consciousness.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe conscious human brain is like an grand symphony orchestra, a multi-scalar vibrational resonance system, than a computer..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nBrain information patterns repeat over spatiotemporal scales in fractal-like, nested hierarchies of neuronal networks, with resonances and interference beats.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nVedas say that brain is a HOLOGRAPHIC STORAGE device\u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThis model allows for important aspects of human consciousness, including the fast associative memory that allows for connections between different pieces of stored information and the non-locality of memory storage (a specific memory is not stored in a specific location, i.e. a certain neuron) device..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn a hologram, any part of the hologram with sufficient size contains the whole of the stored information. In this theory, a piece of a long-term memory is similarly distributed over a dendritic arbor so that each part of the dendritic network contains all the information stored over the entire network</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nHolographic processing is accomplished with the brain acting as a phase conjugating device (e.g. a phase gate) which is type of logic circuit where the inputs are sensitive to the phase of the input signal producing..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nA laser hologram is that it exhibits the distributive property. This means that even a small part of an entire holographic record contains the entire record of the recorded image .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nConsciousness derives from deeper level, finer scale activities inside brain neurons. There are quantum vibrations in \"microtubules\" inside brain neurons..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nEEG rhythms (brain waves) also derive from deeper level microtubule vibrations, and that from a practical standpoint, treating brain microtubule vibrations could benefit a host of mental, neurological, and cognitive conditions.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/12/7000-year-old-vedic-brain-wave-theories.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAll cells, including neurons, contained the same structures that make up mitotic spindles, which are basically microtubules the interior of a cell was like a tiny forest\u2014NOT A WATERBAG..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">This forest is very dynamic. It moves things around, rearranging itself, defining the shape, function, and structure of the cell. Each neuron is a network of microtubules.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nA cell has a skeleton, somewhat like our body has a skeleton. It's called \"the cytoskeleton.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe cytoskeletal branches are moving cooperatively, like arms and hands, passing things along from place to place inside the cell, and rearranging themselves to change cell shape, and grow extensions like axons or dendrites.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMicrotubules are ideal quantum computers.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c249959468293845430-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c249959468293845430-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c1243934232298144164\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1550427937399#c1243934232298144164\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 17, 2019 at 11:55 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nMicrotubules in the brain's neurons, are arrayed in parallel--- if all the microtubules in about 100 neurons were in a quantum state for 500 milliseconds\u2014a half second \u2014a conscious event would then occur. For a more intense experience involving 1000 neurons, it would be 50 milliseconds..<br />\n<br />\nA series of conscious events gives a stream of consciousness.<br />\n<br />\nThere is a quantum process called quantum coherence occurring within the microtubules..<br />\n<br />\nHow the quantum world operates, there is a thought experiment created by the well-known physicist Erwin Schr\u00f6dinger. He asked that one imagines a box that contains a cat. The cat is fed by a mechanism that has a 50 per cent chance to either release food into the box, or a poison. The observer of the box will never know whether or not the cat is dead, unless he opens the box and looks inside. In effect, the cat exists in a limbo; it is both dead, and alive.<br />\n<br />\nBut when the observer opens the box, he finds that the cat is dead. When particles are in a quantum state, they can be in many different states at once, but when the observer views those particles, they \u2018choose\u2019 a state; this is quantum coherence. That\u2019s how qubits, or quantum bits, work in a quantum computer. A regular bit is either on, or off, but qubits exist in multiple states until coming together at once.<br />\n<br />\nIf consciousness holds its roots in some sort of quantum mechanism (i.e quantum vibrations within microtubules), then the quantum nature of that mechanism allows for a more random decision-making process to occur.<br />\n<br />\nA quantum computer is a type of computer that uses quantum mechanics so that it can perform certain kinds of computation more efficiently than a regular computer can.<br />\n<br />\nRegular computer stores information in a series of 0\u2019s and 1\u2019s.<br />\n<br />\nA quantum computer does not use bits to store information. Instead, it uses something called qubits.<br />\n<br />\nEach qubit can not only be set to 1 or 0, but it can also be set to 1 and 0<br />\n<br />\nA binary digit, characterized as 0 and 1, is used to represent information in classical computers. A pure qubit state is a coherent superposition of the basis states. An important distinguishing feature between qubits and classical bits is that multiple qubits can exhibit quantum entanglement.<br />\n<br />\nQuantum entanglement is a nonlocal property of two or more qubits that allows a set of qubits to express higher correlation than is possible in classical systems. A number of qubits taken together is a qubit register.<br />\n<br />\nQuantum computers perform calculations by manipulating qubits within a register. A qubyte (quantum byte) is a collection of eight qubits<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://medium.freecodecamp.org/what-is-a-quantum-computer-explained-with-a-simple-example-b8f602035365<br /><br />https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IiLplTc8rQY</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">BEFORE THE ADVENT OF QUANTUM COMPUTERS ALL THIS WAS MUMBO JUMBO TO THE WHITE MAN-- SUPERSTITION OF SAVAGE HINDUS..</span></b><br />\nNOT ANY MORE !<br />\n<br />\nA binary digit, characterized as 0 and 1, is used to represent information in classical computers. ... However, whereas the state of a bit can only be either 0 or 1, the general state of a qubit according to quantum mechanics can be a coherent superposition of both the state of a bit is either 0 or 1, the state of a qubit can also be a superposition of both. It is possible to fully encode one bit in one qubit.<br />\n<br />\nHowever, a qubit can hold even more information, e.g. up to two bits using superdense coding. ... It's called superposition. Vedanta explains this unique phenomenon by postulating \u201cmaya\u201d as the cause of the superimposition.<br />\n<br />\nThe quantum world cannot be observed by our 5 senses, and they do NOT follow the cause and effect laws of classical physics.<br />\n<br />\nWe live in a time obstructed world using 5 senses -- and also a timeless realm in the quantum dimension, where what you see is NOT what you get. Vedanta has told 7000 years ago that matter is not condensed substance but a diffused form of energy It is written in the Vedas that energy and matter are inter convertible.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c1243934232298144164-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c1904729451515731640\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. All living beings dwell in Me, but I do not dwell in them.<br />\n<br />\nWhile modern mathematics, science and technology centre around linear dimensional reality , but the Vedic systems avail multidimensional spiraling reality.<br />\n<br />\nHeisenberg's uncertainty principle, is an equation of maya. The position and momentum of a particle cannot be simultaneously measured with arbitrarily high precision. There is a minimum for the product of the uncertainties of these two measurements. Maya is mentioned 29 times in the Atharva Veda. As such, it creates not only space, but also time.<br />\n<br />\nSanatana Dharma or Hinduism believes that God has given us 5 senses of narrow bandwidth, so that we do NOT have an information overload breakdown.<br />\n<br />\nThis is how the brain - a lump of \u2018pinkish gray meat\u2019 - produced the richness of conscious experience and subjective experience .<br />\n<br />\nQuantum computing is about qubits of information remaining in multiple states until coming together into an instantaneous calculation, called \u201cquantum coherence,\" making a large number of things act together in one quantum state.<br />\n<br />\nYOU CANT HACK QUANTUM COMPUTERS..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c2939853872774043212\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1549988845089#c7327830882961473460\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 12, 2019 at 9:57 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L78r7YD-kNw</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">CHECK OUT 2.49--THE STUXNET WAS A ISRAELI JOB..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nStuxnet is a malicious computer worm, unleashed by Israel on Ira's nuclear program..<br />\n<br />\nStuxnet specifically targets programmable logic controllers (PLCs), which allow the automation of electromechanical processes such as those used to control machinery and industrial processes including centrifuges for separating nuclear material..<br />\n<br />\nThere was a soccer match between Iran and Israel on 19th May 1968.<br />\n<br />\nThe people were all happy and the vast stadium was full.<br />\n<br />\nUnknown to the Iranians a MEAN IRANIAN JEW bought up most of the tickets and gave it free to Iranian Jews.<br />\n<br />\nSo when Israel ( Giora Spiegel ) hit a goal well into the second half the stadium resounded with cheers \u2014 yes almost the whole stadium cheering for for Israel. The Indian referee was shocked .<br />\n<br />\nThe Iranians fought like tigers and scored two goals at the fag end of the match .<br />\n<br />\nBIG MISTAKE.<br />\n<br />\nThe cast was drawn.<br />\n<br />\nIranian Jews would now NOT be considered Iranian in the minds of the Shia people.<br />\n<br />\nThe money for the Jew soccer tickets came from Habib Elghanian a very rich businessman and the president of the Tehran Jewish Society. For polarizing the nation and spying for Israel this mangy Jew would be shot.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">On 9 May 1979, Elghanian was executed by a firing squad in Tehran.</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\nHe was the first Jew to be executed by the Islamic Khomeini government. Iranian Jews shat in their pants and ran to Israel.<br />\n<br />\nIn the aftermath of the Stuxnet worm that attacked Iran's nuclear facilities, there was speculation by security researchers working for Symantec that a number found in the Stuxnet code - \"<b><span style=\"color: red;\">19790509</span></b>\" - which was used as a marker to identify computers that should not be affected, was a reference to his execution date.<br />\n<br />\nStuxnet reportedly compromised Iranian PLCs, collecting information on industrial systems and causing the fast-spinning centrifuges to tear themselves apart.Stuxnet reportedly ruined almost 25 % of Iran's nuclear centrifuges..<br />\n<br />\nStuxnet has three modules: a worm that executes all routines related to the main payload of the attack; a link file that automatically executes the propagated copies of the worm; and a rootkit component responsible for hiding all malicious files and processes, preventing detection of the presence of Stuxnet.<br />\n<br />\nIt is typically introduced to the target environment via an infected USB flash drive, thereby crossing any air gap.<br />\n<br />\nOut of the initial STUXNET 38,000 infections, about 22,000 were in Iran. Indonesia was a distant second, with about 6,700 infections, followed by <span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">India with about 3,700 infections.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\nAND WE DONT EVEN KNOW !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c7327830882961473460-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c7327830882961473460-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c4375042813645711063\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. text-decoration-line: none;\">February 13, 2019 at 9:35 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nAnalyzing history, it is easy to conclude that both untouchability and sati were not a tradition of our subcontinent. Sati was a fictitious custom not mentioned anywhere while untouchability was imposed by the British. Sati became a historic reality after the Bengal Sati Regulation act 1829. Currently people are refusing to believe history as it is, thanks to the social media. The Sati Regulation act had influenced the SC verdict on Sabarimala women entry case through \"Judicial Precedence\". In future the Sabarimala judgement also may become Judicial Precedence for many other cases relating to Hindu religion.<br />\n<br />\nThe below video demonstrates how the Hollywood style fantasy movies are instrumental in the distortion of history.<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.facebook.com/theverdantchristian/videos/986826984834911/<br />\n<br />\nThe Criminal Tribes Act, 1871 was one of the many draconian laws passed by the BRITS that segregated people based on their caste identification. This law empowered local governments to perform genocide against notified people considering them as born criminals. This stigmatised the entire community and imposed severe restrictions on the movements.<br />\n<br />\nWhile introducing the Bill that became the Act, a British official T.V. Stephens said that People from time immemorial have been pursuing the caste system defined job-positions: weaving, carpentry and such were hereditary jobs. So there must have been hereditary criminals also who pursued their forefathers\u2019 profession.<br />\n<br />\nPeople of these castes were outcasted (Achoot or Untouchable) from their own villages over night. Influential people from other castes did not oppose due to fear. Both govt and public treated them as born criminals. People tried to avoid them because the govt is keeping a vigilant watch over their movements. At the time of independence, thirteen million people in 127 communities faced search and arrest if any member of the group was found outside the prescribed area. The Act was repealed in 1952 and the status of Denotified Tribes (DNT) or Vimukta Jati was given to them. But the stigma of this categorization based on caste continues to haunt us even now.<br />\n<br />\nPhase Pardhis are one of India\u2019s so-called denotified tribes. The santhals and Mundas tribes of Bihar were treated badly by the colonial rulers. Nizam government treated gondu tribe as criminals. The fighter Komaram Bhim who waged war against Nizam for lands to their tribe, was brutally killed by Razakars and nizam army. A new district (Komaram Bheem Asifabad) on his name is there in Telangana. In Gujarat, the denotified tribes like Chhara, Devipujak, Sansi, Sandhi, Dafer have been living with the tag of criminals since the British days. The Mahars colluded with the British and saved themsleves from bring notified as criminals.<br />\n<br />\nIn India, the Aryan Invasion theory was invented to project the white superiorty and in Africa, the Hamitic Hypothesis was used to downgrade the native people as natural slave. In Australia, the aborigines were classified as animals under Flora &amp; Fauna Act until 1967</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c5691139135414441248-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c5691139135414441248-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c3087483186891138515\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt.
