HIS REAL NAME IS ARYAN BHATTATHIRIPAD FROM MY HOMETOWN OF CALICUT -- A VISITING PROFESSOR FROM KODUUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY ( MUZIRIS ) OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING ..<br />\n<br />\nBHATTATHIRIPADS ARE HE CREAMY LAYER OF NAMBOODIRIS WELL VERSED IN MATH AND ASTRONOMY..<br />\n<br />\nNAMBOODIRIS ARE HE CREAMY LAYER OF THIYYAS OF KERALA WELL VERSED IN SANSKRIT AND VEDA SMRITI ORAL ROUTE..<br />\n<br />\nARYAN NAMBOODIRIS WERE VISITING PROFESSORS AT TAXILA/ NALANDA/ SARASWATI DHAR / UNIVERSITY OF ALEXANDRIA ETC<br />\n<br />\nCHANAKYA WAS AN ARYAN NAMBOODIRI PROFESSOR AT TAXILA..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html</span><br />\n<br />\nAN ARYAN WAS RECOGNIZED BY HIS SPECIAL HAIRDO ( KUDUMI TO THE SIDE OF THE HEAD ) ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/09/sikha-kudumi-choti-open-flag-of.html</span><br />\n<br />\nARYAVARTA , BRAHMAVARTA AND BRAHMARISHIDESHA ARE ALL THE SAME...<br />\n<br />\nBRAHMAVARTA WAS THE VAST HOLY FOREST UNIVERSITY LAND WHERE THE BRAHMANAS ( PART 2 ) AND ARNYAKAS ( PART 3 ) OF VEDAS --TECHNICAL SECTIONS-- WERE PENNED.. THIS IS MODERN MALABAR OR NORTH KERALA..<br />\n<br />\nThese two parts written in Sanskrit and Grantha lipi ( techinical volumes ) have been stolen by the white invader..<br />\n<br />\nIN KERALA ARYA VAIDYASALA IS A AYURVEDA HOSPITAL RUN BY ARYANS.. EVEN TODAY A NAMBOODIRI LODGE IN A TEMPLE TOWN IS CALLED ARYA BHAVAN.<br />\n<br />\nMANU SAID BHARAT IS THE LAND BETWEEN THE HOLY RIVER OF SARASWATI ( NORTH ) AND THE HOLY LAND OF BRAHMARISHIDESA ( SOUTH ) GIRDLED BY THE SEAS ON EITHER SIDE....<br />\n<br />\nLET ME QUOTE BHAGAWAD GITA CHAPTER 2 VERSE 2 , PENNED 6000 YEARS AGO..<br />\n<br />\n\u0936\u094d\u0930\u0940\u092d\u0917\u0935\u093e\u0928\u0941\u0935\u093e\u091a |<br />\n\u0915\u0941\u0924\u0938\u094d\u0924\u094d\u0935\u093e \u0915\u0936\u094d\u092e\u0932\u092e\u093f\u0926\u0902 \u0935\u093f\u0937\u092e\u0947 \u0938\u092e\u0941\u092a\u0938\u094d\u0925\u093f\u0924\u092e\u094d |<br />\n\u0905\u0928\u093e\u0930\u094d\u092f\u091c\u0941\u0937\u094d\u091f\u092e\u0938\u094d\u0935\u0930\u094d\u0917\u094d\u092f\u092e\u0915\u0940\u0930\u094d\u0924\u093f\u0915\u0930\u092e\u0930\u094d\u091c\u0941\u0928 || 2||<br />\n<br />\n\u015bhr\u012b bhagav\u0101n uv\u0101cha<br />\nkutastv\u0101 ka\u015bhmalamida\u1e41 vi\u1e63hame samupasthitam<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">an\u0101rya</span>-ju\u1e63h\u1e6damaswargyam ak\u012brti-karam arjuna<br />\n<br />\n\u015bhr\u012b-bhagav\u0101n uv\u0101cha\u2014the Supreme Lord said; kuta\u1e25\u2014wherefrom; tv\u0101\u2014to you; ka\u015bhmalam\u2014delusion; idam\u2014this; vi\u1e63hame\u2014in this hour of peril; samupasthitam\u2014overcome; an\u0101rya\u2014<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">CUNT OF THE FIRST ORDER</span> ; ju\u1e63h\u1e6dam\u2014practiced; aswargyam\u2014which does not lead to the higher abodes; ak\u012brti-karam\u2014leading to disgrace; arjuna\u2014Arjun<br />\n<br />\nTranslation<br />\nBG 2.2: The Supreme Lord said: My dear Arjun, how has this delusion overcome you in this hour of peril? It is not befitting an <span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">NOBLE HIGHLY EVOLVED MAN</span>. It leads not to the higher abodes, but to disgrace.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS 100% PROOF !<br />\n<br />\nManu wrote 10,300 years ago --\u201c All the people on earth should learn their respective practices from a ARYAN born in that land of Brahmarisihidesa \u201d..<br />\n<br />\nARYAVARTA ( PUNT/ SHEBA / OPHIR/ MALABAR/ ARYAVARTA / LAND OF GODS / BRAHMARISHIDESA ) WAS PART OF THE DANAVA CIVILIZATION-WHICH PRECEDED THE VEDIC CIVILISATION BY SEVERAL MILLINIUMS..<br />\n<br />\nEVEN TODAY KERALA IS KNOWN AS GODs OWN COUNTRY..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nARYAVARTA IS THE CRADLE OF THIS PLANETs KNOWLEDGE ..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c8702649353056027309-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c8702649353056027309-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c2594440602899249531\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. XIV, 110.47).<br />\n<br />\nThe Law Code of Manu mentions the Rig Veda many times, but the Rig Veda did not mention the Law Code of Manu even once.<br />\n<br />\nMANU WAS A SAGE FROM ARYAVARTA..<br />\n<br />\nThis is because Rig Veda went of oral route for 330 centuries before being penned down 70 centuries ago.. Manu made his laws 10,300 years ago.<br />\n<br />\nThe Law Code of Manu does not just mention the Rig Veda only in passing, but as the cornerstone of its civilization's philosophical and spiritual thought.<br />\n<br />\nHAMMURABI LIFTED HIS LAWS WHOLE SALE FROM THE LAWS OF MANU ..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. FOREIGN FORCES KNEW WELL IN ADVANCE OF ADULTERY/ HOMOSEXUALITY RULING..<br />\n<br />\nIN FOREIGN NATIONS A JUDGE BENCH GOES THROUGH THE SAME VETTING PROCESS OF A JURY BENCH TO PREVENT HIJACKING OF JUSTICE ..<br />\n<br />\nREAD ALL 8 PARTS OF THE POST BELOW--<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/justice-be-damned-enforce-law-not-any.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE JUDGES IN INDIA DONT EVEN KNOW THAT \"SUBJUDICE\" APPLIES ONLY TO A JURY SYSTEM-- NOT A JUDGE SYSTEM..<br />\n<br />\nIF GOGOI WAS SO MUCH CONVINCED THAT DIPAK MISRA DID BENCH FIXING AS CJI-- WHY HAS HE DONE NOTHING ABOUT IT.. WE NEED FAIRNESS AND TRANSPARENCY..<br />\n<br />\nWE DONT NEED FOREIGN CONTROLLED DICTATORSHIP IN SUPREME COURT..<br />\n<br />\nBELOW: A RIDICULOUS \"HANDBOOK ON PRACTICE AND PROCEDURE AND OFFICE PROCEDURE --SUPREME COURT\"...<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.sci.gov.in/sites/default/files/Practice%20%26amp%3Bamp%3B%20Procedure%20and%20Office%20Procedure%202017%20%28FINAL%29.pdf</span><br />\n<br />\nWE THE PEOPLE WILL NOT ALLOW A OFFICE PROCEDURES BOOK TO BE ATTACHED TO THE CONSTITUTION AS AN ILLEGAL LANGOT...HEY CJI GIVES SPECIAL POWERS TO HIMSELF TO FIX BENCHES (IMPORTANT AND SENSITIVE CASE ) IN CHAPTER XI..<br />\n<br />\nWE ALL KNOW WHAT DIPAK MISRA DID ON ADULTERY/ HOMOSEXUALITY ISSUE..<br />\n<br />\nCJI GIVES HIMSELF \"SUBJECTIVE POWERS \" VIA THE \"RELEVANT FACTS AND CIRCUMSTANCES \" LOOP HOLE USING A OFFICE PROCEDURE BOOK..<br />\n<br />\nARTICLE 145(3) OF THE CONSTITUTION IS VERY CLEAR.. WHY ILLEGALLY DIVE INTO ORDER VI RULE 1 OF A \"OFFICE PROCEDURE BOOK\"?<br />\n<br />\nWe are aware that CBI arrested a hawala operator who led them to a retired judge of the Orissa high court, IM Quddusi, who, allegedly had taken money from a medical college with a promise to help them get a favourable judgement from the supreme court on the question of permissions to admit students for the 2017-18 academic year from the Medical Council of India.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c6880554288062193220-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c6880554288062193220-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c215660361329152399\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Judges decide whether judges face any consequences for misconduct. Judges decide whether judges have committed an impeachable offence. Judges decide whether judges will be named in a criminal offence. margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1550288785780#c3232097504448083537\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 16, 2019 at 9:16 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nONCE ON MY STAINLESS STEEL TANKS CHEMICAL TANKER -- WE LOADED LIQUID UREA AT GERMANY FOR USA..<br />\n<br />\nTHE SHIPPERS WANTED EXTREME CLEANLINESS - WHICH GOT MY ANTENNA UP..<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE CARRIED DRY PRILL UREA IN BULK AND IN BAGS SEVERAL TIMES.. I KNOW UREA AS THE NITROGEN RELEASE FERTILIZER.<br />\n<br />\nSO I HAD A TALK WITH MY GERMAN AGENTS -- ASKING FOR EXACT INFORMATION IF THEY WANT THE CARGO TO BE SHIPPED ..<br />\n<br />\nIT CAME --<br />\n<br />\nTHE CARGO WAS BRANDED \"BLUE LIQUID UREA\" PROBABLY TO AVOID TAXES AND INSURANCE..<br />\n<br />\nI HAD A WAGER ,THAT IN NEW YORK THE UREA WILL BE PUMPED OUT AT A REMOTE EXPLOSIVE QUAY..<br />\n<br />\nI WAS RIGHT !<br />\n<br />\nUREA NITRATE WAS USED IN WORLD TRADE CENTRE ( NEW YORK ) BOMBING IN 1993..<br />\n<br />\nUrea Nitrate has a destructive power similar to better-known ammonium nitrate explosives..<br />\n<br />\nIt is difficult to identify urea nitrate in post-explosion debris, since only a very small fraction survives the blast. Also, in the presence of water, it readily decomposes to its original components, urea and nitric acid.<br />\n<br />\nPost-blast debris of urea nitrate can be confused with ammonium nitrate, the main solid product of urea nitrate thermal decomposition. On chemical tankers were are familiar with gas ion- liquid chromatography/ mass spectrometry analysis.<br />\n<br />\nBombs need two components beside the fertilizer: a detonator and a fuel. The fertilizer must be mixed with a fuel in an exact ratio, and the detonator must be able to generate sufficient energy..<br />\n<br />\nThe first thing that happens during a fertilizer bomb blast is the explosion of the detonator. It contains a small amount of an explosive compound in it, and when it discharges, it creates what experts call a detonation wave. This detonation wave radiates outward from the detonator at a massive speed through the mixture of ammonium nitrate and fuel..<br />\n<br />\nThe energy of the detonation wave causes the ammonium nitrate in the fertilizer to vaporize \u2013 the solid fertilizer becomes a gas in an instant. The ammonium and nitrate molecules break down, and a large amount of oxygen gas is suddenly formed.<br />\n<br />\nThe gas released from the decomposing fertilizer is what drives the explosion. The rapid release of oxygen, along with the energy from the detonation wave, ignites the fuel. When the liquid fuel ignites, it rapidly combusts, and even more gas is released.<br />\n<br />\nThe pressure waves travel at the speed of sound..Heat is also released during the combustion, and it may be enough to set a car on fire, but most of the damage from such explosions is due to the pressure waves.<br />\n<br />\nThe fertilizer and the fuel have to be combined in a just the right proportions, or else nothing will happen--the detonator could go off, but there will be no explosion. It would just burn..<br />\n<br />\nWorkers at a German fertilizer plant were using dynamite to try to break up a large mass of solidified fertilizer that had formed and was clogging up the functioning of the plant in 1921..In the ensuing explosion, at least 500 people were killed.<br />\n<br />\nTHE MOLECULAR FORMULA FOR UREA IS CH4N2O ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE MOLECULAR FORMULA FOR AMMONIUM NITRATE IS \u200eNH4NO3 or H4N2O3 ..<br />\n<br />\nUAN IS A SOLUTION OF UREA AND AMMONIUM NITRATE IN WATER.. CH4N2O + NH4NO3 + H2O ....<br />\n<br />\nWhen the water in UAN evaporates, residue may include solid ammonium nitrate and urea. When sensitised or during decomposition, concentrated ammonium nitrate may become unstable and/or explosive. UAN pumps left operating for extended periods or left running against a blocked discharge have been known to detonate..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://security.blogs.cnn.com/2013/02/25/u-s-pakistan-seek-breakthrough-to-thwart-bomb-makers/<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c3232097504448083537-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c3232097504448083537-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c8207913449291715777\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c4962073224957611484\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1550330562052#c4962073224957611484\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 16, 2019 at 8:52 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCHINAs GDP GROWTH IS NOW 4.9 %..<br />\n<br />\nCHINAs DEBT IS NOW 385% OF GDP\u2026<br />\n<br />\nMAD MEN OF CHINA HAVE BUILD THOUSANDS OF HIGH RISE BUILDINGS IN WHICH NOBODY STAYS OR WILL EVER SAY..<br />\n<br />\nThis is like making fishing boats in the middle of the desert and leaving it there to rot.. These boats will never ever catch a fish..<br />\n<br />\nChina\u2019s construction and \u201cinvestment\u201d binge was funded with credit manufactured by state controlled banks and their shadow affiliates, not real savings.<br />\n<br />\nSky scraper building was driven by state initiated growth plans and MAD commie GDP targets.<br />\n<br />\nThese were cascaded from the top down to the province, county and local government levels\u2014\u2013an economic process which is the opposite of entrepreneurial at-risk assessments of future market based demand and profits.<br />\n<br />\nChina has become a credit-driven economic madhouse. The 56% of GDP attributable to fixed asset investment actually constitutes the most spectacular spree of malinvestment and waste in recorded history. It is the footprint of a future depression, not evidence of sustainable growth and prosperity.<br />\n<br />\nChina\u2019s fantastically over-built industry and public infrastructure embodies monumental economic waste equivalent to the construction of giant dams on dry land. After all China has plenty of cement to export ( after importing it cheaply from Vietnam )<br />\n<br />\nConsider a boundary case analogy. With enough fiat credit during the last three years, the US could have duplicated China\u2019s cement consumption spree and built 160 Hoover dams on dry land in each and every state.<br />\nThe collapse of its construction boom has leftthe Red Ponzi riddled with economic air pockets and negative spending multipliers.<br />\n<br />\nChina\u2019s construction and investment binge is now grinding to a halt-- kickstaring a huge decline in industry wages, profits and supply chain activity.<br />\n<br />\nHousehold debt in China has been skyrocketing posinge risks to growth and financial stability.. The household debt-to-gross domestic product ratio is currently at around 57%.. For households, debt service obligations means less money to spend.<br />\n<br />\nThe year 2018 saw a record number of defaults by number and total value, as Beijing clamped down on lending via both official and unofficial channels in an effort to slow the growth of debt, especially in the corporate sector. The cumulative value of troubled debt is over 3.2 Trillion USD.<br />\n<br />\nThe Chinese government has long forced banks to keep interest rates artificially low, often below the rate of inflation. However, because the Chinese government was eager to revive investment, they allowed these financial products (known as wealth management and trust products) to offer much higher yields.<br />\n<br />\nSavings rapidly flowed away from traditional state owned banks, forcing them to create their own financial products. Since these financial products offer depositors higher interest rates, the banks must make loans with higher interest rates. As a result, a shadow banking system emerged where banks either made high interest loans to a capital starved private sector or to other financial entities.<br />\n<br />\nThe shadow banking has grown at a spectacular rate, and now controls $21.1 trillion of assets or about 89% of GDP.<br />\n<br />\nTo shadow banking system acts as the capillaries of the system getting money to individual private sector businesses. However, the capillaries are deeply imperfect as many of the ordinary savers investing in wealth management products are mislead into believing the products are fully insured by the state, and financial entities have lent lent money recklessly in the assumption they would be.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c4962073224957611484-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c4962073224957611484-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c6220875044811735704\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; ON ORDERS FROM WE ALL KNOW WHO ( TO HIS HALF BROTHER WHO CONTROLLED KASHMIR )..<br />\n<br />\nArticle 370 gave the solitary State of Jammu &amp; Kashmir the right to have a separate Constitution and separate flag, but nowhere does it say which category of Indians will enjoy all citizenship rights in Jammu &amp; Kashmir and which sections will not.<br />\n<br />\nWE ALL KNOW WHICH MAN ( WHO LATER BECAME PM ) BENEFITED MOST FROM MURDER OF DEEN DAYAL UPADHYAYA.. THIS MAN SAID TAAATA BAAYE BAAAYE TO SHYAM PRASAD MOOKHERJEE . ..<br />\n<br />\nPARAMOUNT CLAUSE: \" ETHNIC CLEANSING \" - OF SIX LAKHS KASHMIRI PANDITS BY KASHMIRI MUSLIMS SUPPORTED BY PAKISTAN, MAKES ARTICLE 370 NULL AND VOID....<br />\n<br />\nNehru amended Article 368 without taking the Indian Parliament into confidence, THOUGH Parliament alone had the power to amend or not amend the Constitution, to amend Article 35 and add to it the atrocious Article 35A which was enforced in Jammu &amp; Kashmir through the Constitution (Application to Jammu &amp; Kashmir) Order, May 1954...<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A enabled the Jammu &amp; Kashmir Constituent Assembly to deny citizenship rights to the HINDU refugees from West Pakistan and all other Indians, barring Permanent Residents of the State...<br />\n<br />\nArmed with absolute power, the Jammu &amp; Kashmir Constituent Assembly adopted Section 6 which said no persons who had crossed over to the state after May 1944 will be considered eligible for citizenship rights...<br />\n<br />\nNehru enforced Article 35A in Jammu &amp; Kashmir UNCONSTITUTIONALLY - More important he criminally CONCEALED it...<br />\n<br />\nHe hid the amendments from the public, by not mentioning the same in the main body of the Constitution...<br />\n<br />\nThe unconstitutional amendments to Article 368 and Article 35 were mentioned only in Appendix-I and Appendix-II, respectively, so that they could escape public attention<br />\n- In a CRIMINAL MANNER..<br />\n<br />\nAN APPENDIX , CAN NEVER HIJACK THE MAIN BODY OF ANY ARTICLE...ANY IDIOT KNOWS THIS UNLESS HE IS STUPID COLLEGIUM JUDGE OR HE IS SENILE...<br />\n<br />\nIn October 2015, the High Court of Jammu and Kashmir has ruled that the Article 370 cannot be \"abrogated, repealed or even amended.\"..<br />\n<br />\nIt explained that the clause (3) of the Article conferred power to the State's Constituent Assembly to recommend to the President on the matter of the repeal of the Article...<br />\n<br />\nSince the Constituent Assembly did not make such a recommendation before its dissolution in 1957, the Article 370 has taken on the features of a \"permanent provision\" despite being titled a temporary provision in the Constitution..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1550369139948#c4046014408645006337\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 17, 2019 at 7:35 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nBALLS !<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS DONE BY DECEIT - IS \" NULL AND VOID \"..<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A came into existence by a Presidential Order passed by Dr. Rajandra Prasad ( Rothschild sponsored FAKE Kayastha ) on the advice of Nehru\u2019s cabinet in 1954...<br />\n<br />\nPresident of India has sole legislative power under article 123 power to make ordinance when either house of the Parliament is not in session. - This legislative powers of the President has an EXPIRY SHELL PERIOD OF MERE SIX MONTHS....<br />\n<br />\nThe Constitution can be amended only by the Parliament as per procedure clearly laid out in Article 368. But Article 35A was never presented before the Parliament of India...<br />\n<br />\nThis effectively means, in this case, the President bypassed the amending procedure as laid out in the Constitution of India in order to add the new Article 35A...<br />\n<br />\nThis also means that Article 368 of the Constitution, in its application to Jammu and Kashmir, also got amended!.<br />\n<br />\nThe President of India does not have legislative power, but here in this case he performed the function of Parliament!..<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A appears in the Constitution as an appendix..<br />\n<br />\nHow can an Article, which has been implemented on the ground as if it\u2019s a part of the Constitution, be missing from the text of the Constitution ?..<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A was an amendment in our Constitution via the back door (Presidential order), without the involvement of India\u2019s Parliament..<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A is an example of the abuse of Article 370..<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A is a violation of the basic structure of our Constitution..<br />\n<br />\nIt curbs certain basic rights enshrined in the very Preamble of the Constitution...<br />\n<br />\nAs a result of the implementation of Article 35A,<br />\n- Lakhs of Indian HINDU citizens have been deprived of \u201c JUSTICE, social, economic and political \u201d and \u201c EQUALITY of status and of opportunity \u201d...<br />\n<br />\nIn the laws under Article 370 read with Article 35A even the President of India may be denied a place or land for official purpose. - This is a breach of trust...<br />\n<br />\nDemocratic India cannot allow any section of its population to be treated as second-rate citizens in any part of the country...<br />\n<br />\nArticle 368 is the only way to amend the Constitution- Not the President...<br />\n<br />\nThe marginal note of Article 368 states; --<br />\n- \u201c Power of the Parliament to amend the Constitution and procedure, therefore \u201d..<br />\nWhich means it is the Parliament that has the power to amend the Constitution...<br />\n<br />\nSub-clause 2 of the Article 368 states that:<br />\n- \u201c An amendment of this Constitution may be initiated only by the introduction of a Bill for the purpose in either House of Parliament, and when the Bill is passed in each House by majority of not less than two-third of the members of that House present and voting, [it shall be presented to the President who shall give his assent to the Bill and thereupon] the Constitution shall stand amended in accordance with the terms of Bill...\"<br />\n<br />\nThe President of India does NOT have the sole UNBRIDLED power to amend the constitution through the bypass of the entire Constitutional mechanism nor does Article 370 give power to the President to insert any Article in any Part of the Constitution....<br />\n<br />\nWISDOM: IF INDIA HAS TO NIP OUT PAKISTAN AIDED TERRORISM IN KASHMIR - ARTICLE 370 AND 35 A MUST GO...<br />\n<br />\nWE DO NOT NEED TO RUN TO ANY COLLEGIUM JUDGE...<br />\n<br />\nWE DO NOT CARE FOR THESE UNCONSTITUTIONAL COLLEGIUM JUDGES.<br />\n<br />\nWE THE PEOPLE - challenge this MIND BOGGLING DECEIT - where constitutional procedures were circumvented...<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1550395610711#c2534453819315831358\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 17, 2019 at 2:56 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY CALLED ME AND SAID<br />\n<br />\nIN LITERARY FESTS ,THE ANTI-HINDU BRIGADE CLAIMS THAT LAWS OF HAMMURABI IS OLDER THAN LAWS OF MANU.. AND THAT MANU STOLE FROM HAMMURABI..<br />\n<br />\nTEE HEEEEEEEE<br />\n<br />\nTHE LAWS OF HAMMURABI WERE PENNED IN 1740 BC..<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE HISTORIANS WRITE THAT LAW OF MANU WERE PENNED DOWN IN 1000 BC..<br />\n<br />\nTEE HEEEEEEE<br />\n<br />\nTHE LAWS OF MANU STATES THAT RIVER SARASWATI IS A MIGHTY PERENNIAL FLOWING RIVER..<br />\n<br />\nRIVER SARASWATI DRIED UP JUST BEFORE THE MAHABHARATA WAR STARTED ..<br />\n<br />\nBALARAMA DIVERTED THE BLOCKED SARASWATI GLACIAL MOUTH TO GANGES ..<br />\n<br />\nBALARAMA ARRIVED BACK IN TIME TO WITNESS THE LAST FIGHT BETWEEN DURYODHANA AND BHIMA IN A STAGNANT POOL OF SARASWATI..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN BHIHMA HIT DURYODHANA ON HIS THIGH WITH HIS MACE AGAINST THE RULES OF WAR- HE ATTACKED BHIMA WITH HIS GIANT PLOUGH ( USED AS A LEVER FOR DIVERTING THE SARASWATI RIVER ) , BUT HIS BROTHER KRISHNA STOPPED HIM..<br />\n<br />\nYUDDHISTRA MOCKED DURYODHANA OF HIDING IN THE POOL OF WATER ( STAGNANT POOL OF SARASWATI RIVER )<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE:After doing, in vain, all he could to rally his defeated army, Duryodhana, left almost alone, took up his mace and walked towards a pool of water. His whole frame was burning like fire, and water attracted him. \"The wise Vidura knew what would happen and he told us,\" he said to himself, as he entered the water.<br />\n<br />\nOf what avail is wisdom that comes too late? What has been done must produce its result that has to be suffered. That is the law. Yudhishthira and his brothers arrived there in relentless, pursuit of their great enemy.<br />\n<br />\n\"Duryodhana!\" exclaimed Yudhishthira, \"after destroying family and tribe, would you yourself escape death by concealing yourself in this pond? Where is your pride now? Have you no shame? Come up and fight. A kshatriya by birth, do you shrink battle and death?\"<br />\n<br />\nStung to the quick by these words, Duryodhana replied with dignity: \"I have not come here, Dharmaputra, a fugitive for my life. It was not fear that brought me here. I stepped into the water to cool the fire that is raging within me. I neither fear death nor wish to live, but why should I fight? The earth has now nothing left that I came to fight for! All those who stood by me have been slain. My desire for kingdom is gone. I leave the world to you without a rival. Enjoy it in undisputed sovereignty.\"<br />\n<br />\nUNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nTHIS ANCIENT TEXT PENNED BY MAHARISHI VYASA 6000 YEARS AGO DOES NOT LIE..<br />\n<br />\nMANUSMRITI ( 8200 BC ) TALKS ABOUT THE VEDAS - VEDAS DONT TALK ABOUT MANU..<br />\n<br />\nRIG VEDA ( ORAL ROUTE FOR 330 CENTURIES BEFORE IT WAS PENNED DOWN 70 CENTURIES AGO ) TALK ABOUT SARASWATI RIVER --AS A MIGHTY FLOWING RIVER .. IT DOES NOT TALK ABOUT GANGES..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/mother-of-all-civilisations-saraswati.html<br />\n<br />\nWIKIPEDIA SAYS RIG VEDA WAS PENNED DOWN IN 1000 BC..<br />\n<br />\nIF SO WHY DOES RIG VEDA TALK ABOUT A MIGHTY FLOWING RIVER SARASWATI ?<br />\n<br />\nBATAO NAAH .<br />\n<br />\nPLEAJJE ..<br />\n<br />\nTEE HEEEEEE<br />\n<br />\nKOSHER LIES WONT WORK..<br />\n<br />\nAND BY THE WAY--<br />\n<br />\nOLDER THAN HAMMURABI LAWS URUKAGINA LAWS AND URNAMMU LAWS WERE ALL COOKED UP BY THE WHITE HISTORIANS.. THEY NEVER EXISTED ..<br />\n<br />\nFUCKIN' CUNTS !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c7601260199555642232\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. THE WAY THE KOSHER DEEP STATE WANTS ..<br />\n<br />\nANYBODY BODY RUNNING DOWN THE WATAN MUST BE SLAPPED WITH SEDITION CHARGES..<br />\n<br />\nCONSTITUTIONAL PATRIOTISM IS AKIN TO PATRIOTISM TO \"MAOs RED BOOK\" OR THE \"KORAN\"..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS WHY INDIAN COMMIE SUPPORTED CHINA DURING THE 1962 WAR..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS WHY DURING INDO-PAK WARS MANY MUSLIMS SUPPORTED PAKISTAN AGAINST THEIR OWN WATAN..<br />\n<br />\nWE HAVE SOLIS AND FALIS , LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES , THE DESH DROHI PERCEPTION MOLDERS WHO COME ON TV, THE JUDAS BENAMI MEDIA, THE FOREIGN PAYROLL MPs IN RAJYA SABHA ETC GIVING AN EVIL SPIN TO THE WORD SEDITION......<br />\n<br />\nWHEN SOMEONE ABUSES THE WATAN AND CALLS FOR DISMEMBERMENT OF BHARATMATA , IT IS SEDITION. ....<br />\n<br />\nTHE PUNISHMENT IS DEATH .....<br />\n<br />\nABUSING A RULER ON A THRONE ( EXAMPLE ELECTED LEADER PM MODI ) OR ANY MORTAL IS NOT SEDITION.....<br />\n<br />\nWHAT HAPPENED IN JNU IS SEDITION . BHARAT TERE TUKDE HONGE ,, BHARAT TERE BARBAADI TAK JUNG RAHENGE ,,, SLOGANS RAISED BY COMMIE STUDENTS ( INSTIGATED BY COMMIE JNU PROFESSORS ) IS SEDITION....<br />\n<br />\nAFTER WW2 JEW ROTHSCHILD ENSURED THAT ALL NATIONS LEADERS SWEAR OATHS TO THE PROTECT THE CONSTITUTION... HOWEVER IN HIS OWN LAND ISRAEL ALL LEADERS SWEAR OATHS TO PROTECT THE WATAN..<br />\n<br />\nEVERY TIME OUR UNIFORMED MEN RISK THEIR LIVES AND ARREST TERRORISTS , NAXALS AND SEPARATISTS - - OUR DEEP STATE CONTROLLED COLLEGIUM MELORDS WHO ARE AFRAID OF JEW NOAM CHOMSKY SAVE THEM . .<br />\n<br />\nSOLI SORABJEE AND SANJAY HEGDE KEEPS GIVING UNSOLICITED INFORMATION GHADI GHADI THAT SEDITION LAWS CAN BE APPLIED ONLY IF THIS RESULTS IN VIOLENCE.......<br />\n<br />\nSORRY -- WE THE PEOPLE WILL NOT ACCEPT THIS.........<br />\n<br />\nIN INDIA MOST OF THE VIOLENCE IS TRIGGERED BY TROJAN HORSE FOREIGN FUNDED NGOs CONTROLLED BY THE BENAMI MEDIA...<br />\n<br />\nWE CAN SEE THE NEXUS BETWEEN JEW ROTHSCHILDs MEDIA AND JUDICIARY IN USA -- DONALD TRUMP HAS FOUND THIS OUT.... Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/mistakes-deliberate-or-inadvertant-in_7.html?showComment=1549706846629#c1254707001845320582\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 9, 2019 at 3:37 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nTHIS BLOGSITE WARNS NGT...<br />\n<br />\nDO NOT BE A PUPPET OF THE KOSHER DEEP STATE...<br />\n<br />\nGET YOU ACT TOGETHER ..<br />\n<br />\nGET RID OF ALL USELESS DERELICT \"LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES\u201d IN NGT... WEED OUT FOREIGN PAYROLL STOOGES FROM NGT..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">NGT MUST KNOW THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN SMOKE AND DUST .. EVEN A RETARDED CHILD CAN FIGURE THIS OUT\u2026<br /><br />STOP KILLING INDIAs AGRICULTURE BY PUTTING A BAN ON CROP STUBBLE BURNING..<br /><br />THIS HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH SMOG IN DELHI..</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">THE SMOG IN DELHI IS DUE TO TEMPERATURE INVERSION --AND IT HAPPENS ONLY IN COLD MONTHS..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nDELHI IS AN UNSUITABLE PLACE FOR A HUGE CITY, ESPECIALLY A NATIONs CAPITAL..<br />\n<br />\nINSTEAD ON RELYING ON THE JEALOUS WHITE MAN-- INDIA MUST DO OUR OWN STUDIES USING OUR OWN SATELLITES ABOUT FINE DUST WHICH BLOWS FROM THE FAR AWAY ARABIAN DESERTS TOWARDS INDIA EVERY YEAR..<br />\n<br />\nTHESE DUST WAVES ARE DEPOSITED ON SHIPS DECKS AT SEA ..<br />\n<br />\nAFTER COMMANDING SHIPS FOR 3 DECADES I KNOW WHEN MY SHIPS DECKS GET COATED WITH FINE DUST IN THE NORTHERN ARABIAN SEA..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH SMOKE FROM BURNT CROP STUBBLE IN PUNJAB ..<br />\n<br />\nINDIA HAS BEEN DOING CROP STUBBLE BURNING FOR MORE THAN 200 CENTURIES.<br />\n<br />\nFARMERS DONT BURN HARVESTED CROP STUBBLE EVERY DAY ( TO PRODUCE BIOCHAR ) -- JUST LIKE DIWALI IS NOT CELEBRATED EVERY DAY\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nDO NOT ALLOW FOREIGN FUNDED NGOs, COLLEGIUM JUDGES, NGT INTERFERE WITH FARMERS PRODUCE OF FOOD\u2026. WARNING---- MODI GOVT -- BE VERY VERY CAREFUL\u2026\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIF THERE IS SMOG IN DELHI-- SHIFT THE CAPITAL.. \u2026 DELHI HAS A TEMPERATURE INVERSION PROBLEM.. AND THIS CREATES SMOG ..........<br />\n<br />\nBHARATMATA IS MARCHING TO BE THIS PLANETs NO 1 SUPERPOWER IN 15 YEARS\u2026.. THERE ARE DESH DROHI ORGS IN THE PAYROLL OF BILDERBERG CLUB TO MAKE BHARATMATA TRIP AND FALL\u2026. INDIA MUST BE FOOD SECURE..<br />\n<br />\nWE CANT EVEN WIDEN ROADS DUE TO BILDERBERG CONTROLLED NGT, WHO CRY FOUL WHEN A USELESS ROADSIDE TREE IS CUT DOWN...........<br />\n<br />\nFARMERS WHO DO NOT PRODUCE FOOD , BUT PRODUCE NON EDIBLES LIKE RUBBER, COTTON ETC SHOULD NOT BE PROTECTED...<br />\n<br />\nTHESE RICH CASH CROP PRODUCERS DRIVE HUMMERS AND MERCEDES SUVs AND PAY NO TAX USING A LOOPHOLE ........... THEY MUST PAY TAX LIKE THE REST OF INDIA...<br />\n<br />\nONLY FOOD PRODUCING FARMERS AT SOURCE ( NOT MIDDLE MEN/ BROKERS ) MUST BE SPONSORED......<br />\n<br />\nAS LONG AS INDIA IS SELF SUFFICIENT IN FOOD, DESPITE MONSOON FAILURES FOR THREE CONSECUTIVE YEARS , NOBODY CAN STOP BHARATMATAs MARCH TO BE THIS PLANETs NO 1 SUPERPOWER IN 15 YEARS \u2026<br />\n<br />\nIndians were to first on the planet to do agriculture. ..We taught the rest of the planet about the magic of BIOCHAR \u2026 Biochar has the ability to sequester carbon out of the atmosphere and back into the ground ...<br />\n<br />\nTall grasses burn quick and hot, however, close to the ground where the roots start, air is excluded so the base of the grasses will pyrolyze and not burn\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCarbon is the most essential element of soil fertility. When organic matter is added to agricultural soils to increase carbon levels, most of it rapidly decomposes to carbon dioxide and escapes to the atmosphere... Only a very small percentage eventually becomes stable humic matter...<br />\n<br />\nHumification takes decades to centuries..The process creates a fine-grained, highly porous charcoal that helps soils retain nutrients and water\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nBiochar serves as an electron buffer for redox reactions and helps bacteria swap electrons among themselves, improving their metabolic efficiency as a microbial community.. ..With its pores and its electrical charges, biochar is capable of both aBsorption and aDsorption.. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe surfaces of biochar, both internal and external, aDsorb materials by electro-chemical bonds, working like an electric sponge...Biochar surfaces adsorb carbon and retain it in compounds with minerals, supporting at the same time a large microbial community that potentially makes more efficient use of organic debris containing carbon and other nutrients...<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Biochar lasts at least ten times longer in most soils....<br />\n<br />\nBiochar is effective at retaining nitrogen in soils and there is NO need for CHEMICAL UREA...The desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has left us with a rapidly deteriorating climate, and soils that are dying and eroding....<br />\n<br />\nBiochar, as a form of recalcitrant carbon, is the medicine that DELIBERETELY degraded and unproductive Indian top soils need....<br />\n<br />\nIndia was blessed with HUMUS laden topsoil with healthy microbes and earthworms for millions of years....<br />\n<br />\nJust 55 years of desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has decimated our holy topsoil...<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS THE ONLY INTELLIGENT WAY TO PREVENT FARMER SUICIDES...<br />\n<br />\nThe desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has caused our holy topsoil to lose 80% of their original soil organic carbon (SOC) pool...<br />\n<br />\n90% of our lakes have disappeared due to artificial nitro fertIliser overuse. ..<br />\n<br />\nALL THIS HAS BEEN SENT TO PMO MORE THAN 50 TIMES... CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WILL NOT ALLOW HIM.</span></b>.&nbsp;</div>\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THIS POST MUST BE READ IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE POST BELOW\u2014</b><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/poland-katowice-cop-24-global-warming.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/poland-katowice-cop-24-global-warming.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; clear: both; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/UuGrBhK2c7U/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/UuGrBhK2c7U?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Getting back-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The AMOC is complex system where warmer and colder waters interact and create a continuous circulation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation, or AMOC, is a conveyor belt that brings surface water northward in the Atlantic; from there, the heavier salty water sinks and returns at depth from the Labrador and Nordic seas, near the North Pole, all the way south to the Southern Ocean.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">In the North Atlantic, the saltier water from the tropics sinks almost a mile (1,500 meters). As it does, it carries heat down with it away from the surface. Increasing amounts of fresh water flowing into the waters around Greenland have led to a dilution of these waters, making them lighter and thus hindering the formation of the deep water circulation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Changes in the strength of the AMOC affect how much heat leaves our atmosphere<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The AMOC is a key component of the Earth\u2019s climate system and redistributes heat from the tropics to the polar region across the Atlantic Ocean. As the system of ocean currents slows down, it transports less heat northward, resulting in changes to ocean surface temperatures..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\">Given the importance of the AMOC to heat exchange between the ocean and the atmosphere, the varying strength of this system has major impacts on the global climate, and has been implicated widely in some of the most remarkable and abrupt climate changes of the past.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\">Direct measurements of the modern AMOC flow rates show a marked decline in its strength in the past 2 decades..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\">Slowdown in the AMOC is a direct &nbsp;response to warming caused by anthropogenic greenhouse-gas emissions by the methane laden Gulf Stream.</span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/NthIpxsxvjI/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/NthIpxsxvjI?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Qob1jN56qmc/XF_dnVuE7tI/AAAAAAABfw4/95rEv-GQJWIFEDMmCGkxkfEXbVVQ1R01QCLcBGAs/s1600/dWWWownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"183\" data-original-width=\"275\" height=\"425\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Qob1jN56qmc/XF_dnVuE7tI/AAAAAAABfw4/95rEv-GQJWIFEDMmCGkxkfEXbVVQ1R01QCLcBGAs/s640/dWWWownload.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">I\nWAS THE ONLY PERSON ON THE INTERNET TO WARN DONALD TRUMP THAT HURRICANE FLORENCE&nbsp;WILL DERIVE MASSIVE ENERGY ( INSTANT OCTANE SHOT ) FROM THE WARMER\nTHAN USUAL ( SINCE MAN CAME ON PLANET EARTH ) GULF STREAM ,&nbsp; BY SLOWING DOWN TO A\nCRAWL AND INCREASING ITS INTENSITY .&nbsp; </span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; But\nthen it picked up intensity to Cat 4 ( 225 km per hour winds- 938 mb pressue ) in\ntwo days flat.. </span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nearly unimaginable\nlevels of flash and river flooding have left vast stretches of land temporarily\nuninhabitable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7zESBTZwqkA/XF_dEmk_EHI/AAAAAAABfws/Vo3Vipn_7IkMcfJIj8i6NMaRGB6DY680ACLcBGAs/s1600/800px-Hurricane_DFlorence_rainfall.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Flowing off the coast,\nthe Gulf Stream is a roughly 50-mile wide river in the sea that carries vast\namounts of heat energy from the tropics into the northern Atlantic. The current\ncarries the equivalent heat energy of a 1.1 million nuclear power plants.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Guargum, extracted from\nguarseed, is used as an emulsifer in the hydraulic fracturing technique used in\nshale gas and oil exploration in the US, which accounts for about more than 60\nper cent of India\u2019s exports. Norway, China, Germany and Russia are the other\nmajor buyers. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Drilling companies use\nit to thicken water that is mixed with sand and pumped through shale rock\ncracks to extract gas. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As chairman of the 1972 Earth Day UN Stockholm Conference, Maurice\nStrong promoted an agenda of population reduction to \u201csave the environment.\u201d Maurice\nStrong was named Assistant Secretary General of the United Nations, and Chief\nPolicy Advisor to Kofi Annan. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1992, now allied\nwith the IPCC, Strong pulled off his greatest coup when he set up another new\nbody, the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC), to stage that\ncolossal \u201cEarth Summit\u201d over which he presided in Rio, arranging for it to be\nattended not only by 108 world leaders and 100,000 others but also by 20,000\nUN-funded \u201cgreen activists\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was the key\narchitect of the 1997-2005 Kyoto Protocol that declared manmade Global Warming,\naccording to \u201cconsensus,\u201d was real and that it was \u201cextremely likely\u201d that\nman-made CO2 emissions have predominantly caused it.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1988 Strong was key in\ncreation of the UN IPCC and later the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change\nat the Rio Earth Summit which he chaired, and which approved his globalist UN\nAgenda 21. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
