font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;calibri&quot; , sans-serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Methane is a colorless,\nodorless, combustible gas produced by bacterial decomposition of plant and\nanimal matter. It forms in a process shared by all fossil fuels. First, marine\nplants and animals die and fall to the seafloor.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Next, mud and other seafloor\nsediments cover the decomposing organisms. The sediments put a great deal of\npressure on the organic matter and begin to compress it. This compression,\ncombined with high temperatures, breaks down the carbon bonds in the organic\nmatter, transforming it into oil and natural gas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Generally, this methane\n-- what geologists describe as \"conventional\" methane -- is located\nbeneath the Earth's surface. To get to it, workers must drill through rock and\nsediment and tap into the methane deposits to release the gas. Then they pump\nit to the surface, where it's transported through pipes across the country.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Methane can also form\nunconventionally if the sediments producing it are located about 1,640 feet\n(500 meters) below the ocean surface. The near-freezing temperatures and high\npressure of these conditions causes the methane to become encased in ice.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nmethane doesn't bond chemically with the water. Instead, each tetrahedral\nmethane molecule sits inside a crystalline shell made of ice. This unique\nsubstance is known as methane hydrate, and as soon as it reaches warmer\ntemperatures and lower pressures, the ice melts away, leaving behind pure\nmethane.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Methane hydrate is a\nclathrate, a chemical substance made of one compound nested inside another. The\nword comes from the Latin clatratus, meaning \"bars\" or\n\"lattice.\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One compound serves as\na host, the other as a guest. In the case of methane hydrate, water is the host\nand methane is the guest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>MANY FOREST FIRES ARE\nTRIGGERED BY METHANE.. THIS IS KEPT AS A KOSHER SECRET<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">BELOW: FRICTION OF RUBBING TREES AND METHANE IS THE REASON FOR THIS FOREST FIRE IN UNINHABITED ICE LANDS</b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/9nmm_7ozlvw/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/9nmm_7ozlvw?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%;\"><b>Those METHANE triggered fires all release CARBON DIOXIDE\ninto the atmosphere, creating a dangerous feedback loop of increasing\ntemperatures and worsening wildfire conditions.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\">MODI HAS BEEN MADE CHAMPION OF EARTH SO THAT HE CAN \u201cADMIT\u201d\nINDIA RELEASED ALL THIS CO2 BY BURNING COAL..<o:p></o:p></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\">THERE WILL BE REWARDS FOR MOTHBALLING INDIAN COAL \u2014&nbsp; A NOBEL PRIZE IS IN LINE !</b><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-0qhbhNIGzWg/XGFrWcyvL7I/AAAAAAABf0Q/b953vrjykUEaPvzdh_NkUAFAlNSHiC5uACLcBGAs/s1600/FGHJslide_7.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"720\" data-original-width=\"960\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-0qhbhNIGzWg/XGFrWcyvL7I/AAAAAAABf0Q/b953vrjykUEaPvzdh_NkUAFAlNSHiC5uACLcBGAs/s640/FGHJslide_7.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_rZk-7oLv7Q/XGFrfMxxi3I/AAAAAAABf0U/XADnw3ZIfQoieiwTbW784NdxE_kbUDLOwCLcBGAs/s1600/dFGHownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"194\" data-original-width=\"259\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_rZk-7oLv7Q/XGFrfMxxi3I/AAAAAAABf0U/XADnw3ZIfQoieiwTbW784NdxE_kbUDLOwCLcBGAs/s400/dFGHownload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QbfnjAaMUB4/XGFsIGEtSnI/AAAAAAABf0g/RDRr2WckQK00-NHQOuGoSWxvBE4b7dflACLcBGAs/s1600/advances-automobile-enFFgineering-functionality-catalytic-converter-5-151-g003.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"360\" data-original-width=\"801\" height=\"286\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QbfnjAaMUB4/XGFsIGEtSnI/AAAAAAABf0g/RDRr2WckQK00-NHQOuGoSWxvBE4b7dflACLcBGAs/s640/advances-automobile-enFFgineering-functionality-catalytic-converter-5-151-g003.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An approach for\nutilizing the chemical energy contained in the carbon\u2013hydrogen bonds of methane\nwithout the co-production of CO2 in the combustion process, described by the\nreaction equation:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CH4 + 2O2 \u2192 CO2 + 2H2O<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">is through pyrolysis,\nnamely the thermal treatment of methane in the absence of oxygen, described by\nthe reaction equation:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CH4 \u2192 C + 2H2<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\u2019s time to\ndecarbonise methane into a fuel by converting it to solid carbon and gaseous\nhydrogen without producing carbon dioxide. Artwork courtesy of Chenxi Qian.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The product of this\npyrolysis is solid carbon and gaseous hydrogen but no CO2.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Combustion of methane\nis a highly exothermic process generating heat whilst pyrolysis of methane is\nhighly endothermic requiring the input of heat. Pyrolysis of methane is an\nequilibrium reaction, which begins to produce carbon and hydrogen around 300\u00b0C\nand goes to completion around 1000\u00b0C according to the above equation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE CUNTS WHO ARE\nBRANDING CO2 AS A BAAAAD GAS ARE DECARBONISING METHANE BY CONVERTING IT TO SOLID\nCARBON AND GASEOUS HYDROGEN WITHOUT PRODUCING CARBON DIOXIDE.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THESE CUNTS HAVE BRANDED GOOD GAS CO2 AS WORSE THAN TOXIC CARBON MONOXIDE..</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>THIS CARBON IS NANO\nCARBON WHICH INVADES THE BLOOD BRAIN BARRIER.. GOD HAS NOT DESIGNED THE HUMAN\nBODY TO WITHSTAND NANO CARBON..<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>CNG vehicles emit NANO\nCARBON and poisonous CARBON MONOXIDE.</b></span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; OF YOUTUE VIDEO </span><span style=\"color: red;\">) WHO REMOVED SHRADDHA FROM BHAGAWAD GITA AND INSERTED BHAKTI.</span></b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">PRABHUPADA IS A FAKE AVATAR OF FAKE CHAITANYA MAHAPRABHU OF ROTHSCHILDs FAKE BHAKTI MOVEMENT..&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">OF COURSE FAKE CHAITANYA MAHAPRABHU COOKED UP AND BACKDATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD IS AN AVATAR OF KRISHNA AND FAKE RADHA ( 2 IN 1 )&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/kg2TaDmLt2o/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/kg2TaDmLt2o?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 11, 2019 at 5:44 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nPrabhupada, free food for schools is corporate social responsibility(CSR). I think background idols and personality prominence is just branding and long term loyalty cultivation program. I wonder if it can be called the semiticization of Indic thought and action modules. From internet I learn, at least in USA, super rich only allocate 5% of wealth to CSR, while 95% is for theirs to keep. Not surprising since big people also blessed this world with charity balls. Very different from the ones Captain emphasizes with exclamation marks. I don't understand the concept of doing things that impoverish large segments and then pine and yearn for les miserables - that too by dressing, drinking, dancing, and partying so as to raise awareness, collect funds, and do charity.I always wondered what kind of effect these parties had on partiers? Do they untwist minds? Do they tug at the heart strings? Do they reach the conscience? Reminds me of Angelina Jolie - Clive Owen movie. He walks into party with stereotypical starving African in his arms creating a scene. She joins aid giving NGO, feminist romance angle or something along those lines.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c733353029915384706-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c733353029915384706-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c5133203845375370651\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c2575079372169941915\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/america-caused-global-warming-with_9.html?showComment=1549781761439#c2575079372169941915\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 10, 2019 at 12:26 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ruchir_Sharma<br />\n<br />\nDATE : 10TH FEB 2019<br />\nTIME: 1130 IST<br />\nTV CHANNEL: INDIA TODAY<br />\nPROGRAMME: JAB WE MET<br />\n<br />\nI WATCHED RAHUL KANWAL AND RUCHIR SHARMA HAVING A TETE E TETE.<br />\n<br />\nRUCHIR SHARMA WORE SPIKES AND RAN A 100 METRES SPRINT TO SHOW HE IS FIT.<br />\n<br />\nHE CLAIMED TO HAVE WORN INDIAN JERSEY -- AND HIS BEST TIME IN 100 METRES SPRINT WAS 11.5 SECONDS- HE IS A VERY TALL MAN..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN I WAS IN 9TH STANDARD , I REPRESENTED MY SCHOOL IN THE 200 METRES SPRINT AT THE INTER DISTRICT ATHLETIC CHAMPIONSHIP AT CALICUT.<br />\n<br />\nMY CLASS MATE KP ASHOK ( GUESS HE WAS THREE YEARS OLDER THAN ME ) RAN THE 100 METRES IN 11.2 SECONDS FLAT IN THE SENIOR DIVISION..<br />\n<br />\nI RAN IN THE INTERMEDIATE DIVISION --I WAS A BARE FOOT RUNNER. I RAN THE HEATS BAREFOOT.<br />\n<br />\nJUST 20 MINUTES BEFORE THE FINAL KP ASHOK CAME TO ME AND OFFERED HIS SPIKES ( TOO LARGE FOR MY FEET ) AND HIS STARTER BLOCK.<br />\n<br />\nI HAD NEVER RUN IN SPIKES BEFORE AND NEVER USED A STARTER BLOCK..<br />\n<br />\nI TOLD HIM I CANT WIN THE GOLD AS AN ADIVASI BOY FROM SOME WAYANAD SCHOOL LOOKED TO BE EIGHT YEARS OLDER THAN ME AND HIS MUSCULAR THIGHS WERE TWICE THE SIZE OF MINE .. ( FUDGING AGE AS TRIBALS START SCHOOLING VERY LATE )..<br />\n<br />\nANYWAYS KP ASHOK CONVINCED ME -THAT I WILL GET SOME ADVANTAGE . SO I WORE THE SPIKED AND USED THE STARTER..<br />\n<br />\nI GOT THE BRONZE..<br />\n<br />\nAFTER THE EVENT I GOT BAMBOOED BY THE TEAM LEADER FOR THROWING AWAY THE SILVER MEDAL BY WEARING SHOES TWO SIZES TOO LARGE .. AND I FUCKED UP THE START AS MY TAKE OFF LEG WAS LEFT ( OPPOSITE TO THE STARTER )..<br />\n<br />\nGETTING BACK TO RUCHIR SHARMAs DIALOGUES WITH RAHUL KANWAL ON ECONOMICS..<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS LIKE TWO BLIND MEN DESCRIBING THE BEAUTY OF A WATERFALL..<br />\n<br />\nRUCHIR SHARMAs AGENDA WAS TO ESTABLISH THAT A COALITION GOVT (READ AS MAHA GADBANDHAN ) IN THE NEXT ELECTIONS WOULD NOT HAMPER INDIAN ECONOMIC GROWTH STORY..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN RUCHIR SHARMA SPOKE TO PRANNOY JAMES ROY IN JUNE END 2016 HE HAD RIDICULED MODI OF HIKING UP THE GROWTH RATE .. RUCHIR SHARMA SAID INDIA IS GROWING AT 5% ACTUALLY--WHEN CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL SAID THAT THE GROWTH WAS 10.1 %.<br />\n<br />\nBASTARDS LIKE RUCHIR SHARMA , RAGHURAN RAJAN , PRANNOY ROY, AROON PURIE EXIST TO SHOWCASE INDIA AS A BEGGAR NATION..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/america-caused-global-warming-with_9.html?showComment=1549859021664#c2427155852279340282\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 11, 2019 at 9:53 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/judging-under-stress-in-digital-era-sc-judge/articleshow/67934852.cms<br />\n<br />\nHULLO MELORD JUSTICE SIKRI-<br />\n<br />\nDONT GET DESPONDENT , WE ARE ALL IN THIS TOGETHER !!...<br />\n<br />\nLET ME EXPLAIN BASICS..<br />\n<br />\nALL THE JUDICIARY IS ALLOWED TO DO AS PER THE CONSTITUTION IS TO INTERPRET THE LAWS WITHIN THE CONSTITUTION .. PERIOD !..<br />\n<br />\nSTARE DECISIS IS NOT ALLOWED --WHERE PAST RULINGS OF STUPID JUDGES UNDER THE MINDLESS SYSTEM OF \"JUSTICE IS BLIND SANS CONTEXT \" IS ATTACHED AS AN ADDENDUM-- NAY-- LANGOT TO THE CONSTITUTION..<br />\n<br />\nNOW--<br />\n<br />\nTRY TO THINK IN AN INTELLIGENT MANNER..<br />\n<br />\nABOVE THE CONSTITUTION LIES --<br />\n<br />\n1) WE THE PEOPLE<br />\n2) THE WATAN<br />\n3) DHARMA OR NATURAL JUSTICE..<br />\n<br />\nOUR JUDICIARY IS IN CONTEMPT OF--<br />\n<br />\n1) WE THE PEOPLE<br />\nEXAMPLE: AAA-IF YOU HOLD A REFERENDUM ON ADULTERY 99.9% WILL REJECT IT.. IF PUT TO VOTE IN THE PARLIAMENT 90% ( LEAVE OUT FOREIGN PARYROLL MPs ) WILL REJECT IT..<br />\n<br />\nBBB- AT SABARIMALA , JUDGES TRAMPLED ON 5900 YEAR OLD CULTURE..<br />\n<br />\nhttps://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/11/5900-year-old-sabarimala-this-planets.html<br />\n<br />\n2) THE WATAN..<br />\nTHE RED CORRIDOR WAS CREATED BY THE JUDICIARY IS 3 DECADES FLAT.. JUDGES DO NOT REALISE THAT THE CONSTITUTION IS ONLY TO PROTECT LAWFUL ABIDING DESH BHAKT CITIZENS -- NOT TO PROTECT DESH DROHIS ( INDIAN / FOREIGN ) HOLDING FOREIGN GUNS OR THE FOREIGN FUNDED THINKERS WHO CONTROL THEM..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/09/bauxite-mining-naxalite-menace-joshua.html<br />\n<br />\n3) DHARMA OR NATURAL JUSTICE--<br />\nJUDGES MUST NOT ENFORCE THE LAW AT THE EXPENSE OF JUSTICE ( FAIRNESS )..JUSTICE CAN NEVER BE BLIND SANS CONTEXT .. JUSTICE MUST BE SUBJECTIVE NOT OBJECTIVE.. JEW ROTHSCHILD WHO RULED INDIA WANTED ONLY OBJECTIVE JUSTICE AS HE WAS RULING OVER SLAVES..<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS JEW ROTHSCHILD WHO CREATED THE LEGEND THAT LADY JUSTICE IS BLIND..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS WAS TO SHOW THAT THE CROWN PRINCE AND A OLD DYING LEPER ON THE STREET WILL GET SAME IMPARTIAL JUSTICE..<br />\n<br />\nIN DUE COURSE THIS FINE CONCEPT WAS HIJACKED IN A CUNNING MANNER TO A FOUL \u201c CRIME IS CRIME.. WE THE MASTERS OF SLAVE INDIANS DON\u2019T CARE WHY THEY DID A CRIME \u201d\u2014 MIND YOU, IT COULD BE FOR SHEER SURVIVAL OR TO BREAK CHAINS OF ABJECT SLAVERY ..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nFINALLY--<br />\n<br />\n4) JUDGES ARE IN CONTEMPT OF THE CONSTITUTION ITSELF ...<br />\n<br />\nCOLLEGIUM JUDICIARY IS NOT ALLOWED BY THE CONSTITUTION.. JUDGES CANNOT MAKE AND BREAK LAWS FOR THE WHOLE NATION VIA PIL ROUTE , FILED BY FOREIGN PAYROLL DESH DROHIS..<br />\n<br />\nPEOPLE HAVE WOKEN UP.. EVEN A 12 YEAR OLD CLASS TOPPER SCHOOL BOY CAN DOWNLOAD THE INDIAN CONSTITUTION AND INTERPRET IT ( APPLYING BODMAS ) BETTER THAN ANY JUDGE IN INDIA.. WE WANT THE CONSTITUTION TO BE PART OF THE SCHOOL SYLLABUS..<br />\n<br />\nWE THE PEOPLE WANT THE DEEP STATE CONTROLLED OPAQUE JUDICIAL SYSTEM TO BE BROKEN DOWN AND BUILT FROM SCRATCH..<br />\n<br />\nREAD ALL 8 PARTS OF THE UNFINISHED BLOG SERIES BELOW ( ONLY 32% COMPLETE )..<br />\n<br />\nhttps://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/justice-be-damned-enforce-law-not-any.html<br />\n<br />\nREMEMBER IT IS PENNED BY A RESPONSIBLE SHIP CAPTAIN WHO COMMANDED SHIPS FOR 30 YEARS ..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS DESH BHAKT AND INTELLIGENT CAPTAIN ( YOURS TRULY ) HAS NO INTENTIONS OF WRITING SOMETHING IN THE BALANCE UNWRITTEN 68% WHICH WILL PERMANENTLY ERODE THE TRUST OF THE PEOPLE IN OUR JUDICIARY AND OUR CONSTITUTION..<br />\n<br />\nWE ARE ALL IN THIS TOGETHER...<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK THE JUDICIARY NOT TO DESTROY INDIA.. BE LOYAL TO THE WATAN.. THE RED CORRIDOR HAS DONE ENOUGH DAMAGE TO BHARATMATA..<br />\n<br />\nBHARATMATA ( WHO WAS IN CHAIN FOR 800 YEARS ) IS NOW FREE AND IS RACING TO BE THIS PLANETs NO 1 SUPERPOWER IN 15 YEARS FLAT...THE WHITE JEW OF THE DEEP STATE WILL NEVER ALLOW THIS TO HAPPEN .. AND HE IS USING THE JUDICIARY AS A TOOL..<br />\n<br />\nHOMOSEXUALITY / ADULTERY LOVING FAYE DSOUZA KEEPS REPEATING \" YOU FIRST \" ( NAXALS/ TRAITORS ) --WHEN IT SHOULD BE \" OUR WATAN FIRST \"..<br />\n<br />\nWHY DOES A BLOGGER HAVE TO TELL ALL THIS ? ..<br />\n<br />\nWE THE PEOPLE WILL NOT ALLOW \"CONSTITUTIONAL PATRIOTISM \" ( MAOs RED BOOK TYPE ) WHICH CAUSED INDIAN COMMIE TO SUPPORT CHINA IN THE 1962 WAR .. WE WILL ALLOW ONLY \"PATRIOTISM TO THE WATAN\"..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c2427155852279340282-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c2427155852279340282-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c6027484805866625681\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c6026258490222768535\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/mistakes-deliberate-or-inadvertant-in_7.html?showComment=1549719203439#c6026258490222768535\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 9, 2019 at 7:03 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SOMEBODY ASKED ME--</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHAT WAS THE NEED FOR JEW ROTHSCHILD TO CREATE THOUSANDS OF FAKE HINDU MUTTS AND SOAK OUR PURANAS WITH SEMEN ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WAS HE MAD ?..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/mistakes-deliberate-or-inadvertant-in_7.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LISTEN --</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN INDIA AND CHINA HAD A WAR IN 1962 INDIAN COMMIES SUPPORTED CHINA.. WHAT COULD BE WORSE ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">TO CONQUER A NATION, FIRST YOU HAVE TO MAKE IT IMPLODE FROM WITHIN.. FIRST LOWER THE MORALE OF THE PEOPLE .. MAKE PEOPLE SELF LOATHING..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IT IS EASY FOR SINGLE MESSIAH/ SINGLE HOLY BOOK RELIGIONS TO BRAINWASH PEOPLE BY MAKING THEM FANATICS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS IS A TRUE INCIDENT--</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A RUSTIC SARDARJEE FROM SOME REMOTE TARN TARAN TYPE VILLAGE WENT TO CHANDIGARH TO BUY SOMETHING .. HE GOT OFF THE BUS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">INSIDE THE CITY , HE WAS FOOT SLOGGING AS HE DID NOT HAVE MONEY FOR A TAXI ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HE ASKED A BUNCH OF NAUGHTY SCHOOL CHILDREN THE WAY TO THE SHOP HE WANTED TO GO TO..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THEY GAVE HIM WRONG DIRECTIONS ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE SAME CHILDREN THEN RAN AND SAT AT THE NEW DESTINATION AWAITING THE SARDARJEE .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE RUSTIC GULLIBLE SARDARJEE ASKED THE SAME CHILDREN THE SAME QUESTION</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE NAUGHTY CHILDREN DID THE SAME -- GAVE HIM NEW FALSE INSTRUCTIONS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IT HAPPENED AGAIN AND AGAIN AND FINALLY THE NAIVE SARDARJEE ARRIVED AT THE SAME PLACE WHERE HE FIRST MET THE PRANKSTER CHILDREN ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THEY HID BEHIND A WALL AND WERE WATCHING HIM MERRILY \u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">POOR SARDARJEE REALISED THAT HE WAS BACK AT SQUARE ONE .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HE WAS TIRED AND FRUSTRATED AND HE WAS A BIT FRIGHTENED AS IT WAS GETTING DARK..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AT THAT TIME , A MUNCIPALITY WORKER ARRIVED WITH A LARGE SPANNER, TO RELEASE WATER BY OPENING A WHEELLESS VALVE ( WATER RATIONING ) ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AS HE WAS TURNING IT THE SARDARJEE GOT TERRIBLY ANGRY, RAN TO HIM AND STARTED BEATING HIM UP .. CRYING</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">\" MAIN SUBEH SEH PRESHAAANN HOON, SAALA MERE KOH TU CHOOTIYA BANAH RAHE HOH, TU RASTA GHUMAAH RAHE HOH ? \"</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS IS THE EFFECT OF TOO MUCH BLIND FAITH..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN GURU NANAK WENT TO MECCA-- HE WAS SLEEPING BEFORE HE WENT TO THE KAABA..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ONE RUFFIAN ISLAMIC MULLAH GANG WITH SWORDS ACCUSED HIM OF SLEEPING WITH LEGS TOWARDS THE KAABA AND DISRESPECTING ALLAH ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SO GURU NANAK TOLD THEM-- PLEASE HOLD MY FEET AND TURN IT IN ANY DIRECTION WHERE KAABA DOES NOT EXIST.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SO THE MUSLIM GANG KEEP GHUMAAOING GURU NANAKS BODY -- BUT THE WHOLE OF MECCA ROTATED ALONG WITH GURU NANAKs BODY..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">YOU GO TO ANY VILLAGE IN PUNJAB --ASK ANY RUSTIC SARDARJEE --HE WILL TELL YOU THE SAME STORY WITH GREAT RELIGIOUS FERVOUR.. HE IS PROUD OF GURU NANAH AND WAHEGURU..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ROTHSCHILD USED THIS SIKH PRIDE TO CALL THE HOLY BOOK GURU GRANTH SABIH AS THE ELEVENTH GURU.. THIS HOLY BOOK WAS CREATED BY A WHITE JEW WEARING TURBAN NAMED MAX ARTHUR MACAULIFFE , A ROTHSCHILDs AGENT..</span><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">ROTHSCHILD THEN MADE DOZENS OF COPIES OF THIS HOLY BOOK AND TOOK IT TO EVERY WAR ZONE OF WW2 WHERE SIKHS FOUGHT..<br /><br />IF A WHITE SOLDIER DID NOT STAND UP AND SALUTE WHEN THIS VENERABLE BOOK WENT PAST, HE WOULD BE WHIPPED BY A SIKH..<br /><br />A CRYPTO JEW SIKH WEARING TURBAN WOULD BE IN CHARGE OF THIS BOOK , AND TREATED THE BOOK AS A LIVING ORACLE..</span></b><br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">SIKHS WERE USED AS CANNON FODDER-- AS THEY BELIEVED THE ORACLE \"IF YOU FIGHT WITH THE NAME OF WAHEGURU ON YOUR LIPS , YOU SHALL WIN THIS BATTLE \"..</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: bold;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: bold;\">SAB KO CHOOTIYA BANAAAYA... GANDHI WAS IN CAHOOTS..</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: bold;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Gandhi recruited 13 lakh ( 1.3 million ) Indian soldiers in the first world war \u2013 out of which 111000 ( 1.11 lakh ) Indian soldiers were killed .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Gandhi recruited 25 lakh ( 2.5 million ) Indian soldiers in the second World war. Out of this 243000 ( 2.43 lakh) soldiers were killed.</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">TILL CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL EXHUMED THE NUMBER OF INDIAN SOLDIERS KILLED -NOBODY EVEN KNEW .. TODAY WIKIPEDIA ACCEPTS IT..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I came to know from the great grandfather of a Turkish sailor .. i went to his home..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/dunkirk-christopher-nolan-2017-movie.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/07/unknown-history-of-sikhs-and-sikhism.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c4585366393355635375\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/00472330782894146543\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Vikhyat Singh</a></cite><span class=\"icon user \" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/mistakes-deliberate-or-inadvertant-in_7.html?showComment=1549625852592#c4585366393355635375\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 8, 2019 at 5:07 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n(vii) Arjuna performed the funeral rites of Vasudeva and aided his four wives to enter the funeral pyre.<br />\n(M.B. WHO WROTE POISON INJECTED PURANIC ENCYCLOPEDIA ..&nbsp;</span></span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">VETTAM FUCKIN' MANI, DOES NOT KNOW THAT ALL HINDU GODS ARE COSMIC ALEGORIES ( EXCEPT VISHNU AVATARS RAM/ KRISHNA/ AYYAPPA )&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">https://dharmawiki.org/index.php/Mandavya_(%E0%A4%AE%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%A3%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A1%E0%A4%B5%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%AF%E0%A4%83)</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">VETTAM MANIs BULLSHIT BOOK PURANIC NIGHANTU IN MALAYALAM WAS RENAMED AS AN ENCYCLOPEDIA.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">VETTAM MANIs WIFE NAME IS CHRISTIAN ANNAMMA \u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HIS BOOK --LINK BELOW IS 96 % BLASPHEMY..POISON INJECTED NONSENSE DUE TO WHICH HINDU BECAME SELF LOATHING&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AN EXAMPLE ?</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">PAGE 73 ( 3)</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">3 ) His tusk broken. Once Para?' urama arrived at Kailasa to meet Siva. At that time Siva was asleep. So Ganapati did not allow him to get in. A duel broke out between them. In that duel one of Ganapati's tusks was broken. ( Padma Purana)</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">PARASHURAMA NEH GANAPATHI KA DAAANTH TOADDH DIYAAH REEEE !</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BOOO HOOOOOOOOO !</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AS PER ZAKIR NAIK, GANAPATHI STOPPED SHIVA FROM ENTERING THE TOILET WHERE HIS MOTHER WAS TAKING BATH ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JISM KA MAYIL--IS MENSES BLOOD..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cQmmaiF-OPo</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SHIVA / PARVATI/ GANESHA ARE COSMIC FORCES -NOT MORTALS.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">GANESHA IS IN CHARGE OF MOOLADHARA BANDHAN--( unless BRAHMA GRANTHI is open kundalini cannot rise )..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AS PER ZAKIR NAIK, GANAPATHI STOPPED SHIVA FROM ENTERING THE TOILET WHERE HIS MOTHER WAS TAKING BATH .. MARITAL RAPE DURING MENSES NAAHIN KARNE DENGAAH !</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHY DOES GANESHAs MOTHER PRAKRITI ( SHAKTI ) NEED TO RISE TO MEET HER HUSBAND PURUSHA ( SHIVA) ?..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IT IS ABOUT CREATION OF COSMOS ! NOT MARITAL RAPE DURING MENSES IN THE TOILET !!..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ZAKIR HUSSIAN DOES NOT HAVE THE BRAINS NOR THE CHARACTER TO UNDERSTAND THIS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Purusha symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle. Prakriti symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">On a MACRO scale , when the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the sentient Purusha , the universe evolves. The cosmos in all its manifestations, as an act of divine love..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">On a MICRO scale --The union of Shakti ( prakriti ) with Shiva ( purusha ) by Kundalini rise is the liberation of seeker from the cycle of endless birth and death.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I WANT MY READERS TO GO THROUGH THE LINK BELOW -- AND LET ME KNOW THE BLASPHEMY BEING PASSED OF BY DHARMAWIKI AS \"FACTS \" PENNED BY AN INTELLECTUAL..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: medium;\">https://www.sanskrit-lexicon.uni-koeln.de/scans/PEScan/2014/downloads/pe_bookmark.pdf</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">INTELLECTUAL MY ASS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I ASK MY READERS TO PROFILE ALL ASSOCIATED WITH DHARMAWIKI .. THIS MUST INCLUDE SWAMY AND RAJIV MALHOTA WHO SPONSORS DHARMAWIKI..<br />\n<br />\nSEND IT TO RSS CHIEF , AVBP CHIEF, VHP CHIEF, VIRAAT SENA CHIEF , MODI , AMIT SHAH , YOGI ADITYANATH TOO..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">NOTHING WILL HAPPEN..<br /><br />ALL THESE FORCES EXIST TO STRIKE AT THE ROOTS OF SANATANA FROM WITHIN..</span></b><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">BELOW: SHIVA SHOWING HIS ERECT PRICK TO THE WIVES OF THE SAPT RISHIS -- WHO RESPOND BY SHOWING THEIR RESPECTIVE&nbsp;TWATS !</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">A DOG IS LICKING PUSSY JUICE OFF SHIVAs FINGERS&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">SAPRT RISHIS DISTURBED FROM THEIR PENANCE ARE APPALLED.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">THIS IS AGAMA TEMPLE SCULPTURE</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-hJYsSXEh6cg/XFynpUl5SgI/AAAAAAABfr8/PU_YrE6bJrAhmcrVvUtOSvzoXs3pxfligCLcBGAs/s1600/Vrdidachaleswarar_Bsswhikshatana.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"480\" data-original-width=\"800\" height=\"384\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-hJYsSXEh6cg/XFynpUl5SgI/AAAAAAABfr8/PU_YrE6bJrAhmcrVvUtOSvzoXs3pxfligCLcBGAs/s640/Vrdidachaleswarar_Bsswhikshatana.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/_hyghgkYaN8/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/_hyghgkYaN8?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Parvati, Siva's wife,\ndid not find a way to get a child for her from her husband. At last Brahma\napproached Siva and told him that the absence of Kama was making creation difficult.\nSiva then declared that thereafter Kama would find a place in the minds of all\nliving beings including himself. Parvati and Siva immediately commenced a\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">sexual</span> life which went on incessantly for a hundred years without reaching the\nclimax. The world was agitated and the universe stood on the verge of ruin. The\nDevas decided to send Agni to intervene But Agni was afraid of Siva and so went\nand hid himself under the ocean.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">###########<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sikhandl went to the\npremises of the Yaksa and performed certain rites for a number of&nbsp; days. The Yaksa appeared to her. Sikhandi\nexplained the whole matter to him. They entered into a contract. According to\nit, they exchanged their <span style=\"background-color: white;\">sexes </span>Sikhandi receiving the male sex of die Yaksa and\nthe Yaksa receiv- ing the female sex of Sikhandi. Sikhandi returned home as a\nman. Drupada repeated with greater force his old plea that his child was a man.\nHiranyavarna made a thorough examination of Sikhandi and convinced himself of\nthe truth. Many years after, Hiranyavarna died. 8) Kubera's Arrival. At that\ntime, in the course of his world tour Kubera arrived at the residence of\nSthunakarna. The Yaksa who was in female form, did not come out to receive\nKubera. In his anger, Kubera pronounced a curse that the female sex of\nSthunakarna and the male sex of Sikhandl would continue for ever. The Yaksa\nprayed for the lifting of the curse. Kubera released him from the curse by\nsaying that after the death of Sikhandi, the Yaksa would be restored to his own\nmale sex.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">##########<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ASIKNI II. A wife of\nDaksa. DaksaprajSpati, son of&nbsp; Brahma,\ncommenced creation with his own mind. When&nbsp;\nhe found (hat it was not conducive to the propagation of the species he\npondered over the subject once more and decided to effect it by the <span style=\"background-color: white;\">sexual\n</span>union of the male and the female. He, therefore, married Asikni daughter of\nViranaprajapati. There is a version in the seventh Skandha of Devi Bhagavata\nthat Viranl was born of the left thumb of Brahma<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">############<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once when Balasura\nyawned three bad women, Svairim, KaminI and PumscalT were born. They had with\nthem a potable substance called Hataka which they gave to men whom they liked\nand after enlivening the <span style=\"background-color: white;\">sex </span>impulse in them enjoyed a sexual life with them to\ntheir heart's content. ( Pancama Skandha, Bhagavata) .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">###########<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Satvavati's original\nname was Kali. The fisherman got her from the stomach of a fish. (See the word\nAdrika). Since she had the smell of fish she got the name of\n\"Matsyagandhi.\" She used to assist a fisherman in his work as a\nferryman in the river Ganga.&nbsp; Once the sage\nParasara happened to get into her boat and he fell deeply in love with her. The\nsage removed the smell offish from her and gave her the perfume of musk\ninstead. By this mystic power he created a mist at noon and under its cover, he\nhad a <span style=\"background-color: white;\">sexual</span> union with her. A a result of it the child Krsna (Vyasa) was born.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">##################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At once Maha visnu\nappeared in the form of a Pig and lifted up the Earth on its horns. When the\nEarth floated on the surface of water like a lotus leaf, Bhumi Devi who was\npleased, stood up in her charming figure. Mahavisnu fell in love with her and\nwith the brilliance of a crore of suns, had <span style=\"background-color: white;\">sexual </span>union with her for the period\nof one Devavarsa. It is from that time that Bhumi Devi became Mahavisnu's wife.\nAs a result of their union, a son named Mangala was born to them.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">############<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once Parvati and Siva\nindulged in their<span style=\"background-color: white;\"> sexual</span> act for many years. The earth began to shake to its\nfoundations. The gods approached Siva with a request to refrain and he agreed.\nSiva's<span style=\"background-color: white;\"> semen</span> was discharged and fell on the earth. Parvati who was angry at\nthis, cursed Bhumidevi as follows: \"You Bhumidevi ! You will assume many\nforms and become the wife of many. Since you have prevented me from giving\nbirth to a son, no children will be born to you in future.\" (Valmiki\nRamayana, Balakanda, 36th Sarga).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">##############<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CAITRARATHA(M). A\nforest of puranic fame. Once King Yayati enjoyed<span style=\"background-color: white;\"> sexual</span> acts with the apsaras Visvaci\nin this forest. (Sloka 43, Chapter 75, Adi Parva) . It was here in this forest\nthat Pandu spent some days once with his wives Madrl and Kunti. (Sloka 48, Chapter\n118, Adi Parva).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">##############<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Padma Purana relates\nthe story of four sinners named Vidura, Candrasarman, Vedasarman and Vanjula,\nwho shed their sin by bathing in the Ganga. The sins committed by the four were\nrespectively Brahmahatya (killing of brahmin), Guruhatya (killing of the\npreceptor), Agamyagamana (having <span style=\"background-color: white;\">sexual </span>contact with women like the wife of\nguru which is debarred) and Govadha (killing of cow) respectively<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">#################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now Daksina is\nworshipped as a goddess. The same Daksina was reborn in the Goloka under the\nname Suslla. At that time she was a cowherd woman and friend of Radha. She\nliked to talk with Sri Krsna. One day Radha saw her sitting in the lap of Sri\nKrsna, engaged in<span style=\"background-color: white;\"> sexual </span>sports, in a secluded place. When Suslla saw that\nRadha had found them out, she be- came dumbfounded with shame, and sat with\nbowed head. Sri Krsna slowly placed Suslla devi down and&nbsp; instantly vanished. The angry Radha cursed\nSuSila to become ashes if ever she entered the Goloka again<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7qUpXxOZElU/XF1CBbO0HrI/AAAAAAABftU/hkloG38i60YQIciuusPuK0aRJx_euH0ewCLcBGAs/s1600/dsownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"600\" data-original-width=\"450\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7qUpXxOZElU/XF1CBbO0HrI/AAAAAAABftU/hkloG38i60YQIciuusPuK0aRJx_euH0ewCLcBGAs/s400/dsownload.jpg\" width=\"300\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">#############<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Embittered at this the\nbear cursed Dharmagupta and made him mad. Then addressing Dharmagupta first and\nthe lion next the bear said thus : \"I am Dhyanakastha a sage of the Bhrgu\nfamily. I can take any form I like. I cursed you, Dharmagupta, because you\ncheated a friend. This lion is Bhadra, one of the ministers of Kubera. Once he entered\ninto <span style=\"background-color: white;\">sexual</span> act with a bear in front of the asrama of Gautama at midday and the\nsage cursed him and made him into a lion. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">#################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DHUNDHUMARA. A king of\nthe Iksvaku dynasty. See under Kuvalasva) . He was also called Kuvalayasva\nDHUNDHUMUKA. A wicked King. Visalya was his wife. Even at the marriage of his\nson this wicked King remained indifferent. He indulged in <span style=\"background-color: white;\">sexual</span> activities with\na Siidra woman. Not much later he killed her. As soon as her brother knew about\nthis he ran to the palace and killed the King Dhundhumuka along with his wife.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">##################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Angiras, the son of\nBrahma, had two sons, Utathya and Brhaspati. One day when Utathya was away from\nhome, Brhaspati approached his elder brother's wife, Mamata, who was pregnant\nat the time, and tried to have <span style=\"background-color: white;\">sexual</span> union with her. But she tried to dissuade\nhim and said \"The child in my womb, born from Utathya's <span style=\"background-color: white;\">semen</span> has already\nmastered Vedas and Vedarhgas. Your semen is also equally powerful. How can my\nwomb bear the combined force of the two <span style=\"background-color: white;\">semens</span>? So please refrain from this\nattempt of yours.\" But even after hearing these, words of his sister-in-law,\nBrhaspati was not able to control his passions. At the time of the intercourse,\nwhen the semen of Brhaspati entered the womb, the child within it cried out\n\"Father ! this passion is improper. Two persons have no place here. So\nwithdraw your <span style=\"background-color: white;\">semen.</span>\"&nbsp; Brhaspati did\nnot heed the request. The child in the womb repelled the <span style=\"background-color: white;\">semen</span> that entered the\nwomb with&nbsp; his foot and it dropped on the\nfloor. Brhaspati who&nbsp; became angry,\ncursed the child. As a result, the boywas born blind. He got the name\n\"Dlrghatamas\" because he was born blind. (M.B. Adi Parva, Chapter\n104) .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">##################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kasyapa asked<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dili to wait for a few\nminutes, unlil that terrible lime was over, butl she did not heed his advice.\nIn the fury of her passion she sprang towards him and stripped him of his\nclothes and in tihe end Kasyapa yielded lo her carnal desires. But after the act\nhe in a repentant mood told her that she had defiled her mind by having <span style=\"background-color: white;\">sexual</span>\nunion in that unholy hour and by doing so had sinned against the gods. As a\nresult, twin sons will be born in her womb. They would persecute and torture\nthe three worlds. Mahavisnu would incarnate to destroy them. But since she also\nfell a little regret in her act, a grandson of her (Prahlada) will become a\ndevotee of Visnu.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">##########<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GAUTAMA II. A brahmin\nwho was a member of the court of Yudhisthira. He was a member of Indrasabha also.\nThis Gautama while he was living in Girivraja had<span style=\"background-color: white;\"> sexual </span>relations with a Sudra\nwoman from the country of Usinara and a son was born to them named Kaksivan.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NOTE: SUDRA TERM DID\nNOT EXIST WHEN PURANAS WERE PENNED DOWN.. PURANAS WERE CLEAN T BE NARRATED TO\nSMALL GIRLS<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">##################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GHATA. An urban area in\nancient India. (Bhisma Parva, Chapter 9, Verse 63) . GHATA. A notorious thief.\nHe had a friend called Karpara. They were jointly known as Ghatakarparas. Once\nboth the friends went to commit theft. Leaving Ghata at the door-steps Karpara\nentered the chamber of the princess who, after enjoying<span style=\"background-color: white;\"> sexual</span> pleasures with\nhim gave him some money asking him to repeat such visits in future. Karpara\ntold Ghata all that had&nbsp; happened and\nhanded over to him the money which the princess had given him. Karpara went\nagain to the princess. But, owing to the weariness caused by the night's\nenjoyment both the princess and he slept till late in the morning. Meantime the\npalace guards found out the secret and took the lovers into custody.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_vGlH4np_38/XF1CbAdPPyI/AAAAAAABftc/WLTIU7w79zExOh3Db65Yp-j1pqrd4H7hwCLcBGAs/s1600/down5dload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"224\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_vGlH4np_38/XF1CbAdPPyI/AAAAAAABftc/WLTIU7w79zExOh3Db65Yp-j1pqrd4H7hwCLcBGAs/s400/down5dload.jpg\" width=\"398\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">#####################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Suktimatl was a river\nflowing through the capital city of the kingdom of Uparicara. Once the mountain\nKolahala driven by <span style=\"background-color: white;\">amorous </span>desires subdued Suktimatl. The next morning on\nfinding no river in its place the people were surprised. The news reached the\nears of the King. He became furious and rushing to the mountain gave it a hard\nkick. It created a hole in the mountain and the river flowed through it. But by\nthat time&nbsp; Kolahala had got a son and a\ndaughter of Suktimatl. Greatly pleased at the King for setting her free from Kolahala,\nSuktimatl gave her children to the King. The&nbsp;\nKing brought up the son and made him the chief of his army. The girl was\nbrought up and named Girika and when she was of marriagable age the King\nmarried her. When once Girika was having her monthly period the King was forced\nto go to the forests for hunting. While in the forests he saw the animals\nhaving <span style=\"background-color: white;\">sexual </span>acts and as he thought of Girika at home he had emission. He never\nwanted to waste the <span style=\"background-color: white;\">seminal </span>fluid. He wrapped it in a leaf and sent it to his\nwife through a kite. Another kite thinking it to be something to eat attacked\nthe packet and it fell into a river down below. A fish swallowed it and later\nwhen a fisherman caught it and opened its belly a boy and a girl came out of\nit. The girl was Satyavati mother of Vyasa. (10th Skandha, DeviBhagavata)<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">####################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">. GRTSAMADA III. The\nson born to Indra of Mukunda. There is the following story about him in Ganesa Purana.&nbsp; Once when Rukmarigada was out from the\npalace,&nbsp; Indra, in the guise of\nRukmangada, went to Mukunda, wife of Rukmangada, and slept with&nbsp; her who was at that time <span style=\"background-color: white;\">sexually </span>hungry. She\ndelivered a child in due course. This boy was Grtsamada. He&nbsp; rew into a great scholar. Nobody was able to\ndefeat him in any verbal duel. Once Grtsamada went to the&nbsp; palace of the king of Magadha to attend a\nSraddha (an&nbsp; offering to the manes) along\nwith Vasistha and others. Atri Maharsi who was present there then spoke\nslightingly of Grtsamada's parentage and Grtsamada coming&nbsp; home questioned his mother. The mother then\ntold him&nbsp; what had happened and Grtsamada\ngetting angry at the <span style=\"background-color: white;\">immoral</span> act committed by his mother cursed her and&nbsp; said \"May you be a Kantaka tree\".\nMukunda also did not leave her son free. She cursed him thus \"You will\nhave a demon as your son\"<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dasaratha divided among\nhis wives the divine&nbsp; ayasa (pudding) got\nfrom the putrakamesti yajna which was p3rformed so that he might be blessed\nwith&nbsp; children. Somehow or other a kite\nsnatched some&nbsp; pudding and flew off with\nit. On its way the pudding&nbsp; fell down\nfrom the beaks of the kite on the fingers of&nbsp;\nAnjana doing tapas in the forest. She ate that pudding&nbsp; and Hanuman was born as the son of Anjana due&nbsp; to the extraordinary powers of the pudding.\n(Ananda Ramayana) .&nbsp; ( 3 ) Siva, once in\nhis fierce and effulgent form (aspect)&nbsp; entered\nKesarl, the husband of Anjana and had <span style=\"background-color: white;\">coitus</span>&nbsp;\nwith her. After that Vayu (Wind-god) also had <span style=\"background-color: white;\">coitus </span>with her. Thus as a\nresult of the <span style=\"background-color: white;\">sexual </span>act by both&nbsp; the\nDevas Anjana got pregnant. Later, Anjana was about to throw into the valley of\nthe mountain her&nbsp; new-born child as it\nwas an ugly one when Vayu&nbsp; ( Wind god)\nintervened and saved the child. Hanuman&nbsp; was\nthe child thus born of Siva and Vayu. (Bhavisya&nbsp;\nPurana, Pratisarga Parva).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">####################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One hundred sons were\nborn to Bharhgasva. Once he&nbsp; went to the\nforest after entrusting the affairs of the kingdom to his sons. Indra cunningly\nmisguided him&nbsp; and made him lose his way\nin the forest. Wandering&nbsp; alone with his\nhorse in the forest, he reached the bank&nbsp;\nof a river. Weary and thirsty, he stepped down into the&nbsp; river. To his amazement, he was instantly\ntransformed&nbsp; into a woman ! The\nbewildered \"woman\" somehow&nbsp; reached\nBhamgasva's palace. All the members of his family were deeply grieved over his\nchange of <span style=\"background-color: white;\">sex</span>. To&nbsp; avoid embarrassment to\nhimself and others, Bharhgasva&nbsp; returned\nas a woman to the forest and there lived as the wife of a sage and became the\nmother of a hundred sons. . After some years \"she\" went back to the\npalace&nbsp; with the sons and leaving them\nthere returned again&nbsp; to the forest.\nIndra went to the palace at this time and made the&nbsp; two sets of hundred sons quarrel with one\nanother&nbsp; until all of them perished in\nfighting. Hearing about&nbsp; this the mother\nwho was in the forest, wept bitterly.&nbsp; Indra\nvisited her (Bharhgasva) there and she told him&nbsp;\nthe whole story of her misfortunes and begged his pardon for performing\nIndradvista sacrifice without&nbsp; nviting\nIndra.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">####################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Uttara Ramayana\nthere is a&nbsp; story as given below, about\nthe birth of Bali, a son of&nbsp; Indra :\nAruna, the charioteer of Surya (the sun-god) went one&nbsp; night to Indraloka to see the goddesses\ndancing. Men&nbsp; were not allowed to enter\nthe dancing hall. So, Aruna&nbsp; managed to\nenter the hall by disguising himself as a&nbsp;\nbeautiful lady. The moment Indra saw her he fell in love with her. The\nname she assumed at that time was Arum. Indra secretly took her outside and\nthey had a&nbsp; <span style=\"background-color: white;\">sexual</span> union.
