text-decoration-line: none;\">February 7, 2019 at 11:10 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWord and the number of times it appears<br />\n<br />\nHeaven : 519 times<br />\nHell : 196 times<br />\nDattatreya : 38 times<br />\nRadha : 61 times<br />\nSemen : 96 times<br />\nKalidasa : 43 times<br />\nBhakti : 31 times<br />\nHanuman : 279 times<br />\nNymph : 62 times</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c7378973532588826084\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/zFdxGE77vvD2w5xHy6jkVuElKv-U9_9qLkRYK8OnbDeJPtjSZ82UPq5w6hJ-SA=s35\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/18265601721675424400\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Buddha Zorba</a></cite><span class=\"icon user \" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/america-caused-global-warming-with.html?showComment=1549561954099#c7378973532588826084\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 7, 2019 at 11:22 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\npage 163 ----- amorous with pregnant woman----- bharata<br />\n<br />\n5 ) Growing amorous on the wife of elder brother. A story<br />\nstating how Bphaspati begot a son by the wife of<br />\nUtathya is given in Skandha 9 of Bhagavata. Mamata,<br />\nthe wife of Utathya, was pregnant. Brhaspati had<br />\ncoition with her when her husband was away. The<br />\nmother and the child in the womb who opposed the<br />\nact of Brhaspati were cursed. Mamata gave birth to two<br />\nchildren. Fearing that her husband might cast her out<br />\nshe left the son of Brhaspati in the forest and was<br />\nabout to go, when there was a divine voice from above,<br />\n\"Mudhe, Bharadvajamimam bhara dvajarh Brhaspate.\" \"You senseless woman, bring up this one born<br />\nof the two. Brhaspati, bring up this one born of the<br />\ntwo.\" Hearing this ethereal voice Brhaspati took the<br />\nchild and gave him the name Bharadvaja and brought<br />\nhim up. After that the child was given to emperor<br />\nBharata. The famous archer Drona was the son of this Bharadvaja.</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c9130530491426725819\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-TViqkXPLMBg/XFXE7zteS0I/AAAAAAAAAPI/P6NMRdLAaLEiAEz7HlZJlVc4oQdAyl7NACK4BGAYYCw/s35/depositphotos_6540427-stock-photo-green-texture.jpg\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/00472330782894146543\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Vikhyat Singh</a></cite><span class=\"icon user \" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/mistakes-deliberate-or-inadvertant-in_7.html?showComment=1549604140129#c9130530491426725819\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 8, 2019 at 11:05 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nThe Brahmins disguised Vagbhata as a Muslim boy and sent him to the Muslim Physician on the other side of the river. The boy went to the physician and told him that he was coming from far away with the intention of learning medical science. The teacher put certain questions and understood that the boy possessed extraordinary intelligence.<br />\n<br />\nHe began to teach the boy the science of medicine. Seeing the interest of the boy the teacher asked the boy to eat food from his house and to learn day and night. The Brahmin boy did not like to eat the food of Muslims. The boy said that he had a relative on the other side of the river and that he would go there and have his supper and return for the night study. The teacher agreed and thenceforward Vagbhata began to learn day and night. Within a short time he<br />\ncompleted learning. One day the teacher was sleeping on the seventh storey of the building and his disciple Vagbhata was massaging his legs. The boy soliloquised that fate had destined him to massage the legs of a Musalman. Instantly he cried bitterly, and the teacher awoke and understood that the boy was not a Muslim, and tried to cut his head. The boy thought: \"The four Vedas and the six Sastras say that there is a god. If it is true no harm<br />\nwill come to me.\" Then he jumped out of the window.<br />\n<br />\nIn consequence of this jump, he became a little lame and no other harm befell him. He swam across the river and reached the other side and told the Brahmins everything. The Brahmins asked him what he imagined when he jumped from the seventh storey. He replied \"I jumped with this imagination. The four Vedas and<br />\nthe six Sastras say that there is a god. If it is true no harm will come to me.\" As soon as the boy had finished the Brahmins became angry and they all got up.<br />\nThey said \"You went wrong in using the doubtful 'if', instead of the affirmative 'As'.<br />\n<br />\nThe Brahmins joined together and expelled him from the society. The boy<br />\nthought of going away somewhere. \"But there won't be another chance for somebody else to go and learn medical science from the Muslim physicians. So before going away from here I must make the fruits of my<br />\nefforts available to these people.\" Thinking so he lived there for a little longer. He lived there without ming-<br />\nling with the Brahmins, cooking his food. It is believed that Vagbhata wrote 'Astangasangraha' and 'Astangahrdaya', during this period. Page 818</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c9130530491426725819-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c9130530491426725819-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c169862926225595117\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 8, 2019 at 10:56 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nIf the wife of the teacher is of the caste of the teacher, the brahmacari should consider her as his teacher. If the wife is not of the same caste the brahmacari needs only to stand up and make obeisance to her.<br />\nA brahmacari should not apply oil to the body of his teacher's wife, wash her, massage her body, and comb her hair.<br />\nPage 156<br />\n___________________________<br />\n<br />\nDharmadcva got a daughter named Dharmavrata of his wife Dharmavatl. Dharmavrata was an ascetic and she was married to Marlci, son of Brahma. One day Marici came back from the forest after getting darbha and flowers extremely tired and so after food lay down to rest. His wife sitting by his side massaged his legs. The sage fell asleep. Then Brahma came there and Dharmavrata attended on him and worshipped him. Marici, when he woke up, finding Dharmavrata attending on another man cursed her and made her into stone. Dharmavrata PLEADED NOT GUILTY and standing inside a fire-pit did penance for ten thousand years. Brahma and other devas appeared before her and consoled her by assuring that though she would be a stone devas would take their<br />\nabode in it and that she would be worshipped by all. From that day onwards that stone was known as Devas ila and even now it is believed that Brahma and other<br />\ndevas live therein. (Chapter 114, Agni Purana).</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; SWAMY DOES NOT KNOW THE BASICS OF SANATANA DHARMA..<br />\n<br />\nASK VHS TO READ THE POST BELOW -- KERALA CHRISTIAN VETTAM MANI IS THE SOURCE OF DHARMAWIKI --AN \"INTELLECTUAL\" WHO GIVES THEM \"FACTS\"..<br />\n<br />\nhttps://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/mistakes-deliberate-or-inadvertant-in_7.html<br />\n<br />\nSAME WAY , I ASK THIYYAS AND EZHAVAS OF KERALA NOT TO LISTEN TO THE LEADER OF THEIR ORG SNDP , VELLAPALLY NATESAN.. THIS FELLOW IS A TRAITOR FROM WITHIN BECAUSE OF WHOM ATHEIST COMMIE PINARAYI VIJAYAN RULES KERALA.....<br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS A FOUL EFFORT TO RAISE SNDP FOUNDER ( SIC) SREE NAYAYANA GURU TO A GOD-- SAME AS SHIRDI SAIBABA, BASAVA, GHANSHYAM PANDE ETC..<br />\n<br />\nSANATANA DHARMA DOES NOT ALLOW MORTALS TO BE GODS .. THE ONLY EXCEPTION BEING VISHNU AVATARS RAMA, KRISHNA AND AYYAPPA.. ALL REST HINDU GODS ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES .. ONLY VISHNU HAS AVATARS..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE ARE MARRIAGE HALLS IN KERALA WHERE THE COUPLE GOES AROUND THE PORTRAIT OF SREE NARAYANA GURU ( A ROTHSCHILD CREATION )..THERE IS ONE IN CALICUT ..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS WRONG..<br />\n<br />\nA HINDU MARRIAGE TAKES PLACE WITH AGNI ( FIRE ) AS WITNESS .. HINDU COUPLES HAVE TO TAKE THE PHERAS AROUND THE FIRE.<br />\n<br />\nFIRE IS PURE -- IT CAN NEVER BE POLLUTED.. YOU CAN LIFT FIRE OFF A BURNING CORPSE AND GRILL YOUR FOOD.. FIRE DOES NOT FOLLOW EVEN THE LAWS OF GRAVITY..<br />\n<br />\nMORE THAN 35% OF RIG VEDA EXTOLS AGNI WHICH SUSTAINS RTA.. RTA IS THE GUARDIAN OF THE MORAL CODE. . RTA IS MENTIONED MORE THAN 400 TIMES IN RIG VEDA.. FROM RTA ( TRUTH ) EMANATES DHARMA ..<br />\n<br />\nTOWARDS THE END OF HIS LIFE SREE NARAYANA GURU HAD DECLARED THAT HE HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH THE SNDP ORG , WHICH IS SAID IS POLITICAL WITH ULTERIOR MOTIVES ..<br />\n<br />\nSANATANA DHARMA DOES NOT ALLOW POLITICS..<br />\n<br />\nSIVAGIRI MUTT AND THE PILGRIMAGE ATTACHED WAS CREATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD.. BOTH ARE FAKE.. WE HINDUS DO NOT GO FOR A PILGRIMAGE TO THE TOMB OF A FAKE GOD CREATED BY THE WHITE INVADER..<br />\n<br />\nTHE COLOUR OF SANATANA DHARMA IS SAFFRON-- NOT YELLOW.<br />\n<br />\nSREE NARAYANA GURU WAS A EZHAVA LEADER AND NOT A THIYYA LEADER..<br />\n<br />\nTHIYYAS ARE NOT EZHAVAS ..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD MERGED RULING CLAN THIYYAS WITH BLUNT FACED EZHAVAS.. AND OUT CAME OUT OF THE WOODWORK-- THE CRYPTO JEW VARMAS , LIKE THE CHITPAVAN JEWS NAY BRAHMINS ..<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c6086148411672439022-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c6086148411672439022-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c3489458378382994286\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. A Maharsi who was a devotee of Siva. Once he went to Kailasa and began to go round Siva to pay homage to him. But since Parvati and Siva were sitting together as one body, he could not go round Siva separately. He did not have much reverence for Parvati. So he took the form of a female beetle (Bhrngi ) and<br />\nbored his way through a hole made in the place where their bodies were united and thus went round Siva alone. Parvati was angry at this slight shown to her and cursed him to become physically weak. His legs became so weak that they were unable to support his body. So he prayed to Siva again and he blessed him with a third<br />\nleg. In this way Bhrngi became a Maharsi with three legs. | Page 141</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c6301943391496297633\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-TViqkXPLMBg/XFXE7zteS0I/AAAAAAAAAPI/P6NMRdLAaLEiAEz7HlZJlVc4oQdAyl7NACK4BGAYYCw/s35/depositphotos_6540427-stock-photo-green-texture.jpg\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/00472330782894146543\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Vikhyat Singh</a></cite><span class=\"icon user \" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/mistakes-deliberate-or-inadvertant-in_7.html?showComment=1549615457866#c6301943391496297633\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 8, 2019 at 2:14 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nThis is the most ridiculous thing I've ever read -<br />\n<br />\nAfter that Kali waited for a chance to enter the body of Nala. After twelve years, once Nala, after passing urine, without washing his legs performed his evening<br />\nworship. At that moment Kali entered the body of Nala. With that Nala became bereft of all senses of righteousness and duty, and challenged his younger brother Puskara to a game of dice. Page 196</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c6194150525784170048\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. PERIOD !..<br />\n<br />\nSTARE DECISIS IS NOT ALLOWED --WHERE PAST RULINGS OF STUPID JUDGES UNDER THE MINDLESS SYSTEM OF \"JUSTICE IS BLIND SANS CONTEXT \" IS ATTACHED AS AN ADDENDUM-- NAY-- LANGOT TO THE CONSTITUTION..<br />\n<br />\nNOW--<br />\n<br />\nTRY TO THINK IN AN INTELLIGENT MANNER..<br />\n<br />\nABOVE THE CONSTITUTION LIES --<br />\n<br />\n1) WE THE PEOPLE<br />\n2) THE WATAN<br />\n3) DHARMA OR NATURAL JUSTICE..<br />\n<br />\nOUR JUDICIARY IS IN CONTEMPT OF--<br />\n<br />\n1) WE THE PEOPLE<br />\nEXAMPLE: AAA-IF YOU HOLD A REFERENDUM ON ADULTERY 99.9% WILL REJECT IT.. IF PUT TO VOTE IN THE PARLIAMENT 90% ( LEAVE OUT FOREIGN PARYROLL MPs ) WILL REJECT IT..<br />\n<br />\nBBB- AT SABARIMALA , JUDGES TRAMPLED ON 5900 YEAR OLD CULTURE..<br />\n<br />\nhttps://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/11/5900-year-old-sabarimala-this-planets.html<br />\n<br />\n2) THE WATAN..<br />\nTHE RED CORRIDOR WAS CREATED BY THE JUDICIARY IS 3 DECADES FLAT.. JUDGES DO NOT REALISE THAT THE CONSTITUTION IS ONLY TO PROTECT LAWFUL ABIDING DESH BHAKT CITIZENS -- NOT TO PROTECT DESH DROHIS ( INDIAN / FOREIGN ) HOLDING FOREIGN GUNS OR THE FOREIGN FUNDED THINKERS WHO CONTROL THEM..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/09/bauxite-mining-naxalite-menace-joshua.html<br />\n<br />\n3) DHARMA OR NATURAL JUSTICE--<br />\nJUDGES MUST NOT ENFORCE THE LAW AT THE EXPENSE OF JUSTICE ( FAIRNESS )..JUSTICE CAN NEVER BE BLIND SANS CONTEXT .. JUSTICE MUST BE SUBJECTIVE NOT OBJECTIVE.. JEW ROTHSCHILD WHO RULED INDIA WANTED ONLY OBJECTIVE JUSTICE AS HE WAS RULING OVER SLAVES..<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS JEW ROTHSCHILD WHO CREATED THE LEGEND THAT LADY JUSTICE IS BLIND..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS WAS TO SHOW THAT THE CROWN PRINCE AND A OLD DYING LEPER ON THE STREET WILL GET SAME IMPARTIAL JUSTICE..<br />\n<br />\nIN DUE COURSE THIS FINE CONCEPT WAS HIJACKED IN A CUNNING MANNER TO A FOUL \u201c CRIME IS CRIME.. WE THE MASTERS OF SLAVE INDIANS DON\u2019T CARE WHY THEY DID A CRIME \u201d\u2014 MIND YOU, IT COULD BE FOR SHEER SURVIVAL OR TO BREAK CHAINS OF ABJECT SLAVERY ..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nFINALLY--<br />\n<br />\n4) JUDGES ARE IN CONTEMPT OF THE CONSTITUTION ITSELF ...<br />\n<br />\nCOLLEGIUM JUDICIARY IS NOT ALLOWED BY THE CONSTITUTION.. JUDGES CANNOT MAKE AND BREAK LAWS FOR THE WHOLE NATION VIA PIL ROUTE , FILED BY FOREIGN PAYROLL DESH DROHIS..<br />\n<br />\nPEOPLE HAVE WOKEN UP.. line-height: 150%;\"><b>BUT TODAY I SHALL ( THANKS TO CUNTS AT DHARMAWIKI ).<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">I HAVE KEPT A TRACK OF\nTHE BACTERIAL COUNT IN THE GULF STREAM PART &nbsp;IN THE GULF OF MEXICO NORTH OF CUBA (&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red;\">&nbsp;METHANOTROPHS , OR </span><span style=\"color: blue;\">METHANE EATING BACTERIA DIFFERENTIAL</span><span style=\"color: red;\"> OF EAST AND WEST BRANCHES</span> )&nbsp; , BY <span style=\"color: red;\">METHANOTROPHY</span>.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-tExZOoj_Ulc/XFq80M4-9HI/AAAAAAABfpM/Cb2GBq6gIdELOZqSC6Qect6mGpPviS1zQCLcBGAs/s1600/gulf-strDeam1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"400\" data-original-width=\"700\" height=\"364\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-tExZOoj_Ulc/XFq80M4-9HI/AAAAAAABfpM/Cb2GBq6gIdELOZqSC6Qect6mGpPviS1zQCLcBGAs/s640/gulf-strDeam1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-VWm_aJRkT0s/XFtKwwsR03I/AAAAAAABfpk/IsEaqX4zgwEkwhn9_1iKu_0gkuy_GoRhQCLcBGAs/s1600/Britanhbnica-map-620.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"431\" data-original-width=\"620\" height=\"442\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-VWm_aJRkT0s/XFtKwwsR03I/AAAAAAABfpk/IsEaqX4zgwEkwhn9_1iKu_0gkuy_GoRhQCLcBGAs/s640/Britanhbnica-map-620.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/aUR8e-j3I5U/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/aUR8e-j3I5U?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">HUMONGOUS AMOUNT OF&nbsp; CARBON DIOXIDE FORMED BY METHANE OXIDATION IS BLAMED AS MAN MADE CO2 SO THAT JEWS CAN MAKE MONEY OUT OF THIN AIR- CARBON CREDITS/ CARBON OFFSET/ CAP AND TRADE BULLSHIT ..&nbsp;&nbsp;</b><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Anaerobic oxidation of\nmethane (AOM) is a microbial process<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CH 4 + 2 O2 -&gt; CO 2\n+ 2 H 2 O --- Total Oxidation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Methane (CH4) is\noxidized with molecular oxygen (O2) to carbon dioxide (CO2).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CH 4 + 0.5 O2 -&gt; CO\n+ 2 H 2 --- Partial Oxidation</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CO + 0.5 O2 -&gt; CO\n2--&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; CO Oxidation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/OVdZ6Pl0oLo/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/OVdZ6Pl0oLo?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Black Sea is\nclassified as a meromictic body of water. &nbsp;A meromictic lake has layers of water that do\nnot intermix..&nbsp; The Black Sea has over\n3000 gas seeps, releasing methane (CH4) from deep-sea mud volcanoes. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Methanotrophs can\noxidize methane aerobically and anaerobically, yet the majority are found in\nthe anoxic zone where the concentration of methane is the highest.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The top\nlayer of the Black Sea is approximately 50 to 100 metres deep and is exposed to\noxygen in the atmosphere; the bottom layer is 2000 metres deep and has no\ndissolved oxygen..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aerobic methanotrophs oxidize methane using oxygen as the\nelectron acceptor producing formaldehyde <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Methanotrophy is the\nmicrobially mediated process of the oxidation of CH 4 with O 2 to methanol ,\nformaldehyde , formate, and finally CO 2<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anaerobic oxidation of\nmethane (AOM) is a microbial process.. During AOM methane is oxidized with\ndifferent terminal electron acceptors such as sulfate, nitrate, nitrite and\nmetals<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Coupled to nitrate and\nnitrite reduction--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The overall reactions\nare:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CH4 + 4NO3\u2212 \u2192 CO2 +\n4NO2\u2212 + 2H2O<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3CH4 + 8NO2\u2212 + 8H+ \u2192\n3CO2 + 4N2 + 10H2O<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AOM is considered to be\na very important process reducing the emission of the greenhouse gas methane\nfrom the ocean into the atmosphere. It is estimated that more than 82% of all\nthe methane that arises from marine sediments is oxidized anaerobically by this\nprocess.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Deepwater Horizon\nrig was drilling in Block 252 of an area known as the Mississippi Canyon of the\nGulf, containing methane hydrate-bearing sediments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">More than &nbsp;51% of Gulf Oil Spill Was Potent Methane Gas\nliquid oil wasn't the only hydrocarbon that gushed out of the Macondo well for\n84 days..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again, more than 51\n%&nbsp; of the leak was Methane gas, invisible\nto the naked eye and hence NOT reported <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The total volume of\ndischarged gas was around 810,000 Tonnes \u2013and it is <b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">STILL LEAKING</span></b> Methane .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/6wICBruQKXQ/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/6wICBruQKXQ?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gas and oil occur together\nin deep ocean deposits, so it should come as no surprise that the Macondo well\nreleased large amounts of gas.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nConcentrations of dissolved hydrocarbons at up to 120,000 times higher\nthan background levels.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This gas-rich layer was about 3,300 feet below the\nocean surface. in the case of the BP spill, most of the gas was trapped in the\nocean, and very little made it to the atmosphere\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">METHANE &nbsp;DISSOLVED AND MERGED INTO THE GULF STREAM</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Methane oxidizing\nbacteria Methanotrophs&nbsp; are prokaryotes\nthat metabolize methane as their only source of carbon and energy. They can\ngrow aerobically or anaerobically and require single-carbon compounds to\nsurvive. &nbsp;&nbsp;..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Methane is both the energy\nsource (electron donor) and the sole or partial carbon source for methanotrophs<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I HAVE THE WATCHING THE\nGULF STREAM AS A SHIP CAPTAIN FOR 30 YEARS ..&nbsp;\nI KNOW WHAT I AM TALKING ABOUT..&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE GULF STREAM IS AT\nITS WEAKEST, SLOWEST AND WARMEST POINT EVER SINCE MAN CAME N EARTH<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I AM NOT SOME FAT ASS\nOF NASA SITTING IN AN AC OFFICE PEERING INTO HIS SOFTWARE MODEL ON HIS COMPUTER<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Global Ocean\nConveyor Belt, sends warm, salty Gulf Stream water to the North Atlantic where\nit releases heat to the atmosphere and warms Western Europe. The cooler water\nthen sinks to great depths and travels all the way to Antarctica and eventually\ncirculates back up to the Gulf Stream <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ocean is not a\nstill body of water.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is constant motion in the ocean in the form of a\nglobal ocean conveyor belt. This motion is caused by a combination of\nthermohaline currents (thermo = temperature; haline = salinity) in the deep\nocean and wind-driven currents on the surface. Cold, salty water is dense and\nsinks to the bottom of the ocean while warm water is less dense and remains on\nthe surface.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ocean conveyor gets\nits \u201cstart\u201d in the Norwegian Sea, where warm water from the Gulf Stream heats\nthe atmosphere in the cold northern latitudes. This loss of heat to the\natmosphere makes the water cooler and denser, causing it to sink to the bottom\nof the ocean.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As more warm water is transported north, the cooler water sinks\nand moves south to make room for the incoming warm water.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This cold bottom\nwater flows south of the equator all the way down to Antarctica. Eventually,\nthe cold bottom waters returns to the surface through mixing and wind-driven\nupwelling, continuing the conveyor belt that encircles the globe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again, Methane\nhydrates, also called methane clathrates, are deposits of frozen methane gas\nfound at the bottom of the ocean <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Methane hydrates,\ncage-like structures where methane molecules are trapped in crystals of water\nice molecules. &nbsp;&nbsp;Worldwide hydrate\nreserves could hold THREE TIMES&nbsp; as much\nenergy as all the fossil fuels found on Earth.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kAIaTBzT3h4/XFtKbFgG4vI/AAAAAAABfpY/TBfKtV7w6eQAVe5hNotoFdrhDr0Rw7-uQCLcBGAs/s1600/Segcptember-1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"410\" data-original-width=\"615\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kAIaTBzT3h4/XFtKbFgG4vI/AAAAAAABfpY/TBfKtV7w6eQAVe5hNotoFdrhDr0Rw7-uQCLcBGAs/s640/Segcptember-1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">DEEPWATER HORIZON\nLEAKED 49% VISIBLE OIL&nbsp; ( 6.03&nbsp; MILLION BARRELS OF BLACK OIL ) &nbsp;AND 51 % INVISIBLE METHANE.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Methane released near\nthe bottom in deep water rarely reaches the atmosphere directly but instead\nremains in the deep water..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Actually all this potential wealth belongs to Mexico.. Methane Chathrates\nrepresent the most tantalizing new frontier of unconventional energy \u2014 a\npotential source of hydrocarbon fuel thrice&nbsp;\nlarge as all the petroleum deposits ever known.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For the oil and gas industry, the substances\nare also known to be the primary hazard when drilling for deepwater oil.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">METHANE CLATHRATE &nbsp;IS THE ROOT CAUSE OF THE DEEP WATER HORIZON\nDISASTER..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE BP MANAGEMENT DID NOT KNOW IF THEY WERE COMING OR GOING..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I HAVE WORKED FOR BP, I KNOW HOW STUPID THEY ARE ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Methane hydrate is a\ncage-like lattice of ice inside of which are trapped molecules of methane,&nbsp; the chief constituent of natural gas. If\nmethane hydrate is either warmed or depressurized, it will revert back to water\nand natural gas.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When brought to the earth's surface, one cubic meter of gas\nhydrate releases 164 cubic meters of natural gas. the energy content of methane\noccurring in hydrate form is immense, possibly exceeding the combined energy\ncontent of all other known fossil fuels.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;calibri&quot; , &quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Methane hydrates are\nvolatile compounds \u2014 natural gas compressed into molecular cages of ice. They\nare stable in the extreme cold and crushing weight of deepwater, but are\nextremely dangerous when they build up inside the drill column of a well. If\ndestabilized by heat or a decrease in pressure, methane hydrates can quickly\nexpand to 164 times their volume.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Survivors of the BP rig explosion told\ninterviewers that right before the April 20 blast, workers had decreased the\npressure in the drill column and applied heat to set the cement seal around the\nwellhead.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Then a quickly expanding bubble of methane gas shot up the drill\ncolumn before exploding on the platform on the ocean's</span>&nbsp; .</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even a solid steel pipe\nhas little chance against a 164-fold expansion of volume..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A sudden large scale\nrelease of methane hydrates is believed to have caused a mass extinction 55\nmillion years ago.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The oil and gas\nindustry have experience with methane hydrates, because they have to be kept\nfrom forming in pipes or they will clog the lines, stop the flow of oil, and\npose a danger.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Drillers use inhibitors such as methanol to keep the hydrates\nfrom crystallizing inside drill rigs operating at great depth, where conditions\nfor methane hydrate formation are ideal. From the sea floor a mile down, the\nDeepwater Horizon rig had penetrated another 18,000 feet \u2014 almost another five\nmiles down \u2014 into the earth's crust with pipe.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cofferdam that BP lowered\nover the broken pipe gushing oil to contain the spill was almost immediately\nclogged by methane hydrates, which formed spontaneously.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gas escaping with the\noil from the well, when trapped in the steel structure with cold water under\ngreat pressure, rapidly accumulated into an ice-like matrix. the impact of a\nmoving hydrate mass\" caused the pipe to fail.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The explosion caused a large\npiece of pipe to strike the foreman, killing him. When a surge of gas started shooting\nup the well, a crucial seal on the blowout preventer at the well head on the\nocean floor failed.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;It had been damaged weeks before and neglected as\ninconsequential by Transocean managers, the blast occurred right after workers\n\"introduced heat to set the cement seal around the wellhead<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Warming waters in the\nGulf Stream &nbsp;destabilizes methane hydrate.\n&nbsp;&nbsp;Slight changes in the Gulf Stream flow\ndirection can destabilize methane hydrate by introducing warm waters to regions\npreviously exposed only to cold bottom-water currents <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A changing Gulf Stream\nhas the potential to thaw and convert hundreds of gigatonnes of frozen methane\nhydrate trapped below the sea floor<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rising ocean\ntemperatures could thaw hydrates, potentially releasing humongous methane to\nthe atmosphere. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\">If the GLOBAL WARMING\nPOTENTIAL ( GWP ) is 1 for Carbon Dioxide, it is 302 for Nitrous oxide and 104\nfor Methane over a 20 year period.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Methane gets oxidized\nto Carbon Dioxide and the blame falls on India for burning coal and spewing\nCarbon Dioxide . CO2 is a god gas ..Modi is playing ball with desh drohi kosher\nforces to shut down our coal powered electric plants .. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>JEW darling Modi shouts\nfrom the roof tops\u2014SUN AND WIND IS FREE ..
