, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/industry/energy/power/india-targeting-40-of-power-generation-from-non-fossil-fuel-by-2030-pm-modi/articleshow/66043374.cms\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/industry/energy/power/india-targeting-40-of-power-generation-from-non-fossil-fuel-by-2030-pm-modi/articleshow/66043374.cms</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Twenty &nbsp;times more methane is escaping from melting\npermafrost in the Arctic than previously thought. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gas hydrates is \u201cthe\nmethane time bomb\u201d. Methane hydrate destabilisation by warming seawater is the\ngreat monster-under-the-bed of climate change.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of the methane\nemitted from the Deepwater Horizon wellhead was dissolved in the deep ocean , a\nsignificant component of the methane still dissolves in seawater&nbsp; before rising to the surface and can be\navailable in the deep water for methane oxidation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like I said before\nMethane can be degraded by means of microbial oxidation under both aerobic and\nanaerobic conditions<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Changes in Atlantic\nOcean circulation have an impact on weather patterns and extreme weather across\nEurope and North America. It affects the monsoon of India too.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THERE WAS NO EL NINO\nPHENOMENON BEFORE THE GULF STREAM GOT INJECTED WITH METHANE , GOT WARMED UP AND\nSLOWED DOWN..&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I HAVE SAILED THIS PLANET FOR 4 DECADES\u2014I KNOW !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/el-nino-and-la-nina-mariners-overview.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/el-nino-and-la-nina-mariners-overview.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-IKK_2M-mPr4/XFuqLWYahWI/AAAAAAABfrM/ZAUi8boBA4UYBkYak8EXQJZWjiYR9UuzQCLcBGAs/s1600/drdownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"176\" data-original-width=\"286\" height=\"246\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-IKK_2M-mPr4/XFuqLWYahWI/AAAAAAABfrM/ZAUi8boBA4UYBkYak8EXQJZWjiYR9UuzQCLcBGAs/s400/drdownload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">When methane is anthropogenically emitted,\nmethane is oxidized in the atmosphere a decade or two later. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Once oxidized, the carbon in each methane\nmolecule is converted to CO2, which then stays in the atmosphere as CO2 for\nanother century or more. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\">So really, when methane is emitted, you get a\ndouble whammy: first from the methane itself followed by the CO2 that results\nfrom atmospheric oxidization.</span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">CO2 EMISSIONS FROM ATMOSPHERIC OXIDATION OF\nMETHANE WAS BURIED UNDER THE KOSHER CARPET BY IPCC\u2014WHOSE MAIN AIM WAS TO\nPREVENT INDIAN FROM BURNING COAL .</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">IT IS NO USE TELLING MODI ALL THIS..<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">GUJJO NO 2 WILL LISTEN ONLY IF CAPT AJIT\nVADAKAYIL FIRST GIVES HIM AN EGO MASSAGE ( AND THEN SPIN GUJJU NO 1s CHARKHA\nFOR GOOD MEASURE ) .. <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">SUCH\nIS HIS HUMONGOUS PERSONAL EGO..</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ixtoc I was an\nexploratory oil well being drilled by the semi-submersible drilling rig Sedco\n135 in the Bay of Campeche of the Gulf of Mexico, On 3 June 1979, the well\nsuffered a blowout resulting in one of the largest oil spills in history.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ixtoc I was an\nexploratory oil well being drilled by the semi-submersible drilling rig Sedco\n135 in the Bay of Campeche of the Gulf of Mexico, On 3 June 1979, the well\nsuffered a blowout resulting in one of the largest oil spills in history.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE\nGULF STREAM SLOWED DOWN CONSIDERABLY IN 1979 .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was kept a KOSHER\nsecret..&nbsp;&nbsp; Sedco 135 burned and collapsed\ninto the sea. This disaster also happened due to Methane Clathrates.. But the\nCUNTS could not figure it out.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the time of the\naccident Sedco 135 was drilling at a depth of about 3,600 metres&nbsp; below the seafloor. The same KICK caused by\nsudden expansion of Methane took place .. Remember, the Methane Clathrates (\nhydrates) are essentially compressed gas. And while they can sit, stable and\nsafe, at the bottom of the ocean, changes in temperature or pressure can\nquickly launch an explosive breakdown.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">About a month before the blowout, a\n\"kick\" of gas pressure hit the well hard enough that the platform was\nshut down\u2014this is on record. Yet the CUNTS were like Alice in Wonderland.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Efficient blowout preventers were NOT\ndeveloped to cope with extreme erratic pressures and uncontrolled flow\n(formation kick) emanating from a well reservoir during drilling. Uncontrolled\nkicks lead to a&nbsp; catastrophic event known\nas a blowout. If the blowout preventers and mud do not restrict the upward\npressures of a kick, a blowout results, potentially shooting tubing, oil and\ngas up the wellbore, damaging the rig<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The primary functions\nof a blowout preventer system are to:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Confine well fluid to\nthe wellbore;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Provide means to add\nfluid to the wellbore;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Allow controlled\nvolumes of fluid to be withdrawn from the wellbore.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Additionally, and in\nperforming those primary functions, blowout preventer systems are used to:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Regulate and monitor\nwellbore pressure;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Center and hang off the\ndrill string in the wellbore;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shut in the well (e.g.\nseal the void, annulus, between drillpipe and casing);<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cKill\u201d the well\n(prevent the flow of formation fluid, influx, from the reservoir into the\nwellbore) ;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Seal the wellhead\n(close off the wellbore);<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sever the casing or\ndrill pipe (in case of emergencies).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In deer offshore\noperations with the wellhead just above the mudline on the sea floor, there are\nfive primary ways by which a BOP can be controlled.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The possible means are:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hydraulic Control\nSignal: sent from surface through a hydraulic umbilical;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Electrical Control\nSignal: sent from the surface through a control cable;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Acoustical Control\nSignal: sent from the surface based on a modulated/encoded pulse of sound\ntransmitted by an underwater transducer;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ROV Intervention:\nremotely operated vehicles (ROVs) mechanically control valves and provide hydraulic\npressure to the stack (via \u201chot stab\u201d panels);<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Deadman Switch / Auto\nShear: fail-safe activation of selected BOPs during an emergency, and if the\ncontrol, power and hydraulic lines have been severed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An emergency disconnect\nsystem/sequence, or EDS, disconnects the rig from the well in case of an\nemergency. The EDS is also intended to automatically trigger the deadman\nswitch, which closes the BOP, kill and choke valves<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the Deepwater\nHorizon drilling rig explosion incident on April 20, 2010, the blowout\npreventer should have been activated automatically, cutting the drillstring and\nsealing the well to preclude a blowout and subsequent oil spill in the Gulf of\nMexico, but it failed to fully engage<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On Sep. 30, 1966 the\nSoviet Union in Urta-Bulak, an area about 80 kilometers from Bukhara,\nUzbekistan, experienced blowouts on five natural gas wells. It was claimed in\nKomsomoloskaya Pravda that after years of burning uncontrollably they were able\nto stop them entirely. The Soviets lowered a specially made 30 kiloton nuclear\nbomb into a 6 kilometres borehole drilled&nbsp;\n50 metres&nbsp; away from the original\n(rapidly leaking) well.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A nuclear explosive was deemed necessary because conventional\nexplosive both lacked the necessary power and would also require a great deal\nmore space underground.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">When the bomb was set off, it crushed the original pipe\nthat was carrying the gas from the deep reservoir to the surface and glassified\nall the surrounding rock.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This caused the leak and fire at the surface to cease\nwithin approximately one minute of the explosion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1 m3of methane hydrate\ncan release 164 m3of methane gas and 0.87 m3of water when thehydrate\ndissociates (i.e. becomes unstable) under standard condition.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;THE GULF STREAM SLOWED DOWN CONSIDERABLY IN\n1979 . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONVERSION OF METHANE\nINTO CARBON DIOXIDE ( THIS IS NOT MAN MADE BY BURNING COAL ) WAS DELIBERATELY NOT\nDISCUSSED AT PARIS COP21 OR KATOWICE COP24.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br />A BUNCH OF FOOLS ATTENDED THESE\nCLIMATE CONFERENCES.. JEWS WERE WAITING LIKE VULTURES TO MILK CARBON TAX MONEY\nOUT OF THIN AIR..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was kept a KOSHER\nsecret..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Gulf Stream is an\nocean current which is part of AMOC , that keeps the UK warmer than it would be\ngiven its latitude alone. The &nbsp;impact was\nas much as 5C, keeping London and Western Europe far less cold than say parts\nof Canada which are at the same latitude. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AMOC has slowed down by\nmore than 18%..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A slower current will\ncarry less heat down to the deep oceans meaning more will enter the atmosphere.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Arctic sea ice and\nGreenland land ice melts they dilute the salinity of the &nbsp;northern Atlantic. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This makes the seawater\nless dense and stopping water from sinking to the seabed.&nbsp; &nbsp;This\nin turn slows down AMOC, which is driven by the flux of water with different\ndensities.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WILL NOT ALLOW HIM.</span></b>.&nbsp;</div>\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/UuGrBhK2c7U/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/UuGrBhK2c7U?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Getting back-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The AMOC is complex\nsystem where warmer and colder waters interact and create a continuous\ncirculation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Atlantic Meridional\nOverturning Circulation, or AMOC, is a conveyor belt that brings surface water\nnorthward in the Atlantic; from there, the heavier salty water sinks and\nreturns at depth from the Labrador and Nordic seas, near the North Pole, all\nthe way south to the Southern Ocean.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the North Atlantic,\nthe saltier water from the tropics sinks almost a mile (1,500 meters). As it\ndoes, it carries heat down with it away from the surface. Increasing amounts of\nfresh water flowing into the waters around Greenland have led to a dilution of\nthese waters, making them lighter and thus hindering the formation of the deep\nwater circulation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Changes in the strength\nof the AMOC affect how much heat leaves our atmosphere<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The AMOC is a key\ncomponent of the Earth\u2019s climate system and redistributes heat from the tropics\nto the polar region across the Atlantic Ocean. As the system of ocean currents\nslows down, it transports less heat northward, resulting in changes to ocean\nsurface temperatures..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Given the importance of the AMOC to heat\nexchange between the ocean and the atmosphere, the varying strength of this\nsystem has major impacts on the global climate, and has been implicated widely\nin some of the most remarkable and abrupt climate changes of the past.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Direct\nmeasurements of the modern AMOC flow rates show a marked decline in its\nstrength in the past 2 decades..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Slowdown in the AMOC is a direct &nbsp;response to warming caused by anthropogenic\ngreenhouse-gas emissions by the methane laden Gulf Stream.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; WEED OUT FOREIGN PAYROLL STOOGES FROM NGT..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">NGT MUST KNOW THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN SMOKE AND DUST .. EVEN A RETARDED CHILD CAN FIGURE THIS OUT\u2026<br /><br />STOP KILLING INDIAs AGRICULTURE BY PUTTING A BAN ON CROP STUBBLE BURNING..<br /><br />THIS HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH SMOG IN DELHI..</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">THE SMOG IN DELHI IS DUE TO TEMPERATURE INVERSION --AND IT HAPPENS ONLY IN COLD MONTHS..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nDELHI IS AN UNSUITABLE PLACE FOR A HUGE CITY, ESPECIALLY A NATIONs CAPITAL..<br />\n<br />\nINSTEAD ON RELYING ON THE JEALOUS WHITE MAN-- INDIA MUST DO OUR OWN STUDIES USING OUR OWN SATELLITES ABOUT FINE DUST WHICH BLOWS FROM THE FAR AWAY ARABIAN DESERTS TOWARDS INDIA EVERY YEAR..<br />\n<br />\nTHESE DUST WAVES ARE DEPOSITED ON SHIPS DECKS AT SEA ..<br />\n<br />\nAFTER COMMANDING SHIPS FOR 3 DECADES I KNOW WHEN MY SHIPS DECKS GET COATED WITH FINE DUST IN THE NORTHERN ARABIAN SEA..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH SMOKE FROM BURNT CROP STUBBLE IN PUNJAB ..<br />\n<br />\nINDIA HAS BEEN DOING CROP STUBBLE BURNING FOR MORE THAN 200 CENTURIES.<br />\n<br />\nFARMERS DONT BURN HARVESTED CROP STUBBLE EVERY DAY ( TO PRODUCE BIOCHAR ) -- JUST LIKE DIWALI IS NOT CELEBRATED EVERY DAY\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nDO NOT ALLOW FOREIGN FUNDED NGOs, COLLEGIUM JUDGES, NGT INTERFERE WITH FARMERS PRODUCE OF FOOD\u2026. WARNING---- MODI GOVT -- BE VERY VERY CAREFUL\u2026\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIF THERE IS SMOG IN DELHI-- SHIFT THE CAPITAL.. \u2026 DELHI HAS A TEMPERATURE INVERSION PROBLEM.. AND THIS CREATES SMOG ..........<br />\n<br />\nBHARATMATA IS MARCHING TO BE THIS PLANETs NO 1 SUPERPOWER IN 15 YEARS\u2026.. THERE ARE DESH DROHI ORGS IN THE PAYROLL OF BILDERBERG CLUB TO MAKE BHARATMATA TRIP AND FALL\u2026. INDIA MUST BE FOOD SECURE..<br />\n<br />\nWE CANT EVEN WIDEN ROADS DUE TO BILDERBERG CONTROLLED NGT, WHO CRY FOUL WHEN A USELESS ROADSIDE TREE IS CUT DOWN...........<br />\n<br />\nFARMERS WHO DO NOT PRODUCE FOOD , BUT PRODUCE NON EDIBLES LIKE RUBBER, COTTON ETC SHOULD NOT BE PROTECTED...<br />\n<br />\nTHESE RICH CASH CROP PRODUCERS DRIVE HUMMERS AND MERCEDES SUVs AND PAY NO TAX USING A LOOPHOLE ........... THEY MUST PAY TAX LIKE THE REST OF INDIA...<br />\n<br />\nONLY FOOD PRODUCING FARMERS AT SOURCE ( NOT MIDDLE MEN/ BROKERS ) MUST BE SPONSORED......<br />\n<br />\nAS LONG AS INDIA IS SELF SUFFICIENT IN FOOD, DESPITE MONSOON FAILURES FOR THREE CONSECUTIVE YEARS , NOBODY CAN STOP BHARATMATAs MARCH TO BE THIS PLANETs NO 1 SUPERPOWER IN 15 YEARS \u2026<br />\n<br />\nIndians were to first on the planet to do agriculture. ..We taught the rest of the planet about the magic of BIOCHAR \u2026 Biochar has the ability to sequester carbon out of the atmosphere and back into the ground ...<br />\n<br />\nTall grasses burn quick and hot, however, close to the ground where the roots start, air is excluded so the base of the grasses will pyrolyze and not burn\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCarbon is the most essential element of soil fertility. When organic matter is added to agricultural soils to increase carbon levels, most of it rapidly decomposes to carbon dioxide and escapes to the atmosphere... Only a very small percentage eventually becomes stable humic matter...<br />\n<br />\nHumification takes decades to centuries..The process creates a fine-grained, highly porous charcoal that helps soils retain nutrients and water\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nBiochar serves as an electron buffer for redox reactions and helps bacteria swap electrons among themselves, improving their metabolic efficiency as a microbial community.. ..With its pores and its electrical charges, biochar is capable of both aBsorption and aDsorption.. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe surfaces of biochar, both internal and external, aDsorb materials by electro-chemical bonds, working like an electric sponge...Biochar surfaces adsorb carbon and retain it in compounds with minerals, supporting at the same time a large microbial community that potentially makes more efficient use of organic debris containing carbon and other nutrients...<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Biochar lasts at least ten times longer in most soils....<br />\n<br />\nBiochar is effective at retaining nitrogen in soils and there is NO need for CHEMICAL UREA...The desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has left us with a rapidly deteriorating climate, and soils that are dying and eroding....<br />\n<br />\nBiochar, as a form of recalcitrant carbon, is the medicine that DELIBERETELY degraded and unproductive Indian top soils need....<br />\n<br />\nIndia was blessed with HUMUS laden topsoil with healthy microbes and earthworms for millions of years....<br />\n<br />\nJust 55 years of desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has decimated our holy topsoil...<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS THE ONLY INTELLIGENT WAY TO PREVENT FARMER SUICIDES...<br />\n<br />\nThe desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has caused our holy topsoil to lose 80% of their original soil organic carbon (SOC) pool...<br />\n<br />\n90% of our lakes have disappeared due to artificial nitro fertIliser overuse. ..<br />\n<br />\nALL THIS HAS BEEN SENT TO PMO MORE THAN 50 TIMES... font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c1087198918982647084\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6VOqqm-hCbM/XCa06XjAUxI/AAAAAAABfL4/E3K2A6jHNG0XTf7_mZb9kjj9WxD3GwmzQCK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/america-caused-global-warming-with.html?showComment=1549482847362#c1087198918982647084\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 7, 2019 at 1:24 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://www.bloombergquint.com/law-and-policy/clarity-needed-on-lawyers-voicing-their-opinion-on-sub-judice-cases-says-top-court#gs.s7Y3hqDo<br />\n<br />\nIT IS A DISGRACE THAT OUR ILLEGAL COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY DOES NOT KNOW BASICS OF LAW..<br />\n<br />\nIn law, sub judice, Latin for UNDER JUDGEMENT , means that a particular LEGAL case is under trial or being considered / decided by a court of law involving JURY at the present time -- and hence some details of it cannot be discussed in newspapers, on television, etc..<br />\n<br />\nTHE TERM SUB-JUDICE APPLIES ONLY IF THERE IS A JURY..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">IN INDIA JURY WAS ABOLISHED AFTER THE COMMANDER NANAVATI CASE IN 1961, AND HENCE THE TERM SUBJUDICE IS NOT APPLICABLE ANYMORE..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nINDIA INDIA WE HAVE A JUDGE SYSTEM--NOT JURY SYSTEM TODAY..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">THE STUPID JUDICIARY DOES NOT KNOW THAT THERE IS NO JURY TO BE MISLEAD OF PREJUDICED... THERE IS NO DUE PROCESS WHICH CAN BE ADVERSELY INTERFERED WITH BY LOOSE TALK..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nIN THE NANAVATI CASE THE JURY WAS BRAINWASHED BY RK KARANJIA OF THE BLITZ , AND THE JURY WAS MADE TO FALSELY BELIEVE THAT PARSI NANAVATI POINTED A GUN AT AHUJA AND ASKED HIM IF HE WILL MARRY HIS WHITE WIFE WHOM HE WAS HAVING SEX WITH ..AND AHUJA RUDELY REPLIED \"<span style=\"color: red;\"><b>AM I SUPPOSED TO MARRY EVERY WOMAN I HAVE SEX WITH </b></span>\"..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS PROVOKED ( SIC) NANAVATI INTO MURDERING AHUJA..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS WAS A FALSE NARRATIVE , WITHOUT A SHRED OF EVIDENCE INFLUENCING THE JURY MINDSET..AHUJA NEVER SAID IT..&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">PARSI RK KARANJIA SHOULD HAVE BEEN HEAVILY FINED FOR CONTEMPT OF COURT AND JAILED..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nAGAIN-- SUBJUDICE DOES NOT APPLY TO A JUDGE SYSTEM LIKE IN INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nIT IS BEING APPLIED IN INDIA BY THE ILLEGAL COLLEGIUM JUDGES SO THAT THEY CAN APPLY \"JUSTICE IS BLIND SYSTEM SANS CONTEXT \" AND SUBVERT THE SYSTEM FOR THE KOSHER DEEP STATE ..<br />\n<br />\nWHY DOES A BLOGGER HAVE TO TELL ALL THIS ? ..<br />\n<br />\nWHAT A CRYING DISGRACE !....<br />\n<br />\nREAD ALL 8 PARTS OF THE UNFINISHED BLOG SERIES BELOW-- ( ONLY 26% COMPLETE )...<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/justice-be-damned-enforce-law-not-any.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c4730716229054910634\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/mistakes-deliberate-or-inadvertant-in_7.html?showComment=1549607159129#c4730716229054910634\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 8, 2019 at 11:55 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCHINA HAS THE ABILITY TO JAM OUR GPS .. THIS TECHNOLOGY HAS BEEN PASSED ON TO PAKISTAN..<br />\n<br />\nINDIAN AIRFORCE AND NAVY MUST CONDUCTS FLIGHTS WHERE THE GPS IS TURNED OFF , AS A DRILL.<br />\n<br />\nONCE ON MY SHIP, I INSERTED A \"TIME BOUND \" ERROR IN THE SHIPS GPS ON APPROACHES TO JEDDAH.. ALL MY OFFICERS WENT INTO A SWEAT AND THEN BRAIN DEAD IN THE MIDDLE OF REEFS.. THEY BEGGED ME NOT TO LEAVE THE NAVIGATING BRIDGE..<br />\n<br />\nAFTER THIS INCIDENT I NOTED MY NAVIGATING OFFICERS WERE ALL BURNT OUT FOR A WEEK..YOU CAN SEE THE REEFS BELOW OFF JEDDAH.. ESPECIALLY IF YOU WEAR GREEN TINTED RAYBAN GLASSES,<br />\n<br />\nOUR NAVY/ AIRFORCE IS TOO DEPENDENT OF GPS..<br />\n<br />\nTHE PMs AIRCRAFT PILOTS MUST BE TRAINED TO FLY WITHOUT GPS..<br />\n<br />\nI WAS A SHIP CAPTAIN FOR 30 YEARS.. IN MY FIRST 4 YEARS OF COMMAND MY SHIPS DID NOT HAVE A GPS--WE NAVIGATED USING SEXTANTS.<br />\n<br />\nBy using a system called Simulated Programmable Aircraft-Embedded Jammer, we can realistically simulate GPS jamming on one plane's equipment without affecting others..<br />\n<br />\nFighter jets can have accurate onboard inertial navigation systems. Basically a computer with accelerometers, gyroscopes, and magnetic sensors, this nav system continuously calculates positioning and requires no outside data.<br />\n<br />\nFighter planes can also use their AESA-scanned array radars in concert with inertial navigation to find their way over shorter ranges if need be. Aircraft electro-optical and infrared sensors can also read terrain over short distances to provide additional navigation<br />\n<br />\nIf strike aircraft have reliable communications or datalinks, other aircraft ( ask PUTIN ) , flying outside the GPS-disrupted zone, may be able to relay position and targeting information. Some missiles carried by strike aircraft have laser-guiding instead of or in addition to GPS-guiding.<br />\n<br />\nFOUR YEARS AGO I WROTE THIS 4 PART BLOG SERIES FOR MODI.. HE DID NOT CARE AS THERE WAS NO EGO MASSAGE EMBEDDED..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/11/world-war-3-sans-gps-and-emp-taken-out.html<br />\n<br />\nTHE DEVICE IN THE VIDEO BELOW ( DIGAR ) CANNOT SAVE US FIGHTER JETS FROM RUSSIAN GPS JAMMERS AND SCRAMBLERS ..<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T0OjIY5j95M<br />\n<br />\nI BOUGHT MY OWN PERSONAL GPS AT A HONONULU US NAVAL STORE ( USING EX-NAVY AGENTS PULL ) 3 DECADES AGO ..
